1a1(phal chen): phal chen kha pa bzhugs so// /
1a2(phal chen): pha
1b1(phal chen): shin du rgas pa chen
1b2(phal chen): mamado// sangs rgyas pa la
1b3(phal chen): lho phyogs rgyal ba 'od dpag med la na po//
1b4(phal chen): tas rin 'byung gnas
2a1(phal chen): po che zhes bya ba/ bam po sum bcu
2a2(phal chen): gcig go// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs
2a3(phal chen): bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu mngon par lhags
2b1(phal chen): te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
2b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhi stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs par gyur pa
2b3(phal chen): dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ri re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu rdul
2b4(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dag lhan cig tu phyin to// byang chub sem
3a1(phal chen): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje rgyal
3a2(phal chen): mtshan dang / dam pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ye shes
3a3(phal chen): kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / dri ma med pa'i rgyal
3a4(phal chen): mtshan dang / dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa'
3a5(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs par gyur pa dag ste/
3b1(phal chen): 'di ltar rin po che'i snying po dang / yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang / dngul gyi snying po dang / gser gyi snying po dang /
3b2(phal chen): nor bu'i snying po dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang / ud
3b3(phal chen): dpal la'i snying po dang / tsan dan gyi snying po dang / spos kyi snying po zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dang
3b4(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham 'bring nas tshangs par spyod
3b5(phal chen): ba dag ste/ 'di ltar shin du 'phags pa'i dpal dang / g.yo ba med pa'i dpal dang / bcings pa med pa'i dpal
4a1(phal chen): dang / spyod pa'i dpal dang / 'od zer gyi dpal dang / mtha' las rgal ba'i dpal dang /
4a2(phal chen): mchog gi dpal dang / dbang phyug gi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / shin du bsags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ de nas
4a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs bcu rgyas par byas ste/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su
4a4(phal chen): stan nas seng ge'i khri rin po che'i snying po dang / nor bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag mngon par sgrol te/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs
4a5(phal chen): ba'i lus dang / 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa gtong ba/ dri ma med pa'i 'od gtong ba dang / tshad med pa'i 'od
4a6(phal chen): rab du bskyed pa dang / rnam por dag pa'i rin po che'i yang dag par 'dzin gzungs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa kha na
4b1(phal chen): ma tho ba med pa las byung ba'i smon lam dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni yid du 'ong ba dang / lta na don yod pa dang sems can gdul ba dang /
4b2(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i chos kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyabs par byang
4b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i brtse gcig tu smon lam btab pas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
4b4(phal chen): cad kyang 'di lta ste/ chags pa med par spyod pas sangs rgyas kyis zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / 'di lta ste gnas med pa'i lus
4b5(phal chen): kyis 'di lta ste/ tshad med pa'i lus kyis kun du 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi lus byin gyis rlabs pa dang / 'di lta ste mtha' dang dbus
4b6(phal chen): med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang / 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo 'byam klas
4b7(phal chen): pa tshad med par gyur pa dang / 'di lta ste chos la mi 'jigs par mkhas pa'i snang ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'di lta ste phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal
5a1(phal chen): pa mi zad pa yang dag par shes pa'i tshul ba shad pa dang / 'di lta ste gzugs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa'i
5a2(phal chen): ye shes kyi phung po rab tu rgyas pa dang / 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings rgyas par gyur pa'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa dang / 'di lta ste na mkha'i
5a3(phal chen): dbyings kyis klas par ye shes kyi spyod yul yongs su gnas pa dang / 'tshams med cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyod pa dang ldan pa
5a4(phal chen): rab tu thob par gyur pa dag go/ ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di dga' ldan gyis gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'dus par de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams
5a5(phal chen): cad du/ gling bzhi pa dang dga' ldan gyis gnas dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa'i ming de skad ces bya ba dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di skad ces bya ba
5a6(phal chen): dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham 'bring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag 'ongs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
5a7(phal chen): pus mo gnyis nas/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung ste/ phyogs bcu thams cod snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad stan to//
5b1(phal chen): des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul/
5b2(phal chen): pa yod pa mthong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji snyed kyis phyogs bcur chos kyis dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis mthar thugs pa dag ni de
5b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i/ sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
5b4(phal chen): snang mdzad kyi sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs su gyur pa dag ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mos rnam par 'phrul pa
5b5(phal chen): la mos par sha stag go// chos kyi dbyings kyi lus tha dad pa med pa'i rjesu song ba sha stag go/ gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i rjes song bas rab tu zhugs
5b6(phal chen): ba sha stag go// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab par lta ba la rjesu gzhol ba sha stag go// chags pa med pa'i sems skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par byed pa
5b7(phal chen): sha stag go// bsam pa rin po che rdul dang bral ba dang ldan pa sha stag go// brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang 'grogs pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi
6a1(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// yang dag par spyod pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go//
6a2(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dran pa rnam par dag pa la gnas pa she stag go// blo dang sems skad cig thams cad kyis cher 'phags pa rab tu thob pa sha
6a3(phal chen): stag go// chung ngur zhugs shing cher gyur po'i spyod pa la dbang ba sha stag go// cher gyur pa la zhugs shing chung ngur 'jug pa'i rjesu chud nas ye shes kyi spyod pa'i pha rol du phyin
6a4(phal chen): ba sha stag go// de lta bu gnas dang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rang bzhin rjesu rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i byang
6a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs ltar grub pa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba'i spyod yul thams cad du 'gro ba dang / ye shes
6a6(phal chen): chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo rnam par phye ba dang / ye shes kyi stobs rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi mthus mchog thob pa dang / rdo rje spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rab du thob pa dang / sems
6a7(phal chen): can bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong grangs med pa rnams yongs su smin par 'dul ba la rmongs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad 'gro ba gdon mi za ba'i
6a8(phal chen): mchog pa dang / bgrangs pa thams cad mngon par chags pa dang / bgrangs pa mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad shin tu bslab pa dang / bgrang ba'i shes pa thams cad kyi mthar thug
6b1(phal chen): cing / chos rnam par bgod pa la mkhas pa dang / 'di dag dang gzhan yang yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dang / yon tan bsngags pa rnam par dag pa
6b2(phal chen): zad pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum gyis yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa sha stag pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon gsum du bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
6b3(phal chen): 'byam klas pa thams cad lta ba'i phyir kun nas 'dus par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
6b4(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yang dag sangs rgyas skyes pa med// rgyal ba mya ngan mi 'da' ste// rgyu mthun pa'i smon
6b5(phal chen): lam gyis// des ni rnam par 'phrul pa snang // 'di dag chos ni bsam mi khyab// 'di dag sems kyi spyod yul min// gang gis ye shes pha rol phyin// des ni
6b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas spyod yul mthong // lus 'di yang dag sangs rgyas min// sgra yang de bzhin gshegs pa min// lus dang sgra las gzhan na yang // sangs rgyas rnam par
6b7(phal chen): 'phrul mi mthong // sngon gyi lam rnams ma rtogs par// rang 'byung rnams kyi spyod yul gyi// mchog gi tshul rnam shes pa ni// blo gzhan rnams kyi mi nus so//
6b8(phal chen): yang dag sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di// gang dag nas kyang ma 'ong ste// gang du'ang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag rang byung skra yin no// tshad med shin du 'dren pa
7a1(phal chen): rnams// chos 'di rab du bshad mdzad kyang // chos la gnas pa gang yang med// zhing rnams bye ba kun nas snang // mkhyen
7a2(phal chen): pa mkhyen pa mtha' dang dbus med te// chos kun khong du chud cing rtog/ chos kyi dbyings la rab zhags nas// rnam par 'phral ba ston mdzad pa// chos rnams kun la chags pa
7a3(phal chen): med// 'gro ba de ni sgribs mi mnga'// tshad med pa'i yon tan gyis// zhing rnams kun tu rab du snang // gang zhig ye shes 'di dag dang // ye shes thams cad rtogs 'dod
7a4(phal chen): bas// bsam pa rnam par sbyang byas te// byang chub spyod pa spyad par bya// drang srong chen po byin gyis brlabs// 'di 'dra gang gi mthong 'gyur cing // de ni the tshom mi byed na/
7a5(phal chen): dge ba shes mchog la bstan pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas nas// de'i
7a6(phal chen): tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// shin tu zab te brjod du med// brjod du yod kyang 'da' bar dka'// tshig gi lam las shin du 'das// na mkha' la ni rgyal ba snang /
7a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis// mi'i seng ge mthong bar 'gyur// yang dag sangs rgyas rtogs med kyang // rgyal bar rnam par rtogs par snang // 'jig rten mgon
7a8(phal chen): pos 'di nyid dngos// zab mo 'di dag yang dag bstan// gang zag mtshungs pa med pa yin// des ni 'di rab du byung // thams cad gzugs kyi spyod yul gyi// ye shes chen
7b1(phal chen): po 'di 'dra ste// 'di la gang zhig rtogs 'dod pa// des na rgyal ba mngon du byos// yid kyi dbang po rnam dag pas// de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur zhib// 'di'i tshul las
7b2(phal chen): 'das byed tshe// nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o// mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang // byang chub sems kyi bstan pa rnams// the tsom rnam par zlog byas te// de dag la ni skyon med
7b3(phal chen): ltos// rgyal sras gang gis chos kyi dbyings// shin tu brtan pa'i mthar phyin pa// des ni kun gzigs rnam 'bral pa// de dag shin du 'da' bar bya// dang po chos 'di'i rtsa ba
7b4(phal chen): zhes// chos kyi phung po bshad mdzad kyis// dad pa shin tu cher skyes la// byang chub spyod pa spyad par gyis// sangs rgyas sti stang gang byed cing // de bzhin gshegs la
7b5(phal chen): drin bzo ba// yang dag sangs rgyas dpal ldan pas// de dag rgyang mar mi gnas so// bdag nyid che ba 'di lta bus// gang gis thos mthong mkhas pa rnams// spyod yul
7b6(phal chen): thob pas cir 'gyur ba'i// smon lam su zhig spyod mi byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam
7b7(phal chen): par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas// mig gis gzugs rnams mthong gyur pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas byin brlabs kyis/
7b8(phal chen): dag pa'i sems ldan rgyal ba mthong // ji ltar brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa// rgya mtsho la ni 'jug par byed// de bzhin ye shes stobs ldan pas// bsam du med pa'i
8a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas mthong // ji ltar sa bon rnam par dag/ zhing bzang la ni skye 'gyur ba// de bzhin sems pa rnam dag la// sangs
8a2(phal chen): rgyas chos ni skye bar 'gyur// ji ltar nor gyis phung po yis// dbul ba thams cad spong byed pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyis// byang chub sems dpa' rnam
8a3(phal chen): dag 'gyur// ji ltar dug tu 'gyur ba la// nad med drug sman rgyal bar byed// de bzhin nyon mongs rnam pa la// rnam dag tshul ni spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas kyi ni
8a4(phal chen): bsngags pa'i// dge ba'i bshes la brten byas na// de'i mthus ni sangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid 'di dag thos par 'gyur// bskal pa byed bgrangs med par// sbyin pa'i
8a5(phal chen): mchog rnams sbyin byas kyang // 'di'i tshul rab spyod pa'i// grangs dang char yang mi 'gro'o// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par
8a6(phal chen): bris// brjod pas yang dag sangs rgyas rnams// rgyal ba shes par mi nus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ gnas nas g.yo ba mi mnga' ba// sku ni
8a7(phal chen): kun tu rnam rgyu zhing // chos kyi dbyings ni ston mdzad pa// ji ltar na mkha'i khams 'di ni// nam yang rang bzhin mi 'gyur te// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang //
8a8(phal chen): ngo bo nyid las 'gyur ba med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe
8b1(phal chen): tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mi'i 'jig rten 'di kun dang // lha'i gnas rnams thams cad na// 'gro ba ma lus kun na'ang // mi'i gtso bo shin du snang // ji ltar
8b2(phal chen): sems dngos cig pu las// rnam pa tha dad sems brjod pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas sku cig las// sangs rgyas thams cad brjod pa yin// byang chub gnyis
8b3(phal chen): su med par brjod// byang chub de yang mtshan nyid med// mtshan nyid mngon par rnam bris pa'i// sku rnams gnyis su med par 'gyur// nam mkha' chos kyi dbyings
8b4(phal chen): la zhugs// sgyu ma'i sa yang rab du brtan// de phyir sangs rgyas de dag gis// spyod yul lta ba zad pa med// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// mgon po thams
8b5(phal chen): cad dus gsum du// ji ltar 'dul ba'i 'gro ba la// gzugs kyi skur yang rab du snang // 'di 'dra'i lus su bdag gyur ces// sangs rgyas rtogs pa mi mdzad
8b6(phal chen): de// ston pa rnam rtog mi mnga' yang // byin gyis rlab ni ston pa mdzad// dbyer med pa'i dbyings la yang // chos kyi dbyings ni yang dag gnas// 'jig ce/
8b7(phal chen): khams ni tshad med par// thub pas rnam par rtog pas stan// sku ni sprul pa ma yin te// sbrul min pa sku ma yin// sprul pa med pa'i chos 'di yis//
8b8(phal chen): sprul pa rnams ni rab tu bstan// yang dag sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la shin du bstan// mtha' dang dbus med rab du zab// tshig gi lam
9a1(phal chen): gyis bzla bar dka'// kun tu 'gro ba'i chos rnams la// de bzhin gshegs pas don de mkhyen// zhing rnams kun la/
9a2(phal chen): chags mi mnga'// chos kyi dbyings la rnam par spyod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur
9a3(phal chen): rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kun mkhyen ye shes ma chags pa// de la bzhugs par gang gyur pa// de'i sems ni tshad mi zin//
9a4(phal chen): byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa mang po rnams// yul dang yul du de dag snang // chos rnams phyogs cig gang la yang // yang dag sangs rgyas gnas
9a5(phal chen): pa med// 'jig rten sgron ma de dag gis// byin gyi rlab ni gang bstan pa// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par// de'i mnga' ni rnyed par dka'// des gsum rnams
9a6(phal chen): ni ji snyed pa'i// sems can rnams la mthar thug pa// bgrang ba'i mthar ni phyin par nus// 'dren pa la ni mthar thug med// de dag skra ni cig pu snang // sku gnyis de dag
9a7(phal chen): bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten khams su snang gyur kyang // sku la gnyis su gyur pa med// ji ltar zla ba shar gyur pa// tshad med pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams// chu'i snod du
9a8(phal chen): snang gyur kyang // zla ba gnyi su gyur pa med// de bzhin chags med mkhyen ldan rnams// chags med rnam par 'tshang rgya ba// zhing rnams kun na rab du snang // sangs
9b1(phal chen): rgyas la ni gnyis kyang med// 'di la gnas kyang yod ma yin// ska ni gnyis sam gsum du med// ji ltar sems can bsam pa bzhin// tshad med pa ni rab du snang //
9b2(phal chen): sku ni 'das pa ma yin te// ma 'ong ba'ang sku ma yin// skyes dang byang chub mya ngan 'das// skad cig gis ni rab du snang // ji ltar sgyu mar gyur pa'i gzugs// skyes pa ma
9b3(phal chen): yin 'ong ma yin// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// skye ba med pa shin du bstan// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal gyis// sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis
9b4(phal chen): brlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang dag sangs rgyas tshad med pas// tshad du skra yang rnam par stan// ji ltar/
9b5(phal chen): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams// de bzhin 'dren pa rab du mthong // ska la mchog ni med par brjod// sangs rgyas yul ni ma lus khyab// bar snang na mkha' ji lta ba//
9b6(phal chen): de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// de ni sems kyang 'pho ba med// sems la skye ba'ang yod ma yin// sangs rgyas rnams ni spyod yul 'di// skye ba med par rab du gnas// /
9b7(phal chen): ji ltar rab rib ldan pa'i mig/ nang 'ang med cing phyi nang med// de bzhin 'jig rten sangs rgyas dag/ nang na'ang mi bzhugs phyi nang min// 'jig rten kun gyi don gyi phyir//
9b8(phal chen): rkang gnyis pa'i ni mchog byung ste// 'jig rten dag tu skye bos mthong // sangs rgyas rnams ni zhing mi gnas// rgyal ba dag la nyid mtshan med// skad cig ma yin zla
10a1(phal chen): ba min// rgyal ba la ni lo mi gnas// 'jig rten dag ni 'di skad brjod// nyi mche ge mo zhig tu// rab 'byung byang chub rgyal bas
10a2(phal chen): thob// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rjes mi 'brang // de la bskal pa yod ma yin// dus kyang ma lus med pa ste// dus gsum yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// mgon po rnam
10a3(phal chen): ni mnga' bar 'gyur// ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// nas kyang mtshan dang mi gnas te// nyin mtshan zhes kyang rab du brjod// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid do//
10a4(phal chen): bskal pa cig dang dus gsum du// 'dren pa bzhugs pa ma yin no// dus gsum zhes kyang rab du brjod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ltos// de nas byang
10a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas nas// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
10a6(phal chen): smras so// yang dag sangs rgyas sku cig te// 'dren pa thams cad don cig kyang // tshad med gzhan dang gzhan dag tu// phyogs bcu kun nas rab du snang // gang gi
10a7(phal chen): ma lus thams cad du// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab pa// sems can gtso bo thub pa yi// spyod yul rnams ni ci 'dra ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos
10a8(phal chen): nyid ni// nang gi sku yang snang ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs// pha rol skus kyang mi snang ngo // dus rnams kun du las rnams kyis// ji ltar las
10b1(phal chen): rnams sngags pa bzhin// de bzhin so sor bye ba'i sku// rigs su byung bar rab du stan// rgyal ba'i chos nyid ma rtog par// sangs rgyas sku ni 'di 'dra ba// grangs su
10b2(phal chen): bgrang bar mi nus te// bsam pas ltar yang shes mi nus// ji ltar bdag cag sems kyi las// bsam gyi mi khyab 'byung ba de// de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi
10b3(phal chen): khyab// sems kyis 'phrin las mi 'da'o// ji ltar zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// sa la rnam par dag pas mdzes// de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab//
10b4(phal chen): 'gro ba dag na mdzes par snang // 'di ltar las rnams 'jug pa ni// rkyen gyi rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin rgyun rnams mtha' yas pa// sangs rgyas shin du
10b5(phal chen): mthong bar 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal ba ni// ji ltar yid bsam rdzogs byed pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang // rtag tu smon lam rdzogs par
10b6(phal chen): bsgrub// mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten 'dir// 'jig rten mgon po 'dren par 'gyur// de'i smon lam de dag gis// phyogs bcu 'di dag rgyal bas gang
10b7(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad
10b8(phal chen): pa 'di dag smraso// ye shes dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas te// 'jig rten chos rnams rnam sbyang nas// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod// de ste sems can
11a1(phal chen): mnyam sangs rgyas// sems can la las bsam byas nas// rgyal ba de dag thams cad mthong // sangs rgyas la ni
11a2(phal chen): gshegs pa med// sangs rgyas la ni mig byas nas// sems kyis sangs rgyas dmigs pa ni// sems bskyed pa dang rgyal mnyam par// de bzhin de dag
11a3(phal chen): rgyal ba mthong // dka' ba'i chos nyid nyer snyan cing // gang gis grangs pa rnams sbyang ba// de dag thams cad sems skyed la// shes rab ldan pa rab tu
11a4(phal chen): zhugs// dmigs pa dag dang byin gyis brlabs// mi'i gtso bo ston pa mdzad// do phyir dmigs pa kun tu yang // sangs rgyas rgyal ba gshegs par mdzad/
11a5(phal chen): 'jig rten khams rnams 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas sku rnams bdag gi med// sems la bdag gi med par bstan// byang chub rtog la bdag gi med//
11a6(phal chen): mi'i seng ge'i chos nyid dang // dpal ba'i stobs la rab du gnas// lus dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ste// snang ba'i sems dang mnyam pa'i sku// ji ltar
11a7(phal chen): 'jig rten de bzhin sku// ji bzhin bskur yang rgyal ba ste// sku'i rang bzhin shes pa ni// sangs rgyas chags pa med ces bya// sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs
11a8(phal chen): pa ste// chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs// sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub rnams// gang la'ang dmigs pa med pa yin// sangs rgyas la ni gshegs
11b1(phal chen): pa med// sangs rgyas gang na'ang mi bzhugs te// yang dag sangs rgyas log pa kun// de bzhin gshegs la len mi mnga'// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
11b2(phal chen): dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// sangs rgyas
11b3(phal chen): thams cad kun du khyab// zhing cig la ni mi gnas te// thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du gshegs// zhing rnams kun du rab tu snang // sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad du/
11b4(phal chen): byin gyis rlabs ni rab du rab tu 'byung // 'tshang rgya chos kyi 'khor lo dang // bsam pa bzhin tu mya ngan 'da'// sangs rgyas la ni su zhig sems// ci phyir sangs
11b5(phal chen): rgyas bsam mi khyab// yang dag sangs rgyas su yi mchod// ji ltar chos rnams chos nyid dang // ji ltar sangs rgyas spyod yul du// gang dag chos rnams cig/
11b6(phal chen): bu yang // de bzhin nyid la mi 'jug go/ 'di ni 'jig rten 'di rgyal zhes// 'jig rten dag ni rnam rtog yod// gang gi ngo bo nyid shes na// 'jig rten med te
11b7(phal chen): rgyal ba'ang med// 'jig rten dang par bya ba'i phyir// mgon po dag ni mngon gsum ston// de dag gi ni lta ba 'di// shin tu dmigs par mi rung ngo // gang gi cha
11b8(phal chen): pa rnam bzlog cing // chags pa med la dga' byed pa// chags pa thams cad rnams bzlog nas// chags med chos nyid rtog par 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhes
11b9(phal chen): kyergyal ba su kyang mthong bar 'gyur/
12a1(phal chen): brjod gang yin dang // gang gis rnam 'brul snang gyur pa'i// chos ni dus gsum thams cad du// rnam pa kun tu mi rnyed do//
12a2(phal chen): gang gis nyid 'di shes shing // gang gis 'di bzhin yid shes na// thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs par myur du 'gyur// sangs rgyas tham
12a3(phal chen): cad rnams 'phrul pa// 'di dag thams cad tshig gis bstan// yang dag sangs rgyas tshig lam med// tshig gi lam gyi rab tu brjod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos
12a4(phal chen): kyi rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gis rnam par 'phrul
12a5(phal chen): snang ba'i// sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa bas// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal phung po blangs kyang bla// 'gro ba gang gis byang chub du// sems
12a6(phal chen): ni nam yang ma skyed pa// de dag gnas 'di thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis bsam pa cig gis kyang // 'di la mos byed mkhas pa na/
12a7(phal chen): me'i mchog tu mi 'gyur zhes// de ni the tshom mi bya'o// de'i rnam par 'brul ba ni// bskal pa bye ba rab tu dkon// su zhig 'di la mos byed pa// de dag bla na med par 'gyur
12a8(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// skad cig skad cig bsnyen bkur kyang // 'di'i tshul la ma gnas na// de dag snyen bkur byas ma yin// gang las sangs rgyas
12b1(phal chen): brjod gyur pa'o// chos 'di gang gi thos gyur pa// des ni mi bde kun gyis kyang // spyod pa rnams ni blang bar bya// ci tsam chos kyi dbyings rnams dang // dus gsum gyi ni
12b2(phal chen): mgon po yin// sangs rgyas rnams ni brtan pa yi// ye shes chen po gcig thos nas// mi'i skal ba bye ba rnams// zhing rnams re res zad byas shing // de'i tshul ni brtson
12b3(phal chen): byed na// de la byang chub dkon pa med// sems can dkon pa sngon mtha' yis// 'khor bar mi rnams gnas gyur kyang // des ni sangs rgyas rab tu byung // chos nyid
12b4(phal chen): 'di ni shes ma gyur// chos rnams zhes par byas pa med// chos ni 'jig rten mi 'gyur te// kun tu snang dang rnams 'phrul pa// 'jig rten dag tu thams cad stan// shin tu
12b5(phal chen): rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i tshigasu bcad pa'i le'u ste//
12b6(phal chen): nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba la snyoms
12b7(phal chen): par bzhugs te// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs mi thag tu// de'i
12b8(phal chen): tshe phyogs re rer 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol nas// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag ste/
13a1(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhal snyan pa mchog te/ de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sha stag go// phyogs cig
13a2(phal chen): nas ston pa ltar phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis// 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de ltar
13a3(phal chen): khyod byang chub sems dpa' teng nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa leg so legs so// 'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcun de bzhin gsheg
13a4(phal chen): ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing // brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
13a5(phal chen): 'di mngon gyi smon lam dang // mngon gyis byin gyis rlabs dang // khyod kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bstan pa'i phyir/
13a6(phal chen): 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jig pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang // slob pa chags pa med par bya ba dang // ye shes sgrub pa med par 'jug pa'i sar 'jug par bya ba
13a7(phal chen): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems yang pa rab du 'jug par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa phun sum tshogs par bya ba dang / sgrub pa med pa'i chos dkar po yong
13a8(phal chen): su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phrul snyan par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i
13b1(phal chen): ye shes dang / dran pa rgyun mi mchod par rnam par dag par bya ba dang / dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo mtha' yas par
13b2(phal chen): bstan par bya ba dang / shes pa kun tu bzung bar bya ba dang / 'di lta ste yongs su bsngo ba bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zad
13b3(phal chen): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bzung bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu snyan par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi gcod par bya ba dang / smon
13b4(phal chen): lam chen po'i skabs dbye bar bya ba dang / don shin tu bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
13b5(phal chen): cad kyi yid rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mthun pa la rten par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
13b6(phal chen): pa yang dag par bzung ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs par mdzad kyis// kye rigs kyi bu khyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs
13b7(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyi bstan pa dang / bzud kyi snang ba la zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrib pa med pa la zhugs pa dang / chos
13b8(phal chen): kyi dbyings snang ba'i chos nyid du bya ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dkar po yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi spyod yul yang ba la gnas pa dang / sgrib
14a1(phal chen): pa med pa'i chos snang ba la gnas pas chos ston pa la brjod pa la dang / snyan pa'i phyir spobs par gyis shig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
14a2(phal chen): 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes tshad med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// spobs pa chags pa med pa dang / tshig tu dbye ba la mkhas pa
14a3(phal chen): nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang cig pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// tshad med pa'i
14a4(phal chen): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa nye bar bsgrub par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa nye bar sgrub
14a5(phal chen): pa mdzad do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nyam pa med pa yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// chos thams cad kyi lhag mthong mngon par skyed pa la mkhas pa
14a6(phal chen): nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// chos thams cad snyan pa'i gnas rgyun mi gcod pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid
14a7(phal chen): kyi phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi spyi bo la byug pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom
14a8(phal chen): ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan la reg ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin de las rnam par langs te/ lang nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag
14b1(phal chen): la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 'di lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad khyab par byed pa sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa 'di ni/ bsam
14b2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dge ba de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs
14b3(phal chen): bsngo ba slob po// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongasu sngo ba slob par 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongasu bsngo
14b4(phal chen): ba slob po// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gang la bsam te/ de skad du smras pa de dag ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras
14b5(phal chen): ngag yongs su bsngo ba'i grangs ni du zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i ngag yongs su bsngo ba bcu po 'di dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
14b6(phal chen): kyis gsung so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyuraro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba byang chub
14b7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dang po dang / mi byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gnyis pa dang / sangs rgyas thams
14b8(phal chen): cad la yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gsub pa dang / thams cad rjes song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
15a1(phal chen): yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa dang / bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bya lnga pa da/
15a2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjesu song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba drug pa dang / 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes
15a3(phal chen): song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bdun pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
15a4(phal chen): rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba brgyad pa dang / chags pa med cing bcing ba dkrol ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dgu pa dang / chos kyi dbying
15a5(phal chen): zad pa med pa'i rjesu song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu
15a6(phal chen): bsngo ba bcu po de dag ni/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gsungaso// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i
15a7(phal chen): sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dang po sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gag cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skye ba pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
15a8(phal chen): sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rab du sbyor ba 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnam par sbyor ba 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol
15b1(phal chen): tu byin pa la sems pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsom pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol
15b2(phal chen): tu byin pa la 'jug pa 'am/ byams pa bsgom pa yang dag par skyed pa 'am/ snying rjes snying brtse bar byed pa 'am/ dga' ba la rab tu dga' bar byed pa 'am/ btang
15b3(phal chen): snyoms la shin tu gnas par byed kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la shin tu bsam nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de dag la rab tu sbyor zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med
15b4(phal chen): par rnam par phye nas/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i ngan song rgyun chad par 'gyur ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang /
15b5(phal chen): gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'gro ba thams cad la rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par phan 'dog
15b6(phal chen): ba gang yin zhes sems skyed do// de de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par skyed pa na/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad
15b7(phal chen): rnam par zlog pa'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur cig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgro ba'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi dpung
15b8(phal chen): gnyen tu gyur cig/ 'jig pa kun las srung ba'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi brten du gyur cig/ rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par snyan pa'i phyir/
16a1(phal chen): bdag sems can thams cad kyi snang bar gyur cig/ ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam bsal ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi sgron mar gyur cig/
16a2(phal chen): shin tu dge pa la rab du dgod pa'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi mar mer gyur cig/ chos kyi tshul la bzud pa'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par
16a3(phal chen): gyur cig/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po ston pa'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi yongs su 'dren par gyur cig/ ces de de ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi don tu
16a4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar shin tu/ thug par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste ji ltar mdzad pa srung ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba de ltar mi 'dza' ba srung ba'i phyir
16a5(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag tu bya ba'i bsam pas mi mdza' ba ni/ gang yang med de/ de yang 'di ltar
16a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par byung ba ste/ de 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' la mdza' ba'i don byed pa de dag thams cad ni bdag
16a7(phal chen): ge rgyud la dgod dgod pa yin no// zhes na/ de dag sems can thams cad kyi yul thams cad la zhe sdang med pa'i min gyis lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
16a8(phal chen): chen po rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i tshes yang dag par snyan pa'i phyir 'jug go// 'di lta ste dper ma ca
16b1(phal chen): mtsho chen po ni dag thams cad kyis bdug par bya bar mi nus so// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' yang drin mi bzo ba dang / blo gzhan dang sems 'khrug pa dang /
16b2(phal chen): rnyog pa dang / mun par gyur pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa dang rlom sems dang ldan pa dang / sgrub pa nyams pa dang / sems dmus long lta bur gyur pa'i sems can byis/
16b3(phal chen): pa thams cad kyis skyon can du mi nus so// 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu nyi ma ni dmus long gi skyon gyi 'char pa las thog par mi 'gyur ro// dri za'i grong khyer gyis thogs bA
16b4(phal chen): mi 'gyur ro// gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa'i rdul gyi skyon gyis thog par mi 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra can gyi skyon gyi thog par mi 'gyur ro// du ba khrig
16b5(phal chen): ba'i skyon gyis thog par mi 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu gling gi nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis thog par mi 'gyur ro// grib pa sna tshogs skyon gyis thog par mi 'gyuraro// dug gir/
16b6(phal chen): skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyuraro// khams kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis thog par mi 'gyur ro// dus yongs su 'gyur ba'i skyon gyis thog par mi 'gyur ro//
16b7(phal chen): de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa can yang dag par shes pa dang ldan pa sems kyi bdag nyid shin tu zab cing yangs pa/ yid la yang dag
16b8(phal chen): par rtog pa mi zhan pa/ yon tan spyad pas ye shes kyi mthar gyur pa chos la shin tu dad pa'i sems mngon par skye/ chos kyi snang ba'i 'od kyi rab du snang ba/ don thams cad
17a1(phal chen): mthong ba/ chos mngon par shes pa/ ye shes rig pa/ rtsod pa med pa lhung byed pa/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos spyod pa la rab/
17a2(phal chen): tu sbyor ba/ sems can thams cad kyis nyes par sems skyed pa la 'khrug pa med pa/ de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na/ gnod par byed pa thams cad kyi skyon
17a3(phal chen): gyis thog par mi 'gyuraro// sems can me srun pa'i tshul gyis ldog par mi 'gyur ro// sems can gyi lta ba'i rnyog pas dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsngo ba dang
17a4(phal chen): bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can gyi sems rgyud gtor bas byang chub sems dpa'i go cha bgos pa las ring du mi 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyab
17a5(phal chen): pa'i smon lam dkrugs ma'i spogs pa thams cad kyi bcil bar mi 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa chen po sems can drin du mi bzo ba mthong bas lhod par
17a6(phal chen): mi 'gyur ro// byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can mi srun pa'i dbang pos zhum par mi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin las byis pa'i skye bo dang
17a7(phal chen): 'grogs pa las 'phangs par mi 'gyuraro// sems can gzhan gyi skyo bar mi 'gyuro// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba/
17a8(phal chen): bam po sum bcu gnyis pa'o// // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni sgrib pa med par 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir
17b1(phal chen): 'byung ba ste/ sems can cig la dmigs shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su bsngo ba ma yin/ 'di lta ste
17b2(phal chen): zhing rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ zhing gcig la dmigs te byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la mngon par spro ba ma yin/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas lta ba rnam par dmigs
17b3(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas gcig la dmigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skyed pa ma yin/ 'di lta ste ye shes cig rje su rtog pa'i phyir/ ye shes cig la dmigs
17b4(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam skye ba ma yin/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngo'o// zhing thams cad yongs
17b5(phal chen): su spang bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad lta ba la dmigs nas byang
17b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skyed do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi rjesu rtog par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
17b7(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams kyi smon lam skye'o// de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi stobs
17b8(phal chen): la dmigs pa/ sems yang ba bsam pa 'khrugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad shin du dkon pa'i sems rin po che dang ldan pa rnams kyi sems ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams
18a1(phal chen): cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ rab tu skye ste da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par mthong
18a2(phal chen): nas/ sems dad pa chen po rnam par dag pa dang / snying rje chen pos brtan nas bsngo zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste/ de yang tshig tsam du yA
18a3(phal chen): ma yin gyi bsam pa thag pas yongs su bsngo'o// de yang dga' ba'i sems dang / dad pa'i sems dang / mos pa'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang / nye ba'i sems dang
18a4(phal chen): snying rtse ba'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o// de yang 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba
18a5(phal chen): ba rnam par dag par gyur cig/ skye ba yongs su dag par gyur cig/ bsod nams bdag gi nyid che ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ zil mi non par gyur cig/ mi zad par gyur
18a6(phal chen): cig/ thub par dka' ba'i sems su gyur cig/ dran pa nyams pa med pa'i sems su rtog pa nges par gyur cig/ blo tshad med par gyur cig/ lus kyi dang ngag gi las dang /
18a7(phal chen): yid kyi las kyi yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed par gyur
18a8(phal chen): cig/ mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs 'byung ba med par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mi byed pa'i dad pa'i yang thob par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
18b1(phal chen): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos ston pa zos par gyur cig/ thos nas kyang the tshom dang yid gnyis med par gyur cig/ yang dag par 'dzin pa cing nan tan gyis
18b2(phal chen): sgrub par gyur cig/ sems kyi dka' ba nyid kyang thob par gyur cig/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las yang dag par 'gyur bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bdag rab tu gzhog
18b3(phal chen): bar gyur cig/ shin tu dbul ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig/ nor bdun thob pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjesu slob par gyur cig/ dge
18b4(phal chen): ba'i dbang po thob par gyur cig/ mos pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid kyang yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi go 'phang yang rnyed par gyur cig/ 'gro ba
18b5(phal chen): thams cad du nyams pa med pa'i mig kyang bskyed par gyur cig/ mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ yon tan thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i tshig rnam
18b6(phal chen): par dag pa yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ dbang po snga mas shing stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i sems dge ba yang dag par grub par gyur cig/ gnas med par spyod pa yang yongs su
18b7(phal chen): rdzogs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas de thams cad kyi bde ba'i rim 'gro gang dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i rim 'gro de dag thams cad kyis thob par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas rab tu thob
18b8(phal chen): pas tshad med pa'i gnas su gyur cig/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po sgrib pa'i las sna tshogs las byung ba'i sgrib pa'i las de dag gi sgrib pas sangs
19a1(phal chen): mi mthong ba dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun mi shes pa'i sgrib pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsags pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bung /
19a2(phal chen): po de dag bdag gis lus 'dis sems can dmyal ba'i skyes gnas dang / ngan song gi skyes gnas de dang de dag blang bar bya'o// sems can de dang de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
19a3(phal chen): de nas bton te/ bdag gi de dag gi sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa de dag blang bar bya'o// spro bar bya'o// mi ldog par bya'o// de las mi 'bros par bya'o// mi skrag par bya'o//
19a4(phal chen): mi 'jig par bya'o// phyir mi ldog par bya'o// zhum pa med par bya'o// mi skye bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis ni sems can thams cad sgral ba'i smon lam btab pas
19a5(phal chen): na sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur dgos so// 'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su sgrol bar bya'o// 'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad sgral bar bya'o//
19a6(phal chen): skye ba'i dgon pa dang / rga ba dang na pa'i dgon pa dang / 'chi ba'i dgon pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i dgon pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / mi khom pa thams
19a7(phal chen): cad kyi dgon pa dang / 'khor ba thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / lta ba'i theb po thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad gtor ba'i dgon pa dang / mi shes pa las
19a8(phal chen): byung ba'i dgon pa dang / dgon pa de dag thams cad las bdag gis sems can sred pa'i dra bas khris pa/ ma rig pa'i sgrib pas sgrib pa/ srid pa'i sred pa dang ldan pa/ zhen pa'i
19b1(phal chen): mthar thug pa sdug bsngal gyi shing thag gis bkor ba/ bdud kyi las la rten la mi mkhas pa/ bsod nams 'gag pa/ the tsom gyur pa/ rtag tu yid gnyis dang ldan pa/ mi bde ba mthod
19b2(phal chen): ga byung ba mi mkhas pa/ chub mos skor ba'i lo ma lta bu 'khor zhing chan pa dang / de dag thams cad yongs su thar bar bya'o zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen pos yongs su
19b3(phal chen): rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba mthong nas sems can de dag la snying rtse ba chen po skyes pa/ phan cher gdag pa'i sems rab tu bskyed
19b4(phal chen): pa/ sems can gyi don chen po bya bar dka' ba sems can mang po rab tu sgrol bar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba/ yongs su bsngo ba chen po la zhugs pa 'das pa dang ma byon pa
19b5(phal chen): dadang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongasu bsngo ba la zhugs pa/ bsngo ba chen po'i mdos sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su bsngo ba/ sems can
19b6(phal chen): thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya bar sems pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par yongs su bsngo ba des sems 'di
19b7(phal chen): lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal srid la rab du zhugs pa'i phyir/ bdag spyod do bdag ni dga' ba zhig yongs su dgrol ba la sngon par
19b8(phal chen): zhugs pa ma yin gyis/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rab du snang bas 'khor ba'i dgon pa rgol ba dka' ba gnod par bya'og yang sa chen
20a1(phal chen): bo nas blang bar bya'o// gnod pa thams cadade las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o// 'khor ba'i rgyud
20a2(phal chen): las rab tu bsgral bar bya'o// bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po blang bar spro bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can de dag thams cad 'khon
20a3(phal chen): ba'i sdug bsngal chen po'i sa 'og nas drang bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyis mthar thug par thams cad kyi ngan song kun gyi sdug bsngal thams cad blang te/ nyams
20a4(phal chen): su myong bar bya ba la bdag gis spro bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba las mi spang bar bya'o// sems can thams cad yongs
20a5(phal chen): su bsgrol ba'i phyir bdag ngan song cig na phyi ma'i mthar thug par bskal bar gnas par spro bar bya'o// ngan song cig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
20a6(phal chen): khams thams cad du gnas par spro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kyi hud sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi gnas su lhung bas ni
20a7(phal chen): bdag cig pu sdug bsngal myong yang bra bdag gi der bdag nyid gtar bcug te sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
20b1(phal chen): rten gyi dgon pa nas 'gro ba thams cad smras te/ bdag gi sems can thams cad kyi don sdug bsngal tshor ba'i phung po 'di dag thams cad bdag gis lus 'dis
20b2(phal chen): myong bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can rnams kyi bden par smra ba dang / yid ches shing mi slu bar bya ba'i/ bdag la ni sems can thams
20b3(phal chen): cad kyis ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sgrol ba'i phyir bdag cag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems can thams cad
20b4(phal chen): la dmigs pa skye te/ bdag nyid 'dod pa'i phyir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma bzhugs so// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' ba'i
20b5(phal chen): spyod pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// 'dod pa'i yul la bsnyen pa'i phyir yang ma yin no// 'dod pa'i khams su gtog pa'i dga' ba mang po
20b6(phal chen): gzhan blang ba'i phyir yang byang chub kyi spyad pa mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba de dag thams cad ni dgra yin no//
20b7(phal chen): 'dod pa la rten pa 'di ni bdud kyi yul lo// 'dod pa la rten pa 'di ni blo ngan bstan pa'i lam mo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis smad pa'i
21a1(phal chen): yul lo// de dag la rten pa de las sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar
21a2(phal chen): 'gyur ro// de las sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
21a3(phal chen): de las sems can rnams 'thab pa dang / 'tshang 'grub dang / rtsod pa dang / gnad la 'bebs pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / kun tu 'khrug pa rnams kyang rab tu
21a4(phal chen): 'byung ngo // sems can 'di dag ni 'dod pa la rten pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las ring du gyur pa ste/ 'dod pa de dag ni mtho ris su skyes pa
21a5(phal chen): la yang bar du gcod na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la smos kyang ci dgos ste/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba dang dga' ba thams cad
21a6(phal chen): kyi yang dag par bcad du 'gyur ro// de lta bdag gis 'dod pa ni ro nyong zhing tshad med pa'i nyes pa can du mthong na de ci yang de dag spyod pa'i phyir
21a7(phal chen): 'jug gam/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni 'di dag gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du zhugs pa ma yin no// 'dod pa la
21b1(phal chen): dga' ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa mi spyod de/ de bas na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar zhugs pa'i sems skyed de/ bdag ni
21b2(phal chen): 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de dag nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsngo zhing sgrub pa'i phyir don de la zhugs te/
21b3(phal chen): de bas na bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyi zhags pas bcing ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi zhags pa bcad de/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su
21b4(phal chen): dgrol bar bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi rgyud las rnam par zlog par bya'o// bdag gi ci ltar sems can 'di dag thams cad shin tu bde ba dang phan par gyur
21b5(phal chen): pa'i bde ba dang / tshor ba med pa'i bde ba dang / zhi ba'i bde ba dang / mi gnas pa'i bde ba dang / tshad med pa'i bde ba dang / mnyams pa'i bde ba
21b6(phal chen): dang / mi 'gag pa'i bde ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba rab du thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar
21b7(phal chen): bya'o// bdag kha lo bsgyur ba'i dang / bdag mgon po dang / bdag
22a1(phal chen): sgron me 'dzin pa dang / bdag la lam bde ba dang / ston pa dang / bdag khom pa brnyed pa dang / bdag thabs mkhas pa dang /
22a2(phal chen): bdag don shes pa dang / bdag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la thams cad mkhyen pa'i gru bo che'i gnyen par 'gyur ba dang / bdag yong su bsngo ba la mkhas pa dang / bdag pha rol
22a3(phal chen): ston pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci lta ci ltar sems can rnams kyi skyab 'gyur ba dang / 'khor bar gyur pa rnams yongs su rgal bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
22a4(phal chen): cad mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgribs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi yul rnams mi gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i grogs
22a5(phal chen): po dang thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rten par 'gyur ba dang / las rnam par dag pa kha na ma mtho
22a6(phal chen): ba med par 'gyur ba dang / sprad pa chen po'i smon lam rnams yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar yongs
22a7(phal chen): su bsngo'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na sems 'di snyam du skyed de/ kye ma gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar bya ba'i phyir gling
22a8(phal chen): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de snyed kyi nyi ma ni mi 'char gyi/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nyi ma 'di nyid cig pu 'char te/ sems
22b1(phal chen): can gling bzhir gtog pas de dag rang rang gi lus las kyang snang ba gang gis de dag nyi ma'i grangs shes par 'gyur ba 'am/ rang gi don sgrub par 'gyur ba 'am/ nyin cig nyin cig
22b2(phal chen): cing bza' shing gi ra ba dang grong khyer dag tu dag pa dang / rtsi ba'i longs spong myong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ phyogs sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang / pho brang
22b3(phal chen): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar bya ba dang / spyod par don sbyar bar bya ba'i snang ba mi 'byung ste/ sems can de dag rang rang gi lus la yang 'od gang gis
22b4(phal chen): de dag don bsgrub pa'i 'od de ltar bu mi gtong ste/ 'di ltar lha'i bu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig pu gnyis su med pa de ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can rnams
22b5(phal chen): la snang bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'chang zhing rab tu byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba na sems 'di ltar skyed de/ sems can 'di dag thams
22b6(phal chen): cad la gang gis de dag bdag nyid yongasu skyabs par bya ba de nyid kyang med na gzhan lta ci smos te/ bdag nyid gcig pu gnyis su med pas sems can gyi phyir 'di ltar sem
22b7(phal chen): can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad snang bar bya dang / sems can thams cad gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad shes par bya ba dang / sems can
23a1(phal chen): thams cad bzung bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad skyed par bya ba dang / sems can thams
23a2(phal chen): cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsdu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// bdag
23a3(phal chen): ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de lta bur byas te/ gzhan la phan pa'i lan re bar mi bya'o// gzhan gyi skabs mi rnyed par/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir go cha mi 'dor bar bya'o//
23a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi don tu spro ba mi bzlog par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi bde ba sgrub pa'i yongs su bsngo ba las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu
23a5(phal chen): yang bsdu bar bya ste/ yongs su bsngo ba chung ngus yongs su bsngo zhing dga' bar mi bya'o// dge bo'i rtsa ba phan par mi 'gyur ba rnams ni sems can thams cad la bsngo bar mi
23a6(phal chen): bya ste/ ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la bde bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsngo'o// mngon par chags pa med pa'i chos nyid la brten te yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//
23a7(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// zhes de ni pho ba'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la gnas pa ma yin/ srid pa mngon par chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
23a8(phal chen): de dag la mi gnas so// mtshan ma'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su mi bsngo'o// dngos po thams cad la mngon par chags pa'i phyir las kyi rnam par smin pa
23b1(phal chen): yongs su mi rtog go// phung po rnams kyi 'du shes la gnas shing yongs mi bsngo'o// phung po 'jig pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o// las rnam par rtog pa gnas shing
23b2(phal chen): yongs su mi bsngo'o// rnam par smin pa la re bas ma yin no// rten las snyems pa ma yin no// 'brel bar 'byung ba la kun tu rtog pas ma yin no// grags pa la
23b3(phal chen): gnas pas ma yin no// gnas kyi 'du shes la gnas pas ma yino// gnas su rtog pa la gnas pas ma yin// chos rnam par rtog pas ma yin no// sems can gyi 'du
23b4(phal chen): shes la gnas pa ma yin te// khams kyi tshul rnam par tha dad pa'i rjes su song bas yongs su mi bsngo'o// sems kyi kun tu rtog pa la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o// sems
23b5(phal chen): kyi phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o// 'du shes phyin ci log la gnas te yongasu mi bsngo'o// lta ba phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o// tshig gi lam la
23b6(phal chen): gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o// de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin rnam par spyod cing yongs su bsngo'o// sems can rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid la sems can shing
23b7(phal chen): yongs su sde'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa'i chos kyi yongs su rtag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
23b8(phal chen): yongs su sde'o// chos thams cad sgro btags pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rjes su rtog par byed do// gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par lta zhing yongs su bsngo
24a1(phal chen): bde dag la rab tu 'jug te/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag par byed pa ma yin/ de bzhin tu dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste/
24a2(phal chen): gnyen pos yongs su dag pas bsngo ba de dag la yang dag par smod do// 'jig rten las 'das pas 'byam klas pa'i rjes su song bar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mthong te/ gnyis
24a3(phal chen): kyi tshul gyis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag khong du chud par mi byed do// las kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par mi spyod do// las gzhan du yang thams cad mkhyen pa
24a4(phal chen): nyid la yongs su mi bsngo'o// las gang yin pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // las kyi lam dang bral bas kyang thams cad mkhyen
24a5(phal chen): ba nyid kyi smon lam thob par mi 'gyur te/ las kyi gzugs brnyan gyis yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// rnam par smin pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su dag pas thams cad
24a6(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// yongs su bsngo de g.yo dang rlom sems dang rnam par spyod pa dang bral yang rab tu shes so// des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su
24a7(phal chen): bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngos pas sems can rab tu sgrol rgyud chad par mi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su bsngo ba rnams chos kyi mtshan nyid gnas pa'ang mi gtong
24a8(phal chen): ste/ las dang rnam par smin pa'i chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis las dang mngon par sgrub pa la mngon par mkhas pa yin no// de ltar
24b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rjes spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di
24b2(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyob pa zhes bya ba te dang po'o// de nas byang chub sems
24b3(phal chen): dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis 'khor thams cad la rnam par ltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par ltas nas/ don dang tshig dang yi ge la 'jug par bya ba dang / sems rgya chen
24b4(phal chen): po mtha' dang / dbus med pa yongs su bsgom pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung la sems yang dag
24b5(phal chen): par 'brel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i lus yang dag par skyed
24b6(phal chen): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rab tu dbye ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i dus la ji ltar yang dag par lta ba dang / chos kyi lus mthun pa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs
24b7(phal chen): rnam par dag par ston pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlab kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// gang zhig skal pa bsam yas/
24b8(phal chen): sprod pa dag/ sems can phan phyir rtag tu zhugs pa ste// sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu sbyor zhing tshe la// gang zhig mtshungs med skyes bu 'dul drung du// bsam pa dri ma med pa
24b9(phal chen): tsan dan chags med yid ldan pa
25a1(phal chen): rnams dag nas// chos mkhan 'gro ba skyobs pa'i sems ldan pa// de dag yongs bsngo mdzod du zhugs pa yin// brtson 'grus stobs dang
25a2(phal chen): de dag gnyer ldan zhing // ye shes stobs kyi rnam dag yid gzhung ste// bzod pa'i stobs ldan skal bar mi nus pa// de dag 'gro ba kun skyob mngon par brtson// shin tu yid
25a3(phal chen): rten mtshan pa med pa dang // bsams pa rnams dag dga' ba'i blo ldan pa// de dag sa dang 'dra ba'i bzod stobs kyis// 'gro ba kun la phan phyir mngon par brtson// bdag la
25a4(phal chen): bde ba tshol bar mi byed de// snying rje can gyis bsam pa de 'dra'o// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyabs sems can// chag med gyur pa de dag bzhug pa yin// phyogs bcu'i
25a5(phal chen): sems can ji snyed gang yang rung // 'gro ba kun nas ma lus snga byas te// de dag don tu rten sems ldan pa rnams// de dag yongs su bsngo tshul la slab pa yin// dga' ba'i
25a6(phal chen): sems kyi sbyin pa gtong bar byed// skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims rnam dag pa// brtson 'grus stobs la rten par gnas par sems// de dag ye shes dge bas yongs su bsngo'o// de dag
25a7(phal chen): blo gros yang shing mtha' yas pa// bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan par rab tu zhugs// bsam gtan stobs la rjes su sems pas na// mkhas pa de dag shes rab bsam mi khyab// byog/
25a8(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten khams na gang yod pa// de dge ba de dag yang dag sgrub pa na// 'gro ba kun la phan dang bde sems kyis// ye shes mkha' la de dag yongs su bsngo// dge ba de dag gang la
25b1(phal chen): tshad med pa'i// rten pa de dag yongs su sbas pa'i tshe// de la rtog rtson dam pa'i blo gros can// bsam yas ye shes la ni rab tu gzhog/ de dag 'gro ba'i don tu mnar med par// skal pa bsam
25b2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab gnas par spro// de dag yid ni zhum par mi 'gyur te// de dag sngo rtog bsam pa'i yid dang ldan// gzugs tshol mi byed sgra dang dri ma yin// ro dang reg pa de bzhin mi tshol te// 'gro
25b3(phal chen): ba thams cad yongasu bsgrol sems kyis// ye shes dam pa'i stobs ni rtag tu tshol// mkhas pa de dag ye shes mkha' 'dra bas// mtha' dang dbus med spyad pa spyod par byed// rgyal ba'i
25b4(phal chen): chos kyi chos nyid ci 'dra ba// mtha' yas grags pa'i spyod pa de 'dra'o// de dag gang dang gang du 'dod byed la// 'gro la bde ba rgya chen rab tu sgrub// rtag tu mchog brtson dga' bar byed pa ste/
25b5(phal chen): byang chub spyod pas dga' bar tshol ba med// gdugs med sems la gnas shing zhus pa rnams// ye shes dam pa mchog la rjesu sems// de dag bdag la bde bar mi 'dod de// 'gro
25b6(phal chen): ba kun la bde dang dga' phyir brtson// de dag yongs su bsngo ba mthar phyin dang // bsam pa dug med rnam par dag yid kyi// dus gsum rgyal ba gang na bzhugs pa'i// chos kyi grong rdal/
25b7(phal chen): de na rab tu gnas// gzugs dang tshor ba dang ni mi gnas shing // 'du shes 'du byed yid la'ang ma yin te// srid pa gsum las yongs su yid skyod de// bsod nams gter de dag yongs
25b8(phal chen): su bsngo// sems can ji snyed rgyal bas sang byas pa// 'gro ba kun nas ma lus bsdu byas te// skyes bu dam pa de dag dgrol ba'i phyir// spyod pa'i mchog la gang zhig brtson byed pa// de dag
26a1(phal chen): rnam pa kun tu sems rten te// de dag blo gros yang ba gzhal du med// de dag dran pa dbang po ma nyams pa// de dag mnyam bzhag bsam pa rnam par dag/
26a2(phal chen): 'jig rten 'di'i phyir dang nang rnams su// gang du'ang de dag thams cad mi byed de// mkha' dang rlung mar ji 'dra ba// phyogs rnams kun tu sems ni de bzhin no// de dag lus kyi las ni rtsom byed pa//
26a3(phal chen): des ni rgyal ba mngon par mnyes par byed// rgyal ba rnams la ngag kyang gdam pa ste// yid kyis de dag zhugs pa gang yang med// mi'i dbang po gang na bzhugs pa'i zhing // mtha' yang zhing tu de
26a4(phal chen): dag 'dod byed cing // de dag kun tu thugs rjes rgyal ba mthong // rgyal ba rim 'gro byas shing de nas 'dong // de dag rtag tu kha na ma tho te// 'gro ba kun na de dag 'jig pa med// de dag srid gsum 'di
26a5(phal chen): na mu steg byed// de dag bde gshegs lam la gnas pa yin// de dag rnam par bsgom zhing sngon brtson pa// skye dang 'jig pa'i tshul la rjes su sems// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab tu zhugs// /
26a6(phal chen): nyon mongs pa'i tshul la rab zhugs yin// gang gis spyod pa rab du rten gyur cig/ 'gro ba kun las shes pa mi ldog pa// de 'dra'i chos nyid de dag rjes su sems// de ni dus gsum chags
26a7(phal chen): pa med par 'gyur// gang rnams 'gro ba rnam par dag byed pa// de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i pha rol phyin// de dag gnas rnams thams cad phyir bzlog pas// de phyir de dag spyod la mi gnas
26a8(phal chen): so// 'gro ba kun la tshig lam ji snyed pa// skye dgu thams cad smra zhing mngon brjod pa// de dag smra yang rlom sems med pa yin// chags med yid ldan spyod pa dang 'dra'o// bsod
26b1(phal chen): nams tshal la blo gros mtha' yas pa// de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngobs na// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa ji snyed pa'i// mi'i dbang po de dag mnyes pa yin// 'gro
26b2(phal chen): thams cad yongs su skyob zhes bya ba ste// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas 'das
26b3(phal chen): pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad la mi byed pa'i dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyud kyi tshig cig par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sos
26b4(phal chen): dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems skyed pa cig pu thob pa yan chad kun la yang mi byed pa'i dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste lhag pa'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos
26b5(phal chen): thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa yang dag par bzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir de dang de dag tu skyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
26b6(phal chen): kyi snyan pa la mi byed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste sdang med pa'i mig rab tu thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don tu dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir sems
26b7(phal chen): can thams cad la mi byed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya zhing yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir chos dkar po thams cad la mi phyed pa
26b8(phal chen): dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la mi byed par dad pa yin/
27a1(phal chen): 'di lta ste ston pa'i 'du shes yongs su ma rgyas pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi phyed par dang
27a2(phal chen): pa yin/ 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa la dad par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul mi phyed par dad pa yin/ byang chub
27a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rnams pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par bzung ba dmigs pa kun tu rgyud pa gzhan dang gzhan de dag thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin
27a4(phal chen): te/ 'di ltar mi phyed pa'i gnas rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung ste/ sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ nyan thos so//
27a5(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi ston pa 'am/ sems can rnams la dmigs pa gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs sam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa 'am/ byang chub tu sems
27a6(phal chen): bskyed pa rnam par 'phel bar bya ba 'am/ byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pas kyang rung te/ snying rje chen po yang ba yang dag par mthong bas byang chub tu sems
27a7(phal chen): bskyed pa yang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bslab par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su nan tan bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba
27a8(phal chen): dang / don shes pa la yang dag par rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sbyin pa'i tshogs rab tu rtsam pa dang / yon tan thams cad tshogs
27b1(phal chen): la rab tu 'jug par bya ba dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rnam par spyod pa byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas
27b2(phal chen): thams cad lta ba dang / mi 'bral ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang mi 'bral ba rab tu thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
27b3(phal chen): mi 'bral bar 'grogs par bya ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed par yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bstan pa yang dag par bzung ba zhing bsrung /
27b4(phal chen): ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das par skyed cing yongs su bsngo ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos smra ba thams
27b5(phal chen): cad pud dad du bya ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos kyi snang ba thams cad thob pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / smon lam chen po la rab du brtson par bya ba dang mi 'bral bar yongs su bsngo'o//
27b6(phal chen): de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par sgrub cing / yang dag par bsdad pa dang / nye bar sogs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / sems pa dang / dmigs
27b7(phal chen): par byed pa dang / rab tu rtog pa dang / yang dag par smon pa dang / kun tu spyod pa dang / nye bar ston pa'i tshe 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag 'di ltar bsgrubs pas
27b8(phal chen): las dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu gang byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu nges pa bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa na/ sems kyi skad cig
27'a1(phal chen): re re la brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur cig/ de dag kyang mnyes par byas par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs
27'a2(phal chen): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi rim 'gro rgya chen po byas par gyur cig/ rin po che grangs med pa dang me tog grangs med pa dang /
27'a3(phal chen): dri grangs med pa dang / phreng ba grangs med pa dang / nam bza' grangs med pa dang / gdugs grangs med pa dang / rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / ba dan grangs med pa dang / rgyan grangs med
27'a4(phal chen): pa dang / lhab lhab grangs med pa dang / rim 'gro grangs med pa dang / byug pa grangs med pa dang / rnam par byug pa grangs med pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang /
27'a5(phal chen): spos thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / phreng ba thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / tsan dan bzang bzang po thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / gos thams cad kyi gdan med
27'a6(phal chen): grangs med pa dang / rdo rje thams cad kyis gdan grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / rin po che'i spang leb thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang /
27'a7(phal chen): rin po che'i kha dog gi gdan grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi chags pa grangs med pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi chags sa grangs med pa dang / spos thams cad kyi chags
27'a8(phal chen): sa grangs med pa dang / phreng ba'i rgyan thams cad kyi chags sa grangs med pa dang / gos thams cad kyi chags sa grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyis sna tshog su spras pa'i
27'b1(phal chen): chags sa grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi spang leb gting ba'i chags sa grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi shing ta la'i phreng slong ba'i chags grangs med pa dang / rin po
27'b2(phal chen): che'i stegs bus skor ba'i chag sa grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas g.yogs par byas pa'i chags grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas thams cad
27'b3(phal chen): las shin tu 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i phreng bas thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas
27'b4(phal chen): las shin tu 'das pa'i tsan dan thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i spos dang gdug mchog thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs
27'b5(phal chen): med pa dang / lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i rdo rje'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / spos kyi shing dang gos kyi shing dang / rol me'i
27'b6(phal chen): shing dang / rin po che'i shing dang / lhab lhub kyi shing dang / shing sna tshogs kun nas bskor ba'i gtsug lag khang dang / yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba'i shing grangs med pa dang / snam bu rin
27'b7(phal chen): po che dbyings pa'i shing grangs med pa dang / rin po che mang po'i shing grangs med pa dang / me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad grangs
27'b8(phal chen): med pa dang / shing thams cad kyi rgyan pa'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / ba gam gyi rgyan grangs med pa dang / skar khung gi rgyan grangs med pa dang / rta bab grangs med
28a1(phal chen): pa dang / pu shu'i rgyan grangs med pa dang / zla gam gyi rgyan dang / khang pa brtsegs rgyan dang / bla re rgyan grangs med pa dang / gser gyi dra ba'i khab
28a2(phal chen): grangs med pa dang / spos dang gdug pa'i dam pa thams cad kyi rgyan grangs med pa dang / gos thams cad gting bar gting ba'i rgyan gyis thams cad rab tu brgyan pa'i gtsug lag khang
28a3(phal chen): grangs med pa'i bsnyen bkur byas par gyur cig/ de ltar mchod pa rgya chen po sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la yid kyi dbang po shin tu dang bas mchod pa dang rim 'gro rgyun mi
28a4(phal chen): 'chad pa dang / sangs rgyas la phud dud du bya ba'i mi ldog pa las byung bas phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rim 'gro bya bas
28a5(phal chen): bskal pa brjod du med pa zad par gyur cig/ 'gro ba thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal
28a6(phal chen): gyi phung po rnam par zlog pa dang / sems can chen po skyed pa la mos par bya ba dang / rgya chen pos yang dag par rgyan pa dang / tshad med par grangs pa'i rgyan dang / rnam par thar phyin pa/
28a7(phal chen): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon pa brjod par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / mchod rten sna tshogs bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
28a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan pa la yang dag par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba la de lta bu'i rim 'gro byed pa dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das
28b1(phal chen): nas kyang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi gdung la rab tu brtson par byas pas/ bskal pa grangs med par zad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mchod pa dang bsnyen bskur ba'i rgyan dang
28b2(phal chen): brjod pa yon tan mtha' yas pa'i sngags bsgrubs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par sgrub pa de dag mthar thug pa ma gyur cig/ de ltar rim 'gro byed pa las phyir
28b3(phal chen): ldog par ma gyur cig/ rgyun gcod par ma gyur cig/ sems su skyo ba med pa yang thob par gyur cig/ mngon par chags pa med pa'i sems 'du shes rnam par spang ba dang / mi gnas
28b4(phal chen): pa'i chos nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rlom sems thams cad bcom pas rlom sems med par gyur pa dang / chos 'gyur ba med par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin gyi rgyas btab pa'i chos
28b5(phal chen): kyi sgo dang / tshe dang skye ba thams cad du 'khor ba'i mtha'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la spyod cing dmigs pa'i chos kyis rgyas btab pa'i sems skyed pa
28b6(phal chen): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlab pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang / chos kyi rang bzhin la rab du brtsom pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
28b7(phal chen): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul zhugs pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba med par sgrub pa dang / dngos po thams cad kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i bsngo ba'i tshul dang bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i
28b8(phal chen): tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba'i srid pa kun las 'phags pa dang / bsgoms pa'i sgo mtshan ma la mkhas pas gnas pa dang / byang chub sems
29a1(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa'i byin gyis brlabs can dang / byang chub du sems bskyed pa'i bsngo ba chen pos yongs su
29a2(phal chen): sbyangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gnas pa'i mos pa yongs su rgyas pas thams cad yang dag par bcom par gyur cig/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29a3(phal chen): chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di lta ci nas kyang 'khor ba'i rgyun du chud zos par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa chud zos par mi
29a4(phal chen): 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang srid pa'i 'dra 'dzis chud zos par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad bsgral ba dang / ci nas kyang skye ba dang 'chi 'phos
29a5(phal chen): skyon du mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang chags pa med pa ye shes kyi sgo gtor bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa cig nas cig tu rgyud pa'i rgyu zad
29a6(phal chen): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis kun du blang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas
29a7(phal chen): kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar yongasu bsngo ste/ de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sems
29a8(phal chen): bskyed pa mun pa med pa dang ldan pa ni chos dkar po snang bar gyur pas nye bar snyan cing yongs su bsngo ba'i mchog dam pas spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis
29b1(phal chen): rab tu rtog pa dang / sems dang 'dra ba'i chos thams cad la zhugs pa dang / sgyu ma 'dra ba'i las yongs su shes pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa
29b2(phal chen): dang / sprul pa lta bu'i mngon par 'du byed pa la gnas pa dang / sgra brnyan lta bu'i las la rten pa dang / grib ma lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su song ba dang / chag pa/
29b3(phal chen): med pa'i chos kyi mig rab tu skyes pa dang / bya ba med pa 'byam klas pa'i rjesu song ba dang / zhi ba'i rigs rab tu thob pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang ldan pa'i 'dus byas dang 'dus
29b4(phal chen): ma byas kyi chos thams cad la rab du zhugs pa dang / chos ma nor ba'i mtshan ma thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rje su song ba dang / mtshan ma thams
29b5(phal chen): cad zhen pa med pa dang / thun mongs kyi las la mkhas pa rjes su song ba dang / chos dkar po thams cad rgyun ma chad pa dang / chags pa thams cad kyi mngon par ma zhen pa dang /
29b6(phal chen): chags pa med par 'gro ba la 'gro ba dang / rten pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin du bsam pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la
29b7(phal chen): rmod pa med pa chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa'i chos can rgyu dang / las dang 'gal ba med par yang dag par mthong bas yongs su bsngo ba mkhas pa ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi
29b8(phal chen): tshul dang las rnam par smin par sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta zhing rnam par spyod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ yongs su bsngo ba'i ye
30a1(phal chen): shes chen po mngon par shes pa la shin du rig pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med par spyod pa'i sems dge ba dang ldan pa de dag
30a2(phal chen): de dag 'di ltar ci nas kyang dge ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs bdud kyis las dang bral ba las kyi rnam par yongs su byang ba'i bdag nyid thams
30a3(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ba yongs su bsngo'o// bsngo ba tshad med pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par mthong ba byed de/
30a4(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten gyis yul dang rnam par bral ba nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par byang ba'i phyir yang
30a5(phal chen): yongs su bsngo ste/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug par zab pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang 'khor ba'i chos kyi mi skyod cing sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i mngon
