58a4(phal chen): yin dngos po med pa min// dngos med thams cad rang bzhin khong du chud// yod pa ma ma yin med pa ma yin te// rgyu'i rgyud la mngon par chags mi byed// rkyen la'ang
58a5(phal chen): 'jug par de dag mi byed de// nam yang de dag chags par mi byed do// 'gro ba de dag smra tshul ji snyed pa// de la nam yang chags par mi byed de// 'du shes bsam pa brda
58a6(phal chen): yang rab tu shes// bdag med chos kyang so sor shin tu rtogs// de dag sems can mi 'bral cis ma mthong // de 'dra'i chos nyid mnyam pa rab du rtogs// de 'dra'i
58a7(phal chen): zhing dang de bzhin gshegs las kyi rnams// dus gsum thams cad ma lus bzung byas shing // shes pa de dag de bzhin yongs su bsngo// lus kyis rnam pa gang
58a8(phal chen): gis skye ldan zhing // rang bzhin gang dang mtshan nyid gang yin pa// de na ci 'dra'i chos nyid yod pa dag/ de bzhin de dag dag par yongs su bsngo// gang gis yin
58b1(phal chen): kyi ngo bo nyid mjal ba// de bzhin byams pa med par de dag shes// 'gro ba de dag mi gnas len pa med// 'gro ba kun phyir yongs su bsngo ba gzhol// spyod yul
58b2(phal chen): ma lus thams cad bzung byas shing // 'od gsal thams cad rjes su sems par byed// ma lus de bzhin nyid kyang de dag shes// gang gis lta ba thams cad ma lus
58b3(phal chen): shing // bsam pa'i skyon por rnam par spangs pa rnams// rtag tu de dag dri med kun gdung med// chags med kun gyi tshul yang rjesu rtogs// de dag gis ni chos kyang
58b4(phal chen): rab du shes// nam kyang chos nyid zhig par 'gyur ba med// chos la chags par de dag mi byed de// de dag 'jig rten sgra brnyan 'dra ba yin// gang gis dus gsuM
58b5(phal chen): 'jig rten skyes pa yi// 'gro ba rkyen byung chos kyang rab du shes// bsam pa dag dang bag chags khong du chud// thams cad 'jig par byed pa gang yang med// de dag
58b6(phal chen): las dang las mi rab du shes// las dang rnam par 'gal bar mi byed de// las kyi rnam par smin pa rgyun mi gzon// rgyu las chos kun dag kyang shin tu ston// 'di
58b7(phal chen): na sems can gang yang 'khor ba dang // sems can 'byung ba de dag mi byed de// sems can rnams la sa gnas pa med pa smra// sems can rgyud kyi brda yang rab tu/
58b8(phal chen): rtogs// bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod bya ba ste// yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
59a1(phal chen): yongs su bsngo ba drug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyalnga sras dag 'di la
59a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal por gyur te/ srid chen po thob nas/ 'tshe ba dang phyir rgol ba bcom ste/ rgyal po chen por grags pa dang / srid chen po'i
59a3(phal chen): khams la gnas shing / srid yangs pa la dbang bar gyur nas 'khon med cing ldog pa med par srid la gnas/ chos kyi rgyal srid skyong bar byed pa/ chos dang 'thun
59a4(phal chen): pa chos kyi rjes su sgeg pa/ phun sum tshogs pa'i sred chen po thob pa/ sa chen po la gdugs cig tu gyur pa/ 'khor lo thogs pa med par skyong bas thub pa med
59a5(phal chen): pas thob pa/ srid pa'i pha rol gyi sdes rtse ba med pa/ chos dang ldan pa dbyig pa med pa dang / mtshon cha med pas 'gro ba rnams shin du skyong ba/ chos kyi rjes su zhug
59a6(phal chen): shing bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis 'gro ba bsdu pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la mdzod cis stob pa/ de dbang phyug de lta bu la
59a7(phal chen): gnas shing / de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa/ g.yog dang 'khor mang po shin du 'dus pa/ gzugs dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad ltas pas mi ngom pa/
59a8(phal chen): yid la kha na ma tho ba med pa/ bsod nams rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ zil gyis mi mnon pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ lus shin tu rnam par bye ba/ mdzes pa
59b1(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ lta na bzang ba tshul dang mthun pa lus dang ldan pa/ stobs dang ldan pa/ thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa stobs chen po dang ldan pa/ mthu bo
59b2(phal chen): che'i lus kyi bzung ba/ rnam par dag pa'i las dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i lam rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ zas yongs su gtong ba 'am/ btung ba
59b3(phal chen): 'am ro 'am gzhon pa 'am/ gos sam me tog gam phreng ba 'am byug pa 'am mal cha 'am/ gnas sam rgyab rten nam mar 'am sgron ma 'am/ nam nad kyi
59b4(phal chen): rkyen sman nam/ yo byad kyi sbyin pa 'am/ rin po che gzhal ba'i snod sna tshogs rkang zhing yongs su stong pa 'am/ shing rta sna tshogs shing rta du ma bkang zhing /
59b5(phal chen): tshad med pa'i rin po che dang / nor yongs su gtong ba dang / glang po che cang shes sam/ rta cang shes rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gtong ba dang / slong ba rnams
59b6(phal chen): la ci rigasu rgyal po stan bzang po gtong ba 'am/ gdugs gtong ba 'am/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gtong ba 'am/ rin po che sbyin gtong sbyin pa 'am/ rgyan
59b7(phal chen): dang lhab lhub kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/ cod pan nam drug gi nor bu dag dbang phyug gi spyi bo nas dbang bas mtshon chas bcing shing brtson raran
59b8(phal chen): 'dug pa'i sems can rnams mthong nas nor thams cad yongs su gtang ba 'am/ g.yog dang bdag tu bcas te byin nas brtson ra de dag nas sems
60a1(phal chen): can rnams yongs su thar bar byed de/ gsad par khrid pa mthong nas bdag gis lus dang srog yongs su gtang ste/ gsad
60a2(phal chen): pa de slu bar byed pa de gtsug phud dang / thod dpag tu med bcas pa'i mgo bo dag kyang stong pas blang na gtong ba'i sems kyi gtong ba/ mig gnyis yongasu
60a3(phal chen): gtong ba 'am/ rna ba dang / sna yongs su gtong ba dang / so dang lce yongs su gtong ba dang / mgo bo yongs su gtong ba 'am/ rkang lag yongasu gtong ba 'am/
60a4(phal chen): rang gi lus kyang bral cing slong ba la khrag yongs su gtong ba 'am/ sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba 'am/ slong ba la rang gi lus las snying po phyung ste yongasu
60a5(phal chen): gtong ba 'am/ slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la rgyu ma dang ma cher pa dang / khal ma dang pho ba rnams yongs su gtong ba 'am/ rang gi lus las yan lag
60a6(phal chen): dang rus pa blang ba na dad pa'i sems kyi yongs su gtong ba 'am/ slong ba la mos par lta bas lpags pa dang mdog yongs su gtong ba/ rkang lag las sor
60a7(phal chen): mo yongs su gtong ba 'am/ chos 'dod pa'i rang gi sha dang sen mo yongasu gtong ba 'am/ chos shin du dkon pa tshol zhing mes gang ba'i 'ob mi 'grong lag bdan du mchod
60a8(phal chen): par byed pa 'am/ chos srung ba'i phyir sdug bsngal myong ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus kyi bzod par byed pa 'am/ chos tshol zhing tshig dang yi ge 'bru cig gi phyir yang rgya
60b1(phal chen): mtsho'i mthar thug par sa chen po yongs su gtong ba 'am/ chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug byed pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i chos las sems can rnam slar zlog te/
60b2(phal chen): dge ba'i chos las rab tu sbyor ba 'am/ skyes bu'i mtshan spyod pa mthong nas sdig pa'i las de dag las sems can de dag rnam par zlog par byed pa'am/ de bzhin
60b3(phal chen): gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas par 'jig rten thams cad du bsgrogs cing / gtsug lag khang dang po brang gi longs spyod kyi phyir sa dang khams yongs su gtong
60b4(phal chen): ba 'am/ rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir bran dang las byed pa'i mi rnams gtong ba 'am/ slong ba la rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid dbul ba 'am/ chos la dad pas dga' zhing
60b5(phal chen): mgu ba'i sems rnyed nas/ rang gi lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la rim 'gro bya ba 'am/ bdag nyid sems can thams cad la gtong ba'am/ sangs rgyas thams cad
60b6(phal chen): la rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba 'am/ slong ba rnams ci rigasu yul dang mir bcas pa 'am/ grong khyer dang rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ rgyan thams cad
60b7(phal chen): kyis brgyan pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/ slong ba la bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dag yongs su gtong ba 'am/ slong ba rnams la ci rigasu khyim thams cad yongs su sbyin
60b8(phal chen): zhing rtsa gtong ba 'am/ bza' shing gi ra ba sbyin pa 'am/ slong ba sna tshogs dang sems can sna tshogs gang zag sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dang ldan
61a1(phal chen): pa la phyogs tha dad pa nas 'ong ba tshad las 'das pa'i mi dang mi sna tshogs dang / sbyin pa'i gnas sna tshogs la mchod sbyin
61a2(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas grangs med pa rnams byed cing yongs su gtong ba 'am/ de sbyin pa'i dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems
61a3(phal chen): 'di ltar bskyed de/ yongs su bsngo zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas gzugs shin tu bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying rjes su song ba
61a4(phal chen): tshor ba shin tu bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjesu song bas 'du shes shin tu bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjesu song bas 'du byed
61a5(phal chen): shin tu bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjesu song ba srid pa thams cad shin tu bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i 'khor shin tu
61a6(phal chen): bzung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjesu song bas/ sbyin pa'i shin tu bzung ba de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ bla na med par dmig
61a7(phal chen): nas bza' ba dang / btung ba 'di dag 'di ltar btang ba dang / 'di ltar byin pa dang / 'di ltar chags pa med pa dang 'di ltar bcing ba med pa dang / 'di ltar nye ba
61a8(phal chen): btang ba dang / 'di ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / 'di ltar dngos po yongasu btang ba dang / 'di ltar dmigs pa la mi gnas pa dang / 'di ltar gtong ba dang
61b1(phal chen): ldan pas sems can thams cad ye shes kyi kha zas dang / chags pa med pa la brtson pas/ sems can zas yongs su shes pa dang / chags pa med
61b2(phal chen): pa'i zas dang dga' ba'i zas dang / zang zing med pa'i zas dang / ye shes kyi zas dang / chos kyi snyan pa dang dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi sku
61b3(phal chen): dang / ye shes kyi sku la yang dag par spyod pa dang / sbyin pa'i gnas dang / snying brtse ba'i kha zas rab du len par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa
61b4(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po zas sbyin pa de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' btung ba'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/
61b5(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos kyi btung ba la brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsgom pa
61b6(phal chen): rgyun chad pa dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsgom las mi ldog pa dang / 'dod pa'i yul gyi bsgom pa las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos kyis tshim pa'i
61b7(phal chen): dga' ba rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi shin tu tshim pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis tshim par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / shes rab rgya mtsho la zhugs pa
61b8(phal chen): dang / chos kyi ri rab dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi btung bas ngom par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btung ba'i rjesu sbyin
62a1(phal chen): pa de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo na sbyin pa sbyin pa skyon thams cad sbal nas/ rnam par dag bsgyur ba dang /
62a2(phal chen): mngar ba dang kha ba dang / bro ba dang tsha ba dang / ska ba sna tshogs kyi ro mchog dang ldan pa shin tu 'jam pa'i ro mchog gi rnam pa dang ldan pa ro sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya
62a3(phal chen): stong phrag stong bsags pa dang ldan pa/ khams rnams mnyam zhing 'khrug pa med par gzhog pas lus kyi stobs ston par byed pa sems dga' ba dad cing mos pa dang //
62a4(phal chen): spro ba dang gsal ba skyed pa/ zhim zhing tshul dang ldan pa'i ro dam par gyur pa dang / nang gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed pa dang / lto ba bde bar yang dag par ston pa/
62a5(phal chen): snyom pa thams cad sel bar byed pa dang / nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ nad med par byed pa rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ro dam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa
62a6(phal chen): slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros gtan pa'i sems kyi ro bro
62a7(phal chen): ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha zas kyi ro thams cad kha zas kyi ro thams cad kyi las yongs su shes shing chos kyi ro'i ye shes la rab tu
62a8(phal chen): gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnas pa'i mtha' chos kyi grong khyer du phyin pa chos kyi du ma'i chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs par gyur cig/ sems can
62b1(phal chen): thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gyur pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba zhags shing chos kyi sprin gyi char pa rab tu 'bab par
62b2(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi dga' bas rgyud tshim par gyur te/ ye shes mchog gi ros sems rnam par gzhog par gyur cig/ sems can tham
62b3(phal chen): cad kyi mtshan ma la mi 'dzin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la brtson pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / ro'i mchog thams cad la chags pa med par gyur cig
62b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du rab du 'jug pas chos kyi ro gcig par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa las phyir mi ldog
62b5(phal chen): cing ro mchog gi ngo bo nyid la byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dbang po thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ro tha dad
62b6(phal chen): pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshims par spyod cing chos kyi ros rgyas par gyur cigagaces de ltar ro'i sbyin
62b7(phal chen): pa'i tshogs la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ye shes chags pa med pa'i phung po sna tshogs sgrub pa'i phyir dge
62b8(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' gzhon pa'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems
63a1(phal chen): can thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la gzhon par gyur cig/ theg pa chen po rab du thob cing rnam par zhig pa med pa'i theg pa
63a2(phal chen): mchog gi theg pa dang / dam pa'i theg pa dang / 'gyogs pa'i theg pa dang / stobs chen po'i theg pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa'i theg pa dang / 'jig
63a3(phal chen): rten las 'das pa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang mtha' yas pa'i theg pas byung te/ yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/
63a4(phal chen): ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon pa'i smin par gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gos
63a5(phal chen): kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyi khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi rab da g.yogs/
63a6(phal chen): pa'i lus kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o// cha byad dam pa thams cad rnam par zlog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lus sba bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o//
63a7(phal chen): lus kyi khyud na lus bde ba dang reg par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// kha dog dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// kha dog 'jam par bya ba'i phyir
63a8(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// mdog shin tu 'jam par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bde bar 'gro ba rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas
63b1(phal chen): bde bar bsnyen bkur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste de ltar byang chub
63b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar byed do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog gi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dri sna
63b3(phal chen): tshogs kyi me tog dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i me tog du ma dang / mig tu 'ong ba'i me tog dang / mig mthun pa med pa'i me tog
63b4(phal chen): dang / dus thams cad na yod pa'i me tog dang / lha rdzas dang mi'i me tog dang / 'od mdzes pa'i me tog dang / shin tu dri che zhing du 'ong bar mdzes pa'i me tog dang /
63b5(phal chen): 'di lta bu'i me tog rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gsheg sde ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten rnams la 'byal/
63b6(phal chen): ba dang / chos dkon mchog la mchod pa byed pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul ba
63b7(phal chen): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / pa dang ma rnams la sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ chung ngu na bdag lus de ma yin pa gzhan bkren pa phod pa slong zhing len
63b8(phal chen): pa sna tshogs des de dag sbyin par byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang
64a1(phal chen): ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi gter ting nge 'dzin gyi me tog rgyas pa rab du mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sang+yas
64a2(phal chen): la dga' rab du rnyed nas lta bas mi ngom par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi sems mi 'khrug pas lta ni yid du 'ong bar gyur cig/ sems
64a3(phal chen): can thams cad dge ba'i las la lta zhing nye bar gcod pas lta ba yangs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thams cad la lta ba
64a4(phal chen): dang / sems mnyam pas rjes su lta ba'i dran pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs pa'i dug sreg pa'i phyir dag sman
64a5(phal chen): bzang po nyam su myong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po li tha dad dgod pas smon lam chen po mthong bar gyur cig/ sems
64a6(phal chen): can thams cad sems can kun gyi rab rib dang ling tog dang mun pa gsal ba'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can tham
64a7(phal chen): cad byang chub kyi zla 'od dge ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong zhing chos
64a8(phal chen): kyi rnam par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab du mthong bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i gling du 'jug pa mthong bar gyur cig/ sems
64b1(phal chen): can thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba rnam par dag pa rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba me tog yongs su gtong bar
64b2(phal chen): gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad lta na
64b3(phal chen): mdzes pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lta ba yid du 'ong ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lta ba bzung ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lta na sdug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// /
64b4(phal chen): lta na mngon par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lta na mya ngan med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// lta na rab du dga' ba'i phyir yongs su dga' ba'i phyir yid ldan
64b5(phal chen): mi bde ba med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ldan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa mthong ba rnam par dag
64b6(phal chen): ba thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phreng ba'i sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag sems can thams cad la yongs su
64b7(phal chen): bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ spos yongs su btang bas
64b8(phal chen): bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi spos dang ldan par gyur cig/ mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang / ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims
65a1(phal chen): dang / rnyog pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'gyod pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / kun nas 'khor ba med pa'i tshul khrims
65a2(phal chen): dang / yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims dang log par ma zhugs pa'i tshul khrims dang / mtha' yas pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'jig rten las byang chub sems
65a3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig/ tshul khrims kyi phung po gang dang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ldan pa'i de'i tshul khrims yongasu
65a4(phal chen): dag pa dag sems can thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems
65a5(phal chen): can thams cad kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba//
65a6(phal chen): bam po sum bcu lnga pa'o// // byang chub sems dpa' byug pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge
65a7(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ byug pa'i sbyin pa yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dri dag sems can thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pas
65a8(phal chen): bgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi shin du rnam par dag cing tshul khrims kyis bgos par gyur cig/ sems can
65a9(phal chen): gtang 'tha~Md
65b1(phal chen): thams cad chags pa med pa'i bsam pa rab du thob cing bzod pas bgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la brtson
65b2(phal chen): 'grus kyi go cha bgos shing brtson 'grus kyi bgos par gyur cig sems can thams cad da ltar byung ba'i sngon du zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab du thob pas bsam gang
65b3(phal chen): gyis bgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po la bka' cig gis rnam par dag cing shes rab kyis bgos par gyur cig/
65b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyis 'jig pa med pa rab du thob cing chos kyi bgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi ye shes rab du thob cing /
65b5(phal chen): yon tan gyis bgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rol du phyin pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu
65b6(phal chen): bsngo ba thams cad kyis bgos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i chos spang shing dkar/ chos dkar pos bgos par gyur cig/ ces de
65b7(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byug pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
65b8(phal chen): chen po mal cha'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye shes chen po thob pa'i phyir
66a1(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi mal rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad so so skye bo ma yin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gos bgos
66a2(phal chen): pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bde ba'i mal rab du thob par
66a3(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par rol pa'i cho 'phrul yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir rin po che lta bu'i mal rab du thob par gyur cig/
66a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad chos thams cad legs par bkod pa'i gos bgos pa'i mi mnyam pa med pa'i mal rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig
66a5(phal chen): rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi mnon pa rnam par dag pa rgya chen po'i mal rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi bde ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i
66a6(phal chen): me la rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dmigs pa la brtson pas shin tu dag pa'i mal rab du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
66a7(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis skyabs dang ldan pas shin tu brtan pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas gzims pa lta bur
66a8(phal chen): blo mtha' yas pas 'bebs pa dang ldan pas seng ge'i mal rab du thob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dran pa shes bzhin gyi shin tu bsam
66b1(phal chen): / pa'i dbang po yang dag par rgyu ba dang ldan pa mal cha'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o//
66b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems
66b3(phal chen): can thams cad kyi yon tan gyi gnas la brtson zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas spyod yul du gyur pa dang / gnas nas med cing rten med pa'i gnas nas mi g.yo ba
66b4(phal chen): dang / gnas thams cad rnam par bsgoms pa thams cad 'jig rten gyi gnas las rnam par 'das pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas la gnas pa
66b5(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi yongs su zin pa dang / bla na med pa'i gnas kyi mthar phyin pa dang / bde ba'i gnas la brtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas la shin
66b6(phal chen): du gnas pa dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang / mi 'bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang gnas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub
66b7(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar sems pa sems can thams cad yongs su bsngo bas skyobs pa gnas
66b8(phal chen): kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la de ltar yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgyab rten gyi sbyin pa
67a1(phal chen): byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems
67a2(phal chen): kyis ye shes kyi rten chen po la spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten la spyod pa dang / bla ma'i rten la spyod pa dang / legs pa'i spyad pa'i rten la spyod pa dang /
67a3(phal chen): byams pa chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi sems shin
67a4(phal chen): tu yangs pa'i rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rten la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten la spyod par gyur cig ces de ltar
67a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyab rten gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad yon tan thams cad rnam par 'gyur
67a6(phal chen): ba dang / shin tu dag par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos rnam par dag par 'gyur ba
67a7(phal chen): dang / bsam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / mos pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / smon lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes
67a8(phal chen): pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ til mar
67b1(phal chen): gyi mar me dang / mar gyi mar me 'am/ rin po che'i mar me 'am/ nor bu'i mar me 'am/ ro'i mar me 'am/ a ka re'i mar me 'am/ tsan dan gyi mar me 'am/
67b2(phal chen): spos thams cad kyi mar me 'am/ kha dog mtha' yas pa'i snang ba'i mar me 'am/ rnam pa de lta bu'i mar me de dag yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa na/ dge
67b3(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang 'gro ba thams cad la bde ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ mar me'i sbyin pa/
67b4(phal chen): yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang ba thams mtha' yas par gyur cig/ sems can thams
67b5(phal chen): cad 'jig rten thams cad shin tu phra ba dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba shin tu gsal zhing dbang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems med pa'i khams
67b6(phal chen): yongs su shes shing snang ba rab rib med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'od 'gyed pa'i lus su mngon par byung zhing snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig
67b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
67b8(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa dang ldan zhing 'od rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'od cig gis
68a1(phal chen): rgyas par byed cing thog pa med pa'i snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i zhing du
68a2(phal chen): 'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing snang ba dpag tu med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi skar mdas 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan
68a3(phal chen): zhing 'od snang ba'i skar mda'i rgyal po lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad zhing kun du 'od 'gyed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung zhing snang ba kha dog mtha' yas
68a4(phal chen): par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me'i sbyin pa rab du gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la phan pa
68a5(phal chen): dang / sems can thams cad bde ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung bas yongs su 'dzin to// sems can
68a6(phal chen): thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par 'dzin to// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal pas bgo bsha' byeda'o// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa
68a7(phal chen): bas snying rtse ba byed do// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal pa sbyin par byed do// sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu 'dzin te// sem
68a8(phal chen): can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas dmigs par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i
68b1(phal chen): rtsa bas mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed do// sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shes pas rnam par 'byed par byed de de ltar de mar me'i sbyin pas bsdus/
68b2(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas de dag ci nas kyang sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rab du dgod pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba thog pa med par 'grogs pas de
68b3(phal chen): ltar yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad sbyin pa'i tshe dge ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/
68b4(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dmigs pa kun shin tu langs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab du thob cing lus
68b5(phal chen): nad med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i nad thams cad sos par gyur te sman lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems
68b6(phal chen): dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab du gnas pa'i tshul gyis sman a ga ta lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dug gis gsal zhing /
68b7(phal chen): 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi sman du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing nye bar smod pa'i ngang tshul
68b8(phal chen): can tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i chos dang ldan zhing sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams
69a1(phal chen): cad 'gro ba thams cad gsol ba la zhugs shing sman gyi sdong po lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen
69a2(phal chen): pa nyid kyi snang ba rab du thob cing nad thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sman gyi sbyor ba la brtson pas 'gro ba tham/
69a3(phal chen): cad kyi sman gyi la mkhas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shin tu
69a4(phal chen): gso ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// shin tu bde zhing dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par byang ba'i phyir yongs su
69a5(phal chen): bsngo'o// sems can thams cad snyun mi mnga' ba lta bu rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi zug rngu las thams
69a6(phal chen): cad zlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi lus nyams pa med cing brten pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can tham
69a7(phal chen): cad rdo rje'i 'khor yug lta bur gzhom du mi chom pa dang / stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi ston
69a8(phal chen): thams cad kyis rten cing bsam pa shin tu 'tho ba thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i rnam pa zil gyi
69b1(phal chen): mi non pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyis lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyi brlab kyi brten pa'i phyir
69b2(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snod sna tshogs dang bre dang lnga bres sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe 'di lta ste/ gser gyi snod dang /
69b3(phal chen): gser gyi bre dang / lnga bre rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste dngul gyi snod dang dngul gyi bre dang / lnga bre rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs
69b4(phal chen): su bkang ba dang 'di lta ste/ bai dUr+ya'i snod dang / bai dUr+ya'i bre dang / lnga bre rin po che rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste shel gyi snod dang shel/
69b5(phal chen): gyi bre dang lnga bre rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste mu sa ra ga la ba'i snod dam/ mu sa ga ba'i bre dang / lnga bre mu tig dmar
69b6(phal chen): bros bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste a sgra gar ba'i snod dang / a smA gar ba'i bre dang / lnga bre rin po che bai dur+ya dang / nor bu rin po che 'od zer snang bas rab du bkang
69b7(phal chen): ba dang / 'di lta ste rin po che she la'i snod dam/ rin po che shi la'i bre dang / lnga bre sbas rin pa cha kha zas zhim po ro mchog sna tshogs kyi yongs su bkang
69b8(phal chen): dang / 'di lta ste tsan dan gyi bre dang / lnga rje lha rdzas lta bu'i gos phrug gi yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste rdo rje'i snod dang / rdo rje'i bre dang / lnga bre spos rin
70a1(phal chen): bo ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste snod sna tshogs dang / dngos po rnam pa
70a2(phal chen): dad pa'i sna tshogs kyi bkang ba dang / bre dang lnga bre du ma sna tshogs par bya ba tshad med pa/ nor gyi dbyig dang dngul dang / gser phyes yongs su bkang ba de dag
70a3(phal chen): yon tan gyi gnas bsam gyi mi khyab par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'bul lam/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen shin tu/
70a4(phal chen): dkon par sems bskyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog thams cad 'bul lam/ sems kyi brtan pa shin du ston pa'i phyir// 'phags pa'i dge
70a5(phal chen): 'dun la 'bul lam/ 'phags pa'i skye bo la shin tu mos pa'i sems kyis gang zag gi rnam pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la 'bul lam/ bla ma la bsnyen
70a6(phal chen): bkur zhing bshes gnyen la rim 'gro bya ba'i sems kyi pha dang ma dag la sbyin pa byed dam/ de dang de dag tu yon tan gyi tshogs bsags pa dang / gdam ngag dang
70a7(phal chen): slab pa dang / 'phags pa'i snyan pa la gnas par brtson pas/ slob dang bla dang / bla ma dang / sbyin pa'i gnas la 'bul lam/ sems can thams cad la
70a8(phal chen): zhe mi sdang ba'i mig gi byams pa yongs su bsgoms shing gtong ba'i sems kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams
70b1(phal chen): cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la cig tu nges par zhugs pa'i sems kyi sbyin pa thams cad brtsom zhing tshogs chen po grangs med pas/ 'gro ba thad
70b2(phal chen): yongs su mi btang zhing yongs su mi spong ba'i sems la shin tu gnas te/ sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par chags pa dang / yon tan thams cad rab tu
70b3(phal chen): bzung ba'i sems la rab du gnas pas bkren pa dang phong ba'i slong ba rnams la snod sna tshogs dang bre dang lnga bre yo byad kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang
70b4(phal chen): bas de dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can dran pa'i dbang po nam
70b5(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa dang ldan te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skad bzung ba dang / blang ba dang yid la bya ba'i dran pa rmongs pa med cing
70b6(phal chen): snod tshad med pa'i snying po can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo rgyun chad pa med pa'i chos can tu gyur te/ snod bzang po rnam
70b7(phal chen): par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du
70b8(phal chen): gyur te/ bla na med pa'i snod rin po che lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dbyer med/
71a1(phal chen): pa la mos pas yang dag par bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos yangs pa'i mngon du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub du sems bskyed
71a2(phal chen): ba rgya che zhing mthu che ba la yang dag par gzhol bas rin po che'i snod rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa shin du brgyan pa lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams
71a3(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med pa la mos pa rnam par dag cing yon tan thams cad kyi snod dang / 'byung gnas su gyur cig/ sems
71a4(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar par sgrib pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par gyur cig
71a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rab du bzhag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i
71a6(phal chen): spyod pa'i snod du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi chos ston pa gang yon tan mchog thams cad dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
71a7(phal chen): rigs snod du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs pa dang / chos yongs su dri ba la sgra
71a8(phal chen): ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i skyes bur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i gang bar
71b1(phal chen): byed pa/ shong ba'i snod du gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun
71b2(phal chen): tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod du gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shing rta sna
71b3(phal chen): tshogs dang / shing rta du ma dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing rta tshad med pa dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / bla ma
71b4(phal chen): dang ston pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge 'dun dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / sbyin gnas sna tshogs slong zhing len pa dang / phyogs gzhan
71b5(phal chen): nas 'ong ba'i gang zag sna tshogs dang bong pa dang / bkren pa slong ba dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
71b6(phal chen): yid ches pas skabs phye te 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sbyin pa'i sgra thos te 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang /
71b7(phal chen): sems kyis bos shing stab pa de dag la sbyin zhing gtong ba 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i shing rta'i rgyan gyis shin tu mdzes par byas pa sbyin pa 'am/ gser gyi shing rta dril
71b8(phal chen): bu'i dra ba rab tu 'khor ba'i rgyan rin po che'i srad bu'i lda lnga'i kye ba'i sbyin pa 'am/ bai dur+ya'i shing rtal rin po che bye ba khrag khrig rgyu du mas rab tu rgyan cing klub sbyin
72a1(phal chen): pa 'am/ gser gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dra ba dang / rgyan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan cing glang po che cang shes dang bcas
72a2(phal chen): pa sbyin pa 'am/ tsan dan gyi shing rtal rin po che'i pad ma sna tshogs kyis kun tu sbas te/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khris rgyan pa/ na chung brgya phrag stong bzhon
72a3(phal chen): brgyan thams cad dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs phun sum tshogs pa skyes bu cang shes brgya stong du mas drang ba'i sbyin pa 'am/ shel gyi shing rta la
72a4(phal chen): rin po che du mas kha dog rnam par dbye bas shin tu mdzes par byas shing na chung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su gang ba rin po che'i bla res g.yogs
72a5(phal chen): par byed pa/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyi phyogs bzhi nas rgyan pa sbyin pa 'am/ a smra gar ba'i shing rta la rin po che sna tshogs du mas shin tu mdzes
72a6(phal chen): par byas te/ spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim po'i bdug pa/ spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyi byug pas rab du byug pa/ me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis chal par
72a7(phal chen): bkram pa/ bu mo brgya stong gis rin po che'i srad bu thogs te 'khrul pa med par drang ba'i sbyin pa'i dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi shing rta la ras dang gos sna tshogs
72a8(phal chen): kyi bla re bris pa/ rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs par kheb pa/ spos zhim po yid du 'ong ba rnams par dag pa/ mi 'thun pa med pa tshor ba na dga' ba shin tu 'phrul
72b1(phal chen): ga 'tshams kyi lha'i bu'i drang ba rin po che'i 'jo lo rin po che'i thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan cing / mdzes par byas pa'i sbyin pa 'am/ rin po che thams
72b2(phal chen): cad kyi tshogs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'i shing rta la kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa du mas brgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rin po che sna
72b3(phal chen): tshogs kyi dra ba'i bla res bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba mtha' yas pas kun nas sbas pa bu dang bu mo skyon pa/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye mas mtha' 'khor shi
72b4(phal chen): tu smras pa/ sbyin pa byed pa na de dag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shin du 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar yongs su bsngo te/ sems can tham
72b5(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas la yon tan tshad med pa 'bul bar dad cing sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la shin tu mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas mtha'
72b6(phal chen): yas par rnam par sangs rgyas la rab du rten par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stong pa rgya chen po yongs su grub pas sangs rgyas thams cad la yongs su
72b7(phal chen): gtong bar mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa rab du thob pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi smon lam dang
72b8(phal chen): bral te/ sangs rgyas la skyed pa'i yon tan thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis myong bar gyur cig/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i ye shes la shin tu mos
73a1(phal chen): shing sangs rgyas la yon gsol bzang mi shes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal pos rnam par dag cing la
73a2(phal chen): shes kyi mchog la rab tu rten par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad du 'gro ba thob te/ gang du dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
73a3(phal chen): ye shes mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas rab tu 'khod pa grub pa'i phyir ye shes chen po la rab du rten par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing las
73a4(phal chen): rnam par skye ba'i chos can du gyur te/ bsod nams kyi zhing dam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la
73a5(phal chen): mos shing thams cad du yongs su grub pa lhan gyis grub par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skye ba thams cad kyi drung du phyin pas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon pa
73a6(phal chen): shes pas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i lus la rab du zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnas dpe med pa'i lus rab du thob pas ngal
73a7(phal chen): zhing drab pa med par 'jig rten gyi khamase pas cad du 'gro bar gyur teg/ sems pan thams cad dbyer mi ldog par yid kyis 'gro ba dang ldan nang sras kyi 'phyogs pa
73a8(phal chen): kun du ma tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sem na ma ci bam pa gang cig gis bsam pa dang / nasa'i khams chub par byed pas sangs rgyas kyirnam par na
73b1(phal chen): pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i snang ba dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlab pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can
73b2(phal chen): thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro ba la bde bar 'gro bas rab du brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes zas
73b3(phal chen): cad ma lus par mthar thug par 'gro bas shin du myur du 'gro bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad tha mi dad pa'i 'jug pa la 'jig rten gyi
73b4(phal chen): khams kyi rgyud thams cad du 'gro ba'i pha rol du phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang tshul shes te/
73b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas 'dong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi chos nyid thams cad kyi rjesu song zhing
73b6(phal chen): chos ji lta ba bzhin tu mthong bas 'dra ba med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul thob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs
73b7(phal chen): pa rnams mngon du gyur pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can zad
73b8(phal chen): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa sgrib pa med par gyur pa'i mthar phyin par yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen
74a1(phal chen): la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems
74a2(phal chen): can thams cad byas pa'i drin mi btang ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi gtong ba'i sems gtong ba med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skal ba mnyam pa'i dge
74a3(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang don 'thun par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gtong ba dang yongasu gtong ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i
74a4(phal chen): bshes gnyen la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla ma'i rim 'gro cher brtson 'grus par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen
74a5(phal chen): dang nye bar byas te/ spyad pa sgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa dge ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'thun pa'i bsnyen bkur la
74a6(phal chen): nan tan byed pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems 'khrugs pa med cing nyams pa med pa dang /
74a7(phal chen): 'dres pa med cing rnyog pa med pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'gro la phan pa'i bsam pa can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yo byad ci 'dod pa rab tu bsgrub
74a8(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lus yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byams pa dang ldan zhing 'khon med par rim 'gro byed pa'i phyir dge ba
74b1(phal chen): ba shes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung zhing rab du brtan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kun tu mthun par yang dag par nyan pa'i phyir dge ba
74b2(phal chen): bshes gnyen dang 'thun par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smon lam cig pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las byung ba dang / stobs kyis mthar thug pa'i phyir
74b3(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa dang mthun zhing cig par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams
74b4(phal chen): cad kyis yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pas shes rab bzang pos chos kyi brtson 'grus la shin du byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams
74b5(phal chen): cad chos thams cad bzung ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mtha' gtug pa'i khong du chud pas rig pa'i pha rol du phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thog
74b6(phal chen): pa med pa'i theg pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug te/ theg pa chen pos mngon par spyod cing yang dag par gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
74b7(phal chen): bde ba'i phyogs las phyir mi ldog pa'i yid dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad shes pa'i ye shes 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la
74b8(phal chen): ji ltar thos pa bzhin tu rmongs pa med par chos thams cad la rab du gzhol zhing ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
75a1(phal chen): can thams cad bsgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi chos thams cad las byung ba mthar thug te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su
75a2(phal chen): bzung ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyams pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rab du thob pas 'gyogs pa dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pas 'gro bar gyur
75a3(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / theg pa chen pos 'dul ba la rab du zhugs pas 'gro zhing 'ong ba phun sum tshogs par gyur
75a4(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi shing rtas 'gro bar bya ba'i mthar thug par gti mug med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mtha'
75a5(phal chen): thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul shes shing chags pa med pa'i shing rta zhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen
75a6(phal chen): la shing rta phul ba dang / yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshul gyi
75a7(phal chen): rgyud gcig tu gyur pas snyen cing bkur bas yongs su sgrub pa rnam par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa thams cad la shin du
75a8(phal chen): bslab pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis shin du rtags pa'i bsam pa can yon tan gyis rnam par dag pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ mthun par yongs su gtong ba'i bsam
75b1(phal chen): pacan/ dge 'dun rin po che shin du dkon pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tshogs rin po che la shin du mos pa'i bsam pa can/ snyan pa rab dang bzung ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i
75b2(phal chen): bsam pa can/ shin tu rten pa'i bsam pa can/ rim 'gro byed pa dang ldan pa mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin shin du byas pa/ snyan pa'i yon tan chen po brjod pa/ sangs rgyas
75b3(phal chen): kyi snyan pa yon tan tha mi dad pas 'od gsal zhing rnyog pa med par dag pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun chog la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge 'dun dkon mchog la
75b4(phal chen): shing rtags pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yang dag
75b5(phal chen): par gzhol bas yang dag par brin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i skye mched las chos gzhan med par shin tu grub sems nang gzhol bar gyur
75b6(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos gcig nas gcig tu rgyud par yang dag par bzung bar 'phags par rnyed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig
75b7(phal chen): rten kun gyis shes pas yid ches par bya bas grangs su bgrang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings me gnyis pa'i rang bzhin shes pa khong du chud
75b8(phal chen): bas chags pa med pa'i dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis skad dag par
76a1(phal chen): byung bas cang shes kyis kun nas bskor bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral bar
76a2(phal chen): nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i dge 'dun so so'i skye bo med pa'i sems bla na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog
76a3(phal chen): rab du brjod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chags pa med par gyur pas ye shes la shin tu brtson pa'i chos can tu gyur cig/ 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan
76a4(phal chen): bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad kyi gos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing tshogs kyi rgyal po dam par gyur cig/ sems can
76a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pas legs par bcas pa'i ye shes kyi bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig
76a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par shin du 'gro ba'i 'gros la mkhas pas sems skad cig gis rdzu 'phrul thob par gyur cig/ sems can
76a7(phal chen): thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing na mkha' lta bu'i lus kyi shing rta sgrub par gyur cig/ sems can thams
76a8(phal chen): cad na mkha'i dbyings dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' thug par khyab par byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
76b1(phal chen): 'khor du 'gro ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gang du dga' bar 'gro zhing / rgyu ba dang
76b2(phal chen): ldan pas lus yang ba'i khyad par rjes su rtogs pa rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus yang dag par ston
76b3(phal chen): ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi 'khor gyi mtha' yas pa la mkhas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus 'phos pa med par 'gro
76b4(phal chen): yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul chen po'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mig yor lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
76b5(phal chen): 'gro ba'i mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes rab du thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mi gnas pa'i lus rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dus la
76b6(phal chen): ji ltar bab par sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / 'dul ba mi gtong ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bar yang dag
76b7(phal chen): par ston par 'gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems ska
76b8(phal chen): cig gis phyogs thams cad du 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul la mngon par mkhas par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun la/
77a1(phal chen): shing rta 'bul zhing yongs su bsngo bas/ yang dag par bzung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar sems can thams cad bla na
77a2(phal chen): med pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta la gnas pa rnam par dag par gyur cig/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang chos kyi dbyings thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo rab tu
77a3(phal chen): bskor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes nye bar bzhag pa'i sem
77a4(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ rim 'gro can zhes dang ldan pa bdag nyid che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i tshul la mkhas pa yon tan dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi rig
77a5(phal chen): ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la rnam par sems pa/ mthu chen por skyes bu bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems
77a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dus su brjod pa med pa thams cad du spyod pa rnam par sbyang ba la zhugs pa bdud kyi bcing ba thams cad las rab tu grol
77a7(phal chen): ba/ bdud du mi'i sde dang bdud thams cad kyi shes pa'i stobs rab du 'joms pa'i sems dang ldan pa gzhal du med pa'i chos la mkhas pas snang bar gyur pa/
77a8(phal chen): de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ shing rta yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongasu bsngo ste/
77b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i sbyin pa yongs su smin par grub pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam par yid ches par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad cig tu sbyong mi
77b2(phal chen): gnyis par yang dag par spyod pas 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi yang dag par bsdu ba la brtson
77b3(phal chen): 'grus pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa byed pa'i mchog tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa'i 'bras bu rab du gtong bas ye shes kyi mu
77b4(phal chen): stegs la byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par dag pas sgrib pa med pa'i rtogs par khong du chud par gyur cig/ sems
77b5(phal chen): can thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin byed par khong du chud pas nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la rnam par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams
77b6(phal chen): kyi zhing sbyin pa'i gnas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byas pas/ bsod nams tshad med pa shin tu bstsags par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas su
77b7(phal chen): gyur te/ phan 'dogs pa'i rnam par dag pas cho 'phrul mtha' yas par rnam par grol ba yang dag par ston par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i
77b8(phal chen): theg pa mchog gi 'bras bu yongs su stobs pas sbyin pa'i gnas yon tan zad mi shes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po
78a1(phal chen): zad mi shes pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthar thug par gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas don yod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
78a2(phal chen): can thams cad ma thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos tshig dang yi ge 'dzin cing sdig pa'i chos rab du zhi bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sgra don yod pa
78a3(phal chen): ye shes kyi rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mnyan pa la mos shing brtson 'grus par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams
78a4(phal chen): cad la rjes su sgrags pa'i chos can tu gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos pa'i pha rol du phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad zhag pa thub
78a5(phal chen): pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi lta ba las rnam par 'das te/ snyan pa la gnas pa'i bya ba la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i mchog rnam par spel
78a6(phal chen): bar byed cing 'phags pa mthong ba rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa'i bde ba dang ldan zhing ye shes kyi spyod pa'i
78a7(phal chen): gang zag la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi lta ba rjesu thob pa las byung bas thos pa don yod par gyur cig/ sems can thams
78a8(phal chen): cad snyan pa la rab du bzung ba dang / yongs su srung ba la zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi snyan pa la ye shes mkhas pa rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams
78b1(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnas pa'i snang ba rab du thob pas chos thams cad thos pa shin du 'dzin pa la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin/
78b2(phal chen): ba'i mdzod kyi dga' bar spyod cing gtong ba shin tu byed pa dang / mchod sbyin shin du byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa phun sum
78b3(phal chen): tshogs par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems
78b4(phal chen): can thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pas rna bar dag par mchog dam pa phun sum tshogs pa rab du thob nas kyang mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen
78b5(phal chen): pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang /
78b6(phal chen): len pa sna tshogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ong ba'i gang zag dang slong ba dang phong ba dang bkren pa mang po tshad med pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ong ba dang / byang
78b7(phal chen): nub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / sems bskyed pas shing sgrub pa thams cad gtong ba shin tu re ba'i yid can de dag 'ong ba mthong nas slong ba la rim 'gro bya bas
78b8(phal chen): me ngoms pa'i sems kyis slong ba 'ong ba rnams la bzod pa gsol ba'i sems bskyed do// 'di ltar bdag nyid phyogs de dag tu khyed kyi drung du song ste/ rim 'gro bya/
79a1(phal chen): ba zhig nad 'di ltar khyed 'di phyin te shin tu ngal bar gyur to// zhes spyi bos btud de/ bzod par gsol bas slong ba thams cad bzod
79a2(phal chen): par byas rim 'gror byas ngal bsdud nas ci 'dod pa sbyin pa de dag gis shin tu rim 'gro byed de/ 'di ltar nor bu'i shing rta 'jam bu'i gling ni na chung bzang mo chen po rgyas
79a3(phal chen): yongs su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste gser gyi shing rta yul gyi na chung rin po che shin du rnam par dag pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste bai dUr+ya'i shing rta na chung ma'i 'khor
79a4(phal chen): glu dang rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang ldan pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste/ dngul gyi shing rta shin tu mdzes pa bud med gzhon nure lha'i bu mo lta bus yongs
79a5(phal chen): su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i rgyan pa'i shing rta bud med cang shes rin po che rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa tshul mkhas
79a6(phal chen): pas yongs su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste/ tsan dan gyi shing rta byang chub sems dpa' zhon par 'os pa dang / 'di lta ste/ shel gyi shing rta bud med bzang mo shin tu bzang
79a7(phal chen): ba/ cha byad shin tu brgyan pa gzugs mdzes pa lhun sdug cing mi 'thun pa med pas yongs su gang ba dang / 'dis ste/ a s+tha gang tha'i shing rta dbang bskur bas
79a8(phal chen): yongs su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste/ spos dam pa'i shing rta bu dang bu mos yongs su gang ba dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i tshogs kyis rgyan pa'i shing rta nang gi bshes
79b1(phal chen): gnyen dbyer mi byed pas yongs su bkang ba dang / de rnam par 'di lta bu'i shing rta rnam pa med pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa slong mo ba thams cad la sbyin pa yongs su gtong
79b2(phal chen): bas slong ba 'dod par bya ba'i dngos po rab du thob pas yid la bsam pa shin tu rdzogs nas/ slong ba de dag thams cad sbyin pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzung ste/
79b3(phal chen): shin tu tshims par byas shing bsam pa rdzogs par byas nas/ dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rang ba dang bde bskyed par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag 'di ltar yongs su bsder/
79b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du bsam gyi mi khyab cing thogs pa med pa'i shing rta 'khor lo phyir mi ldog par 'gro ba dang ldan te/ theg pa chen po'i shing
79b5(phal chen): rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la spyod cing phyi ma'i bskal par mur thug par mi ldog par chos kyi shing /
79b6(phal chen): rta cang shes la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i rlom sems med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rigs kyi lam la brtson
79b7(phal chen): pas chos thams cad ci'ang ma yin pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
79b8(phal chen): du 'gro ba brtson pas kun tu 'gro ba dri ma med par shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos la dga' bas mos shing /
80a1(phal chen): yang dag par 'gro ba la brtson pas thams cad mkhyen pa theg pa'i shing rta rjes su 'thun pas la rab du gnas par gyur cig/ sems can
80a2(phal chen): thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba lam bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab du dga' ba'i yid dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i
80a3(phal chen): spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tshul dang 'dra ba'i yul gnas dang ldan pa dang / skyes bu dam pa la brten pa thob pas sngon byas
80a4(phal chen): pa'i bsod nams shin tu sngags pa dang / yang dag par smon lam shin tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyad pas rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa
80a5(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pas 'khor lo bzhi pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i stobs dang ye shes la brtson pas/ phyogs
80a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi dbyings su chos kyi snang ba la gtong ba la slab par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi shing rtas 'byung ba'i pha rol du phyin pa thob ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
80a7(phal chen): chos kyi shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyogs thams cad du legs pa dang bde ba yang dag par ston pas bsod nams thams cad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad
80a8(phal chen): med pa dang chos bsamadapa gyi mi khyab pas shing rta la mkhas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i dri mi rab du byung ste sbyin pa gtong bas 'byung ba'i shing rta la
80b1(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa ma lus pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ra
80b2(phal chen): ye shes rnam par dag pa'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems 'khrug pa med par gnas pas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa 'khrug pa
80b3(phal chen): med cing bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu 'gro bar spyod pa'i bgos
80b4(phal chen): pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin tu 'gyogs pa'i shing rtas snying po byang chub du byung
80b5(phal chen): ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi shing rta la shin tu zhon cing sangs rgyas kyi yul la sprul
80b6(phal chen): pas sangs rgyas par byed pa'i phyir ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos yongasu gtong ba la 'jigs pa
80b7(phal chen): med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir chos kyi rgyal po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi mtshan nyid dang rang
80b8(phal chen): bzhin gyi thams cad la rab du 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa'i phyir smon lam la mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad theg pa chen
80'a1(phal chen): po la ma nor pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye zhing lus yang dag par snyan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi shing rta la zhon pa
80'a2(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam skyo ba med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che'i shing
80'a3(phal chen): rta la zhon par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sbyin pa'i gnas dang len pa dang slong ba sna tshogs la shing rta dga' ba dang /
80'a4(phal chen): rab du dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / spro ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pas byin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i
80'a5(phal chen): theg pa chen zhon pa shin du sgrub pas ye shes dang sems kyi rnams pa mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
80'a6(phal chen): mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// / bam po sum bcu drug pa'o//
80'a7(phal chen): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po che cang shes yan lag bdun shin du gnas pa/ lo drug bcu lon pa mche ba drug dang ldan pa kha dog pad mo lnga
80'a8(phal chen): bu rnam par dag pa dkar zhing dri ma med pa dang / gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dra bas lus kun nas g.yogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i rgyan
80'b1(phal chen): du bcug pa/ gser ltar lta na mdzes pa/ dpag tshad stong gis khyon du ngal ba med par 'gro zhing sbyin pa stong pa 'am/ rta cang shes gom pa zo mdog bde bar 'dor zhing
80'b2(phal chen): 'deg pa dang / bya ltar 'gyogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdog ma lcang lo 'khyil pa/ nam tsong dang rmig par ldan pa/ mig rmig pa'i dbyib zhing skyon med pa/ gser gyi dril bu dra
80'b3(phal chen): bas rgyan pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla ba dang ldan pa/ blo kun nas rgyan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdong rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ zhon na
80'b4(phal chen): bde bas lus la byams pa/ shin tu 'gyogs pa/ phyogs bzhir yid ltar 'gyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas lta bu'i lhab lhab thams cad dang ldan pa/ de lta bu'i
80'b5(phal chen): bla ma'i skye bo dang / bla mar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang pa dang ma dang phong ba dang / bkren pa slong ba dang / len pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su
80'b6(phal chen): gtong ba dang / sems yangs pas sbyin pa dang / sems la chags pa med pas gtong ba dang / rjes su 'gyod pa med pas yid mgu bar byed pa dang / snying rje chen
80'b7(phal chen): bos yongs su rgyan pa'i bsam pas gtong ba chen po rab du gtong zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la rab du brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
80'b8(phal chen): rigasu mngon par skyes pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams
81a1(phal chen): cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyis byung ste/ cang shes kyi theg pa la rab du gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams
81a2(phal chen): cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi theg pas byung te/ theg pa bzang po'i bzhon pa la mngon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sgrib pa med
81a3(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi theg pas snang bar gyur te/ theg pa chen po la shin tu mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad smon lam thams cad sgrol ba la rab du zhugs pas//
81a4(phal chen): rtsam pa chen po'i theg pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rab du thob pa la pha rol du
81a5(phal chen): phyin pa'i theg pa la mnyam pa nyid kyis byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes rin po che sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shin tu byung
81a6(phal chen): ba'i chos can du gyur te/ theg pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i
81a7(phal chen): sems dang rgyud du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i rgyud rnam par rtsig pa'i theg pas shin du byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i theg
81a8(phal chen): ba myur ba la mngon par brtson pa'i ye shes kyi chos can du gyur te/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa rjesu sems cing rnam par spyod par gyur
81b1(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par sgrub pa las mkhas pa longs spyod kyi mchog thams cad dang / cang shes kyi theg
81b2(phal chen): pa chen po'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lam gyi mthar thug par mngon par bzung bar bya ba'i phyir theg pa
81b3(phal chen): shin tu mtho bar gnas shing / rab du brtan pa dang yang dag par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes dang rta cang shes
81b4(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i theg pa la mngon par skyon cing /
81b5(phal chen): ye shes dang bzhon pa yongs su 'grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa sgrib pa med pas byung ba'i mthar thug par yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub seMs
81b6(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa/ chos kyi dbang byed pa stan gyi sbyin pa byed cing rgyal po bzhugs pa'i khri stan bzang po bai dUr+ya'i
81b7(phal chen): rkang pa can/ seng ge'i khri la gnas pa/ gser gyi rgyu dang rin po che'i dra bas bres pa/ stan de na bde ba grangs med pa du ma gting ba/ zhe 'khor spos kyi dam pa tham
81b8(phal chen): cad kyi shin du dri zhim par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sgreng ba/ rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i rgyan gyi brgyan te/ gser gyi dra
82a1(phal chen): ba'i bla res bres pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs byung ba'i rin po che 'brug bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
82a2(phal chen): phrag bcus kun nas skor te rnam par phye bas shin tu 'phags shing lta na mdzes pa/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong grangs med pas kun nas lta ba/ gdugs kha
82a3(phal chen): cig gis sa chen po thams cad skyong bar dbang bskur ba/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang ba'i stan du bya ba de la 'dug cing / 'khor lo thogs pa med
82a4(phal chen): pas sbyang ba dang / phyis bya ba la rgyal po'i bka' thams cad nyams pa med par nyan pa/ dpal rnam par dang snang ba dang / in dra ni la dang / nor bu rin po che'i
82a5(phal chen): snying pos spras pa/ nyi ma zla ba dang / skar ma phye bra lta bur rab du brgyan pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rmad du byung bas brgyan pa/ rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa rgya
82a6(phal chen): mtshos sbas pa/ rgya mtsho dang rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bum pa sna tshogs yongs su gang ba dang / dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par
82a7(phal chen): brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi bag dri ma med cing rdul dang bral bas bka' ba de la 'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi bdag po spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas bsod
82a8(phal chen): nams mngon par dbang bskur ba'i stobs dang ldan pa byams pas dbang bsgyur ba dang / pha rol gyi 'khor bcom pa dang ldan pa bka' la klog pa med pas/
82b1(phal chen): 'dug na dga' ba de lta bu'i stan gyi rnam pa tshul de 'dra ba sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / de dang de dag gi rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la khri stan
82b2(phal chen): bzang po'i rnam pa de lta bu sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la gsol ba 'am skyes bu dam
82b3(phal chen): pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam skyes bu dam pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / chos smra ba 'am chos la dga' ba'i phyir yongs su g.yogs pa'i sems kyis sam/
82b4(phal chen): pa dang ma dang bla ma'i skye bo 'am/ nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i sbyin pa'i gnas sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad dam/
82b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod rten mchod pa'i phyir ram/ 'phong ba dang bkren pa slong ba dpag tu med pa dag gam/ sems can thams cad la phan gdag
82b6(phal chen): pa'i phyir yang rung ste/ sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs
82b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin tu byang chub pa'i stan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud kyi dkrug ma
82b8(phal chen): dang dpung rab du 'joms pa'i phyir chos kyi dbang phyug thams cad rdo rje'i ri rnam pa thams cad thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad la dbang ba'i
83a1(phal chen): stan rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi lta bar 'os shing / sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i seng ge gdan
83a2(phal chen): rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cang+ga 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dbang phyug gis skyong ba'i phyir stan gyi rgyan dang / 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod du med
83a3(phal chen): pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs chen po rnam par dag pas khams gsum pas zil gyis mi non
83a4(phal chen): pa'i stan rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bskal pa grangs med par sangs rgyas kyi gdan yon tan sngags mthar thug pa med pa dang ldan zhing 'jig
83a5(phal chen): rten dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa stan gyis rgyas par byed pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can
83a6(phal chen): thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus kyi rgyas par byed pa'i phyir gter chen po'i sbyin pa'i tshogs la gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ji ltar
83a7(phal chen): dam bcas pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad la chos sbyin pas rim 'gro byed pa'i phyir rgyan gyi rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sna tshogs dang stan rab du thob
83a8(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog kyi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i
83b1(phal chen): phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba stan la rab du gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par 'tshang brgya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i
83b2(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba thams cad dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang spos thams cad kyi stan dang / me tog
83b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi stan dang / gos thams cad kyi stan dang / phreng ba thams cad kyi stan dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang / bai dUr+ya sna tshogs bsam gyis
83b4(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i stan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ltar tshad med pa ltar tshad med pa'i stan dang / 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa
83b5(phal chen): brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i stan dang / rdo rje gdan thams cad la 'khod par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' stan gyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung
83b6(phal chen): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi stan rab du thob cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar
83b7(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed cing dbang phyug gi lus la dga' ba'i gdugs rin po che'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu/
83b8(phal chen): brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong khyad par du 'phags shing dbang chen po'i yo byad du bya ba rin po che dra ba can dril bu'i dra bas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i sran
84a1(phal chen): bu'i gser gyi dril bu sbyang ba'i sgra byung ba/ rin po che'i bai dur+ya'i phreng ba rab du sbyang ba nye 'khor nas rnga'i sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba 'byung ga
84a2(phal chen): gser gyi dra ba rnam par dag cing g.yogs pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dra ba brgya phrag stong gi bla re bris pa/ nor bu rin po che'i 'bru grangs med pas spras pa/
84a3(phal chen): rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas sna tshogs su bres shing brgyan pa/ a ka ru dang tsan dan dang spos sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nye 'khor
84a4(phal chen): dri zhim par bgos shing bdug pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar 'od gsal zhing dag pa/ rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas pas brgyan pa de bas kyang
84a5(phal chen): ches lhag pa'i gdugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas dag kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sems kyi sbyin pa byed cing sems can gyi gtso bo mngon du gyur pa 'am/
84a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten brgyan pa'i phyir ram/ chos btsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
84a7(phal chen): 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' btsun par smra ba dag gam/ pha dang ma 'am/ dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i
84a8(phal chen): gnas kyi gang zag sna tshogs sam/ slob dpon dang bla ma dang / byang chub kyi theg pa 'grub pa 'am/ de la zhugs bdag gam/ bkres pa slong ba dang /
84b1(phal chen): bong pa dag gam/ len pa dag la 'bul ba dang / yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i tsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can
84b2(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi g.yogs pa rab du thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par g.yogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams
84b3(phal chen): cad las yongs su 'das te/ yon tan dang / ye shes kyis mngon par bka' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang mun pa dang / yongs su gdung
84b4(phal chen): ba thams cad las rnam par 'das te/ lus shin tu bka' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi lta na sdug cing sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' ba'i
84b5(phal chen): ye shes kyi snying po can tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi chos la log pa med par 'jug pa brtson pas mi 'khrug pa'i chos dkar pos shin tu bkab par gyur
84b6(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi lus kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mthar thug te/ mngon par bkab pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig
84b7(phal chen): rten kun la stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi bla res skyob pas gdug su reg par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad las shin tu 'phags shing
84b8(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan pas ye shes kyi rnam par snang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa la bsod nams thams cad
85a1(phal chen): kyis mchod pa'i phyir gdug su 'os par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi gdugs rnam par sangs rgyas pas
85a2(phal chen): gdugs kyi rnam par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi
85a3(phal chen): chos las dbang ba'i gdugs yang dag par bzung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// gdugs gcig gi na mkha' thams cad kyis dbyings kyi klas pa/ chos thams
85a4(phal chen): cad kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir
85a5(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gdugs gcig gis brgyan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// gdugs dang rgyal
85a6(phal chen): mtshan dang / ba dan yid du 'ong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma
85a7(phal chen): lus par gdugs kyi rgyun gyis kun tu g.yogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la mos pa'i sems can thams cad dang 'gro ba'i tshogs
85a8(phal chen): thams cad kyis dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ sangs rgyas gcig la 'phul bas
85b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i gdugs phul bar ngom shing yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par 'phags pa'i gdugs kyi sangs rgyas thams cad
85b2(phal chen): dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku ji snyed 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na bzhugs
85b3(phal chen): pa/ thams cad la gdugs kyi dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rin po che thams cad kyis phreng ba rgyus shing
85b4(phal chen): grub pa dang / spos thams cad kyi mchog gi dri zhim po dang byung ba'i gdugs dang / rin po che thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i gdugs dang / rgyan mdzes shing rnam
