85b5(phal chen): bar dag pa'i gdugs dang / rgyan tshad med par yangs shing rgya che ba/ gser gyi dra bas kun nas sbyang ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan par 'byung ba'i gdugs dang /
85b6(phal chen): ye shes sgrib pa med cing chags pa med pa'i gdugs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par dga' ba'i gdugs dang yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems
85b7(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la ye shes mchog gi gdugs kyi mngon par
85b8(phal chen): dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis khams kun nas g.yogs shing rab du rgyan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs kyi ye shes
86a1(phal chen): dang yon tan dang / dgongs pa dam pa rnam par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can rin po che mtha' yas pa la dbang bsgyur ba rab
86a2(phal chen): du thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos thams cad la ye shes kyis dbang bsgyur ba kun du rdzogs pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thams cad
86a3(phal chen): kyi mngon par g.yogs par yongs su bsngo ba'i don du yongs su bsngo'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ye shes mchog gi gdugs rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o//
86a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i bla res bres pa'i gdug su 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi zhing cig gis g.yogs
86a5(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos thams cad la dbang phyug tu bsgyur ba'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// mthu chen po'i sems kyis rgyud thob
86a6(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// blo yangs pa dang / sems rgya chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// yon tan tshad med pas 'gro ba thams cad mngon
86a7(phal chen): par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// yon tan thams cad kyi sems can mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyis 'gro ba thams
86a8(phal chen): cad mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// ye shes chen pos mnyam par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsngo ba'i tshul ma
86b1(phal chen): lus par thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems dang bsam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bsam pa dge ba dang yid kyi dbang
86b2(phal chen): po rnam par dag pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba chen pos mngon par dga' ba'i cing yang dag par bsdu ba'i
86b3(phal chen): phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i yu ba rin po che'i
86b4(phal chen): dril bu'i dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ rnam bu rin po che sna tshogs sbyangs pa kha dog dang / mtshon sna tshogs kyi snam bu'i rgyal mtshan gser gyi
86b5(phal chen): dra bas kun nas sbyangs shing klub pa gser gyi dril bu'i sgra 'byung ba/ dril bu'i g.yer kha'i dra bas shin du rgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya
86b6(phal chen): stong kha dog tha dad pa/ mtshon cha tha dad pa shin tu mtho ba'i rin po che sna tshogasu rgyan pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zla gam gyi mdzes par byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung
86b7(phal chen): gi gser gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcug pa/ 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba/ rgyal mtshan gyis rgyan gyis thams cad kun tu g.yogs pa/ rgyal mtshan
86b8(phal chen): gyis rgyan rnam pa du ma'i 'od dang ldan par rab du rgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgreng ba'i rgyan de lta bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi las rnam
87a1(phal chen): par smin pa la mos pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi klas pa/
87a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'byams klas pa la gnas pa yangs pa kun du rgyal gyi sbyin pa yongs su btang bar mos pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
87a3(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang mos pa'i khyad par rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yong sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du
87a4(phal chen): gyur pa rnams la dbul ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten nas chos dkon mchog la mchod pa 'am/ dge 'dun dkon
87a5(phal chen): mchog la dbul ba 'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas sam/ 'khor gyi tshogasu gyur pa 'am//
87a6(phal chen): gang zag gi rnam pa gzhan su yang rung ste/ slong ba thams cad la rim 'gro bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / rgyal mtshan dang
87a7(phal chen): ba dan sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan
87a8(phal chen): dang / ba dan la thug pa med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad bsgreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi go 'phang bris/
87b1(phal chen): pa sbed pa'i chos nyid kyis chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub
87b2(phal chen): kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur te/ rin po che'i gzhi las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bris pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can tham
87b3(phal chen): cad 'gro ba kun la mar me snang bar gyur te/ rgyal mtshan shin du 'phags par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad rnam par 'jom pa'i phyir thug
87b4(phal chen): ba med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyi mi thub pa'i chos can du gyur te/ ye shes dang stobs kyi rgyal mtshan
87b5(phal chen): rab du bsgreng bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rgyal mtshan thams cad mi ltung ba'i snang ba can du gyur te/ ye shes mthu che ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur
87b6(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag par gyur te/ ye shes kyi nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rab tu 'gyed
87b7(phal chen): pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la sogs pa'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs rab du bsgreng bas sangs rgyas
88a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
88a2(phal chen): can thams cad zhag pa thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi rgyal mtshan gyis dben pas zhing sems 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan rab du thob
88a3(phal chen): par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad
88a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / zab mo thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod
88a5(phal chen): ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan dang zhing tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar/
88a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad gtong ba la mos pa dang sems can thams cad nor gyis phyug par byed pa dang / rin po che'i mdzod thad
88a7(phal chen): 'byed pa dang / rin po che'i gter thams cad gtong ba dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed pa
88a8(phal chen): dang / rin po che kun gyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed pa dang / rin po che'i tshogs thams cad 'bang bar mi sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba dang /
88b1(phal chen): rin po che'i tshogs thams cad 'thor ba 'am/ rin po che'i tshogs thams cad yongs su gtong bar sems bskyed pa'i tshe/ wa srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya
88b2(phal chen): stong grangs med pa la rin po che sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad dran pa'i rgyud rmongs
88b3(phal chen): pa med cing sangs rgyas mthong bar rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod 'dzin pas/
88b4(phal chen): chos dkon mchog gi snang ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba shin du brgyan pas dge 'dun dkon mchog yongs
88b5(phal chen): su 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po che'i rab du
88b6(phal chen): thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rmongs pa med par gzhol bas ye shes rin po che la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems
88b7(phal chen): can thams cad ye shes rin po che tshad med pa yang dag par snang bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rin po che grangs med pa phun sum tshogs par
88b8(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la brtson pas/ yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa'i sngags
89a1(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che shin du yangs pa'i mthar thug pas/ ye shes rin po che bcu
89a2(phal chen): drug gi snyoms par 'jug pa rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che la rnam par sangs rgyas par rin po
89a3(phal chen): che dam pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tha dad pa'i yang dag par shes mi zad pa'i mdzod kyi chos rin po che rab du ston pa la
89a4(phal chen): brtson pas rin po che'i dbang po dam par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po che de dag yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/
89a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyi na rin po che rnam par dag cing nyams pa med pas ye shes dam par rin po che yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye
89a6(phal chen): shes su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rgyan gyi shin du brgyan pa/ lus
89a7(phal chen): ldan sdug pa rnam par dag cing mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyan gyis lus shin tu rgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
89a8(phal chen): stong gis shin du rgyan gyi brgyan pa sems can thams cad kyi lus rgyan gyis brgyan par brtson pa/ sems can thams cad la bu'i 'du shes kyis
89b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi bde ba sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad stobs pa dga' ba sna tshogs kyi rab du dga' bar byed pa/ de rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag sems
89b2(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad la rab du dgod pa'i sbyin zhing yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ rgyan yongs su btang
89b3(phal chen): bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyan rnam par dag pas lha dang bcas pa'i
89b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rgyan du rnyed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi rgyud kyi mtshan rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing mtshan gyis lus shin tu rgyan par gyur
89b5(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams rgya'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i lus can du gyur te/ lus mtshan gyis shin tu rgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
89b6(phal chen): cad lus kyi yan lag mtshan kun gyis brgyan pa dang ldan zhing lus mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bris pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams
89b7(phal chen): cad tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan zhing tshig gi rgyan dang shin du brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dbyings kyi yan lag
89b8(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba dang rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing yon tan gyis rgyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig gi tshul
90a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pas/ 'gro ba kun la lta ba mgu bar byed cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig yid du 'ong ba rgyan pa dang ldan
90a2(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kun la lta bas snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi rgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos snang ba
90a3(phal chen): thams cad chos rab du thob cing gzungs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rab du rgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis ye shes kyis rgyud shin
90a4(phal chen): tu rgyan pas sems ye shes kyi yang dag par rgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi rgyan de dag yongasu
90a5(phal chen): gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang / ye shes kyi rgyan yongs su rdzogs te/ sems
90a6(phal chen): can thams cad kyis ris na/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang dreg pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang phyug
90a7(phal chen): la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas sngon par dbang bskur bcod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che'i sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs
90a8(phal chen): pa dang / ltos pa med par yongs su gtong ba'i sems can rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / sbyin pas bgos pa'i rgyud yongs su bsgom pa dang / sbyin pa la dbang bskur
90b1(phal chen): rang du 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa'i ye shes la rab du slob pa dang / sbyin pa gtong ba'i dbang po yongasu bskyed pa dang / sbyin pa gtong ba'i blo rgya cher byed pa'i me cong ban dang gtsug
90b2(phal chen): gi rin po che yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen
90b3(phal chen): pa nyid du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas dbang po thams cad la shin tu dbang bskur bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi gtsug gi pa
90b4(phal chen): rol du phyin pa thob pas spyi bo gtsug gtor gyi mgo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi yon tan spyi bo'i mthar phyin pas ye shes rin po che
90b5(phal chen): mchog gi sems can thams cad yang dag par bsdus par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi spyi bos phyag bya bar 'os shing ye shes rin po che'i mchog
90b6(phal chen): la yang dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi bskyed pa la dbang bsgyur ba rab du thob pa ste/ ye shes kyi cod pan shin tu bcing bar gyur cig/ sems
90b7(phal chen): can thams cad 'jig rten gyi lta bar mi nus pa'i chos can du gyur te/ ye shes kyi nor bu rin po ches mgo rab du rgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyi bor
90b8(phal chen): gyur pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rnam par lta zhing chos can du gyur te/ spyi bo shin du btsun pa dang ldan par gyur cig pa sems can
91a1(phal chen): thams cad ye shes rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing stobs bcu'i rgyan cod pan gyis mgo rab du rgyan par gyur
91a2(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i khams kyi dang po nas bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir sa'i dam pa la gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ston
91a3(phal chen): bcu'i mthar thug ste/ chos kyi ye shes kyi skye bo rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbu zil gyis mi non pa'i snang ba rab du thob
91a4(phal chen): ste/ rgyal ba'i mchog dam par gyur cig/ ces de ltar sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des
91a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi 'byung gnas rnam par dag pa dang / ye shes kyi cod pan dang nor bu rin po che rab du thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o//
91a6(phal chen): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ btson rar bcug cing mtshon chas bcing ba'i sems can sdug bsngal gyi khyim gyis bskor ba shing sgrog dang
91a7(phal chen): lpags sgrog dang / lcang gi bcing bas lus lpags thag gi btags pa dang / sngams pa shin du rgyu ba'i lus can mi bde bar lus shin du mnang ba/ skyabs med
91a8(phal chen): par ltung ba/ bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa gos med pa/ mun pas g.yogs cing khyebs pa/ shin du rke bar lpags sgrogs gis bzlog pa de lta bu dag mthong /
91b1(phal chen): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / rgyal po mig bzang gi ji ltar byas pa bzhin du/ bdag dang 'khor du bcas pa nor thams cad dang bcas pa yongasu
91b2(phal chen): btang ste/ byin nas btson ra de nas sems can de dag yongs su thar bar byed// de brtson ra de nas sems can de dag thar bar byas nas kyang nor gyi sbyin pa thams cad
91b3(phal chen): sngon par byin nas sman dang sngags kyi rnam pas lus nad med par byas te/ bde ba dang yid dga' ba la rab du bkod nas rin po che zos par byas te/ dga' ba'i gtas
91b4(phal chen): gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la bkod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las mi nyams par byed do// de de ltar sems can btson ra nas kye bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge
91b5(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongasu bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad srid pa'i bcing ba dang zhags pa las shin du dgrol bar gyur cig/ sems
91b6(phal chen): can thams cad ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol du phyin pa med cing 'khor ba'i rgyud shin du chad par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad la nyal ba shin du bcom pa ste/ kun
91b7(phal chen): nas 'khor ba dang / rnam par bral bas ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib dang ling tog rnams rtsegs cing rab rib med pa'i ye shes yang dag par mthong bar gyur/
91b8(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gdon par bya ba'i ye shes kyi mthar thug par gyur te/ khams gsum pa'i bcing ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can
92a1(phal chen): thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i sar ye shes sgrib pa med pa mthong ba'i pha rol du phyin pa thob cing nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba
92a2(phal chen): thams cad shin du bshig par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rlom sems kyi g.yo ba rnam par rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa'i ye shes la
92a3(phal chen): yang dag par gzhol zhing g.yo ba dang rlom sems kyi bcing ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad du chags pa med par
92a4(phal chen): gnas shing / 'dod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral te/ 'dod pa'i bcing ba thams cad rnam par spang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa sangs rgyas
92a5(phal chen): thams cad la btang bas lhag pa'i bsam pas shin du grol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa
92a6(phal chen): dag tu sems chags pa med pa dang grol zhing bcing ba med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya
92a7(phal chen): ba dang / gdul ba dang theg pa chen po la dgod pa'i phyir rnam par rgyu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dod par
92a8(phal chen): gyur cig de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad btson ra dang / btson ra nas kye bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de
92b1(phal chen): dag sems can thams cad shin du grol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// 'di ltar sem
92b2(phal chen): can la la zhig srog dang bral ba'i phyir srang du khrid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gi mi gsad cing 'dar ba bcing ba lngas bcings pa/
92b3(phal chen): skye bo brgya phrag stong gi kun nas bskor cing 'dzam bu'i gling du rtogs pa sna tshogs nas gzhal cing dkri ba dang / gnyen bshes rgyud dang 'dza' ba'i rgyud thams
92b4(phal chen): cad dang bral bar gyur pa/ ral gri brtsab cing gshegs pa/ gsal shing sgreng ba la skyon pa lus thams cad kun nas rlag te/ me 'bar ba'i nang du dor ba
92b5(phal chen): 'am/ sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mi bde ba thams cad kyis mi bde bar bya ba dang / rtse ba sna tshogs sgreng ba zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
92b6(phal chen): mthong bar gyur na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsad par bya ba'i don du yongs su gtong te/ ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa
92b7(phal chen): dang / rgyal po khyad par 'gro bas ci ltar bya ba dang de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams kyang sems can gsad pa sku
93a1(phal chen): / ba'i don du lus gtong zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nyams su len pa de bzhin tu rab du gtong zhing byed cing tshig 'di skad
93a2(phal chen): smra'o// khyod kyi mi bde ba 'di dag gis shig lus 'di yongs su btang ba gi srog gcod par gyis shig ngal ni ci byas mchog kyang mi snyan pa med kyis/ khyed kyis mi
93a3(phal chen): 'di la ci byas par 'dod pa de las grangs med par 'gyur du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pas brtse ba thams cad kyi mi bde ba sna tshogasu kyis shig ces bya ba ste/ 'di ltar bdag
93a4(phal chen): gis gsad par dkris pa mthong yang bdag gis lus dang srog gis lus dang srog gis mi slu ba ni bdag dang tshul mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis ni sem
93a5(phal chen): can thams cad la dmigs te/ 'gro ba thams cad srung ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen nyid du sems bskyed do// snyam nas bdag gis lus dang srog yongs su btang te/
93a6(phal chen): gsad par bya ba de smras nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad gzhan gyis rtse ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar byung bas lus dang srog shin
93a7(phal chen): du mi 'phrog par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub stobs bcur lung bstan pa'i gnas rab du thob par gyur cig/
93a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad ngan song thams cad kyi lam las yongs su 'das te 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
93b1(phal chen): 'chi ba med pa'i ye shes kyi dbyingasu zhugs pas 'tsho ba thams cad kyi skabs rab du rnyed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen de bzhin gshegs
93b2(phal chen): pas yongs su bzung bas/ dgras 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dge ba thams cad spyod pas
93b3(phal chen): ral gris rtsa ba lta bu'i mi bde ba thams cad las 'das par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing dam pa'i drung du phyin cing 'jigs pa med par bdud kyi
93b4(phal chen): sde thams cad rnam par 'thor bas bag cha ba dang / 'jigs shing skrags pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'jig
93b5(phal chen): pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam par dag cing khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pas 'khor gyi 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad bral bar gyur cig/ sems can zad
93b6(phal chen): kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la yang dag par spyod cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi nang na sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i seng ger gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
93b7(phal chen): skye bo phal po che kun la yongs su skyong ba'i sems dang ldan zhing 'gro ba kun du 'jigs pa med pa'i khang par zhugs par gyur cig ces de ltar gsad par gyur pa/
93b8(phal chen): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi lus dang srog btang ste blus nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i btson ra'i sdug bsngal kun
94a1(phal chen): spang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba mi spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
94a2(phal chen): po la mgo las gtsug phung dang thor bag tu gcad pa blang nas/ rgyal po'i gnas gtsug na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' yan lag dam pa shin du 'phags pa
94a3(phal chen): dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du des slong ba de dag mthong nas/ gtong bar mos pa'i tshig dge bas thor bag dang
94a4(phal chen): gtsug phungad du bcas te/ khyer cig ces stobs shing / kye tshur gshegs bdag gi mgo las gtsug phud dang thor bag tu bcas pa long shig ces nas/ byang chub sem
94a5(phal chen): dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling na btsun pa mi'i dam pa des yid rtse gcig tu byas ste/ yid ma 'khrugs pa dang / yid ma 'dres pa dang / las gzhan la mi sems pa'i yid dang /
94a6(phal chen): 'jig rten las 'phags pa'i yid dang / rab tu zhi ba'i yid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yid dang / dga' ba'i yid dang / dran pa'i yid dang / rig pa la brtson pa'i
94a7(phal chen): yid kyis gtsug pud dang thor bag dang bcas pa de slong ba la gtong ba'i tshe/ gtsug phud dang thor bag tu bcas par brtson gyi phrogs te/ mgo las phab nas pus mo g.yas
94a8(phal chen): pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ rim 'gro dang bcas pa'i lus sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub
94b1(phal chen): snod pa rjes su dran pa'i sems skyed pa dang / dga' bas rnam thar 'phel ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / chos kyi yongs su rgyas pa'i yid kyi dbang po dang / thug bcwas
94b2(phal chen): gyi tshor bas dengs par mi 'gyur ba'i yid kyi dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang / tha dad par khong du chud pa dang / tshor ba gcig nas gcig
94b3(phal chen): tu rgyud pa de dag thams cad kyi rtag go zhes bya bar rab du shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad dang / rgyud kyi
94b4(phal chen): tshul cig tu gyur pa'i stong pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyes pa las phyir mi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i lhag
94b5(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa'i rnam pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jogs pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi snyan pa'i tshul la gnas te/ gtsug phud dang thor bag tu bcas pa mgo las phog te
94b6(phal chen): yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug gi mchod rten du gyur te/ gtsug gtor ltar
94b7(phal chen): mi snang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin du phra ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par sel cing skra rdo rje nag po'i dam pa lta bur gyur cig/ sems can
95a1(phal chen): thams cad ska tugs cing skra 'tshams legs pa dang / skra snum par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mgo legs pa las shin du
95a2(phal chen): legs par skyes pa'i sgra rab du 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skra dga' ba 'khyil ba ltar g.yas phyogasu 'khyil cing dpal gyi be'u bkra
95a3(phal chen): shis kyi sku dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las rnam par 'das shing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'i sgra thob
95a4(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par rang gi sgra las 'od zer rab du 'gyed par gyur cig/ sems can thams
95a5(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu shin du rnam par dag pa ltar skra shin du mdzes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems mnyam shing sangs rgyas kyi dbu ska dang / de lta bur
95a6(phal chen): mdzes pa dang ldan pas spyi bo la bzhag pa'i mchod rten du 'ong ba'i skra dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu ltar chags pa med pa'i sku
95a7(phal chen): dang mdzes par skyes par mun pa dang / rdul gyis mi chags pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ de ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsug phud dang thog
95a8(phal chen): bag tu bcas pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi lta bur shin du zhi ba'i sems yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
95b1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs bcu'i mthar gtugs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba rnams la
95b2(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa dang / rgyal po zla 'od dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa gzhan dag gis gtong ba'i mig yongasu
95b3(phal chen): sbyang ba'i sems dang / ye shes kyi mig yongs su sbyang ba'i blo dang / chos kyi snang ba rab du thob pa'i yid kyi gnas dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur pa
95b4(phal chen): yid kyi rnam pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang / ye shes kyi skye mched la yang dag par btang pa'i sems
95b5(phal chen): dang / me pa' sangs rgyas mngon du gyur pa'i yid kyi rnam pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i yongs su bsde ba dang / ye shes kyi skye mched la yang
95b6(phal chen): dag par btang ba'i sems dang / dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang nyams par byas pa'i sbyin pa dang gtong ba'i sems dang / zhe sdang med pa'i dmigs shes
95b7(phal chen): dad pa mi zlog pa'i dbang po dang / dag slong rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas so snyan la gzhol bas byang chub sems dpa'i sems theg pa can pa
95b8(phal chen): dang / byams pa dang snyeng rje yongs su bsgom pa dang / dbang po drug shin du sdum pas spong ba rnams la mig 'byin pa de bzhin du de yang mig yongs su gtong cing
96a1(phal chen): chos de lta bu la bzhugs pa'i sems kyi spong ba dang / 'dod pa dag la sbyin pa byed cing mchod sbyin gyi don la 'jug pa dang /
96a2(phal chen): chos kyi mthu shin du skye ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi dga' bar lta ba dang / bag med pa'i sred pa rnam par zlog par byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba dang / 'dod
96a3(phal chen): pa sna tshogs mthong bas rang gi dga' ba khong du chud par byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba nyod par byed pa dang / ci slong ba'i dngos po kha cig stong par byed pa
96a4(phal chen): dang / mi gnyis pa'i sbyin pa rjes su srung ba dang / rlom sems med pa'i shin du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / slong ba rnams kyi dngos po ci blang ba sbyin pa byed pa'i
96a5(phal chen): tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi mig tu gyur te/ mig gi dam par gyur cig/
96a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad ye shes kyi mdzod shin du yangs pas mnyam pa med pa'i mig tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad snang ba mi 'phrogs pa dang ldan zhing sha'i mig
96a7(phal chen): rnam par dag pa yongs su grub par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shi 'pho dang skye ba shes shing lha'i mig gi rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de/
96a8(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rjesu 'dong zhing chos kyi mig rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gtong ba thams cad rnam par ston pas shes rab kyi mig
96b1(phal chen): thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad mngon par 'chang rgya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nas
96b2(phal chen): ba med pa'i mig mthar thog ste/ kun du lta ba'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cadas mas can gyis khams yongs su shes shing rab rib med
96b3(phal chen): mig dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs par byed pas sgrib pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar
96b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig yongs su gtong ba na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshad kyis mig gi chos thams cad yongs su bsngo ba la nye bar 'god do//
96b5(phal chen): shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// / bam po sum bcu bdun pa'o// /
96b6(phal chen): / 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud med pa'i spyi gtsug gis yongs su
96b7(phal chen): btang ba bzhin du slong ba nye bar 'ong ba la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa blang ba'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu rigs dang ldan par 'byung bas sangs
96b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi rig su byung ba'i sbyin pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub du 'thun pa
97a1(phal chen): skyes pa dang / dbang po dang ye shes dang / yon tan gyi shin du mtshun pa dang / khams gsum ma dag cing snying po med pa la rab du/
97a2(phal chen): zhi bar rab tu rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' lta ba rab du thob par byas pas rang gi lus la chags pa med pa'i sems dang / gnas med
97a3(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjesu dran par gnas pa dang / dul ba dang zhi ba'i sems dang / dbang po'i rgyu ba shin tu zhi ba dang / 'gro ba'i mya ngan thams
97a4(phal chen): cad nas sems can thams cad gdon par sems pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams dang 'byung gnas dang / rgyud ched du brjod pa rgya mtshos
97a5(phal chen): gtong ba'i sems yangs par byas pa dang / don la rnam par nges pa'i chos dang / mgon po thams cad kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug la ye shes
97a6(phal chen): kyi spyod pa dang / rang gi lus snying po med pa las snying po blang ba'i blos yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rna ba dang sna yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i
97a7(phal chen): rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi sgra thams cad kyi sgra rnam par rigs par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i rnab
97a8(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra thams cad skad ji lta ba bzhin du shes par byed pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
97b1(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sman dang ldan pas thogs pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rno ba'i skye mched shin
97b2(phal chen): du bsgom pas rna ba rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rnam par shes pa zhi ba skye ma da pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par
97b3(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung khong du chud pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig
97b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad sgrib pa ma lus rnam par dag par bya ba'i gnas med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyir rgol ba 'jigs
97b5(phal chen): par byed pa'i shes pa la mi byed pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rna ba shin du dag pa la dbang bsgyur bas kun du 'jug pa'i rna ba'i dang
97b6(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snyan rab du thob par bya ba thob pas lha'i rna ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub
97b7(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba yongs su gtang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad rna ba rnam par dag pa/
97b8(phal chen): phyir yongs su bsngos nas/ sna rnam par dag pa yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad legs par 'thob pa'i sna dang / dpe byad bzang po'i sna dang /
98a1(phal chen): mtshan bzang po'i sna dang / shin du yid du 'ong ba'i sna dang / rnam par dag pa'i sna dang / rim gyi gzhol ba'i sna dang /
98a2(phal chen): mdzes pa 'phags pa'i sna dang / dgra thams cad rab du 'dul ba'i sna dang / ngo lta na sdug pa'i sna dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shangs rab du
98a3(phal chen): thob par yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad ngo la mi sdug pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo dang chags pa med pa'i ngo dang / lta na sdug pa'i ngo dang /
98a4(phal chen): mi mthun pa med pa'i ngo dang / shin du rnam par dag pa'i ngo dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ngo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor lta bu'i ngo
98a5(phal chen): dang / kun nas lta ba'i ngo// yid du 'ong zhing tshad med pa'i ngo dang ldan par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba dang sna yongs
98a6(phal chen): su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams
98a7(phal chen): cad kyi chos thams cad la rab du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin du 'dus par 'gyur ba dang /
98a8(phal chen): ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin du shes par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos
98b1(phal chen): thams cad la shin du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin du mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems
98b2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sgo khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin du zil gyis mi non pa yongs su dag par 'gyur
98b3(phal chen): ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba rab du thob par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad sangs
98b4(phal chen): rgyas kyis zhing thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus
98b5(phal chen): dang ldan par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyid pa zil gyis mi non pa'i
98b6(phal chen): sa la gnas te/ u dum 'ba' ra ltar shin tu dkon par sems pa'i sems rnam par dag pa dang / gtong ba'i mi zad cing 'byams klas pa/ dad cing krung sdug
98b7(phal chen): te btang ba'i sems dang / yongs su gtong ba'i blo mtha' yas pa dang / dul ba dang yongs su dul ba'i yid kyis gtong ba'i dbang po dang / gtong ba thams
98b8(phal chen): cad yongs su gtong ba'i mthar thug pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang / 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i gtong ba'i 'bras bu dang / gtong ba chen
99a1(phal chen): bo dang / shin tu gtong ba dang / rab du gtong ba dang / mchog tu gtong ba'i sems can thams cad kyi rang gi lus dang yan lag dang
99a2(phal chen): gtong bas kyang phan 'dogs pa dang / mi smod par gtong ba'i sems kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i chos la rab du gnas te ji ltar rgyal po me tog so dang / glang po che
99a3(phal chen): rgyal po che ba drug pas so ji ltar byin pa de bzhin tu rang gi lus dang kha nas so yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems
99a4(phal chen): can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi mchod rten du mchod par 'os par 'gyur te mche ba dkar zhing rno ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
99a5(phal chen): mtshan rab du thob pas so mnyam zhing thag bzang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol du phyin pa la legs par zhugs shing
99a6(phal chen): dul ba'i sems kyis nye bar spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gdong gi dkyil 'khor lta na sdug cing kha'i nang dang so rnam par dag par gyur cig
99a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med par rnam par dag cing bzhin dran pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad so bzang po'i gseb nas spos
99a8(phal chen): zhim po'i mchog grangs med pa yid du 'ong ba'i dga' ba skyes pa'i ngang byung bas yongs su dag cing so bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
99b1(phal chen): shin du dul ba'i so rab du thob cing bkra shis dang 'khyil pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bris pa'i so dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gdong gi dkyil
99b2(phal chen): 'khor nas tshad med pa'i 'od zer snang ba 'byung bas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas pa rab du 'byung ba'i so dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha zas la
99b3(phal chen): ma chags ma zhen cing kha na ma tho ba med par spyod pas sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa'i mthar thug par gyur cig/ de'i so thag legs shing 'bras can kha che ba lta bur gyur cig/
99b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i dam par lung stan cing so'i gseb kun nas 'od zer 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i snang ba 'byung ba dang ldan par gyur
99b5(phal chen): cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i so'i sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang
99b6(phal chen): dge par bskyed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i rgyun gyis chos thams cad shes par rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dang
99b7(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po la lce blangs nas ji ltar rgyal po bzhin bzang dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
99b8(phal chen): dag gis kyang skye mched rnam pa sna tshogs dag la gnas shing tshe rab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de dang de dag tu yongs su btang bar gyur pa de bzhin du des
100a1(phal chen): @kyang spong ba de dag rgyal po la 'os pa'i seng ge'i gdan dag la bkod cing srong pa mos pa'i sems can gyis yid du 'ong shing 'jam
100a2(phal chen): pa'i ngag dang / byams pa la spyod pa'i sems kyis rang gi lce gtong ba'i tshe/ gshe ba'i sems med pa dang / rma med pa'i sems dang / nyams pa med pa'i sems dang /
100a3(phal chen): rigs chen po'i rigs dang ldan pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs su byung ba'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems la bkod cing bzhag pa'i sems dang / rgyud 'khrug
100a4(phal chen): ba med pa'i sems dang / mthu stobs chen po'i shugs kyis sems dang / tshig tu brjod pa la chags pa med pa'i sems su byas te/ pus mo'i lha nga sa la gtsugs
100a5(phal chen): shing bdag gi kha nas byung ste/ lus thams cad slong ba dbang byed du 'jug nas tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / byams par spyod pas tshig tu brjod cing /
100a6(phal chen): ji nas kyang khyed dga' zhing bde ba dang mgu zhing yid rangs par bdag gi lce long la gang du dgos pa sgrub shig ces nas de lce 'byin cing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ yongs
100a7(phal chen): su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can tshig gi tshul thams cad kyi shes par byed pa'i
100a8(phal chen): phyir/ lce shin du yangs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshig bden pa gnyisu bya ba med pa dang ldan par gyur cig
100b1(phal chen): gdong gi dkyil 'khor khebs pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/
100b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par byed pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ro bro ba'i mchog shin du rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing shin tu srab pa'i
100b3(phal chen): lcer gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi tshig shes pa the tshom gcod pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig gi dbyangs mtha' yas pa yod pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
100b4(phal chen): can thams cad lce'i mdzod 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa 'gyed pa'i phyir/ snang ba mtha' yas 'byung ba'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos
100b5(phal chen): thams cad rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa'i tshogs mi zad pas tshig shin nges par brjod pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa kun du brjod pa
100b6(phal chen): tshad med pa'i mdzod kyi lce dang ldan zhing 'dul ba'i mtha' dang mnyam par sems can kun gyi tshig thams cad dang / smra ba thams cad rnam par grol ba'i lce dang ldan
100b7(phal chen): par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa'i tshig gi rgya mtsho thams cad la rab du zhugs pas dbyangs kyi tshogs dang / tshig gi rnam par shes pa'i lce dang ldan pa
100b8(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyod pa thams cad mngon par brjod pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa thab cang chas thams cad mngon par brjod pa'i ye shes kyi pha ral
101a1(phal chen): du phyin pa thob cing chos thams cad shin du ston pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
101a2(phal chen): po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa'i smon lam la rab du brtson pa de dag yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad
101a3(phal chen): kyi sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes chags pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad
101a4(phal chen): kyi dam pa mgo lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug cing sems can thams cad la yongs su skyabs pa byang chub khong du chud par byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mchog tshul gyi
101a5(phal chen): mgo dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par lta ba dang / ye shes yang dag pa'i mgo la yang dag par lta ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i mgo yongs su sgrub pa dang /
101a6(phal chen): sa dam pa'i mgo rjes su lta ba dang 'gro ba thams cad ye shes kyi dam pa mgo lta bu 'dod cing tshol ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad kyi ltar med pa'i ye shes
101a7(phal chen): kyi mgo'i dam pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / phyogs thams cad du phyin pa'i ye shes rgyal po'i mgo la mngon par mos par byed pa dang chos thams cad la dbang nga'i
101a8(phal chen): zil gyis mi non pa'i mgo yongs su grub par byed cing / de lta bu'i chos brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad yongs su gtong
101b1(phal chen): pa'i tshul la rlabs pa/ sangs rgyas la mos pa skyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rab du thob pa// slong ba mtha' yas pas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa yid kyi
101b2(phal chen): dbang po shin du gsal ba/ rgyud rab du dang zhing sems dang yid shin du dngas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba'i snang ba thob pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa
101b3(phal chen): shin du rgya che ba rgyun mi 'chad par sems stong pa chen po gtong ba'i shin du gtong bas/ gtong ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ dbang po shin du dga' bas nye bar bstan pa'i
101b4(phal chen): chos can lhag pa'i bsam pa yang shin du dge ba rgya che bas sbyin pa gtong ba la mngon par 'dor ba ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog dang / skyes
101b5(phal chen): bu dam pa ka sha'i rgyal po dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag kyang mgo yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de ltar
101b6(phal chen): mgo gtong ba'i tshe/ mgo yongasu gtung bas yang dag par bsdus pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyis dpa rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir
101b7(phal chen): yongs su bsngo'o// skye gtsug ltar me snang ba dang / skye mched zil gyi mi non pa dang / zhing thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa dang / bum pa rgyas pa dang /
101b8(phal chen): dga' ba 'khyil ba dang / skra dang mgo'i 'od dang / 'od zer sna tshogs kyi rnam par rgyan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du slad du byung ba dang / dpal gyi be'us
102a1(phal chen): rgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu dang ldan pa dang / ye shes kyi mgo rtogs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchog tu phyin pa'i
102a2(phal chen): mgo dang ldan pa dang / mgo rnam par dag pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mgo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
102a3(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po mgo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi chos kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ye shes kyi yan lag dam
102a4(phal chen): pa rab du thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba rnams la dad pa'i lag pa thog mar 'gro ba rnams dang /
102a5(phal chen): phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / chos spyod pa la brtson par 'gro zhing ldog pa dang / rin po che'i lag pa thogs mar 'gro bas lag pa gtong ba dang / spyod pa don yod par
102a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod pa dang / lag shin du brkyang zhing gtong ba'i sems ma 'khrugs pa dang / rim par spyad pa'i tshul shin du nges pa dang / byang
102a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis spyod pa dang lag pa gtong ba la mos pas lag pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul gyi bzhi chen po rab du bstan pa la spyod
102a8(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yi dam dang / tshor ba ma nyams pa'i blo dang / 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i 'gro bas byang chub tu byung ba de ji
102b1(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa dang / rgyal po dga' ldan pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan tshad med pa dag
102b2(phal chen): kyang skye ba'i gnas sna tshogs dag na gnas shing lag pa yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems yangs shing rgya che ba tshad med pa dang ldan
102b3(phal chen): pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur pa/ chos kyi rgyud kyi sgo rnam par phye ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gtong ba'i lag dang ldan pa/ thams
102b4(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin pa'i smon lam can/ sems skyed pa rdul med pa dang 'grogs pas/ kun nas bskor ba med pa'i ye shes chos kyi lus
102b5(phal chen): rgyun mi 'chad pa/ mi bshig mi chad pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bdud kyis las thams cad kyis mi sgul ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nye bar brten pas
102b6(phal chen): sems spel ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyad pa dang / gcig tu gyur pa'i gtong ba'i byung ba de slong ba la rkang lag sbyin pa byed cing yongs su
102b7(phal chen): gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad thams cad 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te rkang lag yongs su
102b8(phal chen): btang ba yongasu byin pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rdzu
103a1(phal chen): 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob cing rin po che'i lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ de dag rin po che'i lag pa des sems can thams cad
103a2(phal chen): la sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes rab du thob te/ phan tshun gyi lus la rin po ches 'thor bar gyur cig/ sngon par 'thor bar gyur cig/ rab du 'thor bar gyur cig/
103a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin gyis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par gyur cig/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang phan tshun du
103a4(phal chen): zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su dong zhing 'jig pa med
103a5(phal chen): pa la gnas te mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir thams cad la lag na rin po che thogs pa dang / lag na spos thogs pa dang / lag na gos thogs pa dang /
103a6(phal chen): lag na gdugs thogs pa dang / lag na phreng ba thogs pa dang / lag na me tog thogs pa dang / lag na phye ma thogs pa dang / lag na lhab lhab thogs pa dang /
103a7(phal chen): lag na me tog mtha' yas pa thogs par gyur te/ kun nas sgo dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas shing / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par brtson pa'i sems
103a8(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phral dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i lag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yang dag pa
103b1(phal chen): 'dzin pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi lag pa mtshan bzang po dang ldan pa'i lag pa dang / 'od zer gyi mdzod mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor rab du gtong ba'i lag pa dang / 'gro
103b2(phal chen): ba thams cad lag 'thil gcig gis g.yogs par byed pa'i lag pa dang / dra bas 'brel cing sen mo zangs ltar 'dug pa'i lag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyag shin du yang
103b3(phal chen): pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod byed par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la rab du zhugs pa'i
103b4(phal chen): sems can bskyed pa dang / khas len pa'i ngang tshul dang / slong ba thams cad mngon par mos shing 'dod pas dga' ba dang spro ba dang / dad pa chen po rab du thob pa dang / slong
103b5(phal chen): ba 'bod par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rjesu zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rgyud kyi tshul cig tu gyur pa
103b6(phal chen): rkang lag yongs su gtong bar byed cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi byang chub tshol ba'i tshe/ rkang lag yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar
103b7(phal chen): thams cad gtong ba don du yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad ma khyen pa'i bsam pa dang / sems dang ming du las
103b8(phal chen): pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis rab du dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tshor bas deng bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
104a1(phal chen): slong ba thams cad la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ len pa thams cad zhe mi sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems
104a2(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi gtong ba'i lam du rab du zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gtong bas byin par bya ba'i rjes srung ba'i sems dang ldan
104a3(phal chen): ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa rgya chen po btang ba shin du gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sems rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa/ bdag gi lus la
104a4(phal chen): 'phang ba mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'byung gnas dang / rgyal po yod bde bar sems pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
104a5(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag grangs med pa dag kyang skye ba'i gnas de dang de dag la gnas shing khrag yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de ltar slong ba rnams la/ rang gis lus
104a6(phal chen): kyi khrag gtong ba'i tshe/ khrag yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos
104a7(phal chen): dang ye shes kyi lus dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' lus phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang 'dra bar dge sbyong gi lus
104a8(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus nyams pa med cing dag pa dang ldan te/ lus rma med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis mi 'phrog
104b1(phal chen): ba'i sems dang ldan zhing sprul pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'od dang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thad
104b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi gnas pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi dbyings su mngon par skyes pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad la gzhan thams cad
104b3(phal chen): rim 'gro byed pa'i lus dang ldan zhing rin po che lta bu'i 'od yod pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su chos kyi bskyed pa
104b4(phal chen): la dbang bsgyur ba'i lus dang ldan zhing ye shes dam pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi lta na sdug cing don yod par skyes pas/
104b5(phal chen): rin po che rgya mtsho lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis rtse ba gos pa med cing bar snang gi rang bzhin gyi lus dang ldan par gyur
104b6(phal chen): cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus la khrag gi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ ye shes kyi theg pa dang theg pa chen po la rab du gzhol ba'i
104b7(phal chen): sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su bsngo'o// dga' ba'i yid kyi yongs su bsngo'o// dag pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// rangs
104b8(phal chen): ba'i yid kyi yongs su bsngo'o// spro ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// bde ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// dngas pa'i
105a1(phal chen): kha' yang byas yongs su bsdam/ satha pa yang kyis yongs su bsdam// rab du dga' ba'i yad dang ying bden rangs bskyes pas dge pa
105a2(phal chen): rtsa ba de yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba'i sems gzhan du med pa'i dga' bas rnam par 'brel ba dang / byang chub
105a3(phal chen): sems dpa' dang / mkhas pa'i skye bos brten pa'i zla med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i 'jig rten gyis dri ma rtsal ba dang / spong ba thams
105a4(phal chen): cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i nang gi lus nye bar blangs pa'i yid kyi yongs su gtong ba dang / yon tan rin po ches yang dag par blang ba'i dge ba 'byams klas pa dang //
105a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yid kyi nye bar blangs pa'i sbyin pa'i mchog chen po dang / slong ba thams cad kyis yid kyis 'dod par bsam pa dang / yang 'gyod
105a6(phal chen): pa med pa'i sems dang / sbyin pa la dmigs pa'i dngos po shin tu rtag pa'i las rnam par smin pa'i stan dang / len pa rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe
105a7(phal chen): nyams pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon du gyur te/ ba lta bu'i 'du shes mngon par 'dzin pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sems
105a8(phal chen): can thams cad rnam par dag pa la gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan thams cad dang 'gro ba thams cad mngon du
105b1(phal chen): gyur pa'i snying rje chen pos yongs su skyobs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i stobs bcu rnam par spyod pa dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
105b2(phal chen): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thun pa yongs su rdzogs pa bya ba dang / me 'jigs pa thams cad sngon du
105b3(phal chen): gyur pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro sgrogs pa dang / dus gsum mngon du gyur pa'i dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dus gsum thams cad mngon
105b4(phal chen): du gyur pa'i mtha'i bskal par thug par zhe non pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / yongs su yid chad pa med pa'i mngon du gyur pa'i sems bskyed pa grangs med
105b5(phal chen): bas de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phan pa tshol ba dang / rgyal po thams cad gtong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan
105b6(phal chen): grangs med pa dag kyang skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs dag na gnas shing / sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ste/ de ltar slong ba rnams la lus las sha dang rkang yongasu gtod /
105b7(phal chen): wa bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongasu bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying ltar/
105b8(phal chen): 'khregs pa'i yan lag dang ldan shing mi bshig pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gso ba med pa'i lus rab tu thob ste/ gsog ma yin/
106a1(phal chen): pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas pa'i
106a2(phal chen): lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis lus la shin du grub pas bsod nams rgya'i mtshan gyis lus dang ldan par gyur cig/
106a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tha mi dad cing mnyam pa dang ldan te/ dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu'i rnam par bris pa'i lus dang ldan par
106a4(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab du thob pas mtha' las 'das pa tshad med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
106a5(phal chen): bdud thams cad kyi dkrug ma rab du 'joms pas kun du khyab pa'i spyod lam dang ldan zhing thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
106a6(phal chen): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lus gcig par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad na mkha'i dbyings kun tu chos kyi
106a7(phal chen): sku khyab par byed pa'i phyir/ chags pa med pa'i lus mngon par grub par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad shong ba'i lus dang ldan zhing byang chub
106a8(phal chen): kye lus dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan par
106b1(phal chen): slong ba la sha dang rkang lag yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi mtha' las 'das pa tshad med pa rnam par dag parab
106b2(phal chen): tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i rgyud bslab pa'i sems dang ldan pa sbyin pa thams cad byin pas spyad
106b3(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan pa sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chen po'i sems dang ldan pa/ pha rol du phyin pa'i sbyin pa grub pa'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
106b4(phal chen): kyi sbyin pa'i rjesu slab pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa dang yongasu gtong ba thams cad kyi zad mi shes sems dang / sbyin pa'i gnas thams cad la shin du gnas pa'i
106b5(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i las la rab du gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la bya bas mngon
106b6(phal chen): par gyur pa'i gtong ba'i sems dang / slong ba thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par sbyar ba rab du mchod pa'i sems dang ldan pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba
106b7(phal chen): med pa dang / rgyal po g.yo ba med pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang snying yongs su gtang bar/
106b8(phal chen): gyur pa de ltar slong ba kun nas 'ong ba rnams kyis blang zhing rang gi lus las snying yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa dang / spong ba dang thob par byed pa dang /
107a1(phal chen): lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad rab du sgrol ba'i phyir/ stobs bcu'i byang chub la dmigs par byed
107a2(phal chen): pa dang / smon lam chen pos nan tan du byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa dang / smon lam yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin
107a3(phal chen): byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin lta bu'i yongs su bzung ba'i snying
107a4(phal chen): dpal gyi be'us rgyan pa dang ldan zhing rdo rje'i ri 'khor yug thams cad mi bshig shing rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i snying dang ldan pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa'i snying dang / thub par
107a5(phal chen): dka' ba'i snying dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi mi 'phrog pa'i snying dang / dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ye shes kyi snying po can gyi snying dang mthu bo che chen po dam pa'i sems kyis rgyal
107a6(phal chen): mtshan can gyi snying po dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gtso bo lta bu mi 'phrogs pa'i snying dang / mthu bo che ltar mi shig pa'i snying po can gyi snying dang / bdud kyi las dang bdud
107a7(phal chen): kyi dpung dang / bdud kyi sde rnam par 'jom pa'i snying dang / brtan pa'i snying dang / gzeng mtho ba'i snying dang dpa' ba'i snying dang / rtul pod kyi snying dang / mi 'jigs mi
107a8(phal chen): sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i go cha chen po yang dag par bgos pa'i snying dang / shin du btsun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying dang sangs rgyas kyi/
107b1(phal chen): chos yongs su rdzogs pas byang chub snang bar gyur pa'i snying dang / byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs shing rmongs pa med par thams cad
107b2(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang brgya pa'i snying dang / stobs bcu mngon par byang chub pa rab du thob pa'i snying dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
107b3(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po snying gi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i stobs bcur med pa'i
107b4(phal chen): thugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dag dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba mngon par dad
107b5(phal chen): bar byed pa'i lta ba dang / gsal zhing dga' bar byed pa'i mig dang / byang chub dang mnyam par bya ba'i byams pa dang / ci 'dod pas slong ba phud dud du bya ba'i sbyin pa dang /
107b6(phal chen): rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed pa'i gtong ba dang / lus kyi snying po med par rtogs pas snying po blang ba'i sems dang / 'da' bar gyur pa'i lus rjesu dran pa'i yid la
107b7(phal chen): byed pa dang / spyang khu dang wa dang khyis bza' bar gyur pa'i lus su rab du rtogs pa dang / gzhan la rag lus pa'i mi rtag par yid la byed pa dang / lus kyi rgyus thams
107b8(phal chen): cad khong du chud pa dang / gzhan la dad pa'i sems dang de lta bu'i chos de dag yid la bya ba brtson pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' legs pa'i byin pa dang / rgyal po'i
108a1(phal chen): sdig bsngal ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa de dag gis kyang spong ba
108a2(phal chen): rnams la rgyu ma dang / mchin pa dang / khal ma dang / ko ba yongs su btang bar gyur pa de ltar rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang / mkhal ma dang bro ba dag yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/
108a3(phal chen): sems dpa' spong ba de dag la mi dge ba pa'i mig gi lta zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus mi rtag cing mig btsan na/ 'on kyang rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang /
108a4(phal chen): mkhal ma dang glo ba lta bu dag kyang slong ba dag la dgos pa ltar byin par bya'o// zhes de lta bur yid la byed cing dga' ba'i rgyud dang de ltar chos nyid shes pa'i bsam
108a5(phal chen): pa dang slong ba mthong ba de dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi lus snying po med pa de snying po blang bar 'dod de/ de lta bu'i yid la byed cing rab du
108a6(phal chen): rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang mkhal ma dang / glo ba de dag yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di
108a7(phal chen): ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang mkhal ma dang gro ba dang yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye
108a8(phal chen): shes kyi snying po'i lus dang ldan zhing lus phyi nang shin tu gtsang shing dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam yang dag par 'dzin
108b1(phal chen): pa'i phyir ye shes kyi lto dang yang dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nang spos zhim po'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing phyi rol du 'od zer rab du 'gyed pas ldan
108b2(phal chen): bzang ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rim gyi gzhol cing mnyam pa'i lus kyi yan lag dang ldan te/ gzhu lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa'i lus
108b3(phal chen): su gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos dga' bas lus shin du skyes pas lus chos kyi zas dang ye shes kyi bso bar gyur cig/ sems can thams
108b4(phal chen): cad dga' ba'i lus dang chos kyi lus kyis yang dag par spyod pas zad mi shes pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par shes
108b5(phal chen): pa'i chos snang ba dang ldan pas gzugs kyi snying pos lus kyi nang rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nang gi bsam pa'i rgyud shin du sbyar bas lus
108b6(phal chen): yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi ngoms par byed cing chos kyi sprin gyi char rab du 'beb pas de bzhin gshegs
108b7(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi rnal 'byor khong du chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyi rol gyi lus 'gro ba thams cad la ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan mdzes shing snang
108b8(phal chen): bar gyur pas nang gi lus dag cing zhi bar gyur cig/ ces de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu ma dang mchin pa dang mkhal ma dang glo ba de
109a1(phal chen): dag rang gi lus las slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi lus phyi nang
109a2(phal chen): yongs su dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la rab du 'khod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
109a3(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'byung gnas dang rgyal po skar ma'i 'od dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis kyang yan lag
109a4(phal chen): dang nying lag dang rus pa slong ba rnams la yongs su btang bar gyur pa de ltar yan lag dang nying lag dang rus pa blang ba na slong ba rnams la gtong ba'i tshe slong ma thag
109a5(phal chen): tu sems dga' ba dang sems mos pa dang sems dang ba dang sems rab du spro ba dang / sems thar pa dang byams pa'i sems dang chags pa med pa'i sems dang dga'
109a6(phal chen): ba'i sems dang slong ba rnams la rim 'gro bya ba'i sems rab du thob te de yan lag dang nying lag dang rus pa de dag blang bas slong ba la yongasu gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba
109a7(phal chen): de dag thams cad la 'di ltar yongasu bsngo ste/ rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag dang rus pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
109a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad rus pa dang sha dang khrag med pa'i lus dang ldan zhing sprul pa lta bu'i lus can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lus thug pa med cing zil gyis mi
109b1(phal chen): non pas rdo rje lta bu'i stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chags pa med cing grol ba dang bcings pa med pa'i ye shes kyi lus kyis byung ste thams cad
109b2(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i stobs dang chos su ldan pa'i lus phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can dbang po tha mi dad cing bcad du med pas rab du thob pas ye shes kyi stobs kyi lus
109b3(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi stobs dang dbang gi pha rol du phyin pa thob pas chos kyi stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
109b4(phal chen): cad lus shig shig por med pas yan lag shin du rten pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun yongasu smin par byed cing 'dul ba la
109b5(phal chen): zhugs pas 'gro ba thams cad ji ltar mos pa'i lus dang yan lag gi byin rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthu bo che'i yan lag dang nying lag
109b6(phal chen): dag par zin pas stobs chen po dang ldan zhing ye shes la gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chad cing dub pa med pa'i lus rab du thob par
109b7(phal chen): shin du brtan par lus kyi rgyud 'brel ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i lus kyi shin du rten cing stobs dang
109b8(phal chen): ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtha' yas/ ye shes kyi khyu mchog gi mthu byin gyi pa'i lus dang ldan zhing chos kyi lus kyi 'gro ba thams cad du rnam
110a1(phal chen): par rgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med cing lta na don yod pa dang ldan te bsod nams kyi
110a2(phal chen): stobs kyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gnas med pa'i ye shes kyi mthar rtag te/ gnas pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
110a3(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam pa byin gyi rlabs pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi yongs su bzung ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad du 'gro ba'i
110a4(phal chen): lam gyis lus kyi rjesu song bas 'gro ba thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi phyogs
110a5(phal chen): pa med cing mngon par lta ba'i snang bas sgo kun nas lta ba'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la spyod pa la brtsam
110a6(phal chen): par mthar phyin par bya ba la brtson pas brtson 'grus dang ldan par lus phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can ye shes rten par gnas pa thob pa sangs rgyas dang r-I
110a7(phal chen): pa dang drag pa thams cad rgyun 'chad cing rnam par dag pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin
110a8(phal chen): du lus grub par gyur pas rtul shugs dam po'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thams cad las rnam par 'das shing
110b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bas byung ba'i lus su gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yan lag dang nying lag dang rus pa de dag slong bar
110b2(phal chen): gyur pa rnams yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grub par bya ba dang shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir yod
110b3(phal chen): su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus la slong ba dag gis mdog dang ldan pa'i lpags pa blang ba'i tshe/ mtshon cha thogs pa'i
110b4(phal chen): slong mthong yul dga' bar byed pa'i dbang pos slong ba rnams la drin du bzo ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas len par sting ba'i stan la slong ba rnams bkod de/ slong ba rnams
110b5(phal chen): la rim 'gro'i 'du shes nye bar gzhog pa dang / len pa rnam la shin du dkon pa'i 'du shes yang dag par bskyed pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i bzhir gyur pa smon par
110b6(phal chen): bya ba yang dag par mthong bar sems shing slong ba rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sems kyi rtog cing 'dzum pa dang ldan par lta bas slong ba rnams la lta zhing tshur
110b7(phal chen): shog long shig ces bya ba'i tshig brjod pa dang / slong ba rnams la bdag nyid ci dga' bar bya bar gtong ba de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag pa'i snying po dang / ri dgas
110b8(phal chen): kyi rgyal po gser gyi rtsib logs ltar mdog dang ldan/ 'i lpags pa slong ba rnams la yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can rnams la 'di ltar yod/
111a1(phal chen): gtong ste/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi mi ngoms shing rnam par dag pas shin du 'jam pa'i mdog
111a2(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i mdog thug par dga' ba'i kha dog dngas zhing ma 'dres pa'i kha dog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
111a3(phal chen): cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gis gser gyis snying por dag cing gser gyi mdog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rnam pa
111a4(phal chen): sbyang bas dag cing kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge sbyong de bzhin gshegs pa shin du gzhol ba'i kha dog gis rnam
111a5(phal chen): par dag cing rnyog pa med pa'i dad pa'i kha dog gi mchog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyi kha dog rnam par dag cing kha dog dang mdog gi
111a6(phal chen): mchog dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par bris shing sangs rgyas kyi kha dog rnam par dag pas mdog dang kha dog shin du
111a7(phal chen): rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kha dog dang mdog bzang po phun sum tshogs shing shin du 'gro ba kun du mdog gi snang ba rab du 'gyed par gyur cig/
111a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa rnam par 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan zhing mdog 'od zer gyi dra ba can
111b1(phal chen): dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gzugs thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dag ste/ mdog dang kha dog shin du snum pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar
111b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi lus las mdog dang ldan pa'i lpags pa slong ba rnams yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can
111b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub
111b4(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can la phyin ci log pa med pa bzhin 'dzum pa can yid bde ba thob pa theg pa chen po la legs par gnas pa grags pa
111b5(phal chen): 'dod pa med pa'i sbyin pa can/ snying zag pa nas sbyin pa la gnas pa gtong bu chen po la yid rab du zhugs pa 'byung ba'i dri ma la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa//
111b6(phal chen): phra dog dang 'byung ba'i dri ma dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rabs la zhugs pa/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' lta ba'i brtson 'grus dang 'jam
111b7(phal chen): bu'i gling gi bdag po gser gyi 'od dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa gzhan dag gis kyang sor mo rnams yongs su
111b8(phal chen): gtong bar gyur pa ltar slong ba la rkang lag gi sor mo yodasasu gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sor
112a1(phal chen): mo byin pa dang ci blang ba'i dngos po btang bas yang dag par sdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
112a2(phal chen): kyi phyag sor thob par gyur te sor mo ring bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sor mo rims kyis gzhol bar legs par grub pas sor mo zlum pa dang ldan pa
112a3(phal chen): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sen mo rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing zangs kyi kha dog lta bu'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos
112a4(phal chen): thams cad 'dzin par brtson pa'i sor mo dpe byad bzang po dang ldan zhing skyes bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
112a5(phal chen): stobs bcu'i phyag sor dang ldan par gyur cig/ dpe byad bzang po grub pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin du sbyang ba'i sor mo
112a6(phal chen): tshul dang 'thun par sor mo'i dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sor mo'i chos nyid kyi yan lag dang bum pa gang ba dang / bkra shis
112a7(phal chen): kyi mdzes pa dang ldan pa'i sor mo'i rtse mo la 'khor lo yod pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i phyag sor 'phrin las kyi rnam par
112a8(phal chen): smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pas byung ba lta bu dang ldan pas pad mo bzang po dang dga' ba 'khyil bas sor mo thams cad kyi tshig dang yan lag shin du brgyan cing
112b1(phal chen): dpe byad bzang pos mdzes par rnam par phye zhing rgyan gyis rgyan pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med par snang
112b2(phal chen): ba la brtson zhing 'od zer gyi dra ba'i mdzod rab du 'gyed pa'i sor mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sor mo shin du mdzes pa dra bas legs
112b3(phal chen): bar 'brel pa dang ldan zhing sor mo legs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sor mo slong ba rnams la sor me/
112b4(phal chen): yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can rnams la yongs su bsngo'o//
112b5(phal chen): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa la/ la la zhig gis chos thob par bya bar bsam te/ des 'di skad du gal te khyod
112b6(phal chen): kyis sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo nga la byin na ni ngas khyod la chos ston par bya'o zhes zer ba zhig yod na de la 'di skad du smra ste/ bdag gi sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo
112b7(phal chen): ci sder khyer la bdag la chos stan por mdzod cig ces nas/ ji ltar rgyal po dbang phyug tu gyur pa legs bshad tshol ba dang byang chub sems dpa' zad mi
112b8(phal chen): shes pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dang/ sems dpa' chen po gzhan tshad med pa chos bzang po nyid la brtson pa 'gro ba kun du chos kyi lo shin du
113a1(phal chen): legs pa yang dag par snyan pa'i phyir sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo yongs su btang bar gyur pa te/ de ltar spong ba rnams rang gi
113a2(phal chen): sha dang bcas pa'i sen mo yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag sen
113a3(phal chen): mo rab tu grub cing zangs kyi kha dog lta bus sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dpe byad bzang po'i sen mo rab du thob cing mdog snum pa'i sen mo dang ldan
113a4(phal chen): bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sen mo'i dam pa dang ldan zhing 'od zer ba'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sen mo bzang po dang ldan zhing
113a5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sen mo rab du thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyi mi gos shing mtshungs pa med kyis sen mo dang ldan par gyur
113a6(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad 'od kyis snang bar byas par la brtson zhing shin du rgyan pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyams pa med cing sems
113a7(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes che zhing yangs pa rnam par dag par ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjesu
113a8(phal chen): song ba'i mtshan ma dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par smin par mdzes par skyes pa'i sen mo dang ldan par gyur
113b1(phal chen): cig/ sems can thams cad kyis 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa rab du 'gyed pa'i mdzod dang ldan zhing mgon po thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyag sen dang ldan par gyur cig/
113b2(phal chen): ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa'i phyir sen mo dang shar bcas pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas thams
113b3(phal chen): cad kyi sku dang phyag sen gyi rgyan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyi mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// shin du rgyas pa chen
113b4(phal chen): pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// / bam po sum bcu brgyad pa'o// /
113b5(phal chen): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi don tu chos tshol ba lhur len pa shin du bkon pa'i chos tshol ba la zhugs pa la
113b6(phal chen): chos gtong ba'i gang zag la las me'i nub su lus zhugs par byas te/ 'di skad du gal te khyod mi 'greng bdun du dgos pa'i me'i rlub su 'tshong phod na khyod la
113b7(phal chen): chos sbyin par bya'o zhes na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra de zos nas shin du dga' ba'i yid bde ba dang / rab du 'dun pa'i yid skyes nas/
113b8(phal chen): 'di snyam du sems te/ ngan song thams cad mnar med 'i sdug bsngal nyams blang ba dang yang bsngo zhing bdag gi dam pa'i chos rtsal dgos la/ 'di ltar me'i
114a1(phal chen): rlabs su 'acong ba cas byas chos rnyed par 'gyur na/ sa kyi ma de ltar dkon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang sems can dmyal
114a2(phal chen): ba'i sdug bsngal lta bu med par me'i rlub tsam du 'tshong par sems dpa' ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam nas 'di ltar bdag gis mi 'gring bdun tu skos pa'i me'i rlub su 'tshong bar gyis
114a3(phal chen): shig/ khyod kyis bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad du gsol zhes nas de ji ltar rgyal po legs par bshad pa tshol ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' dang
114a4(phal chen): de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang / me'i rlubasu tshong bar byas pa de ltar chos kyi don du sdug bsngal
114a5(phal chen): gyi tshor ba thams cad dang bsngo ba'i lus kyi me rlub su 'tshong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongasu bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
