219b6(phal chen): su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i las dang chos la brtson pa dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// yongs su dag par bya ba'i
219b7(phal chen): phyir 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mngon par sangs rgyas pa thams cad ma lus
219b8(phal chen): par de ltar rnam par dag cing 'od gsal ba dang / bzang zhing sgrib pa med par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu dmigs pas rnam par dag pa rnam ji ltar gzugs
220a1(phal chen): rlan gyi tshul yongs su sdang ba de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du yang yongasu snang bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi
220a2(phal chen): zhing de dag thams cad kyang gcig bzung bas yongs su bzung te/ chos kyi dbyings tshad med par gtogs pa'i rnam par dag pas rnam par gyur cig/ shin du rgyas pa chen
220a3(phal chen): bo'i mdo/ sangs rgyas pa la po zhe bya ba// / bam po bzhi bcu pa'o// // 'di lta ste rin po che'i brgyan grangs med pa kun
220a4(phal chen): nas gnas par gyur cig/ gos rin po che thams cad gting zhing rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pa thams cad kyi rin po che rnam par dag pa'i bden kun nas gnas par
220a5(phal chen): gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba dang ldan zhing rin po che'i bla re grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad gcig nas gcig tu
220a6(phal chen): rgyud pas yongasu bzung zhing / rin po che'i gdug drangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ nor gyi dbyigs thams cad kyi char rab tu dbab pa'i rin po'i sprin grangs med
220a7(phal chen): pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ lta na yid du 'ong la rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i me tog grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis skar
220a8(phal chen): khung shin du brgyan cing rin po che thams cad kyi stegs bu grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yid du 'ong bas/ sems can thams cad kyi
220b1(phal chen): / khams su sgrogs cing / rin po che'i dril bu grangs med pa gnas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi yon tan gyi sangs rgyas shing gsal bas/ rin po che'i pad mo grangs med
220b2(phal chen): ba kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i shing grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i gnas
220b3(phal chen): rin po che'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing thams cad du yid du 'ong bar rgyu ba'i rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs bgrangs
220b4(phal chen): med pa'i kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che'i rgyan chen pos sbas pa'i rin po che'i ba gam grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad rnam par dag
220b5(phal chen): bas rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i rta bab grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi se mo do las rab tu kye ba'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi sgo grangs med
220b6(phal chen): pa rnams kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan pa'i shing rta la rin po che'i zla gam grangs med pas rgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ bsam gyi mi
220b7(phal chen): khyab pa'i rin po che rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i skar khung rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las kyi dge ba'i
220b8(phal chen): rtsa ba rab tu grub pas rin po che'i brgyan dang lhab lhub kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi brgyan dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i snying po rab tu brgyan pa grangs me
221a1(phal chen): pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ mang du mdzama' tshan po cashin du rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i brgyan dang lhab lhub sna tshogs
221a2(phal chen): grangs med pas kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ chos thams cad kyi rgyun shin du rigs par 'bab pa'i rin po che'i chu klung grangs med pa rnams kun nas gnas par gyur
221a3(phal chen): cig/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i rgya mtsho grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ chos thams cad kyi me tog bun ta ni kra rjesu sgrogs pa'i
221a4(phal chen): rin po che'i me tog pun ta ri ka grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ ye shes kyi ri bo shin tu 'phags shing rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i ri bo grangs med pa kun nas
221a5(phal chen): gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi srad bu bres pa'i rin po ches mig mangs ris su rnam par phye ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ ye shes chen
221a6(phal chen): po'i 'od zer gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snang bar byed pa'i rin po che'i 'od thogs pa med par gsal ba/ grangs med par kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ yid
221a7(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan par sgrog pa rin po che'i dril bu rab tu bkrol ba grangs med kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che dang ldan pas rin po che rnam par dag
221a8(phal chen): pas rnam par sbyangs pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che'i kha dog bsam gyi mi khyab cing rnam par dag pas snam bu rin po che rab tu sbyangs pa grangs med pa
221b1(phal chen): kla nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che blugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par mdzes pa'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sbeng ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po
221b2(phal chen): tshe thams cad kyi bdan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa'i rin po che'i bdan grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ bar snang gi rgyan sna tshogs kyi snam bu'i rin
221b3(phal chen): po che'i ljang lding mngon par bres pa kun nas gnas par gyur gyur cig/ rin po che sna tshogs reg na bde ba'i rin po che'i gding ba yongs su gting ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas
221b4(phal chen): par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i can rnam par sbyong ba'i rin po che'i klong grangs med pa kun nas gnas par
221b5(phal chen): gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs brgya stong thams cad kyi mdzes par gyur pa'i rin po che'i se mo do rab tu sbyangs pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/
221b6(phal chen): gnas dang mi gnas pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pas rin po che'i khang pa dang / gnas grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rdo rje rin po ches mdzes par
221b7(phal chen): gyur cig/ rin po che'i brgyan gyis rab du brgyan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ grangs med pa thob nas thams cad rnam par dag cing rin po che sna
221b8(phal chen): tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa'i kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa'i thams cad dang ldan zhing rin po che rnam par dag pas/ rnam par sbyangs pa
222a1(phal chen): grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ chags pa med pa'i lus kyi tshul rnam par dag pas rin po che'i 'khor yug gis kun nas/
222a2(phal chen): skor ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dri zhim po rjes su song zhing rin po che'i spos grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/
222a3(phal chen): sprul pa re re zhing chos kyi dbyings tshad dang mnyam pas rin po che'i 'phrul pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ snang ba re re las snang ba thams cad ston cing / rin po che'i
222a4(phal chen): snang ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ chos kyi ye shes kyi 'od rnam par dag pa rin po che'i 'od grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ 'od zer re res kyang chos
222a5(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du khyab par 'gyur ba'i rin po che'i 'od zer gnyis grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang ldan pa'i rin po che 'byung
222a6(phal chen): bgrangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ ye shes bzang po chen po rnam par dag pa'i/ chos rin po che'i dbyig thams cad sbyin pa'i rin po che'i mdzod grangs med pa kun
222a7(phal chen): nas gnas par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan shin du 'phags pa'i rin po che'i dpal grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ ye shes bzang po chen po
222a8(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i rin po che bzang po grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la dga' zhing rtse ba'i bza' shing gi ra ba
222b1(phal chen): shin du brgyan pa grangs med pas kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam par bstan pa'i rin po che'i dbyangs grangs med pa kun
222b2(phal chen): nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'bru las chos kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rin po che'i gzugs grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ mtshan thams cad
222b3(phal chen): mtshan ma ma yin pas brgyan pa'i rin po che'i dra ba med pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che'i thams cad kyi rim gro byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba skyed pa'i
222b4(phal chen): rin po'i gro grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi lhun legs par rtsigs pa'i rin po che las bsgrubs pa'i grangs med pa kun nas gnas par
222b5(phal chen): gyur cig/ rin po che'i thams cad shin du brtan par brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gnas grangs med pa rnams kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
222b6(phal chen): gzhal du med pa'i gos bde bar bgo ba rab tu thob pa'i rin po che'i gos dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ sems skyed ma thag tu shin du mthong ba'i
222b7(phal chen): gzung rab tu thob cing / chos gos dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ las rin po che thams cad rnam par smin pa nges par rtog shing de mthong ba
222b8(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches bsgom pa grangs med pas kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ mthong ma thag tu chos thams cad kyi tshul shes pa'i mig rnam par dag cing nyams
223a1(phal chen): pa med par lta ba'i rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ ye shes kyi phung pos grub pa'i rin po che'i 'od kyi phung
223a2(phal chen): po grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i gzims stangs kyi nga ros rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i grangs med pa kun nas gnas par
223a3(phal chen): gyur cig/ ye shes kyi mar me yongs su grub pa'i rin po che'i mar me grangs med pa mang po kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ shing rta la gcig dang gnyis la rin po che'i
223a4(phal chen): srad bus mig mangs ris su bris pa shin du rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i shing rta la grangs med pa mang po kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che'i yal gas shin du rnam
223a5(phal chen): par dag pa'i rin po che'i sdong po grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i shing sa la grangs med pa kun nas
223a6(phal chen): gnas par gyur cig/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i bya mang po chos kyi rgyun sgrogs pas brgyan pa'i rin po che'i nags tshal grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/
223a7(phal chen): ye shes kyi snang ba kun du gtong ba'i rin po che'i lam dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pas/
223a8(phal chen): me tog gcig la gnas shing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyu ba'i rin po che'i me tog dang dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen
223b1(phal chen): pa'i ye shes chen po las/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu rab tu thob pa'i rin po che'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ grong gi chos thams cad yongs
223b2(phal chen): su spangs par gnas pa'i rin po che'i grong grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyis g.yogs pa'i sems can gyi gang zhing / rin po che'i 'a
223b3(phal chen): gnas grangs med pa'i kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ mthu bo che dpal tsha bo'i chos kyi go brtan pa bgos pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan
223b4(phal chen): pa'i rgyal po'i gnas rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ sems kyi gnas thams cad las rnam par 'das pas rab tu gang ba'i rin po che'i gnas grangs
223b5(phal chen): med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ yongs su shes pa'i gos thams cad rab tu bgo ba'i gos rin po che grangs med pas kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ khyim pa med
223b6(phal chen): par rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gang zhing / rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi gnas grangs med pas kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ lta na yid du 'ong ba'i
223b7(phal chen): rin po che dang ldan pa'i 'thun pa'i rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi 'od 'gro ba rab tu gtong ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo
223b8(phal chen): shin tu sprul pa rab du bskor ba rin po che'i 'khor lo grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing rnam par dag pa/ mig 'phrul gyi rnam pa
224a1(phal chen): shin tu dag pa'i rin po che'i shing grangs med ba kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ lhan bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i shin tu rnam par bkram
224a2(phal chen): pa'i rin po che'i sa rnam par dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgrogs pa'i rin po che'i rol mo rdung
224a3(phal chen): ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur byin gyi rlab rgyun mi chad pa'i rin po che'i rol mo dkrol ba grangs med pa kun nas gnas
224a4(phal chen): par gyur cig/ chos rin po che rnamasu 'dzin pa'i sems can rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ bsod nams rin po che dang ldan pa'i lus rin po
224a5(phal chen): che rnam par dag pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ chos rin po che rab du brjod pa'i rnam par dag pa'i ngag rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ thams
224a6(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa smon pa'i bsam pa rin po che rab tu thob pa'i sems yongs su byung ba rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
224a7(phal chen): rin po che'i stobs rmongs pa med pa la rten pa'i dran pa rin po che yongasu dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rin po che gzung
224a8(phal chen): ba dang / yang dag par bcad pa'i byin gyis rlabs yod pa'i rig pa rin po che rnam par dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
224b1(phal chen): kyi mdzod nges par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros rin po che yongs su dag bgrangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che ma
224b2(phal chen): du yangs pas rgyas par 'gas pa'i blo rin po che tshad med grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ stobs bcu rin po che thams cad nyams pa med pa'i mig rin po che
224b3(phal chen): yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad du nyan pa rnam par dag pa'i rna ba rin po che yongasu
224b4(phal chen): dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ mthun pa'i rin po che rnam par dag pa'i sna rin po che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig
224b5(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshig gi tshul thams cad rnam par ston pa'i lce yangs pa rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
224b6(phal chen): cad du thog pa med pa'i 'gro ba'i lus rin po che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam la
224b7(phal chen): brtson pa'i yid rin po che yongs su dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ dbyangs rin po che rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams cud rgyas par 'gengs
224b8(phal chen): ba'i dbyangs rin po che yongasu dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ ye shes rin po che sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las rin po che grangs med pa kun nas gnas
225a1(phal chen): par gyur cig/ ye shes rin po che sgrib pa med pa la brtson pas ngag gi las rin po che yang dag par yongs su dag pa grangs med pa
225a2(phal chen): kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes rin po che'i mtha' thug pa'i yid kyi las rin po che yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
225a3(phal chen): kyi zhing de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig/ skra'i rtse mo re re zhing yang de ltar skye mched kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa nas/
225a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i grangs dang bgrangs pa las 'das pa kun du gang bar gyur cig/ phyogs gcig du ji blta ba de bzhin du chos
225a5(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtug pa na mkha'i dbyings kyi khong du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad kyang yongs su gang bar gyur cig/ de ltar byang chub sos
225a6(phal chen): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rin po che'i dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
225a7(phal chen): gcig bzung bar sbas te/ spos rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi spos kyi rgyan tshad med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ gzhung de ltar rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du sposu snang yang kho
225a8(phal chen): du chud par bya ste/ ye shes kyi spos chags pa med pa'i mtha' thug pa'i spos kyi yid kyi las rgya chen po yongs su dag pa tshad med pa'i bar du kun nas gnas par gyur cig
225b1(phal chen): de bzhin du me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi me tog gi rgyan bsam gyi mi khyab pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ ye shes kyi me tog chags pa med pa'i mthar thug
225b2(phal chen): pa'i bar yid kyi las me tog rgya chen zhing yongs su dag pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ phreng ba dang byug pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi phreng ba dang byug
225b3(phal chen): pa'i brgyan mtshungs pa med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ ye shes kyi phreng ba dang byug pa chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las kyi phreng ba dang /
225b4(phal chen): byug pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa mtshungs pa med pa'i bar du kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ phye ma dang gdugs pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi phye ma dang / gdug pa'i brgyan
225b5(phal chen): sa mtshams med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi phye ma dang gdug pa chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las kyi phye ma dang / gdug pa
225b6(phal chen): yongs su dag pas mtshams med pa'i bar du kun nas gnas par gyur/ gos dang chos gos sna tshogs thams cad kyi gos dang / chos gos kyi rgyan mu med pa kun nas gam
225b7(phal chen): par gyur cig ces bya ba nas/ ye shes kyi gos kyi rgyan chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos gos yongs su dag
225b8(phal chen): mu med pa'i bar du kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ zhing thams cad du gdug sna tshogs yang dag par sdug pa'i gdugs kyi brgyan sa mtshams med pa kun nas gnas pa/
226a1(phal chen): gyur cig/ ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi gdug kyi rgyan chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las ye shes kyi yang dag par khyab pa
226a2(phal chen): yongs su dag pas sa mtshams med pa'i bar du kun+da nas gnas par gyur cig/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi rgyan tshad med pa kun nas
226a3(phal chen): gnas par gyur cig/ ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi lus kyi ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan yongs su
226a4(phal chen): dag pa tshad med pa'i bar du kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ lteb lhub sna tshogs thams cad kyi lhub lhub kyi rgyan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa kun nas gnas par
226a5(phal chen): gyur cig/ ces bya ba nas ye shes kyi lhab lhub kyi brgyan mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las kyi ye shes kyi lhab lhob kyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa rnam par dag pas brjod du med pa'i
226a6(phal chen): bar du kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ de ltar tshul de bzhin du thams cad du yang shes par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag las sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu bzung
226a7(phal chen): bas bsdus te/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis nor bu rin po che'i rgyan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ ces bya ba nas
226a8(phal chen): nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi shing kun du bres pa'i nor bu rin po che'i gdan rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig/ de ltar tshul de bzhin
226b1(phal chen): du kun du byas te dmigs pa re re zhing lan rgya zlas par bya'o// ye shes kyi nor bu rin po che chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yid kyi las kyi ye shes kyi nor bu rin po
226b2(phal chen): tshe rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du gnas par gyur cig/ ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa
226b3(phal chen): la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yongasu bsngo'o// sems can thams cad
226b4(phal chen): yong su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid mi 'khrug pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
226b5(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir bsod nams kyi stobs thub pa med pa rnam par dag
226b6(phal chen): pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyem pa nyid kyi phyir/ bsod nams kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa zil gyi gnon pa snyan pa dang / sems can thams cad mnya
226b7(phal chen): pa nyid kyi phyir mi zad pa'i ye shes stobs kyi sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis chos la bzung pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tshig
226b8(phal chen): gi rnam grangs med shin du dbyings dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir thogs pa med pa'i mig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas tug/
227a1(phal chen): par shes par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
227a2(phal chen): 'jam klas pa thams cad rjesu dran pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ sgrib pa med pa'i blo gros chen pos nges par rtog pa'i mdzod du/ sems
227a3(phal chen): can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub mtha' dbus med pas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dag pa la chags pa med par yang dag gzhol ba dang / sems can thams cad
227a4(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas rnam par dbye ba med pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ rgyud kyi tshul gcig
227a5(phal chen): tu gyur pas lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang yid kyi las yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir kun du
227a6(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod pa rgyud kyi tshul cig tu gyur pas byung ba dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyud kyi tshul cig rnam par dag pa la
227a7(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / gom par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes pa thams cad rnam par spyad pa la 'jug pa'i yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems/
227a8(phal chen): can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mi mnyam pa med par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su sngo ba dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa gcig
227b1(phal chen): nas gcig tu rgyud pa rnam pa tha dad pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ lhag pa'i bsam pa
227b2(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa rnam pa tha dad pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ dkar po'i
227b3(phal chen): phyogs thams cad sgrub cing rten par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ skad cig gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i
227b4(phal chen): mthar thug par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ nan tan gyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir
227b5(phal chen): yongasu bsngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su bsngos nas/ chos
227b6(phal chen): thams cad yongs su dag pas chos snyan pa'i tshul gyis/ chos nyid kyi stobs mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
227b7(phal chen): chos rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thob pa/ rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa byin gyi brlab dang ldan par gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo'o// chos rgya mtsho de dag
227b8(phal chen): las chos rgya mtsho re re zhing yang / chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa ye shes kyi snang ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// tshigs thams cad rab tu dbye bas
228a1(phal chen): shin du snyan pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par snyan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos 'jas klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams
228a2(phal chen): cad dang / chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// dus gsum dang mi 'gal ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa thob par
228a3(phal chen): bya ba'i yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o//
228a4(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de sangs rgyas la dga' ba dang / chos la dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su skyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po la dga' bas las phyir mi ldog pa yongs
228a5(phal chen): su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de las kyi rnam pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par gzhol bar bya dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa
228a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi sems dang / dbang po dang bya ba dang dga' bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de zhing gi rgyud snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshug su rgyu ba thams cad shin du snyan pa
228a7(phal chen): dang / bra ba dang rgya che ba dang yangs pa dang / dog pa dang thar gru tsho ba sna tshogs dang / rnam par dag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun
228a8(phal chen): mi chad par mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par bskor ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba sems skyed pa'i skad cig re re la mi 'jigs pa gzhan dang gzhan tha dad pa yang shes
228b1(phal chen): bas mi zad pas chos snang ba sar pa/ gsar pa rab tu thob cing snyan pa bshad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad tshol ba lhag pa
228b2(phal chen): bsam pa dang / dbang po ma 'khrug shing mi mnga' bas chos 'jam klas pa thams cad ma lus par mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang / chos kyi rdzu 'phrul thob pas sems
228b3(phal chen): can gyi dkyil 'khor 'jam klas pa thams cad mngon par dga' ba dang / tshim par chos thams cad rab tu ston pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de chos
228b4(phal chen): kyi dbyings tshad med pa thams cad du song ba'i yongs su bsngo ba la gnas shing 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i lus kyi las kyi
228b5(phal chen): yongs su bsngo/ chos kyi dbyings tshad med par dag gi las yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i yid kyi las kyi yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi
228b6(phal chen): dbyings tshad med par song ba'i/ gzugs mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed/
228b7(phal chen): dang / rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i phung po mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o//
228b8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i skye mched mnyam pa
229a1(phal chen): nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo// chos kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i nang mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o//
229a2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i phyi rol mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngog/ chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i rtsam pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing
229a3(phal chen): yongasu bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i song ba'i sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid la gnas/
229a4(phal chen): shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i ma mos pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i dbang po
229a5(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i mngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o//
229a6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa mnyam pa nyid las gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i kun nas nyon mongs
229a7(phal chen): pa dang rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongasu
229a8(phal chen): bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i zhing thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i chos thams cad mnya
229b1(phal chen): bzhid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings chad med par song ba'i 'gro ba thams cad du snang ba marnam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngor// chos kyi dbyings/
229b2(phal chen): tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
229b3(phal chen): dang smon lam thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid la
229b4(phal chen): gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas
229b5(phal chen): shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings
229b6(phal chen): tshad med par song ba'i chos thams cad mi gnyis pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i de bzhin gsheg
229b7(phal chen): ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid la yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings tshad med par song ba'i de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang
229b8(phal chen): mnyam pa'i lus yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i ngag yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyuraro// chos kyi
230a1(phal chen): dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang
230a2(phal chen): mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos spyod ba dang / smon lam yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyuraro// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang / mnyam pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
230a3(phal chen): 'khor yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang / mnyam pa'i chos thams cad bstan pa dang brjod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
230a4(phal chen): thams cad go bar bya ba yongs su dag pa kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par/ chos kyi
230a5(phal chen): dbyings la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyis lus 'jam klas pa rjes 'gro ba kun nas gnas par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang / mnyam pa'i chos kyi snang
230a6(phal chen): ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad dang / mi 'jig pa rnam par dag pa'i tshig gcig brjod pas/ sems can thams cad kyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi the tshom bcod cing /
230a7(phal chen): sems dang dbang po dang / bsam pa khong du chud par byed pas tshim par byed pa dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang de bzhin gshegs
230a8(phal chen): ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang ye shes la 'jug pa shin du 'phags pa dang / chos mngon par shes pa la gnas par bya ba kun nas gnas snga/
230b1(phal chen): gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa zhes bya ba bcu pa ste/ byang chub sems
230b2(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngo ba des yongs su bsngos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
230b3(phal chen): smon lam mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa na mkha'i
230b4(phal chen): mthas gtug pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyi kyang rab tu thob par bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye
230b5(phal chen): shes mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ro// sems skyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad kyis skad cig re re la/ sangs rgyas skyed pa thams
230b6(phal chen): cad mthong ba rab tu thob cing khong du chud par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i
230b7(phal chen): rnam par 'phral pa dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams
230b8(phal chen): cad byin gyi rlob cing rten par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / shin du stan pa brjod du med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / dus thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par shes
231a1(phal chen): pa dang / ye shes dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi dbyings dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus par 'gengs pa
231a2(phal chen): la 'jug cing khong du chud par 'gyuraro// kun du bzang po'i mig mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// mtha' dang dbus
231a3(phal chen): med pa'i chos ston pa chags pa med pa rna ba'i ye shes khong du chud par yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyuraro// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad lus kyi dkyil
231a4(phal chen): mo dkrung gcig gi yongs su rgyas par byin gyis rlob kyang / sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par byed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum mtha' dang dpung med pa thams cad
231a5(phal chen): la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'jam klas pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob cing khong du chud par 'gyur ro// blo mtha' dang dbyangs med pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / sems can thams
231a6(phal chen): cad rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / skyed mched yongs su shes pa'i ye shes thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings mtha' dang
231a7(phal chen): dbungs med pa thams cad la 'jug cing rgyas pa 'gyengs pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / sems can gyi ris dang skye gnas rnam pa sna tshogs gyur pa thams cad las
231a8(phal chen): byung ba'i sgra dang / smra ba skad thams cad ma lus pa la mngon sum gyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i
231b1(phal chen): 'od zer dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong zhing mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sdang bar byed pa rnam par dag pa dang / dus gsum thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ma lus
231b2(phal chen): par mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang dpung med pa ma lus pa thams cad cig/
231b3(phal chen): tu 'jug pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad ma lus par 'jug par/ 'gro ba mtha' dang dpung med par rnam par dag
231b4(phal chen): par bya ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rab tu bsgrub pa'o// rnam par dag par byed do// mnyam par byed do// mngon sum du byed do//
231b5(phal chen): rab tu rtogs par byed do// khong du chud par byed do// yang dag par sems par byed do// rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob par bya ba rjes su thob par byedado// /
231b6(phal chen): de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya phrag stong gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu
231b7(phal chen): g.yos so// g.yos so rab tu g.yos so kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to 'gal to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go rab tu ldeg go kun du ldeg go// ches chem rab tu
231b8(phal chen): chem chem kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig rab tu shig shig kun tu shig shig go/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid rab
232a1(phal chen): na ga/ na nga ga/
232a2(phal chen): phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab po// lha rdzas kyi rin po'i tshe'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// lha rdzas kyi lhab
232a3(phal chen): lhub kyi sprin gyi char bab bo// lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi dus dang mthun pa'i
232a4(phal chen): tsan dan gyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab po// lha rdzas kyi sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan gyi mchog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /
232a5(phal chen): ba dan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi lha'i lus grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// lha rdzas kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya stong brjod
232a6(phal chen): du med pa'i tshig dang / brjod pa la gtogs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i spyod pa'i chos chen po sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi dbyangs sangs rgyas bsngags pa
232a7(phal chen): bsam gyi sa khyab pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi legs so zhes bya ba dang / lhung lhung ljags kyi sgra 'byin pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char
232a8(phal chen): mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi lha'i lus bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong grangs med cing brjod du med pas rab tu btung ngo // lha'i yul gyi lha grangs med pa lnga brgyas/ rjes dran pa la
232a9(phal chen): la byed/
232b1(phal chen): brtson par yid la byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa shin du dang ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang mi 'bral ba'i sems kyi mngon par gnaso// lha rdzas
232b2(phal chen): kyi rol mo rdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra lha'i glu'i dbyangs kyi tshul grangs med par grangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing yid la bya ba la brtson pa/ rnam kyang rab tu/
232b3(phal chen): skrag go// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i 'od zer rgya stong grangs med pas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad
232b4(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi thag gru thams cad rab tu snang bas khyab pa byas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i sprul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul grangs med pa stan pa dang / de bzhin
232b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i chu 'phrul rnam kyang yang dag par snyan par gyur to// gling bzhi pa 'di dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha'i dbang po dga' ldan gyi khang pa ni ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig
232b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang zhing stan 'di nyid du kun du byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
232b7(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pha rol dag nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' lhags nas/
232b8(phal chen): phyogs bkang ste 'di skad zer ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod kyi yongasu bsngo ba'i chos nyid bshad pa leg so leg so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kun kyang mi
233a1(phal chen): rdo rje'i rgyal zhes pa sha stag te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i dpal
233a2(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs pa dag gi drung nas 'dir phyin te/ kun nas yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni/ tshig 'di dag dang yi ge 'di dag dang /
233a3(phal chen): go bar bya ba 'di dag gis donak+ShA nyid lhag pa med cing chad pa med par brjod de/ chos nyid 'di ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
233a4(phal chen): gyi khams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa dag gi dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi gnas rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan ces bya ba dag tu sangs
233a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du rnyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byin pa mngon du mthong ba sha stag/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlab kyi 'khor byin to// de byang
233a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs bcu'i ltas te/ 'khor thams cad la ston nas/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par lta ba dang / don dang tshig dang yig ge la rab tu
233a7(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / sems skyed pa mtha' dang dpung med pa yangs pa yongs su bsgom pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snying rje chen po khyab par bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
233a8(phal chen): kyi rigasu sems yang dag par 'brel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin rlab pa'i lus yang dag par
233b1(phal chen): skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par shes par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar skyed pa dang / ji ltar dus la bab pa la yang dag par lta ba dang /
233b2(phal chen): chos kyi lus kyi rjes su song ba'i gzugs kyi lus yang dag par snyan par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// de dag
233b3(phal chen): chos la rab tu mkhas gyur cing // chos rgyud mtha' yas rnam par dag byas nas// chos kyi 'od byed chos la kha lo bsgyur// chos rnams rab rtogs chags pa med pa thob/
233b4(phal chen): de dag chos kyi 'khor lo gyur pa te// shin du dkon pa'i chos rnams ston byed cing // chos kyi sgo la rab tu gzhag bya bar// sems can mtha' yas phyogasu go bar byed/
233b5(phal chen): de dag chos kyi gang chen mtsho 'thung zhing // chos nyid sprin char phyogasu rab tu 'bebs// 'jig rten khams su chos nyid nyi shar cing // sems can phan phyir chos rnams ston
233b6(phal chen): pa byed// de dag shin du dkon pa'i sbyin bdag ste// chos kyi rnam tshul shes pa rjes su thob// chos kyi snang ba rab tu sems gsal ba// 'jig med 'jig rten dag tu chos ra
233b7(phal chen): ston// shin du sris med chos kyi sems dang ldan// chos kyi sgo la de dag rab tu gnas// chos rnams rgya mtshos de dag shin du 'phags/ 'jig rten dag tu chos nyid rnga yang
233b8(phal chen): brdungs// de dag shin tu dkon pa'i chos brjod cing // chos nyid bsod nams yang dag stsogs par byed// chos nyid bsam pa yongs su dag byed cing // chos kyi gter rnams//
234a1(phal chen): 'gro ba kun la ston// chos kyi khang pa rgyal bas dbang bskur ba// chos kyi ye shes snying po'i lus dang ldan// chos kyi mtshan bzhi rtogs
234a2(phal chen): pa'i ye shes can// de dag chos nyid bzang po'i chos la gnas// rgyal ba kun gyi gang la ston mdzad dang // rab kyi phul gyi gang zhig gnas gyur cig/ skye dbang thams cad gang gis
234a3(phal chen): skyed gyur pa'i// sbyin pa dam pa de dag sbyin pa byed// de dag chos kyi lus ldan shes dang ldan// 'jig rten khams las chos nyid sprul mdzad pas// chos kyi sgron ma 'gro la phan pa'i
234a4(phal chen): phyir// dma' ba med par mtha' yas chos ston to// de dag chos bzang dam pa sbyin byas nas// dge ba de dag rjesu sems byed cing // 'jig rten dag du dge ba gang byas pa// de dag
234a5(phal chen): yongs su bsngo ba'i shes dang ldan pa'i yin// rang 'byung thams cad gang gis skyes gyur pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba'i don du shes// thams cad rnam phye rnam par dag gyur cig/
234a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgyan gyi pha rol phyin par byed// sangs rgyas rgyan mang shin du rgyu zhing // phyogs rnams kun du de la tshad med pas// 'jig rten kun du bsam yas rgyan ldan pa/
234a7(phal chen): de 'dra zhing rnams ma lus kun gyur cig/ skyes bu 'dul ba ye shes ji tsam par// de 'dras sems can rnam dag ldan gyur te// rgyal ba'i sras po bzang po ci bzhin du/ yon tan
234a8(phal chen): kun gyis sems rgyan ldan gyur cig/ de dag rnams 'phrul shin tu rnam yangs pa// gang gis 'jig rten ma lus rgyas gang ba// de'i spyod la shes rab bzang gnas par// sems
234b1(phal chen): can thams cad ma lus 'gyur bar shog/ ji snyed 'jig rten ma lus gang yang rung // phyogs bcu rgyal ba kun gyi sangs rgyas pa/ kun tu kyang kun du bzang po'i ji bzhin du// legs
234b2(phal chen): spyod dam pa'i mchog dang ldan gyur pa// yon tan rgyud rnams ji snyed gang yang rung // rgyal sras rnams dang rgyal ba sras thugs chud pa// yon tan gang la mtha' dpung med pa'o//
234b3(phal chen): yon tan de 'drar sems can kun gyur cig/ gang yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan pa'i rnams// 'jug pa kun la slab pa// rnam 'phrul gang dag thams cad ston pa rnams// bye
234b4(phal chen): rnams thams cad rgyas par 'dod gyur cig/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis rang 'byung rnams// 'dren pa'i sems can kun dang mnyam mthong ste// chos rnams thams cad
234b5(phal chen): ma lus bsdus byas shing // skra rtse gcig tu mi 'gon bsdud gyur cig/ 'jig rten 'di na 'gro ba gang rgyu ba// gang rnams mi'i dam pa mkhyen gyur pa// de dam mnyam pa thams
234b6(phal chen): cad ma lus pa'i// 'jig rten mkhyen pa mchod pa byed gyur cig/ spos kyi rgyud rnam de bzhin me tog dang / gos kyi rgyud dang de bzhin gdugs rnams kyis// chos dbyings ma
234b7(phal chen): lus par gang byas shing // 'jig rten kun du yid kyi 'gengs gyur cig/ sangs rgyas mtshon gyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa// sgra rtse gcig tu thams cad bsdu ba yis// lhag
234b8(phal chen): ma med par lam rnams kun sngas shing // 'jig rten sgron la phyag 'tshal 'gyur bar shog/ rgyal ba de dag kun la phyag 'tshal te// thams cad lus kyi tshul gyis 'du byed/
235a1(phal chen): cing / phyogs rnams kun du rgyal po kun bstod pas// phyi ma'i bskal pa kun tu zad byed cing // sems can
235a2(phal chen): snyed kyi yid kyi rnam pa yi// rgyal ba gcig la'ang chod pa byed gyur cig/ ji ltar rgyal ba gcig mchod de bzhin du// skye dbang ma lus kun la'ang mchod gyur cig/ de dag mchod
235a3(phal chen): pa'i yon tan brjod byed pas// 'gro ba kun du bskal pazang gyur kyang // skyes bu 'dul ba dpe zla med pa yi// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mthar thug mod gyur cig/ 'gro ba kun la
235a4(phal chen): bskal mang ji snyed pa// de dag bskal par spyad pa spyod byed cing // rgyal ba gcig la rim 'gro byas pas kyang // bskal pa thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig/ rgyal ba kun
235a5(phal chen): la'ang bskal pa de snyed de// bskal ba de snyed rnams kyi mthar thug ma gyur cig/ rgyal ba'i spyod pas skyo ba med gyur cig/ ji ltar chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dang // ci tsam rgya
235a6(phal chen): chen yongs su mtha' yas pa// de snyed rgya chen me tog bzang po rnams// thub mangs sems can rnyed la dbul cig/ dri zhim ldan pa'i de bzhin phye ma dang // gtsang zhing
235a7(phal chen): rnam dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa// 'gro ba kun na dpe zla dmigs med pa// de 'dras rgyal ba'i mchod pa byed gyur cig/ zhing rnams du ma sems can mnyam pa'i/
235a8(phal chen): rgyal ba gcig la gdugs rnams dbul byed cing // rgyal ba kun la de bzhin dga' byas pas// rgyal ba rnams la gdugs mchog byed gyur cig/ byug pa dam pa
235b1(phal chen): mchog tu gyur pa rnams// 'gro ba 'di na gang la dpe ma med pa// de yis sangs rgyas mchod byed spyod pa yis// bskal mang sems can mnyam pa zad gyur cig/ de bzhin
235b2(phal chen): phyag dang spos kyi bye ma dang / me tog gdugs la nas bza' spos rnams dang // rin chen lhab lhub mchod pa mtha' yas pa// rim 'gro skye ba med par byed gyur cig/ 'jig
235b3(phal chen): rten sgron ma sems can mnyam pa dang // skad cig re rer byang chub 'tshang rgya ba// de dag yon tan mtha' yas brjod byed cing // skyes bu 'dul ba mchod pa byed gyur cig/
235b4(phal chen): sems can mnyam pa'i 'jig rten mkhyen pa la// sems can mnyam pa'i bskal pa'i grangs byas shing // blo mchog ldan pa mchod pa byed pa ni// rgyal bas bshad kyang
235b5(phal chen): zad par ma gyur cig/ rgyal ba rnams la 'di 'dra'i mchod byed cing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phral kun du 'gengs byed cing // bzang dang ldan pa'i spyod la gnas byas shing /
235b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad mthong gyur cing // 'gro kun dge ba ci snyed yod pa dang // byas dang byed 'gyur de bzhin byed pa dang // bzang po ci bzhin de 'dra'i sa dag la/
235b7(phal chen): kun nas kun du bzang po reg gyur cig/ 'jig rten thams cad ma lus sems can rnams// ji snyed rgyal ba kun gyi thugs chud pa// kun kyang mkhas pa kun gyi bsngags
235b8(phal chen): ba yi// kun du bzang po de bzhin gyur par shog/ phyogs rnams ma lus kun du ci byas pa// skyes bu dam pa de dag yongs su bsngo// rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan rgyal bas
236a1(phal chen): gang gsungs pa// yongs su bsngo ba dam pa mchog dang yul yang yin// de bzhin zhing
236a2(phal chen): rnams thams cad ma lus par// rgyu zhing kun kyang khong du chud byas te// sems can ci snyed thams cad ma lus pa// de dag kun kyang kun du bzang gyur cig/ sbyin pas
236a3(phal chen): yongs bsngo ci bzhin red gyur cig/ tshul khrims kyi kyang bsngo bzhin shes gyur cig/ brtson 'grus stobs kyi bskal par mi ldog cing // bzod pas 'khrug pa
236a4(phal chen): med pa'i yod gyur cig/ bsam gtan gyi kyang rtse cig yid ldan zhing // ting 'dzin kun gyi spyod yul shes gyur cig/ shes rab dus rnams gsum po thams cad du//
236a5(phal chen): 'jig rten dag tu mthar dmigs med gyur cig/ lus dang ngag dang yid rnams thams cad kyang // rnam pa kun du nam dag mkhas gyur cig/ spyod pa de dag thams cad
236a6(phal chen): ma lus par// kun kyang kun du bzang po red gyur cig/ ji ltar chos dbyings rlom pa'i sems med cing // de la spros dang chags pa med pa dang // mya ngan 'das
236a7(phal chen): dang sgrib pa med pa ltar// de bzhin sems la rlom sems med gyur cig/ chos mkhas yongs su bsngo ba gang brjod pa// de ni rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bsngo ba ste/
236a8(phal chen): mkhas pa'i spyod pa cig nas 'grub pa 'gyur bar// dge ba yang ba de yis yongs su bsngo// rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'di la slab bya ste// ci snyed gang yod thams
236b1(phal chen): cang ma lus par// khams gsum kun kyang yongs su bsdu byas te// ci nas bde gshegs stobs la 'jug par bsngo// yang bci snyedang rgyal bas gsungs pa dang /
236b2(phal chen): kun du bzang zhes gang la gdugs pa yi// rgyal ba sras rnams gang la gnas gyur pa'i// spyod pa dam pa de dag su 'dod pas// sems can ma lus thams cad bgrang bar
236b3(phal chen): nus// dus gsum ma lus kun kyang bgrang bar nus// gang la kun du bzang por ming gdags pa// rgyal sras de'i yon tan mtha' med de// na mkha' spu rtses bgrang
236b4(phal chen): bar nus kyang srid// zhing rnam kun gyi rdul kyang bgrang bar rung // gang yang rgyal sras drang srong cher gnas pa'i// spyod pa de dag bgrang bar mi nus na// chos kyi dbyings
236b5(phal chen): tshad med zhes bya ba ste// yongs su bsngo ba bcu pa'o// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba las// rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su bsngo ba'i
236b6(phal chen): le'u sum bcu pa'o// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba// bam po bzhi bcu lnga pa'o//
236b7(phal chen): de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi gnas kyi nor bu rin po che dam pa'i khang pa na/ sems dpa'i dge 'dun rin po che nor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
236b8(phal chen): byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa sha stag kun nas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / spyod yul thams cad
236b9(phal chen): byad chub nga
237a1(phal chen): rab du thob pas gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul la gnas cing gzhol ba'i spyod yul ma tang ba
237a2(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dus bzhin du thogs pa med pa'i byin gyis brlabs rnam pa tha dad pas bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa
237a3(phal chen): la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad mngon par sgrub cing bskal pa dang / zhing dang dus su spyod pa la gnas rgyun mi gcod pa/ byang chub sems
237a4(phal chen): dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing / 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba'i mi zad pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
237a5(phal chen): shes rab dang / thabs thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa dam pa thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yang dag par bstan
237a6(phal chen): shing shin du sgrub rgyun mi bcod pa dang / sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyom par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
237a7(phal chen): rig pa dang ye shes la rnam par rol pa'i/ mngon par shes pas bya ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang stobs
237a8(phal chen): dang / dbang thams cad thob cing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sems skad cig gcig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor du 'dod la/
237b1(phal chen): mngon du 'dren pa'i gtam gyi skye bu dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo yang dag par bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / rim gro rgya che/
237b2(phal chen): po rgya che ba'i don du mngon par brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las thams cad blang ba mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyi
237b3(phal chen): gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad chags pa med pa'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrog pas dus gsum thams cad du/ chags pa med pa'i sems dang ye shes
237b4(phal chen): kyi lus rgyas par 'gengs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang / nan tan yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad bskal pa brjod du med par rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par
237b5(phal chen): snyan pa la/ yon tan bsngags pa zad mi shes pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
237b6(phal chen): dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi snying po
237b7(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
237b8(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
238a1(phal chen): zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan rnam par bkod pa'i thams cad rab
238a2(phal chen): tu ston pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes sdang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal yid du 'ong
238a3(phal chen): ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsan dan dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog dpal gyi snying
238a4(phal chen): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog rgyas pa dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha'i snying po dang /
238a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa
238a6(phal chen): dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen dpal gyi
238a7(phal chen): snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos sna tshogs brgyan gyi snying po
238a8(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od 'dri ma med
238b1(phal chen): pa'i dpal gzi brjid bzang po'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' se chen po gser bzang dri ma med pa'i dbyig gis spras pa'i gzi brjid mdzes pa'i snying
238b2(phal chen): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan thams cad kyi brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
238b3(phal chen): po dpal gyi be'u rdo rje'i 'od 'phro bas rgyan pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems
238b4(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po 'od rab tu snang ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i mdzod ye shes sgrib pa med pa'i
238b5(phal chen): snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa med cing nga ro snyan pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
238b6(phal chen): dpa' chen po gzung gi yon tan gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yang dag par 'dzin pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho
238b7(phal chen): brgyan gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi thams
238b8(phal chen): cad rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
239a1(phal chen): chen po sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang de dag la/
239a2(phal chen): sogs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa gzhal du med pa/ grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa dpag tu med pa/ kun du
239a3(phal chen): mtha' yas pa mu med pas mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
239a4(phal chen): sna tshogs nas 'dus pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhug so// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus theg pa chen
239a5(phal chen): bo rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen
239a6(phal chen): po rab tu snang ba de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra
239a7(phal chen): ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba ji snyed kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag
239a8(phal chen): gis mngon par stan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen
239b1(phal chen): pos rab tu snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so leg so// 'di ltar rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag
239b2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar 'thun pa sha stag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
239b3(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyis rlabs dang / khyod nyid kyi ye shes kyi khyad par gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
239b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab par rab tu brjod cing ye shes kyis la 'jug par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba dang / sangs rgyas
239b5(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la ye shes shin du yang bar bya ba dang / shin du legs par gnas pa'i chos rab tu ston pa
239b6(phal chen): dang / ye shes tha dad pa'i rnam par snang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi gos par med par bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag
239b7(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i yul khong du chud par bya ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul gyi bar du khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'di ltar
239b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rtsam pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma nor bar rnam par dgod pa shin tu snyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
240a1(phal chen): la yang dag par dmigs par bya ba dang / zag pa med pa'i chos bye brag rnam par bsgoms pa dang / rnam par dbye ba shin du
240a2(phal chen): rnam par phye ba'i shes rab kyi snang ba chen po la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan thob par bya ba dang / shin du rtags ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas kyi rnam pa ci rigs su
240a3(phal chen): brjod pa dang / spobs pa'i snang ba dma' ba med pa thob par bya ba dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes chen po'i sa shin du rtog par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la dran pa nyam
240a4(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / thams cad du song ba'i blo rnam par gdon mi za ba la mkhas pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis
240a5(phal chen): brlab pa mdzad do// de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sgo dbye ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
240a6(phal chen): snang ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings shin du sbyang ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan gdags pa
240a7(phal chen): dang chos kyi sku'i ye shes kyi lus la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la dbang bskur ba yang dag par blang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shin du
240a8(phal chen): 'phags pa'i lus 'byung bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs
240b1(phal chen): su dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis byang chub
240b2(phal chen): sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la zil gyis non pa'i lus nye bar bsgrub par mdzad do// thogs pa med pa'i spobs pas shin du ston pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// shin du
240b3(phal chen): sbyangs pa'i ye shes rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa nye bar bsgrub par mdzad do// dran pa nyams pa med pa'i byin gyis rlabs nye bar bsgrub par mdzad do// blos ni shin du nges
240b4(phal chen): par rtogs pas mkhas pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i blo'i rjes su 'gro bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
240b5(phal chen): stobs thub pa med par nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa chen shing zhum pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
240b6(phal chen): ye shes dang / tha dad yang dag par mkhyen pa'i rnam par dbye bas chos kyi tshul shin du rtogs par nye bar sgrub par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
240b7(phal chen): gsung dang / thugs kyi shin tu rnam par phye ba mngon par bsdu ba nye bar bsgrubs pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid rab tu thob pa/
240b8(phal chen): dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis mngon par sgrub pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin du rnam par sbyang ba dang / ye shes dkyil 'khor shin du sbyang ba dang / tshogs shin du
241a1(phal chen): bsags pa dang / yongs su spangs pa shin du byas pa dang / dran pa'i gnod tshad med pa dang / mos pa rnam par dag cing 'od
241a2(phal chen): shin du gsal ba dang / gzung gi sgo tha mi dad pa thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyangs kyi ye shes kyi shin tu btab pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag na
241a3(phal chen): bzhugs bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus so so nas phyag g.yas pa brkyang sa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po'i mgo la byug pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
241a4(phal chen): 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la reg ma thag tu/ de nyid kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal
241a5(phal chen): ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 'di ni/ shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba ste tha mi dad pa ltar med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ yang na mkha'i dbyings
241a6(phal chen): kyi mthar gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams cad du rgyas par khyab pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su
241a7(phal chen): skyobs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ 'das pa'i sangs
241a8(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyis la'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la'ang rab tu 'jug par
241b1(phal chen): 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa la'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub
241b2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi sa rnams te gang la bsam te/ bdag gi de skad du smras pa/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bco
241b3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi gsungaso// gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po dang //
241b4(phal chen): dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa dang / 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya ba byang
241b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa dang / rgyal bar dka' ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa dang / mngon sum zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa dang / ring du
241b6(phal chen): song ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa dang / mig yo ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba byung /
241b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi
241b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ste/ de ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsungs ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro//
242a1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bdag gi ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang nas 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
242a2(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag ni gsung de lta bu mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sem
242a3(phal chen): dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyong ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo 'di yang dag phul zhes bya ba yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par
242a4(phal chen): dgod pa shin du snyan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam gyi mi khyab ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'o// de nas de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
242a5(phal chen): rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag ming tsam zhig brjod do// cang mi zer bar 'dag nas de las rab tu phye ste ma bshad pa dang / de nas byang chub sems
242a6(phal chen): dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig thos la rab tu phye ste/ ma brjod pa skom par gyur nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems
242a7(phal chen): te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu po de dag gi ming tsam zhig brjod de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas de las rab tu phye zhing mi
242a8(phal chen): ston pa de la rgyu ni gang rkyen ni ci zhig yod snyam pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba zla ba zhes bya ba
242b1(phal chen): 'dus shing 'dug ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam grol zla bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyi yongs su shes nas byang
242b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la glu'i dbyangs kyi tshig su bcad de don dris so// ci phyir rtog pa rnam dag cing // dran dang ye shes ldan pa yi// sa'i mchog ni brjod bya ste//
242b3(phal chen): mkhas pa rnams par phye mi bshad// 'di kun nges par rtogs pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen yin// ci phyir khyod kyis brda brjod de// rab tu phye ba bshad mi bgyi
242b4(phal chen): rgyal sras 'jig med 'di dag ni// kun kyang shin du nyan par 'dod// sa'i don tshul yang dag tu// rnam par phye ste bshad pa mdzod// 'khor 'di shin du rnam dang ste// le lo med
242b5(phal chen): cing dge dang ldan// dag pa'i chos la gnas pa ste// yon tan ye shes ldan pa yI// phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing // kun kyang rim gro bcos par gnas// sbrang rtsi ji ltar
242b6(phal chen): spang min pa// de ltar bdud rtsi mchog kyang 'dod// rdo rje snying po 'jigs pa med pa// shes rab chen pos de thos nas// 'khor rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir// bde bar
242b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sras la spras// sangs rgyas sku rab yang dag 'byung bas nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab stan cing // sa rgyu dam pa rnam par dbye bya ba/
242b8(phal chen): de ni rmad byung mchog tu dga' ba yin// phra zhing lta ba rnam par rtog pa spang // sems kyi sa dang bral bas bsgrub par dka'// mkhas pa rnams kyi zag med spyod yul te/
243a1(phal chen): 'gro ba rnams kyi de thos mos par 'gyur// rdo rje lta bur bsam pa rab bzhag ste// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la
243a2(phal chen): mos byas shing // bdag med pa'i sems kyis shes na// ye shes dam pa 'di bzod mnyan par nus// ji ltar bar snang mtshon ris bris pa dang // na mkha'i dbyings la
243a3(phal chen): rlung gnas ci bzhin du// de ltar ye shes zag pa med pa yang // shin du lta dka' thub pas rnam par phye// de la bdag ni sems la 'di sum byed// sangs rgyas ye shes
243a4(phal chen): dam pa bsam yas la// 'gro ba gang rnams dang bar byed dkon byed// de'i phyir ni ma smras ma bshad// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i
243a5(phal chen): zla bas// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smra so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag la bsam pa
243a6(phal chen): shin du sbyangs pa kun du rtogs pa yongs su sbyangs pa/ spyad par bya ba shin du spyad pa/ tshogs shin du bsags pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong shin du bsnyen bkur
243a7(phal chen): ba/ yon tan ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan pa the tshom dang nem nur med pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi
243a8(phal chen): 'jog pa la sha stag tshogs pas yongasu dag pa yin gyis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi legs pa mdzod cig dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thaMd ni rnam
243b1(phal chen): ba 'di lta bu'i gnas zab mo la mngon du gnas pa sha stag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bar zlas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
243b2(phal chen): dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis tshigasu bcad de smras pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bla med pa// sa rnams rab phye rnams dgod rtags pa yi// ye shes spyod zhing byang
243b3(phal chen): chub thob byed pa// mchog dang dam pa zhi pa'i chos rnams shod// 'khor 'di dag pa nyon mongs med pa'i mchog/ mos dang bsam pa shin du sbyangs pa te// sangs rgyas bya
243b4(phal chen): ba mang la spyad pa spyod// sa 'di dag la yid ches ldan pa yi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba la 'di skad ces smraso//
243b5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas zab mo la bsam pa shin du sbyangs pa// kun du rtogs pa
243b6(phal chen): yongs sbyangs pa/ spyad pa shin du spyod pa/ tshogs shin du gdags pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du bsags pa dang / yon tan
243b7(phal chen): dang ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ the nom dang nem nur med pa/ nyon mongs pa bral ba/ mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu gnas pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jon
243b8(phal chen): ba la sha stag tshegs pas/ 'on kyang sems can mos pa chung ngu gzhan dag gi zab mo'i rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i gnas dag thos par gyur la/ thos kyang tha
244a1(phal chen): tshom dang yid gnyis gyur na/ don med pa dang mi bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas/ 'di lta bu'i zhig tu snying brtse ba'i phyir bdag cang mi zer bA
244a2(phal chen): 'dug pa nyid du mos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos don 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// 'khor 'di rnam dag shes
244a3(phal chen): rab yang ba ste// zab cing gsal ba'i spyod ldan rtogs shes shing // gzhan dring mi 'jog ri rgyal bzhin mig g.yo// bsam partog mi 'khrul rgya mtsho chen po 'dra// 'on
244a4(phal chen): kyang rnam rtog mi shes ma sdud pa// rnam shes yul gnas don la shes med pas// thos shing ma shes 'phral du ngan song ltung // de dag snying brtses ye shes sam
244a5(phal chen): bshad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas// yang byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la gsol ba btab pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras legs
244a6(phal chen): par bshad pa mdzod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas 'di dag kyang gzhan mi 'gyur ba dang / legs par
244a7(phal chen): yid ces par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni 'di ltar shin du snyan pa bshad pa'i tshe/ chos nyid rab tu thob pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kyang dgo/
244a8(phal chen): par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyis 'di yongasu srung ba'i don rab du brtson par byed do// de yang ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ni spad pa'i dbang po/
244b1(phal chen): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa grub pa'i bzhi yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na yi ge dang 'bru bgrang ba ci snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyi
244b2(phal chen): mngon du 'gro ba'ang yi ge'i phyi mo'o// tha mar yang yi ge'i phyi mo thug ste/ yi ge'i phyi mo bstan pas mi khyab pa de lta bu'i yi ge dang / 'brang bgrang ba stan pa ni gang yang med
244b3(phal chen): do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang spyod pas rab tu 'grub pas mngon du 'gro'o// rang 'byung gi yi ge shes kyi mthar thug par gyur pas
244b4(phal chen): sa'i mthar thug pa'o// de bas na kye rgyal ba'i sras shod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir
244b5(phal chen): byin gyis rlob par mdzod do// de bas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas don 'di nyid gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la
244b6(phal chen): tshigasu bcad de smras pa// sa dang spyod 'jug byang chub 'gyur ba ye shes bsgrub par byed// spyod pa rnams dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sras kyi legs par shod// phyogs
244b7(phal chen): bcu'i rgyal bde gshegs kun mgon 'dren pa ci snyed pa// khyu mchog de kun ye shes 'byung gnas ston pa dgod mdzad pa// 'di ni dang po zhugs pa'i shes spyod 'di'i mtha
244b8(phal chen): thug ste// rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhal yas ci snyed de dag 'byung gnas 'di// yig ge bgrang ba phyi mo'i rjes 'gro sngon du de 'gro mngon du 'gro ltar// de bzhin mA ga
245a1(phal chen): de bzhin mchog blo'i yul du tha ma thug par 'dod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi dbyangs kying ro gcig tu glu'i tshigs
245a2(phal chen): bcad de byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po// don 'di nyid phyir gsol ba btab pa// blo yang dam pa'i phul mnga' ba// spobs pa mtha' yos rnam par dbye ba rtag mkhyen
245a3(phal chen): pas// yid du 'ong ba'i gsungs dbyangs kyi// kun la phan don dam pa bshad par mdzad// dran dang dga' bas spyod pa dag/ stobs bcu'i stobs kyi shug sogs yon tan ldan
245a4(phal chen): ba yi// sa'i dam pa mchog gi rnams// tha dad yang dag don mkhyen spyod par shog/ zhi sdom grub pa'i yin ldan pa// nga rgyal dregs dang lta ba'i nyon mongs zhi gyur
245a5(phal chen): pas// 'khor 'di the tshom bral ba ste// khyod kyi legs par bshad du re zhig sdod// skom pa sel ba'i chu 'dod bzhin// bkres pa kha zas nad pa sman rab 'dod pa dang /
245a6(phal chen): bung ba sbrang rtsi 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin 'khor 'di khyod kyi tshig la sdod// de bas shin du bla yang bas// rdul med rnams la sa'i dam pa 'jug par shog/ chags med
245a7(phal chen): stobs bcu'i tshogs gyur pa// bde gshegs spyod pa ma lus bshad par mdzad// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas// byang chub sems dpa'i
245a8(phal chen): stobs snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer rgya stong grangs med pa ldan pa byung ngo // de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa thams cad
245b1(phal chen): ma lus par snang bar byas nas// sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad rtsal zhing bar byas te/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad zil gyi gnan nas de bzhin
245b2(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul nI mI khAb+ha b+ha'i mthu bstan nas/ phyogs thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams
245b3(phal chen): 'jam klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos ston pa'i byin gyis rlabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lus snang bar byas
245b4(phal chen): te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa stan nas steng gi bar snang la 'od zer stug po sprin gyi dra ba'i khang brtsegs pa chen por byas te 'dug go/ de bzhin
245b5(phal chen): du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mdzod spu dag nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer grangs med pa dang ldan pa dag byung bar
245b6(phal chen): 'gyur ro// byung nas kyang de dag gi phyogs bcu'i thams cad de 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa kun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos
245b7(phal chen): thams cad snyan pa'i byin gyis rlabs pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa stan nas/
245b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyams pa stan nas/ 'jig rten gyis khams mi mjed 'di yang snang bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa/
246a1(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di yang snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po'i lus snang bar
246a2(phal chen): byas nas steng gi bar snang la de bzhin du 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyi dra ba'i khang partsegs pa chen po byas te 'khod do// de nas 'od zer stug po'i/ dra ba'i khang brtsegs
246a3(phal chen): ba chen po de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin rlab kyis sgra'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di 'byung ngo // mi mnyam dang mnyam pa mkhas dang mnyam pa dag/ stobs bcu'i khyu mchog mthu
246a4(phal chen): ldan tshad med yon tan can// 'jig rten kun mchog mi'i dam pa 'phrul gyi rnams// shAkya seng ge'i chos la byin gyi rlabs pa mdzad// bde gshegs sras po 'dren
246a5(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi bshad par gyis// chos rgyal khyu mchog rnams kyi mdzod kyi dam pa che// sa'i ye shes rnam phye spyod mchog rab yang pa// stobs bcu'i byin gyis ma thog
246a6(phal chen): myur du bstan pa gyis// gang gi rna lam bsam pa chos dam rin chen 'di// song bar gyur pa de la bde gshegs byin gyi rlabs// rdul med sa kun rims kyi rab tu
246a7(phal chen): rdzogs byas nas// stobs bcu'i ldan pa'i rgyal ba dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// rgya mtsho'i chu byung gyur cing bskal pa'i sems gdungs kyang // gal te snod 'gyur
246a8(phal chen): sems can de dag 'di la nyan// gang rnams the tshom za zhing yid gnyis byed pa ni// de la rna bas rnam pa kun du thos mi 'gyur// de phyir sa'i ye shes lam mchog
246b1(phal chen): gsun par gyis// gnas dang rgyud dang 'phro b.rim gyi rab tu shod// spyod dang yul dang chos dang ye shes tshul rnams kyis// chos kyi tshul yang 'gro bkun la par bye shod//
246b2(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos phyogs bcur bltas nas// 'khor thams cad de bas kyang dad par bya ba'i phyir// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// pra la/
246b3(phal chen): shes ka drang srong chen po'i lam// mi rtog rtog yul ma yin blta bar dka'// rang bzhin zhi zhing 'gag med 'byung ba med// mkha' gsal shes pas khong du chud ba yin//
246b4(phal chen): ngo bo nyid stong zhi zhing sdug bsngal zad// rgyud rnams rnam grol mnyam par mya ngan 'das// mtha' dang dpung med tshigs gis brjod du med// dus gsum grol ba rnams
246b5(phal chen): namamakha' 'dra zhing mtshungs// bde gshegs spyod yul zhi zhing nye bar zhing // smra ba'i lam rnams kun du brjod par dka'// de dag sa dang spyod pa de 'dra bas// smra bar dka
246b6(phal chen): na snyan par ga la nus// 'di ni bsam yas sems lam rnam par spangs// ye shes mngon bsgrub rgyal ba'i spyod yul te// phung po skye mched khams kyi skyed pa min// /
246b7(phal chen): sems kyi ma shes yid kyi rnams ma rtags// ji ltar bar snang gnas pa'i bya'i rjes// shin du smra bka' stan par mi nus pa// de ltar bde gshegs sras kyis sa rnam
246b8(phal chen): kyang // yid dang sems kyi yul rnams shes mi nus// 'on kyang byams dang snying rje'i smon lam gyi// de las phyogs tsam rim pa tshul bzhin du// bshad par bya ste
247a1(phal chen): sems kyi spyod yul min// ye shes tshul gyi rdzogs par bya ba'o// de 'dra'i spyod yul phra zhing lta bka' ba// rang rig
