274a4(phal chen): dag sangs kyi chos thaMd las shin du gol ba'i seMs kyi bsam pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi rjesu 'bab pa'i sem kyi bsam pa dang / thar pa'i lam gyi sngag pa'i sems kyi bsam pa dang /
274a5(phal chen): sems kyi bsam pa 'di bcu nye bar gzhog go// de de ltar sems can gyi khams rtse ba mang po can mthong nas// brtson 'grus 'di ltar brtsom te/ sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis
274a6(phal chen): sgrub par bya ba yongasu grol bar bya ba yongasu sbyangs par bya ba/ shin du gnod par bya ba/ rab tu dgod pa bya ba/ shin du rten par bya ba/ gnasu phyin par bya ba/ rnam pa gdul bar bya ba/
274a7(phal chen): yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba yin no zhes na/ de de ltar 'du byed ni rnam pa thaMd las skyo ba'i rjesu song zhing / sems can dmyal ba zad rab tu blta ba'i rjes song ba dang / zad
274a8(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes la zad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rjes song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu rten pas/ sems can thaMd yongasu sgrub par bya ba la rtson par de
274b1(phal chen): 'di ltar yongasu rtog te/ rgyud dang zhing dang tshul dang thabs gang zhig gis 'di lta bur sdug bsngal dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs par ltung ba'i sems can 'di dag mngon par gdon nas rgyu dang
274b2(phal chen): gzhi dang / tshul dang / thabs gang gis ni shin du bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bkod pa nus snyam nas/ de la byang chub sems pa 'di snyam du seMs te/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes
274b3(phal chen): la rnam pa thar pa'i gnas nam gtog par gzhan thob pa mi nuso// sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par zla ba'i gnas de yang / chos thaMd yA dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pi gte
274b4(phal chen): pA gzhan gyi thob pa mi nuso// chos thaMd yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa yin/ rgyu ba med cing skye ba med pa la spyod pa'i shes rab ma gtog pa gzhan gyi khong du chud pa/
274b5(phal chen): mi nuso// shes rab kyi snang ba de'ang bsam gtan la mkhas shing rtog pa'i blos rab tu rtog pa med par gzhan gyis thob par mi rung // bsam gtan la mkhas shing rtog pa'i
274b6(phal chen): blos rab tu rtog pa'i blos rab tu rtog pa de yang thos pas mkhas pa med par mi 'byung // zhes de de ltar shin tu rtag pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ de bas kyang shes cher dam pI chos tshol
274b7(phal chen): ba la mngon par brtson pa gnas te/ nyin mtshan du chos nyan pa don du gnyer ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos brtsal ba'i don chos la mos shing ngom mi shes pa la rgyan
274b8(phal chen): mi chad pa yin/ chos la dga' zhing spro ba dang / chos la rab tu 'jug pa yin/ chos la gzhol zhing chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la 'bab pa yin/ chos
274b9(phal chen): la rten cing chos la skyabs tshol ba dang / chos la mthu tshol ba yin/ chos la gnyer ba'i chos la mngon par brtson pa yin te/ de de ltar chos tshol
275a1(phal chen): ba la mngon par brtson pas rin po che'i rnam pa 'am/ dbyig gi rnam pa 'am/ nor dang 'bru'i
275a2(phal chen): mdzod dang bang ba gang rung ste/ yongasu mi gtong ba de lta bu gang yang med do// chos smra ba'i gang zag de 'ba' zhig dka' ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa las par de dag gzhan la
275a3(phal chen): cung zad kyang dga' ba'i 'du shes mi skyed do// de ni chos kyi don du phyi rol gyi dngos po nye bar bzung ba yongasu mi gtong ba de gang yang med do// nang gi dngos po yongs mi gtong
275a4(phal chen): hUM bar bya ba de lta bu 'ang cung zad med de/ gang 'di dag 'di lta ste/ g.yog 'khor yongs gtang ba 'am/ longs spyod yongasu gtang ba 'am nor dang 'bru dang nor bu dang / gser
275a5(phal chen): gyi mdzod dang / bang ba yongs su gtang ba dang glang po che shing rta dang / gzhon pa yongasu gtang ba 'am/ rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub yongasu gtang ba dang chung ma dang bu dang
275a6(phal chen): bu mo yongs gtang ba dang / mgo dang rkang lag dang / yan lag gi dam pa yongs gtong ba dang / lus thams cad yongasu gtang bar bya ba 'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad
275a7(phal chen): chos kyi don du yongs mi gtong ba gang yang med do// bla ma la snyen bkur bya ba gang yang rung ste/ nyam su len pa gang yang med do// nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongasu
275a8(phal chen): gang bas/ nga rgyal med pa la spyad pa gang yang rung ste/ nyam su mi len pa gang yang med do// lus kyi gnod pa ga rung ste/ nyam su mi len pa gang yang med do// ma thos pa'i chos
275b1(phal chen): cig gcig thos la nor che bar 'dzin gyi sgong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dang b.ran bca' phung ba thob pas ni ma yin no// legs par bshad
275b2(phal chen): pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcig thos pas sems dga' bar 'gyur gyi brgya byin dang / tshangs par dang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i srid la/ skal pa brgya stong mang po'i mthar thug
275b3(phal chen): pa ni ma yin no// de la la zhig brgya la 'di skad du zer te/ gal te khyod kyi me'i dong chen por lus par te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i phung po chen po rang gi lus kyi nyams
275b4(phal chen): blang bar nus na/ ngas khyod kyi tshig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis snyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyong ba 'di bshad par bya'o zhes na yang /
275b5(phal chen): de'i 'di snyam du sems te chos kyi tshig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu spyod pa'i don du ni/ stong gsum gyi stong
275b6(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mer gang bar yang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas bdag gi bdag dor bar mos na/ me'i dong tha ma la pa 'di lta bu zhig bdag dor ba lta ci smos
275b7(phal chen): kyi de bas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad nyam su bab pas kyang / bdag gi chos cal ba'i bya bas me'i sdug bsngal dang 'grogs pa lta khyad du gsod do//
275b8(phal chen): de rnam pa de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom/ chos yongasu tshol lo// 'di skad du thos pa'i chos rnams la yang tshul bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'i ngang tshul can yin te/
276a1(phal chen): des chos de dag zos nas kyang / rjes la rab kyi sems rtog par gzhag pas/ gcig pu dben pa 'dug cing 'di ltar rtog/
276a2(phal chen): chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i tshig gi las yongasu dag pa 'ba' shig gis ma yin no zhes te/ byang chub
276a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la gnas shing / 'dod pa rnam las dben/ sdig to dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben zhing rnam par rtog pa can rnam par spyod pa can
276a4(phal chen): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba'i bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub te gnaso// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa rnam par zhi te/ nang shin
276a5(phal chen): du dang zhing sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa'i ngang rnam par spyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyed pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas na bsam gtan gnyis po nye
276a6(phal chen): bar bsgrub te gnaso// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral te/ btang snyoms gnas pas dran pa dang ldan zhing rab tu shes par bde ba la lus kyi tshol te/ 'phags pa
276a7(phal chen): rnams snyoms pa can dga' ba med la bde ba la gnas pa'o// zhes bya bar bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrub te gan so// de bde ba spangs sdug bsngal yang spad
276a8(phal chen): la bde ba'i yid dang nyams nga ba'i yid kyang sngar nubs par sdug bsngal yang med sde pa med pa'i btang snyoms dang / dran pas yongs dag pa'i bsam pas yongs
276b1(phal chen): dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrub te gnaso// de gzugasu 'du shes pa las rnam pa thams cad du 'das nas thog pa'i 'du shes rnams nub te/ 'du shes sna
276b2(phal chen): tshegs yid la byed pas mtha' yas na mkha' zhes te/ na mkha' mtha' yas pa'i skye mched la nye bar bgrub te gnaso// de nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las rnam pa
276b3(phal chen): thams cad du 'das nas/ mtha' yas rnam shes zhes te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrub te gnaso// de rnam par shes pa'i skye mched las rnam pa
276b4(phal chen): thams cad du 'das nas/ ma yod ba cung zad ces te cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrub te gnaso// de cung zad kyang med pa'i skye mched las rnam pa thams cad du 'das
276b5(phal chen): nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrub te gnaso// chos la nan tan du bya ba ma gtogs par de yang sngon par dga' ba'i gnas dang / rten ma yin pa
276b6(phal chen): des byams pa dang / ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya che ba gnyisu med pa tshad med pa kho na med pa ltar sgrib pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa thams cad du khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
276b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa namakha'i mthas gtug pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ nye bar bsgrub te gnas so// de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /
276b8(phal chen): gtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya che ba/ gnyis su med pa tshad med pa/ khon med pa ltod med pa bsgrub pa med pa gnod pa thams cad du khyab pas/ 'dzin
277a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa/ thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ nye bar bsgrub te gan so//
277a2(phal chen): de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma myong ba byed de/ sa 'di yang g.yo bar byed do// gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro// mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang ba dang maM snang ba'ang
277a3(phal chen): rab tu spyod de/ rtsigs pa las thags thogs pa dang ra ba la thag thogs pa med pa dang / ri la'ang dper na nam mkha' bzhin du thags thogs med par chags pa med par 'gro'o//
277a4(phal chen): dper na na mkha' la lding ba'i bya bzhin du/ na mkha' la yang dkyil mo krung gis bcas par byed do// rdzu 'phrul che zhing / chu bzhin du sa la yang nub cing 'byung bar ston
277a5(phal chen): to// sa bzhin du chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro'o// me'i phung po bzhin du du ba 'phrul lo// me lce 'bar ro// sprin chen po bzhin du lus la char 'babs so//
277a6(phal chen): nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing / 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di ltar dbang che bar bgrang ba dag kyang lag pa las nyug cing reg par byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig
277a7(phal chen): rten gyi bar du yang lus kyi dbang bsgyur te/ de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa'i mi las 'das pa/ lha dang ma'i sgra gnyis ka yang nyan to// ring yang rung nye yang
277a8(phal chen): rung ste chung ngu na/ sbrang bu dang sha sbrang dang / bung ba dang srin bu'i sgra yang thos so// des sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems kyang sems kyi yang
277b1(phal chen): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
277b2(phal chen): shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang
277b3(phal chen): zhe sdang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs dang bral ba dang / che ba dang chung
277b4(phal chen): ba dang / yang pa dang dog pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par ma grol ba dang / skyon can dang med pa dang / sems rgya chen po'o zhes
277b5(phal chen): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu na shes so sems rgya chung ngu la sems rgya chung ngu zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de ltar na sems can pha rol dang
277b6(phal chen): gang zag pha rol gyi sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran te tshe rab gcig tu rjes dran no// gnyis dang gsum
277b7(phal chen): dang bzhi dang lnga dang / bcu dang nyi shu sum bcu bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang tshe rabs rgya yang rjesu dran no// tshe rab rgya phrag du ma dang / che rab stong phrag du ma dang / tshe rab brgya
277b8(phal chen): stong phrag du ma dang / tshe rab bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / tshe rab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar du rjes drano// 'dra ba'i bskal pa du ma dang / 'jig pa'i bskal
278a1(phal chen): pa du ma dang / 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma yang rjes dran no// bskal pa brgya yang rjes dran/
278a2(phal chen): bskal pa stong dang bskal pa stong phrag brgya dang / bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya nas/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes
278a3(phal chen): dran no// bskal pa khrag khrig dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong dang / bskal pa khrag khrag stong phrag brgya dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
278a4(phal chen): brgya stong nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes dran te/ bdag ni che ge mo zhig na 'dug go/ ming ni 'di zhes bya'o// rigs ni 'di yin no// kha zas ni
278a5(phal chen): 'di zas so// tshe ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur to// 'di srid cig tu ring du gnas so// bde ba dang nyon mongs pa'i ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo // de nas shi 'bos nas che ge mo zhig du
278a6(phal chen): skyeso// de nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta ba zhig tu skyes so// zhes sa tshigs dang bcas/ mtshan dang bcas don rtags dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes dran no//
278a7(phal chen): de nas lha'i mig rnam par dag cing / mi las 'das pas sems can rnams shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bde ba'i lam du phyin
278a8(phal chen): pa dang / ngan song du song ba dang / ngan pa dang bzang po thams cad rab tu mthong ngo // las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes 'brang ba'i sems can rnam yang dag
278b1(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan na/ ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la bskur ba 'debs pa/
278b2(phal chen): log par lta ba'i las rab tu blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par lhung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// zhes bya ba sems can 'dra
278b3(phal chen): dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la bskur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba can de dag te/ yang dag par
278b4(phal chen): lta ba'i las rab tu blang ba'i rgyus lus zhig te/ shi ba'i 'og bde 'gro mtho rigasu 'jig rten du lhar skye'o// zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar na lha'i mig rnam par dag
278b5(phal chen): pa mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi ba dang skye ba dang / kha dog pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bde 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang bzang po thams cad sa tshigs
278b6(phal chen): dang bcas mtshan ma dang bcas ngan rtags dang bcas rab tu mthong ste/ las ci lta ba bzhin du rjesu 'brel ba'i sems can rnams kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes// /
278b7(phal chen): de bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang yang gang du byang chub yan lag yongs
278b8(phal chen): rdzogs par gyur pa'i gnas ma gtogs par de dag gis mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ de'i lha ba rgya chen po dang / smon laM gyi
279a1(phal chen): sang+yas stong phrag mang po dang /
279a2(phal chen): stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/ lha ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyi sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /
279a3(phal chen): rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang /
279a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
279a5(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro bya'o// bkur sti bya'o// mchod pa byed do// nam bza' dang bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang srung
279a6(phal chen): gi rkyen sman dang / rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang sems yongasu 'bul lo// dge 'dun gyi tshogs
279a7(phal chen): rnams la yang dag par mchod pa byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcwa
279a8(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la snyen bkur byed cing de dag la rim 'gror chos nyan to// thos nas kyang ci tshul du nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub ste/
279a9(phal chen): de chos thams cad la 'pho ba med pa dang / rten 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa rab tu lta zhing rtogs pas kyang / 'dod pa'i bcings pa thams cad bsrab par 'gyur ro//
279b1(phal chen): sring ba'i bcing ba thams cad bsrab par 'gyur ro// ma rigs pa'i bcing ba thams cad bsrab par 'gyur ro// lba ba las byung ba'i bcing pa thams cad ni ldanas kyang bya
279b2(phal chen): ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i log par 'dod chags ni/ bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya
279b3(phal chen): phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
279b4(phal chen): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag du sa dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /
279b5(phal chen): bskal pa khrig khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma spang shing mi sgrogs par gnas so//
279b6(phal chen): log pa'i zhe sdangaspang shing stsogs par gnas so// log pa'i gti mug spang shing
279b7(phal chen): mi stsogasapar gnas so// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang /
279b8(phal chen): yongs byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / las su rung bar 'gyur bar gnas su/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de lta ste dperan
280a1(phal chen): gser gyi sa le sbrum de nyid 'gar ba mkhas pa'i lag na spyod na/ srang 'gram cig yod pa'i tshad bzhin du 'dug go// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
280a2(phal chen): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa 'di la gnas pa'i/ log pa'i 'dod chags kyang 'grib pa med par 'byangs par
280a3(phal chen): 'gyur ro// log pa'i zhe sdang yang 'grib pa med par 'byangs par 'gyur ro// log pa'i gti mug kyang 'grib pa med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rab tu byang
280a4(phal chen): zhing / yongasu dag pa dang la su rung bar 'gyur ro// de'i bzod pa dang nges pa yang de bas kyang yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// 'grogs na bde zhing nges pa'i bsam pa dang / mi 'khrug pa'i
280a5(phal chen): bsam pa dang / klod pa med pa'i bsam pa dang / rnyog pa med pa'i bsam pa dang / thon dman med pa'i bsam pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pas lan mi re ba'i bsam
280a6(phal chen): pa dang / phan btag pa la phyir lan lon pa'i bum pa dang / g.yo med cing rgyu ba med pa'i bsam pa dang / thib po med pa'i bsam pa yang yongasu dag par 'gyur te/ de snga ba'i dngos po bzhi
280a7(phal chen): las don bsgrub pa'i shas che ba yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi bsgrub pa
280a8(phal chen): ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' ni phal chere/
280b1(phal chen): lha'i rgyal po dbang po 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags rnam par zlog pa'i thabs nye bar bsgrub pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yod pa yin/ de sbyin pa'am ngag sman
280b2(phal chen): pa'am/ don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung te/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ mthu bor 'gyur/ phul du
280b3(phal chen): dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/ yongasu 'dren par 'gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bstan pa'i bar du 'gyur
280b4(phal chen): snyam te/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la
280b5(phal chen): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
280b6(phal chen): pa yid la bya ba dang / rnam pa mchog thams cad dad pa'i thams cad dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi rab du yid la bya ba dang / mi 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig
280b7(phal chen): tu/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rab tu thob cing / de dag sgom par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong dang / de dag gis byin gyis rlabs kyang yang dag shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi kham
280b8(phal chen): brgya stong spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyis khams brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang / sems can brgya stong yongasu smin par bya ba dang / bskal
280b9(phal chen): yongasu 'dren par 'gyur//
281a1(phal chen): pastong du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus
281a2(phal chen): brgya stong yongasu bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / brtson 'grus kyis rtsam pa de lta bu rtso mo//
281a3(phal chen): de byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu chen rnam/ smon lam gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mog gam/ spyod yul lam
281a4(phal chen): dbyangs sam/ spyod pa 'am/ rgyan tam/ byin gyis rlabs sam/ mos pa'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong dam dang / bskal pa
281a5(phal chen): stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar bka'o//
281a6(phal chen): de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang rtag pa dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad po 'di dag smraso// de dag yon tan 'byung
281a7(phal chen): gnas bsam dag bsam dag pa/ skye zhing 'dod chags bral te tshe med sems dpa' ldan/ sems bskyed bstan pa dga' ldan rgya chen shugs chen rnams/ mkhas pa bdag
281a8(phal chen): nyid che ba'i sems ldan gsum pa gnon/ 'od byed sa mchog 'di la gnas pa'i khams pa ni/ sdug bsngal mi rtag mi sdug rab tu 'jig chos dang / ring por mi gnas skad cig
281b1(phal chen): snying po med par ni/ 'du byas rnam pa 'ong ba med par rab tu rtogs/ nad du gyur pa mya ngan smre sngags 'don dang bcas// gnod dang 'khrug dang sdug bsngal mi sdug rjes 'brang ba//
281b2(phal chen): sdug bsngal yid blong phung po 'bar ba'i me 'dra bar// 'du byas mtha' yas kun nas 'bar ba mthong las skyod// srid pa gsum po kun las skyo zhing ltos sems med/ bde gshegs
281b3(phal chen): ye shes 'dod cing blo gzhan med pa ste// bsam pa med cing gzhal yas pha rol mtha' yas pa'i// rgyal ba'i ye shes gnod med de dag rab tu mthong // de dag sangs rgyas ye
281b4(phal chen): shes gnod med mthong 'gyur nas// skyab med mgon dang bral ba rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir// rtag tu dbul zhing me gsum kun nas 'bar gyur dang / srid pa'i btson rar sdug bsngal
281b5(phal chen): sna rgyas sems skor cing / nyon mongs sgrib dang rnam par lta dang 'dod snyam pa// bde gshegs ye shes chos kyi dga' ba stor ba'i byis pa rnams// 'khor ba'i rgyud du 'bab cing
281b6(phal chen): thar pas bsngags gyur pa// bdag gis skyabs pa yin zhes brtson dam du brtson// ye shes 'dod pas ltos pa med pas 'gro don byed/ gang rgyas rnam thar lam gyi rgyu ni gang zhes
281b7(phal chen): rtog/ bde gshegs ye shes bsgrib pa med las gzhan med na/ bde gshegs ye shes de yang shes rab mthu 'byung ste/ she rang thos las 'byung bar byang chub sem
281b8(phal chen): dpa' rtog/ de ltar shes nas thos den spyod pa brtson 'grus com/ nyin mtshan nyan pa'i rgyur spyod bya ba gzhan med pa/ chos nyid don nyer chos rab tu ston pa yin/ nor bu ma
282a1(phal chen): tig rin chen tshogs dang 'ja' gnyen dang // srid long du ma pho brang phun ldan dam pa dang / chung ma dag dang bu dang mthun par spyod pa'i 'khor// ltos med
282a2(phal chen): sems kyi mkhas pa chos spyi don du gtong // mgo dang rkang lag mig de bzhin mig dang bdag gi sha/ lce dang mche brna ba sna dang khrag rnams dang / bang ba'i rkang dang snying byung
282a3(phal chen): yongasu gtong ba byed/ 'di ni dga' bar mi rtsi thos par de dga' rtsi// la la de drung 'ong shing 'di skad smra gyur te/ de ste mi lce mi zad 'bar dong tshong phod na/ bde gshegs
282a4(phal chen): brten chos rin chen bshad do zhes na yang // zos na mi dma'i yod kyi yon tan don du chongs// chos kyi tshig gcig don du ri rab rtser gtag par/ stong gsum mes bkang
282a5(phal chen): chang rig yul nas mchod gyur kyang / da dung rgyal ba'i byang chub yang pa thob dka' na/ de ste tha ma la mi bdes snyed 'gyur shin tu bde// drang srong mchog gi ye shes thob 'gyur
282a6(phal chen): ji srid pa/ de srid par du mnar med sdug bsngal bzod pa na/ mi'i sdug bsngal phung po sna tshogs ci smos kyi/ chos rab mnyan pa'i don du bdag nyid nyam zhes/ chos rnam
282a7(phal chen): thos par gyur nas tshul bzhin sems par byed// bsam gtan tshad med de bzhin gzugs med rnam pa bzhi// rnam par shes pa'i dam lnga po mngon po bsgrib kyang / de dag
282a8(phal chen): dbang gis de dag skye bar 'gyur ba min/ legs ldan 'di nas sangs rgyas khrag khrig ma po la/ mchod pa byed cing nges rtog yid kyis chos kyang nyan/ srab par 'gyur ci
282b1(phal chen): log bral yongasu dag par 'gyur// skyon med gser sbra ma ji ltar srang la bsngal ba bzhin// de nas yon tan ldan pa lha'i dbang po ste// dbang sgyur don byed 'dod pa'i nad kyi rnam pa
282b2(phal chen): sel/ tata lha mang sna tshogs du ma dge ba'i lam la dgod// sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod bsam pa gzhan yang med// 'di la gnas pa'i rgyal sras brtson 'grus rab com te// brgya
282b3(phal chen): phrag stong la mi nyung ting 'dzin thob pa yin// mtshan rab sku rgyan sangs rgyas rnam kyang rab tu mthong // yan chad smon lam rab dang yon tan bsam mi khyab// de ltar sa mchog
282b4(phal chen): dam pa yid 'ong phul gyi spyod pa 'di 'dra thos nas// rgyal sras yid dga' shin tu mgu bar 'gyur// rgyal ba la ni me tog sngon thor chos 'di shin du bstan cing brjod pas// /
282b5(phal chen): lan tshwa'i gang chen mtsho yang g.yo mi gyur// lha'i bu mo yid 'od snyan pa'i klu'i dbyangasu chos rab dbyangs len dbang sgyur lha dbang shin du yid dga'// bde gshegs rin
282b6(phal chen): can lha rdzas nor thong // don grub yon tan pha rol phyin pa'i// rgyal ba'i de tshe gsung rab gsung rab sgrog mdzad ci phyir zhe na chos kyi dam pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub
282b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod rab/ di ring 'dir thos mkhas pa'i sa de/ bskal pa rgyar yang zos pa rab dga'/ rgyal sras mkhas la spyod pa'i dam pa/ lha dang mi phan pas yang shod/
282b8(phal chen): sa don ma nges ma nor lam 'di/ lha mang 'di dag yid rgas nyan 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po la/ rnam thar dazla bas lang smras pa// bzhi por yang dag par ba'i//
283a1(phal chen): spyod yul mkhas pas bshad par mdzod// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa
283a2(phal chen): sa gsum pa la snang ba la shin tu sbyangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa yongasu gton te/ de chos snang ba la 'jug pa bcus yongasu ston to// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
283a3(phal chen): sems can gyi khams rnam par spyod pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi khams rnam par byed pa snang ba la 'jug
283a4(phal chen): pa dang / na mkha'i khams rnam par spyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par spyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams rnam par spyad pa
283a5(phal chen): snang ba la 'jug pa dang / gzugs kyi khams rnam par spyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang / gzugs med ma'i khams rnam par snang ba la 'jug pa dang / bsam pa dang smos
283a6(phal chen): pas yang ba'i khams rnam par spyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa la/ bdag nyid che ba'i bsam pa dang / mos pa'i khams rnam par spyad pa snang ba la 'jug pa dang / chos snang ba la
283a7(phal chen): 'jug pa bcu po 'di dag gis yongasu gton to// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i 'od 'phro can thob pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs/
283a8(phal chen): pa'i rig su de'i bdag nyid kyi chos rab tu thob pa'i phyir// ye shes yongasu smin par byed pa'i chos bcus yang dag par 'byung ba yin/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldeg
283b1(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi phyed rab tu thob pa'i mthar thug pa dang / 'du byed skye ba dang / 'jig pa rnam par bsgom pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa
283b2(phal chen): rnam par bsgom pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu zhing ldog pa rnam par bsgom pa dang / las kyi srid par skye bo rnam par bsgom pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par bsgom
283b3(phal chen): pa dang / sem can gyi zhing dang las rnam par bsgom pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par bsgom pa dang / med pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i mtha' rnam par bsgom
283b4(phal chen): pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ye shes yongasu smin par byed pa'i chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu
283b5(phal chen): de'i bdag nyid kyi chos rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ yang dag par 'byang yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro can la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de
283b6(phal chen): ni yongasu sbyong ba dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can/ dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par spangs te/ nang gi lus kyi rje su lta bar gnas so//
283b7(phal chen): yongasu sbyang ba ldan zhing shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi chag sems dang yid mi bde ba spangs te/ phyi'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta bar gnas so// sbyong ba dang
283b8(phal chen): ldan zhing shes bzhin can/ dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par spangs te/ phyi nang gi lus kyi rje su lta zhing gan so// de bzhin du nang gi
284a1(phal chen): tshor ba dang / phyi rol gyi tshor ba dang / byi nang gi tshor ba dang / de bzhin du nang gi sems dang / phyi rol gyi sems dang / byi nang gi sems la ste/ sbyongs pa dang ldan
284a2(phal chen): zhing shes bzhin can/ dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par spang ste/ nang gi chos la chos kyi rje su lta bar gan so// yongasu spongs pa dang ldan zhing
284a3(phal chen): shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par spang te/ phyi rol gyi sems la chos kyi rje su lta bar gan so// yongasu spongs pa dang ldan zhing she
284a4(phal chen): bzhin can dran pa dang ldan par/ 'jig rten gyis chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par spang te// phyi nang gi chos kyi rje su lta bar gan so// sdig sto dang mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnam mi
284a5(phal chen): skye ba'i phyir dang bskyed do// rtsol lo brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin no// smon lam yang dag par 'debaso// sdig to dang mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir dad
284a6(phal chen): paskyed do// rtsol lo brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to smon yang dag par 'deb so// dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed par 'gyur bar dad pa skyed do// rtsol lo brtson 'grus
284a7(phal chen): brtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'deb so// dge ba'i chos skye ba rnam gnas pa dang / mi nyams pa dang / rgya cher 'gyur ba dang / de bas kyang 'phel bar 'gyur
284a8(phal chen): ba dang / bsgom pa dang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dad pa skyed do// rtsol lo brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'deb so// de mos pa'i ting
284b1(phal chen): 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzun 'phral gyis rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spangs pa yongasu grub pa yongasu
284b2(phal chen): bsgo mo// brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan rdzun 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spang
284b3(phal chen): pas yongasu 'grub pa yongasu bsgom mo// sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzun 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/

284b5(phal chen): par spangs pas yongasu grub pas yongasu bsgom mo// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa rnam par spang bas yongasu grub pa'o

284b7(phal chen): 'dzin gyi dbang po dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pas rnam par spangs pas/ yongasu grub pa yongasu sgom mo// shes rab kyi dbang po
284b8(phal chen): dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pas rnam par spangs pas yongasu sgrub pa yongasu sgom mo// dad pa'i stobs dben pa la gnas pa/

286a1(phal chen): 'gog pa a gnas pa

286a6(phal chen): rje chen po sngon du btang ba dang / byams pa chen po sngon du gtang ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsgrub cing rgyan mngon par grub pa
286a7(phal chen): bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi myi 'dres pa dang / gzungs mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag
286a8(phal chen): dang / gsung phun gsum tshogs pa sngon par sgrub pa dang / gong nas gong du khyad par du gyur pa'i chos yongasu brtsal ba dang / sangs rgyas rnam par thar pa zab mo thob pa khod
286a9(phal chen): du chud par bya ba dang / shes rab dang thabs pa shin tu mkhas pas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir ro// kye rgyas pa'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gan
286b1(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gang 'di 'jigs tshogs la lta ba la stsog pa/ bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyed
286b2(phal chen): pa la mngon par chags pa dang / phung po khams dang skye mched las mngon par chags pa las byung ba/ brkyangs pa skum pa dang / rnam par rtag pa dang / rnam par spyad pa dang / dran
286b3(phal chen): pa dang bdag gir byas pa dang / nor bu byas pa dang brtan pa'i gnasu 'gyur de dag thams cad kyis thams cad rab tu shes rab tu spong ngo // de 'di ltar las gang bya ba'i mi bye ba yang
286b4(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis smad pa kun nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyi thams du spong ngo // las gang bya ba'i rigs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
286b5(phal chen): kyis sngags pa byang chub kyis lam gyi tshogs kyis mthun pa de dag yang dag blang shing gnas te/ de'i phyir ji lta ji ltar thabs dang / shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrub pa'i laM/
286b6(phal chen): yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir/ lam gyis yan lag rnam par bsgom pa de ltar 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan/ mnyen pa'i sems dang ldan yin/ la su rung ba'i sems dang ldan
286b7(phal chen): yin/ phan pa dang bde ba snyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ gong nas gong du khyang par yongasu tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa yin/
286b8(phal chen): ye shes kyis khyad par la mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ 'gro ba thas cad yongs sgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ bla ma la rim gro dang mthun pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/
287a1(phal chen): skad du thos pa'i chos lang/ nan tan tu byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ de ni byas pa shes pas drin du bzo ba yin/ 'grogs na bde ning nges pa yin/ 'jam
287a2(phal chen): zhing snyan pa yin/ rgyu med cing rgyal med la/ thibs po med par spyod pa yin/ mthun par 'dzin cing nga lo bde ba yin te/ de de ltar bzod pa dang ldan te/ de ltar dul ba dang ldan/ de
287a3(phal chen): ltar zhi ba dang ldan ste/ de ltar bzod cing dul la zhi ba dang ldan pas gong dus yongasu sbyong ba'i las rnams yid la byed cing / yang dag par spyod pas phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang
287a4(phal chen): ldan yin/ rgyun ma bcad pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ zlog pa'i brtson 'grus ldan pa yin/ skyob med pa'i
287a5(phal chen): brtson 'grus ldan pa yin/ yang ba'i brtson 'grus ldan pa yin/ mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ shin du sbyangs pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ mi mnyam
287a6(phal chen): pa dang / mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ mi 'phrog pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ sem can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ tshul
287a7(phal chen): dang mi tshul bye ba phrag phyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/ phyi zhing de'i bsam pa'i kham yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// lha'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams dang rnam par mi 'dra'o//
287a8(phal chen): mos pa'i kham kyang shin tu sbyang bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa yongasu skye'o// 'jig rten gyi dri ma'i stog pa dang / bral bar 'gyu ro// the rtsom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur dang /
287b1(phal chen): yang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// nem nur med pa'i la mngon gsum du gyur pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dga' babag yang kyang yang dag pa byung de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa skra
287b2(phal chen): po chen po mngon gsum du 'gyuraro// sems kyi bsam pa tshad med par yang dag par skye'o// de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'gro can 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ lta ba rgya chen po dang smon
287b3(phal chen): lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/ lta ba rgya chen po smon lam gyis stob kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas
287b4(phal chen): bye ba bcwa stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sang+yas khrag khrig brgya brag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrig khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas
287b5(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dpa par 'gyuraro// des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen po
287b6(phal chen): rim gro byed do// bkur sti byed do// sti stang byed do// nam bza' dang bsod snyom dang / gzim cha dang snyun gyi rkyen sran dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa
287b7(phal chen): yo byad zad kyang yongasasu 'bu'o// dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang dag par mchod pa byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongasu
287b8(phal chen): bsngo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag bsnyen bkur byed cing / de dag gi chos bstan yang rim 'gro byed cing ldan to//
287b9(phal chen): rgya kyi ba khrag khrig brgya stong zag ya
288a1(phal chen): @'dzin to thos nas kyang ci nul dunan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub bo// de dag las ngal cher de bzhin gsheg pa de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung te/
288a2(phal chen): phyir zhing de'i bam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyang rnam par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can/ 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems

288a6(phal chen): gsal bar 'gyur kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ gser gyis le sbram de nyid 'gar ba mkhas pas rgyan du byas pa ni/ de ma yin pa'i gser gyis le sgra gzhan rgyan du ma
288a7(phal chen): byas pa'i mi 'phrog shing mi thub pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gnas pa'i
288a8(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag kyang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'og ma rnaMs la gnas pa'i byang chub sem dpa' rnams kyi dge rna bA mi 'brog shing mi thub pa yin/ kye rgyal
288b1(phal chen): sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od dang ldan pa'i 'od gser gyi dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa can snang ba rab tu stong pa de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i rnam pa mi 'phrogs
288b2(phal chen): cing mi thub pa yin/ rlung langs pa dang / chu dang char 'bab pa 'od mi chod pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems
288b3(phal chen): dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can 'di la gnas pa yang de ma yin pa'i sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam kyi mi 'phrog shing mi thub pa yin bdud pa dang nyon mongs rgyud
288b4(phal chen): rnams kyis ye shes kyi mi chod pa yin/ de'i snga ba'i dngos po bzhi las/ don mthun pa'i shas che ba yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shes
288b5(phal chen): che ba yin te lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nu su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam kyi byang chub seMs
288b6(phal chen): dpa'i sa bzhi pa ste/ 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher ni lha'i rab mtshe mar 'gyur te/ sems can rnam kyi 'jig
288b7(phal chen): tsho ga la lta ba mang po yang dag par gzhol bar mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ de sbyin pa'am ngag snyan pa'am/ don bsgrub pa 'am/ don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom
288b8(phal chen): yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can tham cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ mthu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/
289a1(phal chen): 'dren par 'gyur/ yongasu 'dren par 'gyur ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyab ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang /
289a2(phal chen): chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid
289a3(phal chen): la bya dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jig pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog
289a4(phal chen): thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig rab tu
289a5(phal chen): zos cing / de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mthong zhing / de dag gi byin gyi rlab kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig
289a6(phal chen): skyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig du snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig yongasu smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa
289a7(phal chen): khrag khrig gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo khrag khrig rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus khrag khrig
289a8(phal chen): yongasu rten pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo// de yan cad byang
289b1(phal chen): nub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gas spyod yul lam
289b2(phal chen): dbyangs sam spyod pa 'am/ rgyan dam byin gyis rlabs sam/ mos pa'am mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang / bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du
289b3(phal chen): ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong da ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos sa'i don 'di
289b4(phal chen): nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa gsum 'od byed pa la shin tu sbyang byas shing / nam mkha'i khams dang yid kyi kham gsum
289b5(phal chen): dang / sems can spyod dang chos dang 'jig rten spyod byed cing / mos dang bsam pas rnam par dag gnon/ 'od 'phro yod pa'i sa thob 'phral du mthu chen rnams// ston pa'i rigs yang
289b6(phal chen): dag skyes pas phyir mi ldog/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog dang phyi mi byed/ skye zhing 'jig dang gnas pa byed pa med pa lta/ 'jig rten rgyu ba'i las dang byed pa srid
289b7(phal chen): smyo dang / mya ngan 'das 'khor zhing dang sems can rnam par sgom// sngon phyi mtha'i zang dang skye med grub pa dang / las la ston pa'i rigs kyi rjesu 'brang zhing sgoms// de dag 'di
289b8(phal chen): 'dra'i chos ldan pan dang bder sems// lus dang dran pa tshor ba sems dang chos sgom te/ dran pa nye gzhag sgom pa rnam sbyang ba/ phyi dang nang dang gnyis ka'i rnams mkhas
290a1(phal chen): bsgom/ sdig to zad cing dge chos rnam par 'phel 'gyur ba'i// yang dag spong ba bzhi la'ang mkhas pasgom par byed/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi dang stong
290a2(phal chen): dang dbang po dang / byang chub yanaHrin chen lam rab yid 'ong sgom// stong de dag kun kyang 'gro la lta ba'i ltos sgom te/ snying ce bya ba bsngon 'gro smon lam nye bar
290a3(phal chen): ston// stobs kyis dam pa go 'phangs mchog gi rjes thob shing // thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sangs rgyas zhing la smon// ston pa'i 'jig med rnams dang chos
290a4(phal chen): rnams 'phrogs med dang // sangs rgyas gsung gis mchog la rten pa smon byed cing // rim can laM zab rnam par mthar pa'i gnas rnam dang / che ba'i thabs rnam
290a5(phal chen): yang dag bsgrub phyir sgom pa byed/ 'jigs tshogs lta med lta ba drug bcu gnyis kyang med// bdag gi med cing srog du dmig pa med// phung po skye mched rnams dang khaMs
290a6(phal chen): kyi gnas dang rten// kun kyang mkhas pas bzhi po'i sa la rab tu spangs// de ni gang dang gang rnams rgyal bas rmad mdzad pa'i// las dang nyon mongs bcas pa'i don du rim
290a7(phal chen): 'gyur rnams// de dag yongasu spangs shing mkhas pa khong nas dag/ 'gro bskyabs pa'i don du las rab dge ba btson// mkhas pa de ni byams pa'i sems ldan bag kyang
290a8(phal chen): yod// gnyen 'jam sems ldan pan dang bde byed dran dang ldan// dam pa'i don rnams thams cad skyon med yongasu tshol// ye shes dbang bskur mngon mos 'gro ba'i
290b1(phal chen): don kyang byed// bla ma rim 'gro byed dang ldan zhing nan tan brtson// drin bzo khro ba med cing nga lo bde dang ldan// rgyu med mthib po med cing shin du des pa ste// yang dag
290b2(phal chen): bsgrubs byed brtson 'grus phyir ldog pa med pa yin// yid du 'ong ba'i sa 'dis ni de nas tshe// lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang bsam dag thob par 'gyur// mos pa rab
290b3(phal chen): dbyangs 'gyur ba dge chos rnam par 'phel// dri med rnyog pa the tshom yid gnyis thams cad gsal// 'di la gnas pa'i shes rab khyu mchog rgyal ba'i sras// bde ga sh+ye
290b4(phal chen): bye ba du ma mngon pas mchod pa byed// chos kyang nyan byed bstan pa de las rab tu 'byung // rgyan du byas pa'i gser ltar mi 'brogs thub pa med// mkhas pa 'di la gan
290b5(phal chen): pa'i yon tan bsam pa dang // ye shes thabs dang spyod pa rnam dag lam la yang // rnam par bdud rnams bye bas mi nus te// rin chen 'od rlung gi mchod par mi 'gyur
290b6(phal chen): zhing // mi dang lhas mchod 'os pa 'di la gnas pa ni// dbang phyug mtshe ma'i dam pa chos la spyod par 'gyur// lta ba'i thib po rnam las sems can blar zlog/ rgyal
290b7(phal chen): ba ye shes du dge ba rab tu brtson// brtson 'grus ldan pas mi'i khyu mchog khrag khrig brgya// gzhan du mi sems shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas mthong // yan
290b8(phal chen): cad 'byung gnas bskal pa mang po mngon par sgrub// de ltar sa mchog bzhi pa 'di// rnam par dag pa'i spyod ldan zhing // yon tan ye shes don ldan pa// bde
290b9(phal chen): sdo mi dam pa yon tamadon spyod pa/ ye shes
291a1(phal chen): gshegs pagrus kyi bzhag// 'od 'thob ba nishes byaste/ byang chub sems dpa'as bzhi pa'o// shin tu rgyal pa chen pa'i mang/ sa
291a2(phal chen): rgyas bal po che zhes bya ba las bam po bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// // mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog spyod pa thos gyur nas// chos kyi ye shes dam pas rgyal sras mgu zhing dga'/
291a3(phal chen): dga' ba'i yid kyis mkhas las me tog char yang 'bebs// bdag nyid che ba'i bde gshegs sras po dga' zhes brjod// lha'i bdag po dbang sgyur lha'i tshogs rnaMs
291a4(phal chen): dang / dga' bas mkha' la 'phags te bde gshegs mchod pa'i phyir// me tog sna tshogs sprin can mdog sdug yid 'ong ba// bdag zhing mos pas bde bar gash+ye
291a5(phal chen): pa mngon gtor gla dbyangs snyan pa yid 'ong rnga'i sgra// lha'i tshogs mang po rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du byas// rgyal ba de tshe rab 'phral ba'i sku yang ston// sgra dbyangs rnams
291a6(phal chen): pa kun las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ngo // yun ring mchog gi thub pa'i sgong pa rdzogs// yun ring mchog gis thub pa byang chub rnyes// lce mi phan pa yun ring mchog gis mthong //
291a7(phal chen): lha'i gan su shAkya thub pa gshegs// yun ring mchog gi 'od tsho'i chu'ang g.yos/ yun ring mchog mchod 'od bzang thub pas bkye// yun ring mchog gis sems nas
291a8(phal chen): bde bar 'gyur// thugs rje gsung ni yun ring mchog gis thos// yun ring mchog gis thub pa che dang 'phrang / yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin de byon to// nga rgyal dre ga
291b1(phal chen): snyem mun pa kun spangs te// mtshungs med mchod par 'os la mchod par bgyis// de la mchod pa byas na bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro// de la mchod pa byas na bde ba rnam par mang // de
291b2(phal chen): la mchod byas sdug bsngal thams cad byung // de la mchod byas rgyal ba'i ye shes thob// rgyal ba mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa ste// 'gro bas mi gos pad+mo'i chu dang 'dra// shin du
291b3(phal chen): 'phags pas rgya tshe'i ri rab bzhin// spro ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa mchog gi zhing // de dbyangasu brjod pas na// lha'i bu brgya mang ba 'am// dga' bas pA rab tu lta// shin tu
291b4(phal chen): dga' bas rim 'gro byed// de nas rdo rje snying pos// rnam thar zla bas smras pa ni// sa lnga'i rnam ci 'dra ba// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad par mdzod// byang chub sems dpa'
291b5(phal chen): rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa dang // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi sa'i lam longasu rdzogs pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la 'jug ste// de sems
291b6(phal chen): kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug go/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
291b7(phal chen): ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang tshul khrim
291b8(phal chen): kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam nyid dang / sems kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lta ba dang nem nur dang dog pa gsal bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa ma
292a1(phal chen): pa nyid dang / lam dang ma yin pa shes pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / nan tan dang spong ba shes pa bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa
292a2(phal chen): nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad gong nas gong du rnam par sgom pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byas pa
292a3(phal chen): pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems kyis bum pa rnam par dag pa bcu po 'di dag gis de la 'jug te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub
292a4(phal chen): sems dpa' sa lnga pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang / lam gyi yan lag de nyid la sbyang pa shin tu byas shing / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu sbyang ba/
292a5(phal chen): de'i gong du lam gyi khyad par tshol zhing de bzhin nyid kyis rje su gzhag pa dang / smon lam gyi mthu dang shugs dang snying rje dang byams pas sems can yongasu mig tong ba dang / bsod
292a6(phal chen): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rab tu bsags pa dang / yongasu rgyun chad med pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / gong nas gong du sa'i snang ba la blta ba dang /
292a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlab stsal ba dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang rig pa dang / blo'i stobs dang / shugs kyis yid la bya ba'i phyir mi ldog par byas te/ 'di
292a8(phal chen): ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba// 'di na sdug bsngal kun 'gog pa/
292b1(phal chen): 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de kun rdzob kyis bden pa la
292b2(phal chen): mkhas pa yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ mtshan nyid kyis bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ brtag pa'i
292b3(phal chen): bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ dngos po'i pa la mkhas pa yin/ byung ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ byang zhing mi skye ba'i bden la mkhas pa yin/ lam gyi ye shes
292b4(phal chen): la 'jug pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rim pa 'tshams sbyar ba sgrub par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag pa
292b5(phal chen): skyed pa'i bar du mkhas pa yin te/ de sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan las bsam pa ji lta bzhin tu shin du dga' bar byed pas kun rdzogs kyi bden pa yang
292b6(phal chen): rab tu shes so// zla ba gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bas don dam pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so// chos kyi rang gis mtshan nyid khong du chud pas/ mtshan nyid
292b7(phal chen): kyis bden pa yang rab tu shes so// chos kyi bye brag rnams par dbye ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so// phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam par bkod pas rton/
292b8(phal chen): pa'i bden pas yang rab tu shes so// lus dang sems la gnod pa nyam su 'babs pas dngos po'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so// 'gro brgyad kyi mtsham sbyor bas byung
292b9(phal chen): bkod pa khong du chud
293a1(phal chen): pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so// rigs dang yongasu gdung ba thams cad shin tu zhi bas byang ni mi skye ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so// mi gnyis
293a2(phal chen): sa mngon par bsgrub pas lam kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so// rnam pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i
293a3(phal chen): rim pa thams cad 'tshems sbyar ba rab tu sgrub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung ba'i bden pa rab tu shes so// de'ang mos pas shes pa'i
293a4(phal chen): stobs dang shugs kyis de lhag ma lus par ye shes khong du chud pas ni ma yin no// de de ltar dben pa la mkhas pa/ mngon par bsgrub pa'i blos 'dus byas thams
293a5(phal chen): cad gsog/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can rku byed pa'i byis pa 'dred par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin tu shes so// de sngon pas kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje mngon
293a6(phal chen): du 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po'i snang ba'ang rab tu byung ste/ de de ltar ye shes kyis stobs dang shugs rab tu thob cing / sems can thams cad la lta ba dang / sangs
293a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon pas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' rab tu rtogs te/ 'di ltar sngon gyi ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang
293a8(phal chen): sred pa las rab tu byung ba'i sems can 'khor ba'i rgyud du 'bab pa/ phung po'i gnas las sems 'phags pa/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po bdag med ga seMs
293b1(phal chen): can med pa srog med pa gso ba med pa/ gang zag med pa bdag dang bdag gis dang bral ba rnam pa 'phel lo zhes// de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// /
293b2(phal chen): 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' med pa la rmongs pa'i 'dod pa 'di nyid rgyan bcad pa dang / mthar 'byung bar bya ba dang / yod pa dang med pa de yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du
293b3(phal chen): de 'di snyam du semaso// de ltar lus grangs med pa zhig 'gags la/ 'gag par 'gyur shing 'gag bzhan te/ 'di ltar dgud par 'gyur yang lus la skyo ba mi skyed
293b4(phal chen): cing sdug bsngal gyis 'khrul 'khor bye bas je 'phel du byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog cing / phung po'i gnas phyir mig ting ba dang / khams kyis sprul
293b5(phal chen): gyi skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / nga rgyal dang lta ba'i zug rngu mi sbyin cing / 'dod chag dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi me la lce 'bar zhing zhi bar mi byed pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun
293b6(phal chen): pa chen po mi sel cing / sred pa'i mtsho mi skyems la/ stobs bcu'i ded dpon mi tshol zhing bdud kyi bsam pa thib po rjesu song ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya tshe rnam par rtog pa sna
293b7(phal chen): tshogs kyis chu srin gyis dkrug pas yongasu g.yeng bar mkhod cing / byis pa so so skye bo de ltar mi shes shing rmongs pa ni ngo mtshar ches mang lag/ bdag gis sem
293b8(phal chen): can de ltar sdug bsngal gyis man rab/ mgon med pa/ dpung gzhan med pa/ skyabs med pa/ gnas med pa/ gzhi med pa/ rten med pa long bar gyur pa ma chi
294a1(phal chen): pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang bris mas g.yogs pa/ mun pas 'khebs pa de dag gis don du bdag gcig pu gnyis med pas bsod nams dang /
294a2(phal chen): ye shes kyi rnam par bsags par bya ba/ ji lta bur bsags pas sems can de dag shin tu rnam dag par thob par 'gyur ba dang / stobs bcu'i stobs kyi ye shes chags
294a3(phal chen): pa med pa'i bar gyis mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyis tshogs par bya'am ji snyam ste/ de de ltar shin tu rtag pa'i ye shes kyi
294a4(phal chen): mngon par sgrub pa'i blos dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ci rtsom yang de dag thams cad sems can thams cad yongasu skyabs pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can tham
294a5(phal chen): cad la bde ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la rtse ba med pa dang / sems can thams yongasu dgrol ba dang / sems can thams

294a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa lnga pa shin tu sbyang bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid kyis dran pa dang ldan pa yin/
294a8(phal chen): shin tu ngas par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi blo gros dang ldan pa yin/ mdo'i don dang tshul dang ldem po ngag gis khong du chud par rigs dang ldan pa yin bdag gzhan gyis rje su bsrung
294b1(phal chen): bas ngo tsha shes shin khrel yod pa yin/ sdom pa dang tshul ma bo rabs dga' ba dang ldan pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas shing shin tu rtag pas blo dang ldan pa yin/
294b2(phal chen): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa ye shes dang ldan pa yin/ don dang don ma yin pa'i tshig yang dag par dge ba la mkhas pas shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub
294b3(phal chen): pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes bsgrub pa thob pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi rje su 'brang bas thabs la mkhas pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar sgrog pas ngom mi shes pa yin//

294b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongasu tshol bas snyoms las med pa'i yongasu tshol ba la brtson pa yin/ sangs
294b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bsgrub pa dang / rgyan sngon par shoms pas mngon bsgrub pa dang ldan pa yin/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yang dag par sgrub pas dge ba rnam sna tshogs la
294b7(phal chen): brtson pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongasu tshol bas rtag tu rgyun mi mtshad rab brtson pa yin/ byang chub sems dang chos smra ba thams
294b8(phal chen): cad la rim 'gro byed pas bsnyer bkur dang srid zhu chen po'i ngang tshul can yin ste/ byang chub kyi sems dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i tshul dang ldan par/ 'jig rten du
295a1(phal chen): rgyu bas khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pas nyin mtshan du/ gzhan
295a2(phal chen): du sems pa'i yid yongs su spang ba yin te/ de de ltar mngon par brtson pas sbyin pas yang sems can yongasu smin par byed do// ngag snyan pa dang / don bsgrub pa dang / don

295a6(phal chen): kyi ye shes kyis rje su song ba'i bsam pa can dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ khyad par can gyis chos yongs su btsal ba mngon par brtson pa de gang 'a
295a7(phal chen): 'jig rten na yod pa'i yig ge dang / drug lag dang lag brda dang / grangs dang brtsis dang / shod thabs la sogs pa dang / khams kyi cho ga dang gso ba'i cho ga dang / skem
295a8(phal chen): pa dang brjod byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon gsal ba dang / dug dang ro langs kyi sbyor ba gsal ba dang / rang bzod dang gar gyi cho ga dang / gtam dang rol mo dang /
295b1(phal chen): srung gtam dka' ba skyed pa dang / grong dang grong khyer dang bza' shing gi ra ba dang / chu klung dang che'u dang / lteng dka' rdzing bu dang / me tog dang shing rtog dang rtsi shing
295b2(phal chen): dang nag tshal mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gser dang dngul dang nor bu dang / mu ti ga dang bai dUr+ya dang / dang dang rin chen shel dang / bai dur+ya dang rin po che rnams kyi 'byung

295b4(phal chen): lag gis nyin lag gis mtshan dang / spyod pa'i mtshan dang / sdoms pa dang tshul dang / bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs

295b6(phal chen): thams cad 'jig rten la snying rje bas rims kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir mngon par bsgrub po// byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal bar dga' ba 'di
295b7(phal chen): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/ lta ba rgya chen po smon lam gyis stobs kyis
295b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang ba dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /
295b9(phal chen): sad+ya sau stong phrag mang po dang /

296a2(phal chen): rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos rim 'gro byed do//
296a3(phal chen): bkur sti byed do// ti stang byed do// mchod par byed do// bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad de dag kyang 'bul zhing / byang chub seMs
296a4(phal chen): dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongasu 'dul lo// dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang dag par mchod pa byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang
296a5(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la rim 'gre byed cing / de dag la
296a6(phal chen): rib gro dang zhes dang / ste stang du ches stan la nyan to// len te 'dzin to// thos nas kyang ci tshul tu nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub ste/ de dag la phal chen
296a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa la rab tu 'byung // rab tu 'byung nas thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzugs rab tu thob pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba yin/ de ltar byung
296a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bskal pa du mar shin tu byang ba'i yongasu dag pa dang /
296b1(phal chen): 'od rab tu gnas so// bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba rgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma
296b2(phal chen): dang / bskal pa khrig khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
296b3(phal chen): shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / rab tu 'od gsal bar gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid rin po che mu sa ra ga la bas
296b4(phal chen): btab pa de dag kyang yongasu tshor ro// yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// 'od shin tu gsal shing dang bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ byang chub
296b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang shes rab kyis/ rnam par spyad pa yang shin tu byang ba
296b6(phal chen): dang / yongs su dag pa dang / rab tu 'od gsal zhing dang ba yin/ ye shes kyis spyod pa'i yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa yin mi phrogs shing shin tu rtag/
296b7(phal chen): pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skor ma dang / rgyu skar gyis gzhal med khang gi sa 'od snang ba ni/ rlung gi dkyil
296b8(phal chen): 'khor gyis mi phrogs shing rlung dang mthun mongs du mi sbyor ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rtags pa dang / ldan
297a1(phal chen): pa yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrogs pa yin/ 'jig rten dang mthun mongs du mi spyod pa yin/ de pha rol du phyin
297a2(phal chen): pabacu las bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su mi bsgrub pa ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni
297a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa mdor stan pa'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal
297a4(phal chen): cher lha'i rgyal po rab tu dga' ldan du 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad rnam par zlog pa ldog pa la mkhas shing mthu
297a5(phal chen): yod pa yin/ de'i sbyin pa 'am/ ngag snyan pa 'am/ don sgrub pa 'am/ don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar
297a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi mchog du gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ yongs su
297a7(phal chen): 'dren par 'gyur bas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam te/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang /
297a8(phal chen): dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
297b1(phal chen): sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid
297b2(phal chen): la bya ba dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad du ldan pa'i ye shes thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba mi 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na sku cig yung
297b3(phal chen): tsam thang cig tu/ ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig phrag stong rab tu thob cing / de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag stong mthong zhing de dag
297b4(phal chen): gis byin gyis rlab kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig phrag stong skyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag stong du
297b5(phal chen): 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig phrag stong du snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig phrag stong yongasu smin par bya ba dang bskal pa khrag
297b6(phal chen): khrig phrag stong du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig phrag stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyis sgo khrag khrig phrag stong
297b7(phal chen): la rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus khrag khrig phrag stong yongasu bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor khrag khrig phrag stong yang dag par
297b8(phal chen): bstan par bya bI brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo// de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams/ smon lam gyis khyad par rnam
298a1(phal chen): bar 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam 'od dam rdzu 'phrul lam mig gam spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam spyod brgyan tam/ byin gyis rlangs ma/ mos
298a2(phal chen): pa'am mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang / bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskul
298a3(phal chen): pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang bar dka'o// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di ni yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir/
298a4(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i spyod pa bzhi po de ltar rnams sbyangs te// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su sems byed cing // tshul khrim
298a5(phal chen): sems dang nan tan lam rnam rnam dag pas// nem nur med pa'i khas pa lnga po yongs su gnon// dran gzhung dang dbang po mda' rno phyir mi ldog/ yang dag spong ba to//
298a6(phal chen): yin gzhon pa rdzu 'phrul rkang // stobs lnga go cha dgra rnams kun gyis rtsug mi nus// dpa' bas mi ldog mkhas pa lnga po yongs su gon nan// ngo tsha khrel yod
298a7(phal chen): dgos pa'i mkhas pa'i tshul rtsang spos// byang chub yan lag 'phreng ba byung bas bsam gtan mchog/ shes rab rnam par spyod dang thob mchog brgyan yin te// bza'
298a8(phal chen): shing ra bting 'dzin dga' ldan yang dag gnon// rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi rkang pa dran pa rnam par mgrin// byams rtse rnam dag migo yin shes rab che ba mchog/ bdag med
298b1(phal chen): nga ros nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu 'joms// mkhas pa mi'i seng ge sa lnga yongs su gnon// de dag sa mchog lnga po'i phyogs su phyin gyur nas// yongs su dag
298b2(phal chen): pa'i lam rnams phyin zhing gong du sbyang // bsam dag mkhas pa rgyal ba'i thob par bya don du// skyo ba med par snying rje byams pa'i rje su sems// bsod nams tshogs bsags
298b3(phal chen): de bzhin ye shes rab ldan pa// sa rnams snang bar bya phyir gcig min thams rtog cing / sangs rgyas byin gyis dran dang blo gros blo thob pas// bden pa bzhi po ma lus yang
298b4(phal chen): dag khong du chung // don bya bden pas de bzhin kun rdzob mtshan bden dang // rnam par dbye ba bden pa de bzhin bden dang ni// 'byang zhing 'jig pa dngos po bzhi lam bden pa
298b5(phal chen): nas// sgrib pa med pa'i rab du yang dag rtogs// de ltar bden pas yongs su spang ba'i blo phang yang // rnam thar dam pa'i sgrib med de ni thob pa min// ye shes mo sa ya
298b6(phal chen): yon tan rnams kyi 'byung gnas te// 'gro kun dgra bcom rab rgyal rnams ni zil gyis gnon// de dag bden pas de ltar rang gis blo bsgrub pas// 'dus byas rdzun zhing
298b7(phal chen): rang bzhin snying po med par shes// sems can don du bde gshegs ye shes tshol ba'i tshe// bde gshegs thugs skye byams pa snang ba rab tu thob// 'dus byas
298b8(phal chen): sngon dang mi mtha' mkhas pa rab tu lta// gti mug mun nag mun pas 'khrugs shing sred chags pa'i// 'gro rnams sdug bsngal phung po lte bang dag medang+ga cing //
299a1(phal chen): srog bral rtsal zhing 'dra ba mngon par shes pa byed// nyon mongs rjes 'gro 'di dag 'das dang ma 'ong ba'i// sdug bsngal rgyud bcod mthar phyin pa zhol
299a2(phal chen): ba long mi byed// kyi hud 'gro ba de ltar khams shing snying rjes skye// gti mug 'khrul pas 'khor ba'i rgyun tu phyir mi ldog/ phung po'i gnas dang khams 'phrul lta ba'i
299a3(phal chen): gzugs can du// mes rdung yid chad sgrib pa'i mun pas bsgrub 'gyur ba// don dam rnam par ma rtags srid pa'i mtshor ltung zhing // rgyal ba'i ded dpon bral la sdug
299a4(phal chen): bsngal rgya mtshor gnas// de ltar rig nas bag yod phyir zhing rab tu brtson// ci rtsom kun kyang 'gro ba rnam thar don du ste// phyir zhing dran ldan blo gros rigs dang ldan//
299a5(phal chen): khrel yod dka' ldan mkhas pa blo ldan shes rab ldan// sod nams bsags dang ye shes dam pas mi 'ong shing // rtag tu skye med le lo thos pa tshol// zhing bsgrub
299a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i mtshon dang sangs rgyas gsung tshol zhing // sems can phan par brtson pa'i bya bas ngom mi shes// 'gro ba smin bya'i don du mkhas pas bzo'i gnas/
299a7(phal chen): yig ge lag rnga grangs rtsis dag dang gso ba'i thabs// 'byung po'i gdon dang las rnams sna tshogs gsal ba'i phyir// snying rtse byams pa'i blo gsal la gtsu
299a8(phal chen): la kun la bzhog/ rang bzo'i mchog dang gar sdug sna tshogs dga' byed dang // chu klung rab shing rtogs me tog gdugs gnas dang // bya ba sna tshogs sgrub
299b1(phal chen): byed sems can bde don du// rin chen 'byung gnas du ma nye bar ston par byed// sa g.yo nyi zla ba zas dkar kun kyang de bzhin du// sems can mtshan ma'i
299b2(phal chen): sprad drang rgyal srid gnas// gzugs med bsam gtan mngon shes mchog dang tshad med la// 'gro la phan bde dag pa'i don 'dod mngon par bsgrub// shin tu
299b3(phal chen): rgyal dka' 'di thob shes rab mchog spyod pa// sangs rgyas bye ba mchog byed chos rnams nyan pa byed// de dag dge dang bsam pa phyir zhing dag par 'gyur// gser sprab
299b4(phal chen): ji ltar mu sa gal bas btab pa bzhin// ji ltar bar snang gza'i rin chen gzhal med khang // rlung la rgyus te 'od kying rlung gi 'phrog pa min// de ltar 'gro ba'i don
299b5(phal chen): spyod 'jig rten chos spyod kyang // ji ltar pad+mo'i chu mig chag skyon 'phrog pa min// 'di la gnas pa dga' ldan dbang po mkhas 'gyur// mu steg spyod dang lta ba mang
299b6(phal chen): po'i nad kyang sel// stobs rnams bcu pos sems can sgrub par bya'o zhes// dge ba de dag rgyal ba'i ye shes don du brtson// 'di dag gong du brtson 'grus
299b7(phal chen): rtsom byed mthu thob pa// khrag khrig bye ba stong gi bde gshegs mchod pa byed// ting 'dzig thob nas khrag khrig zhing yang mkhas pas sbyong // yan cad smon
299b8(phal chen): lam khyad par yon tan 'byung gnas so// de ltar sachog lnga pa 'di// thabs kyis rnam par khrag khrig gis// sems can bcol yang dag du// rgyal ba'i sras
300a1(phal chen): kyi bstan pa yin// shin tu rgyal bar dka' zhes bya ba ste// byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'o// mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog spyod
300a2(phal chen): rab thob nas// rgyal sras mkhas las me tog char 'beb so// nor bu rin chen rnam dag 'od gsal rgyang chen 'byung // bde gshegs la mngon thor dge zhes rnam
300a3(phal chen): bar brjod// lha rnams rgya phrag stong bgrangs dga' shing bar snang las// lha rdzas yid 'ong rin chen sna tshogs phyi ma'i rnams// bde bar gshegs pa don mthun byug
300a4(phal chen): pa phreng ba spos// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sen mo do yang 'bul// lha'i dbang bsgyur lha tshogs mang po dang // steng gi nam mkha' mkhod cing rin chen sprin yang
300a5(phal chen): la// rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du bde bar gshegs la mthor// dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal sras legs shes rnam par brjod// bar snang gnas las lha'i bu mo stong
300a6(phal chen): gi kyang // klu dbyangs yid 'di rol me'i sgra dbyangs snyan dbyung // sgra rnams kyi dbyings las 'di skad kyang 'byung // rgyal ba'i gsung ldid 'ong nyon mongs 'dul ba
300a7(phal chen): sem// chos rnams thams cad stong zhing bsngon ni mtshan ma med// namakha'i dbyings dang mtshungs mnyam rnam ga rnam mi rtog/ 'gro dang gnas las rnams 'das ma
300a8(phal chen): lus smras pa med// de bzhin chos nyid chos rnams yang dag mnyam mi rtog/ tshe rnams kun la snang ba khong du sus rgud pa// de la dngos dang dngos med g.yo ba gang yang
300b1(phal chen): med// snying rtse 'gro ba dgol phyir brtson pa ni// de dag rgyal sras chos kyis sku skyes so// mtshan ma thams cad spangs shing sbyin pa'i spyad pa spyod// tshul khrims
300b2(phal chen): shin tu sems dam sngon nas zhi zhing dul// 'gro ba'i don du chos kyi ye shes mnyam bzod// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan zhing chos rnams kun gyi dbyen// nyon
300b3(phal chen): mongs bsal cing rnam dag bsam gtan tshul la zhugs// dngos po thams cad snga nas zhi zhing phye// ye shes spyod dang stobs phyag rtag tu 'gro don brtson rgyal ba
300b4(phal chen): de dag bzhi cha ba nyid dang / de skad sgra dbyangs bstan pa stong grags brjod byas nas// lha'i bu mo smra dad par thul ba ste/ rdo rje snying po 'jig med la// mthar ba'i zla bar
300b5(phal chen): yang smras pa// sa mchog lnga'i gong ma de// rnam pa ci 'drar 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang
300b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la// sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la 'jug go/ de chos snyam pa nyid bcus 'jug ste/ bcu gang
300b7(phal chen): zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid dang // chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
300b8(phal chen): chos thams cad ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dben pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad ldan pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang //
301a1(phal chen): @chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid dang / chos thams cad blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
301a2(phal chen): ma dang rmi lam dang / mig yor dang sgra snyan dang / chu'i zla ba dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa dang chungs pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dngos po yod
301a3(phal chen): pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pastan pa nyid de// kye rgyal sras dag chos mnyam pa nyid/ bcu po 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa
301a4(phal chen): la 'jug pa la 'jug go// de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de 'dra bar rab tu rtog cing spyod pa dang mthun par sems shing / mi mthun pa'i mi byed pas byang chub sos
301a5(phal chen): dpa'i sa drug pa mthun pa'i bzod pa rnon po'i sa thob te/ 'on kyang da dung mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa mngon du gyur pa thob pa ma yin no// de chos thams cad la
301a6(phal chen): rang bzhin de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/ de bas kyang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po la dbang bsgyur bas/ snying rje chen po yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i/
301a7(phal chen): phyir 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten la rnam par lta'o// de 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten la lta ba'i tshe 'di snyam te/ 'jig rten kun tu sbyar
301a8(phal chen): ba'i skye ba ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag tu mngon par zhen pa las byung ste/ bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang / bral na 'byung ba yang med par 'gyuraro//
301b1(phal chen): khyim pa'i blo can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa mi shes pa'i rab rib sgrib pa yod pa dang med pa la mngon par mos pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa yod la byed pa la gzhol ba/ yang
301b2(phal chen): dag par ma yin par rab tu zhugs pa la los pa'i rje su 'brang ba de dag ni/ bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed nye bar sogs te/ 'du byed de dag gi
301b3(phal chen): yongasu bsgos pa'i sems kyi sa bon zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang / bcas pa ni ma 'ong ba'i skyes pa dang / rga shi dang srid pa mngon par grub pa 'byung ba nye
301b4(phal chen): bar song ba yin/ las kyi zhing gis bzhi dang ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / bsred pa'i snrums dang nga'i rgyal gyi brlan pa'i lta ba'i rnams pa dang dra ba rab tu 'phel bas/
301b5(phal chen): ming dang gzugs kyis myu gu 'byung ste/ byang nas rnam par 'phel lo// ming dang gzugs kyis myu gu rnam par 'brel nas/ dbang po lnga 'byung bar 'gyuraro// /
301b6(phal chen): dbang po lnga byung nas phan tshun 'dus shing phrad pas reg par 'gyur ro// rig pa lus pas tshor ba 'byung ngo // tshor ba nas de'i rjes mngon por smon pas
301b7(phal chen): 'byung ngo // srid pa ni nye bar len po rnam par 'phel bar byed do// nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel ba las srid pa 'byung bar 'gyu ro// srid pa byung nas phung
301b8(phal chen): po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ phung po lnga byung nas las kyi rgyuso sngar rim gyis de nges par 'gyuraro// dengs shing bral bar 'gyur te/ dengs shing bral ba/
302a1(phal chen): mi dga' zhing yongasu gdung bar 'gyur ro// mi dga' ba dang yongs su bdung ba'i rgyus mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
302a2(phal chen): ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa 'byung bar 'gyur yang de dag lus yang 'byung bar byed med do// rang bzhin dang lhun gyi grub par 'gyur yang de dag 'jig par byed pa
302a3(phal chen): su yang med do// zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che bo lug su mthun par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rab tu rtag go// de 'di snyam du sems te bden pa dang
302a4(phal chen): mngon par mi shes pa'i yang dag par ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa byas pa'i las kyis rnam par smin pa ni/ 'du byed rnams so// 'du byed la gnas pa'i sems dang po ni rnam par
302a5(phal chen): shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa dang / lhan cig tu skyes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi ni ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni drag gi skye mched do// dbang po dang yul dang rnam
302a6(phal chen): par shes pa gsum phrad pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni rig par bya'o// reg pa'i rjes la skyes pa ni tshor ba'o// tshor ba la chags pa ni sred pa'o// sred pa la rnam par 'phel ba'i
302a7(phal chen): nye bar len pa'o// nye bar len pa las byung ba'i las zag pa dang bcas pa ni srid pa'o// las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni skye ba'o// skye ba ni phung po 'byung ba'o// phung po
302a8(phal chen): yongs su smin pa ni dga' ba'o// rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o// 'chi zhing bral ba'i tshe myos shing chags par 'gyur ba ni sems la yongs su rdung ba ni mya ngan ne// mya ngan las
302b1(phal chen): byung ba'i tshig tu brjod pa ni smre sngags 'don pa'o// dbang po lnga'i nyam su bab pa ni sdug bsngal lo// yid kyi lta nga'i nyams su ba pa ni yid kyi mi bde ba'o// sdug bsngal dang yis
302b2(phal chen): bde bar mang po 'byung ba ni 'khrug pa to// de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phu bo chen po dang // sdug bsngal gyi sdong po 'ba' zhig byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med par mngon par grub par gyur to// de
302b3(phal chen): 'di snyam du sems te byed pa po mngon par chags pa las rnam par yod pa gyur to// gang ni byed pa po med pa ni don dam par na las kyang mi dmigs so// de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
302b4(phal chen): ltar khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam te// gang 'di sred pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu phyed te/ bka' stsal pa/ de dag thams cad sems cig la
302b5(phal chen): gnas pa dag go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos pa gang la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i skyes pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o// dngos po ni 'du byedado// mgo rmongs pa'i ma rig pa'o// ma rig pa'i
302b6(phal chen): sems dang lhan cig skyes pa ni/ ming dang gzugs so// ming gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni drug pa'i skye mched do// len pa'i yan lag 'byung ba 'di dag ni srid pa'o// drug gi skye
302b7(phal chen): mched dang 'brel pa ni rig pa'o// reg pa dang ldan cig skyes pa ni tshor ba'o// tshor bas mi ngoms pa ni srid pa'o// sred pas mnar te sdug cing mi gtong ba ni nye bar len pa'o//
