302b8(phal chen): len pa'i yan lag 'byung ba 'di dag ni srid pa'o// srid pa 'byung ba ni skye ba'o// skye ba yongasu smin pa rga shi'o// dga' ba dang bral ba ni 'chi ba'o// de dag la ma rig pa ni bya ba
303a1(phal chen): gnyi su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ sems can rnams kyang dmig pa la rmongs par byed do// 'du byed mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang byin to// 'du byed rnams
303a2(phal chen): kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ ma 'ong ba'i rnam par smin pa yid mngon par 'grub par byed do// rnam par shes pa yang smon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to// rnam par
303a3(phal chen): shes pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ srid pa'i nyin gyi mtshams kyang sbyor ro// ming dang gzugs mngon par grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to// ming dang gzugs kyang
303a4(phal chen): bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ phan tshun nye bar rton pa yang byed do// skye mched drug mngon par grub pa yang sgyu yang 'byin to// drug gis skye mched kyang bya ba gnyi su nye bar
303a5(phal chen): gnas pa yin te/ rang gi yul rnam par phye ba yang ston to// reg pa mngon par 'grub pa'i sgra yang 'byin/ reg pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ dmigs pa la reg
303a6(phal chen): par yang byed do// tshor ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to// tshor ba bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa
303a7(phal chen): yang tshor ba yang skyed do// sred pa mngon par 'grub pa'i sgyu yang 'byin to// sred pa bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ chags par 'gyur ba yang dngos po la mngon par
303a8(phal chen): chags pa byed do// nye bar len pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to// nye bar len pa yang bya ba gnyi su nye bar gnyis pa yin ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pas 'ching ba yang
303b1(phal chen): rked do// sred pa mngon par grub pa'i sgra yang 'byin to// srid pa'i yang bya ba gnyi su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ srid pa'i rgyud gzhan du yang nye bar gnas par byed do// skye ba yang mngon
303b2(phal chen): par grub rgya yang 'byin te/ kye ba dang bya ba gnyi su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ phung po 'byung bar yang byed do// rga ba mngon par 'grub pa yang rgyu 'byin to// rga ba yang bya ba gnyi su nye
303b3(phal chen): bar gnas pa yin te/ dbang po yongs su 'gyur bar yang byed do// 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang 'byin to// 'chi bar yang bya ba gnyi su nye bar gnas pa yin te/ 'du byed 'jig par
303b4(phal chen): yang byed do// yongs su ma shes pa dang mi ched pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to// de la ma rog pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams so// zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams
303b5(phal chen): rgyun ma chad cing ston pa'o// 'du byed kyis rkyen gyi rnam par shes pa'o zhes pa ni// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i rgyun mi chad cing ston pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming
303b6(phal chen): dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs rgyun mi chad cing rton pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyi drug skye mched ces bya ba ni/ ming dang gzugs
303b7(phal chen): kyis rkyen gyis drug gis skye mched rgyun chad cing ston pa'o// drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa'o// drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa rgyun mi ched cing ston pa'o//
303b8(phal chen): rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgyun mi chad cing ston pa'o// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa'o// zhes bya ba ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa rgyun mi chad cing ston pa'o// srid pa'i
304a1(phal chen): pa'i rten gyis nye bapa yin pa'o// zhes d+ha / zhi ba rkyen gyi pa chen rgyun mimad ci ston pa'o// med na men pa rkyen gyis srid s+ho/
304a2(phal chen): zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa rgyun mi mched cing ston pa'o// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba'o zhes bya ba ni// sred pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba rgyun mi mchad cing ston pa'o// skye ba'i
304a3(phal chen): rkyen gyis rga shi'o// zhes byani/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis rga shi rgyun mi mchad cing ston pa'o// ma rig pa 'gag pas 'du byed rnams 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i rkyen med pas
304a4(phal chen): 'dra byed rnams nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med pa'o// 'du byed 'gag pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go/ zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi rkyen med pas rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med
304a5(phal chen): de// rnam par shes pa 'gag pas ming dang gzugs 'gag go/ zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen med ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med pa'o// ming dang gzug
304a6(phal chen): 'gag pas drug gi skye mched 'gag go zhes bya ba ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen med par drag gi skye mched nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med pa'o// drug gi skye mched 'gag pas reg
304a7(phal chen): pa 'gag go/ zhes bya ba ni drug gi skye mched kyis rkyen med pas reg pa nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med pa'o// reg pa 'gag pas len pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ reg pa rkyen
304a8(phal chen): med pas tshor ba nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med pa'o// tshor ba 'gag pas sred pa 'gag go/ zhes bya ba ni tshor ba'i rkyen med pas sred pa nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med do// sred pa
304b1(phal chen): 'gag pas len pa 'gag go// zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rkyen med pas len pa nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med pa'o// nye bar len pa 'gag pas srid pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni nye bar len
304b2(phal chen): pa'i rkyen med pas srid pa nye bar ni zhing ston pa med pa'o// srid pa 'gag pas kye ba 'gag go/ zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rkyen med pas skye ba nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med pa'o// /
304b3(phal chen): skye ba 'gag pas rga shi 'gag go zhes bya ba ni/ skye ba ni rkyen med pa rga shi nye bar zhi zhing ston pa med pa'o// de la ma rig pa dang sred pa dang nye bar len pa ni nyon mongs pa'i
304b4(phal chen): lom gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o// 'du byed dang / srid pa ni las kyis lam rgyan mi chad pa'o// lhag ma rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi lam gyi rgyun mi chad pa'o// rab tu rnam par phye bas sngon
304b5(phal chen): gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' 'gag pas lam gyi rgyun 'chad pa'o// 'di ltar lam 'di gsum ni bdag med cing bdag dang bdag gis bral bar 'byung zhing 'jig pa
304b6(phal chen): ste/ rang bzhin gyi brdang khyim lta bu de ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' la ltas pa'o// rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang /
304b7(phal chen): drug gi skye mched dang reg pa dang tshor ba 'di dag ni/ da ltar byung ba la ltas pa'o// sred pa dang nye ba len pa dang / srid pa dang skye ba zhes bya ba'i phyi ma'i mtha' la bltas pa
304b8(phal chen): ste/ de phan chad du yang de dag rgyun du 'byung ngo // mi rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya ba 'di ni lta ba rgyun chad pa ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no//
305a1(phal chen): yang 'di ltar srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag rgyus sdug bsngal gsum 'byung ste/ de la ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
305a2(phal chen): shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / drug gis skye mched ces bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyis sdug bsngal lo// reg pa dang tshor ba zhes bya ba sdug bsngal la/
305a3(phal chen): srid pa nye bar len pa srid pa dang // skye ba nas 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal lo// ma rig pa 'gag pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces
305a4(phal chen): bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gsum gyis mchad pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'ad byed rnams zhes bya ba ni 'du byed rnams rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/ lha ma rnams kyang
305a5(phal chen): de bzhin no// ma rig pa 'gag pas 'ad byed rnams 'gag ces bya ba ni 'du byed rnams med pa ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'ad/
305a6(phal chen): byed rnams shes bya ba ni skye ba rnam par 'brel ba ste/ lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// ma rig pa 'gag pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya ba 'jig pa rnam
305a7(phal chen): par 'brel pa ste/ lha ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed shes byang ba ni/ srid pa lugs gsum mthun par brtag pa ste/ lha ma rnams kyang
305a8(phal chen): de bzhin no// ma rig pa 'gag pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni zad pa dang / 'jig pa'i rje su mthun par brtag pa ste/ lha ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// zhes
305b1(phal chen): de ltar bsten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lugs su mthun pa'i dang mi mthun pa'i tshul du rab tu rtog te/ 'di ltar srid yan lag rjes su 'brel pa dang / sems
305b2(phal chen): cig tu yang dag par 'du ba dang / rang gi sa las ma 'dres pa dang / ched du byed pa dang / lus gsum gyis rab tu 'brang ba dang / sngon gyis mtha' dang da lta
305b3(phal chen): byung ba dang phyi ma'i mtha' la lta ba dang / sdug bsngal gsum 'byung ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang 'jig pa rnam par 'brel ba dang
305b4(phal chen): srid pa'i lugs su mthun pa dang / zad par 'gyur bar rab tu rtog pa'o// de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam pa bcur rab tu rtog pa bdag
305b5(phal chen): med pa dang / srog med pa dang gang zag med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par rab tu rtog pa'i tshe
305b6(phal chen): stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyes pa yin/ srid pa'i yan lag 'di dag gi rang bzhin 'gag shing rnam par thar pa las shin tu nye bar gnas par
305b7(phal chen): chos kyis mtshan ma gang mi skyes te/ des de'i mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyes pa yin/ de ltar des stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa la
305b8(phal chen): zhugs pas snying rje chen po sngon du stong zhing / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba ma rtogs par 'dod pa gang yang skye te/ des de'i smon lam med pa'i rnam
306a1(phal chen): par thar pa'i sgo skyes yin/ de rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag sgom pas bdag dang // pha rol gyi 'du byed dang bral ba dang / byed pa po dang /
306a2(phal chen): tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang / yod pa dang med pa'i 'du shes dang bral bas byang chub kyis yan lag yong su rdzogs pa rnams yong su rdzogs pa bya ba'i phyir snying rje
306a3(phal chen): chen po sngon du btang te// de bas kyang shin tu rtsom par byed do// de 'di snyam du sems te 'dra ba yod pas 'dus byas 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 'du ba dang bral bas ni 'phel ba medo// /
306a4(phal chen): rgya dang rkyen dang ldan pas ni 'du byed 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyu dang rkyen mo ldan pas ni 'phel ba med do// de ltar bdag gis de lta bu'i 'das byas nyes pa mang po'i skyon can shes par byas
306a5(phal chen): te/ 'du ba sgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'di dag rgyun bcad par bya'o// sems can yongasu min par bya ba'i phyir/ 'du byed rnams shin tu zhi ba'ang sngon du mi bya'o// zhes te kye rgyal ba'i sras
306a6(phal chen): dag de de ltar 'du byed kyis rnam pa de ltar nyes pa mang po'i skyon can snying po dang rang bzhin med pa/ skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin tu rab tu rtog pa dang / snying rje
306a7(phal chen): chen po rab tu bsgrub pa dang / sems can yongasu mi tong bas chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon gsum zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa snang ba'i tshul du
306a8(phal chen): mngon gsum du 'gyur ro// de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shes pa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par snang bar 'gyur nas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag yongasu bsdud pa'i rkyen nye na//
306b1(phal chen): stsogs cing yang dag par bsdud do// 'du byas dang 'grogs par yang mi gnas so// 'du byed rnams rang bzhin gyis zhi bar yang rab tu rtog go/ 'on kya byang chub kyis yan lag rnam
306b2(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i phyir de la mi gnas te/ de byang chub sems dpa'i mngon gsum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ 'jug pa zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
306b3(phal chen): don dam pa stong nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / mngon par bsgrub pa stong pa nyid dang / yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin tu rnam par rtogs pa'i stong pa nyid
306b4(phal chen): dang / ltos pa'i stong pa nyid dang tha dad pa med pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag stsogs stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag
306b5(phal chen): bcu de la mngon gsum du 'gyur ro// de bzhin mtshan ma med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu mngon gsum du 'gyur
306b6(phal chen): ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa sngon gsum de 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa sngon gsum du 'di la gnas byang chub sems dpa' de'i phyir zhing mi phyed pa'i bam
306b7(phal chen): pa yongasu rdzogs pa thob po// nges pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa dang / zab pa'i bsam pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam pa dang / rgyun mi chad pa'i bsam pa dang / dri
306b8(phal chen): ma med pa'i bsam pa dang // mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa dang / ye shes la mngon par mos pa'i bsam pa dang / thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pa'i bsam pa yongasu rdzogs
307a1(phal chen): par thob te/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa 'dis bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyis rjesu song ba yin pas kyi rgol ba thams cad
307a2(phal chen): kyi phyir mi ldog pa yin/ ye shes kyis la yang dag par gzhol ba yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis sa las rnam par ldog pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon
307a3(phal chen): du bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa kun nas rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrog pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba la shin tu gnas pa yin/ stong pa nyid
307a4(phal chen): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i chos yang dag par spyad pas yongasu sgoms pa yin/ thabs dang shes rab dang / ye shes rnam par sprad pa dang / ldan pa yin/ byang chub kyi
307a5(phal chen): phyogs kyis chos mngon par bsgrub pa dang rnam par 'dren pa yin/ de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i mngon gsum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
307a6(phal chen): pa'i shas che ba yin/ chos de dag tshul bzhin du mthun par byed cing / mi mthun pa mi byed pas mthun pa'i bzod pa gsum pa rab tu rno ba rab tu skyes pa yin/ de de ltar de byang
307a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa mngon gsum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/ de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te/ lha brgya chen po dang smon la
307a8(phal chen): gyi stobs kyi sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs
307b1(phal chen): rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
307b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas/ bsam brgya
307b3(phal chen): chen pos rim 'gro byed do// bkur sti byed do// sti stang byed do// mchod pa byed do// nam bza' dang bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyis rkyen sman dang / yo byad de dag
307b4(phal chen): kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongasu 'bul lo// dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang dag par mchod pa byed do// dge bI rtsa ba de dag kyang bla
307b5(phal chen): named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas de dag la skyen bkur byed cing rim 'a
307b6(phal chen): dang / bkur sti nan tan tu chos nyan cing len to// 'dzin to// thos nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab dang ye shes kyis snang bas rab
307b7(phal chen): tu rtsom par byed do// nan tan gyis yongasu 'dzin pas de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pa yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon gsum
307b8(phal chen): 'di la gnas pa'i tshe// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
308a1(phal chen): bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig
308a2(phal chen): brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar sngon pas kyang ches byang dang / ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas so// kye rgyal sras dag 'di lta ste
308a3(phal chen): dper na/ gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid bI dUr+yas btab pa/ sngon pas kyang shin tu tsher la 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
308a4(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang shes rab dang ye shes kyis shin te rtags pas sngon pas kyang shin tu byang ba 'od gsal zhing dang ba te/ phyi zhing yang rab tu zhi bas mi 'phrogs par 'gyur
308a5(phal chen): ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i 'od ni sos can gyi lus kyang sim par byed la rlung gis dkyil 'khor chen po bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/ kye
308a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa mngon gsum 'di la gnas pa'i rtsa ba de dag sdoms pas kyang / sems can du ma'i
308a7(phal chen): bsam pa'i nyon sa mongs pa 'bar ba yang zhi zhing tshims par byed la/ bdud kyis lam gyis rgyu bzhis kyang mi 'phrog pa yin/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa shas che ba yin te/
308a8(phal chen): lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul cing nus su yang dag par mi bsgrub pa ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon gsum zhes bya ba ste/
308b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni pad+ma lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal ni
308b2(phal chen): bar bya ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ nyan pa thams cad kyis yongs su dri bas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ de sbyin pa 'am ngag snyan pa'am/ don 'grub pa 'am/ don mthun pas
308b3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsoms yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur mthu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur dam par 'gyur/ bla
308b4(phal chen): na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam de/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid
308b5(phal chen): la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
308b6(phal chen): pha rol tu phyir pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dris pa yid la bya ba dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad ldan
308b7(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yod la bya ba dang / mi bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par
308b8(phal chen): gzhog pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang / de dag gis byin gyi rlab kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong skyod dang /
309a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis zhing khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig brgya
309a2(phal chen): stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig rgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang chos
309a3(phal chen): kyis sgo khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus bye ba brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag
309a4(phal chen): par snyan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu brtsom mo// de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul ste/ de dag lus sam/ 'od dam rdzu 'phrul
309a5(phal chen): lam/ mig gam sprod pa'am/ dbyangs sam/ spyod yul lam rgyan tam/ byin gyis rlab sam/ mos pa 'am/ sngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya
309a6(phal chen): phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o// de nas byang chub
309a7(phal chen): sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos/ sa'i don 'di nyid yang dag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mkhas pas lam gyis spyod
309a8(phal chen): ba lnga po yongs rdzogs nas// chos rnam mtshan med mtshan nyid med dang ma skyes dang // ma byung lda nas yongs su ni zhing spros med pa// yongs su sgom pas ye shes bla can drug
309b1(phal chen): pa gnon// chos rnams dben zhing len med rnam par rtog med dang // sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gnyis kyis dngos las rnam grol bas// chos kyi tshul la 'gal med rjes su mthun byed
309b2(phal chen): cing // ye shes ldan pa'i dam pa drug pa yongs su gnon// mthun pa rno la gnas shing ye shes stobs ldan pa// 'jig rten kun gyis 'byung dang 'jig la rab tu rtog/ gti mug
309b3(phal chen): mun pas 'gro ba 'byung ba kun tu skyed// gti mug de nyid bral bas 'byung ba med pa yin// rkyen gyis rnam pa don dam stong par rnam par 'byed// bya ba mi 'gal rgyu rkyen byed pa mnyam par
309b4(phal chen): shes// yang dag ji bzhin byed pa po yang med par rab shes nas// 'dus byas sprin sdug lta bur byed pa med par shes// bden pa mi shes de ni yang dag ma rig pa// las ni sem
309b5(phal chen): kyis stobs kyi mgo rmongs 'byung bar 'gyur// sems la rten te lhan cig 'byung ba'i ming dang gzugs// de ltar sdug bsngal phung po chen po rab tu 'byung // khams gsum sems
309b6(phal chen): gyis rgyu las 'byung ba de ltar ste// srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'di dag sems cig rten// 'dod chags skyes pa de las semasu brjod pa yin// ji bzhin srid pa'i dngos po
309b7(phal chen): sems kyi rnam pa'o// ma rig bya ba gnyis la rmongs pa'i dngos po la// mongs par byas shing de nas sems dpa'i rgyu yang 'byung // de bzhin dga' ba phung po bzhig bya 'jig
309b8(phal chen): byed par// de las sdug bsngal mig thog thams cad mi zad 'byung // ma rig rkyen gyis chad par 'gyur ba yod pa yin// nom par chad cing rgyu rkyen bral bas yod pa 'gag
310a1(phal chen): gti mug srid pa nye len nyon mongs la pa yin te// las dang srid pa sems dpa' lhag ma sdug bsngal yin// gti mug skye mched rab tu 'ang byas sdug
310a2(phal chen): bsngal te// reg dang tshor dang de dag sdug bsngal yin// yan lag lhag ma 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal rnam 'phel// bdag med shes pas sdug bsngal gsum po'i chad par 'gyur/
310a3(phal chen): mun pa sems dang 'du byed 'di ni sngon ltas yin// rnam par shes nas tshor ba'i rgyun tu da ltar 'byung // sred dang srid par sdug bsngal 'byung ba phyi ma'i mtha'// 'phags shing
310a4(phal chen): zad pa de dag 'chad pa yin// gti mug rkyen gyis de dag rnam par 'brel ba 'byung // zad pas byang du rkyen rnams rnam par 'brel pa yin// rgyu las rgyu 'byung med na rgyun chad 'gyur/
310a5(phal chen): bde phan shes ldan rang bzhin stong pa de ltar rtogs// rgyud du mthun pa'i gti mug mun las 'byung ba yin// mi mthun bzlog pas gti mug zad pas mi 'byung ba'o// zad pa'i
310a6(phal chen): rkyen dang de dag yod dang med pa las// gnas pa med blos rnam pa bcur na de ltar rtog/ srid pa'i yan lag mtshams dang sems cig las mthun dang // ched du mi
310a7(phal chen): byed rgyud gsum brjes 'brang sngon dang // sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyus 'byung skye dang 'jig pa dang // srid pa'i mthar phyin pad dang rkyen gyi lus mthun par// de ltar
310a8(phal chen): rten 'brel 'byung la yang dag 'jug byed pas/ rgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin tsher rab byed med cing // rmi lam 'dra ba de bzhin mig yor 'dra ba ste// byis pa slu ba'i mig rgyu
310b1(phal chen): rang bzhin mtshungs mnyam pa// de ltar sgom pa'i mkhas pa stong pa nyid kyi sgo// rkyen rnams med pa de ni mtshan ma med pa ste// log par shes pas smon med pa yin/ gzhan
310b2(phal chen): du sems can snying rtse'i don du skye ba 'dzin// de 'dra'i rnam thar sgo la sgom byed mthu che ba// snying rtse'i don du blo ldan sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod cing // 'dus byes 'das
310b3(phal chen): ma mkhas pa yongs su rtogs byas pas// bsam pa nges shing gcig min legs dang ldan pa yin// stong nyid ting 'dzin stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su rgyas// de bzhin
310b4(phal chen): brtan pa mtshan med dang smon lam med ldan// shes rab shas che mthun pa'i bzod pa mchog can de// mkhas pa'i rnam thar ye shes chags pa med dang ldan// de 'dra'i
310b5(phal chen): bsam pas drang srong che mang mchod byed pas// rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la shin tu bsngags pa yin// de ni sangs rgyas mdzod thob khong du chud pas na// bAM dar rgyas tab
310b6(phal chen): gser mdog bzhin tu mngon pas gsal// zla ba'i 'od ni 'gro ba'i lus las sim par byed// rlung bzhin langs pas yongs su 'phrog par mi nus so// rgyal sras
310b7(phal chen): 'od kyang bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das// nyon mongs nad dang sdug bsngal nad kyang sel// sa 'di phyogs su phyin pa lha'i bdag por 'gyur// 'phrul dga' dam pi
310b8(phal chen): lhag pa'i nga rgyal sel la mkhas// ye shes lam dang ldan pa de ni ci rtsom yang // nyan thos lam las 'das te brten zhing mi 'phrog pa'o// bde gshegs sras po 'dod gyur na/
311a1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya stong 'tshang dbye ba thob par byed// ska cigacig tu phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mang po lta// srid kyi nyi ma gsal zhing lhan par byed pa bzhin//
311a2(phal chen): zab cing lta dka' 'phra ba de ni nyan thos rang rgyal shes mi nus// bdag nyid tshe bas drug pa rgyal ba'i sras kyi bshad pa yin// mngon gsum zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug
311a3(phal chen): pa'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo las sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// / bam po bzhi bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas sna tshogs yid 'ong sprin// lha tshogs mang
311a4(phal chen): po'i mkhas la mkhas shing mngon par thor// tshig snyan rnam par brjod pa byed/ dga' ba'i dam pa mchog gis yongs su rgyas// dge 'a don dam sems mdzad cing / yon tan brgya dang
311a5(phal chen): yang dag ldan zhing dbang sgyur ba/ mi'i phun dang ri dka' yis/ 'gro la phan phyir spyod rab yang dag bshad// yid 'ong 'od mchog ldan khyod dang / mi'i rtse bo mya ngan yongs su sel mdzad
311a6(phal chen): ga// dbang phyag chen po mi par gnas shing // spos sprin med 'od dam pa mngon pa 'bor// tshig sun rab tu brjod pa byed// lha tshogs mang po mkha' las dga' 'gyur dbyangs sgrog
311a7(phal chen): cing // gangagis ldan pa 'di thos nas// de dag theb papabang po bab ces zer/ rol mo brdud dkrol dbyangs ston pa// brgya mang rtswa'i bla mos dga' bar byed// bdag shis
311a8(phal chen): dang khyod ma bu mig/ tshig rang 'di 'dra rab tu brjod par 'gyur// zhing dang nges spyod dam pa can// ma dul 'dul sa 'ad 'jig rten kun gyis mtshad byas bo// 'jig rten tu
311b1(phal chen): las 'das pa'i 'jig rten spyod pa shin tu phra bstan// sna tshogs lus kyang rab tu bstan/ lus dang lus la chos nyid phun sum tshogs shing ldan/ rnams spyod ni gnas mthus bcil
311b2(phal chen): bas/ dbyangs su sgrogs kyang yig ge brjod mi byed/ zhing rnams brgyar yang 'dod byed cing / mgon po mchod par 'os la mchog byed cing / shing rgyal bdag tu 'du shes pa/ ye shes
311b3(phal chen): dbang bsgyur mchog gis rab tu sel/ sems can yongs su smin byed kyang // bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes rnam pa kun tu med// dge ba yang ba yang dag stsogs// 'od kyang dgra
311b4(phal chen): ba gnas la sogs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi/ 'jig rten thams cad rab 'bar mthong gyur cing / 'du shes thams cad rnam spang nas/ snying rje'i ldan pas brtson 'grus
311b5(phal chen): rab tu rtsom/ lha mang lha'i bu mo yis// gsung gis mchog la mchod byas nas/ kun kyang mi dgar 'gyur bya te/ drang srong che la lta zhing gnas/ thar pa'i zla bas kyang smras pa/
311b6(phal chen): 'khor rnams shin tu rnam par dang / sa bdun pa'i rnam dag dang / rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad par mdzod// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
311b7(phal chen): dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa drag pa la de ltar sa'i lam yongasu rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa yongasu gnon to de thabs dang shes rab kyi
311b8(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i lam la rtsams pa'i khyad par bcus yongs su gnon to// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
312a1(phal chen): shin tu bsgom pa'i yid dang ldan la/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang dag par rdzogs pa yin/ bdag med pa dang / bso ba med dang /
312a2(phal chen): gang zag med pa dang / chos yang rab tu 'jug la tshad med pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa yang yongs su mi tong ba yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis shin tu mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
312a3(phal chen): par bsgrub pa yang mngon par bsgrub la/ chos gang yang mngon par chags pa med pa yin/ khams gsum pa las 'byin par 'gyur ba'ang thob la/ khams gsum pa bsdu ba dang /
312a4(phal chen): rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ste/ nye bar zhi ba'ang yin la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dod
312a5(phal chen): chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang nyon mongs pa'i me lce rab tu zhi ba sngon par bsgrub pa yin/ sgyu ma dang rmi lame dang / mig yor dang / sgra snyan chu'i zla ba dang / gzugs brnyan
312a6(phal chen): dang / sprul ba'i rang bzhin lta bur yod pa dang med pa gnyis ka ma yin pa thams cad kyang khong du chud la/ las dang bya ba rnam par phye ba'ang med pa'i bsam pa yang mngon par bsgrub
312a7(phal chen): pa yin/ shing gi thog nam pa' dang mnyam par shin tu bsgom pa'i yid dang yang ldan la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyad zhing bsgrub pa dang / rgyun mngon par grub pa yin/
312a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang chos dang sku nas khar lta bur yang rab tu 'jug la/ gzugs dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang bas skye ning rgyan mngon par bsgrub sngon par smrab pa
312b1(phal chen): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rang bzhin gyi ning brjod du med pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par yang yid la ne su lA/ sems can thams cad kyis dbyangs kyis yan lag rnam
312b2(phal chen): ngakhong duny+dzang
312b3(phal chen): par 'phye ba'i rgyan mngon par grub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ska cig gis dus gsum thug su nI de li/ dus dang bskal pa'i grangs dang mtshan nyid tha dad pa
312b4(phal chen): yang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par sgom pa'i phyir rje su zhugs pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag thabs dang shes ba kyis sngon par bsgrub pa'i lam rtsam pa'i khyad par 'di bcus/
312b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pas sa bdun pa yongasu gnon to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
312b6(phal chen): chen po lam gyis tshogs thabs dang / shes rab kyi mngon par sgrub pa'i khyad par snang bar 'gyur ba 'di dag mngon par sgrub pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa yongasu gnod
312b7(phal chen): ces bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la yongasu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang
312b8(phal chen): rnams kyis sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba'i 'phrin las tshad med pa la 'jug go// 'jig rten gyis khams mang po tshad med pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas
312b9(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la 'jug go// chos thams cad tshad med pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
313a1(phal chen): ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med pa la 'jug go/ bskal pa grang chad med pa 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dus gsum
313a2(phal chen): thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go// sems kyis mos pa'i khyad par cha dbul 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mtshan dang / sku gzugs dang / sku sna
313a3(phal chen): tshogs ston pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sems can rnams kyis bsam pa dang dbang po tha dad pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung brjod pas/ sems
313a4(phal chen): can yongs su smin par mdzad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sems can rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ye shes
313a5(phal chen): 'jam klas pa thugasu chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ nyan thos theg pas 'byung ba mos pa tshod med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lam shin tu
313a6(phal chen): bstan pa'i ye shes 'jug pa tshad med pa la 'jug cing mos par byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa shin tu rdzogs par bya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go//
313a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ye shes zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sbyor
313a8(phal chen): ba tshad med pa la 'jug go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go/ de 'di snyom de sem
313b1(phal chen): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyod yul ni de ltar tshad med de/ de ni bskal pa khrag khrig dang / bskal pa stong phrag
313b2(phal chen): khrag khrig dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag khrag khrig gnas te/ de snyed kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi kyang bgrang bar dka'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
313b3(phal chen): spyod yul ni de dag gi lhun gyis bsgrub par bya'o// rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med par yongasu rdzogasu par bya'o// zhes de de ltar shin tu
313b4(phal chen): brtag pa'i khwa shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhing rtag tu rgyan mi chad par mngon par brtson pa ni/ thabs dang shes rab kyis yongasu bsgom pa'i lam gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i ye
313b5(phal chen): shes las mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyi yongasu gnas pa yin/ de skad cig tu yang lam mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan par mi byed de/ de 'gro yang de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin/
313b6(phal chen): 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / rmi lam dag tu yang ba sgrib pa med cing spyod lam thams cad la gnas kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ye shes yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba
313b7(phal chen): yin/ de'i sems skyed pa re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol du phyin pa bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag par 'byung ngo // de ci'i
313b8(phal chen): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems skyed pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
314a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su sngo bas de la gang sangs rgyas kyis ye shes yongs su tshol zhing / sems can rnams la
314a2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gtong ba 'di ni/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba 'di ni/ de'i tshul khrims
314a3(phal chen): kyis pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang snying rje dang byams pa sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad la 'che ba med pa 'di ni/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang gong nas gong
314a4(phal chen): du dge ba 'tshol bas mi ngom par dam 'cha' ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ 'gyod pa med pa'i lam dang
314a5(phal chen): ldan pa 'di ni/ de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang rang bzhin gyis mo skyes pa sngon du gyur pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang ye shes tshad med pa
314a6(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gong nas gong du ye shes la dmigs shing / mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni/ de'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu
314a7(phal chen): phyin pa'o// phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / bdud kyi tshogs thams cad kyi lam yongasu mi mchod pa 'di ni/ de'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang chos thams cad yang
314a8(phal chen): dag par ji lta ba bzhin tu rtogs pa 'di ni/ de ye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i
314b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po de dag yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byin rlab bcu dang byang chub kyis phyogs
314b2(phal chen): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgom gsum dang / mdor bsdu na byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos thams cad ska cig cig tu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
314b3(phal chen): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so//
314b4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa zhig gis/ byang chub kyis yan lag thams cad skad cig skad
314b5(phal chen): cig tu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'on te ma yin gyi sa bcu pa thams cad la'ang de bzhin yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal
314b6(phal chen): ba'i sras sa bcu po kun la yang byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyis yan lag thams cad skad cig skad cig tu yongasu rdzogs par lta 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun
314b7(phal chen): po 'di la ni de dag las lag par yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di ni nan tan bya ba'i sbed pa yongasasu rdzogs pa
314b8(phal chen): byed pa/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongasu gnon pa ste/ de ltar kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la ni/ smon lam thams cad la lhag par ma dmig
315a1(phal chen): pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa la/ sems kyi dri ma thams cad bas/
315a2(phal chen): gsum pa la smon lam par 'phel ba dang / chos kyi snang bas thob pas bzhi pa la lam la 'jug pas/ lnga pa la 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/ drug pa la chos zab mo'i
315a3(phal chen): sgor 'jug pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di ni sangs rgyas chos thams cad yongasu bsgrub pas/ byang
315a4(phal chen): chub kyi yan lag thams cad skad cig tu yongs su grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung te byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i bar du
315a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon par ma ye shes mngon par ma bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yan lag de dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan chad lhan
315a6(phal chen): gyi grub par yongasu 'grub po// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / shin tu dag pa 'jig rten gyi
315a7(phal chen): khams dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi bar ni smon lam dang / thabs dang shes rab dang / sngon par shes pa'i stobs dang shugs chen po ma rtogs par 'dod do pa
315a8(phal chen): rgal bar mi nus so// kye rgyas pa'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i skrod pa ma 'dres pa dang / yongasu dag pa'i bar dang / smon lam dang / thabs dang shes rab dang /
315b1(phal chen): mngon pa ma shes pa dang / ye nas kyi stongs dang / grags chen po sa rtogs par 'od dod pa rnam par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gros pa'i rlabs smras pa/
315b2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'on ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i spyod pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yid ches par bya ba yin nam/
315b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la rab tu dga' ba nyid bzung ba yan chad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i
315b4(phal chen): spod pa thams cad byang chub tu yongs su sngos pa'i dbang gis nyon so mongs pa'i rnyog pa bral bar 'os pa'i tshul gyi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis yid ches par byas te/ de tsam gyis
315b5(phal chen): sa bdun po rnams nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa las yang dag par 'das shes ni mi bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni lha rdzas kyi glad
315b6(phal chen): po rin po che la zhon zhing gling pa dag du'ang 'gro/ mi'i sdug bsngal dang phongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ 'on kyang nyes pa de dag
315b7(phal chen): gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// de tsam gyis mi'i lus las yongasu 'das pa ma yin te/ nam mi'i lus spangs te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe ni/
315b8(phal chen): tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang na gnas shing / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mthong te/ de dag du yang 'gro/ tshangs pa'i gzugs brnyan yang kun tu ston ste/ mi zhes kyang
316a1(phal chen): @#/ mi brjod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po bzung ba yan chad/ byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la/
316a2(phal chen): zhon zhing / 'gro ba thams cad du rgyu ba'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ yang dag pa'i lam du zhugs pas kun nas nyon mongs pas de dag
316a3(phal chen): gi gos pa mi 'gyur ro// 'on kyang de tsam gyis bdun po rnams la nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa rnams las yang dag par 'das shes mi bya ste/ nam sbyor ba can gyis spyod pa thams
316a4(phal chen): cad spangs te/ sa bdun po nas sa brgyad pa yongs su non par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su dag pa la zhon zhing 'gro ba thams cad de rgyu ba'i tshe/ kun nos nyon mongs
316a5(phal chen): pa'i nyes pa thams cad kyang rab tu shes te/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba kun nas 'das pas nye ba dag gis kun nas nyon mongs gyur ces mi bya'o// kye rgyal po'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i
316a6(phal chen): sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ni 'dod chag la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las kyang shin tu shas che bar 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di
316a7(phal chen): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' di ni nyon mongs pa can nas kyang mi bya/ nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// de ci'i byor zhe na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyu ba med pas nyon mong
316a8(phal chen): ba tsan zhes mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mngon par 'dod cing bsam pa yongasu ma rdzogs pas/ nyon mongs pa med pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// de ltar byang chub sems
316b1(phal chen): dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pa'i lus kyis las dang ldan pa yin/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yong su dag pa'i ngag gis las
316b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa yin/ lhag pa'i bsam pas yongasasu dag pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan yin/ de ni 'di ltar mi dge ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pas smad pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas
316b3(phal chen): pa/ de dag thams cad kyis thams cad de yang dag par 'das pa yin/ gang 'di dag dge ba'i las yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sngags pa de dag gis rje su rtag tu
316b4(phal chen): rgyan ma chad par 'brang ba yin/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang ji ltar mngon par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad kyang lhan gyi grub
316b5(phal chen): por rab tu byung ngo // de stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na slo dpon tu bya ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
316b6(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' ma tog par su de dang bsam pa 'am sbyor bas mnyam pa med do// 'di ltar yang dag 'di dag
316b7(phal chen): bsam gtan rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dag dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa dag dang / rnam par mthar pa rnams kyang thams cad kyi thams cad
316b8(phal chen): du bsgom pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo tshul gyis mngon du gyur te/ 'on kyang da dung byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la de lta ba bzhin tu rnam par smin pas longs rdzogs pa ma gan/
317a1(phal chen): de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems skyed pa thams cad la shes rab dang thabs dang / sgom pa'i
317a2(phal chen): stobs yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sngon pas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa rab tu thob bo// de de byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe byang chub
317a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhog te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin don shin tu bsam pa zhes bya ba dang / khyad par
317a4(phal chen): gyi blo gros zhes bya ba dang / rab tu phye ba'i don gyi mdzod ces bya ba dang / chos ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par byed pa zhes bya ba dang / rtsa ba shin tu gnas pas rten pa zhes bya ba dang / ye shes
317a5(phal chen): dang rnam par shes pa'i sgo zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su spang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba dang / don sna tshogs kyi mdzod 'khor ba dang
317a6(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo zhes bya ba mnyam par bzhog ste/ de dag la sogs mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes chen po'i sgo ting nge 'dzinas yongasu spong bar byed pa brgya stong phrag bcu
317a7(phal chen): 'tshangs pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de thabs dang shes rab kyis yongasu spangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag tu thobs pa dang / snying rje dang snying rtse ba'i 'bus nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa
317a8(phal chen): yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa yin/ shes rab dang ye shes kyis rnam par spyad pa'i sa sngon gsum du gyur pa yin/ de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas
317b1(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ lus kyi las tshad med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba rab tu 'byung ngo // yid kyi las mtshan ma dang shin tu rnam par spang ba'i mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pas snang bar byung ba'i tshad med
317b2(phal chen): pa rab tu 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta ltag go/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i tshe/ 'ang byang chub
317b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis las tshad med pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las yang dag par 'das nas ci rab po// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i
317b4(phal chen): snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar yin te de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi chos la dmigs pa'i mthur zad kyis/ rang gyis blo rnam par spyad pa ni ma yin no// byang chub
317b5(phal chen): sems dpa' sa bdun po 'di la ni rang gis blo spyod yul rnam par spod pa rab tu thob pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi 'phrog pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di
317b6(phal chen): lta ste dper na/ rgyal po'i rgyal rig skyes pa'i rgyal po mtshan ma dang ldan pa ni/ btsas ma thag tu blon po'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon gyi/ rang gi blo rnam par spad pa ni ma
317b7(phal chen): yin no// nam nar son par gyur pa de'i tshe/ rang gi blon po thams cad kyi byed pa'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpo' 'ang sem
317b8(phal chen): bskyed ma thag tu/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid chen pos nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ rang gi blos rnam par brtag pa ni ma yin no//
318a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang gi yul gyi ye shes kyis stobs kyi shugs kyis/ nyan thos dang
318a2(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi byed pa'i tshul gyi las shin tu 'das pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sra so de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa 'di la
318a3(phal chen): gnas pa'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las zab cing dben pa la rgyu ba med dang / ldan pa'ang rab tu thob pa yin te/ khyad par gong du rtsal ba'i brtson 'grus dag yongasu mi gtong
318a4(phal chen): ngo yongs su rtsal brtson 'grus des kyang / yang dag par mthar pa la gnas te/ khyad par gong mo shin tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du'ang mi byed do//
318a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa gang yan chad du byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug/ byang chub
318a6(phal chen): dpa'i rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa yan cad byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa la snyom par 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
318a7(phal chen): sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems kyi ska cig re re la yang 'gog pa la yang sgom par 'jug ste/ 'grogs pas mngon du byas shes ni mo bya'o// de bas
318a8(phal chen): na de ni drimaM gyi mi khyab pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang ldan zhes bya ba yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang gnas
318b1(phal chen): pa la yang dag pa'i mngon du mi byed pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru chen por zhags te/ rgal ba'i thabs dang khas shing
318b2(phal chen): rlung la mkhas pa/ chu la mkhas pa ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i nyes pas mi gos so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i
318b3(phal chen): sa bdun pa 'di la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gru chen por zhugs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas kyang gnas pa la yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du yang mi byed do// de
318b4(phal chen): ltar de ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs thob pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin da shes kyi stobs dang shags kyis mngon par grub pa'i blo dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs dang shag
318b5(phal chen): chen pos 'khor ba'i sgo yang ston la mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa dang yang mi 'bral ba yin/ 'khor mang pos kun nas bkor bar snang yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sem
318b6(phal chen): dben pa'ang rab tu thob pa yin/ khams gsum du skye ba'ang smon lam gyi dbang gi mngon par bsgrub la/ 'jig rten gyi nyes pas kyang mi gos pa yin/ zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba'ang yin
318b7(phal chen): la thabs kyis kyang rab tu 'bar te/ de ltar 'bar yang tshig par yang mi 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la'ang yongasu 'jug pa nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
318b8(phal chen): kyang phyir mi ldog pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthil du'ang phyin la/ bdud kyi lam bzhi las kyang yang dag par 'das la bdud kyi yul dang / spyod yul yang dag par
319a1(phal chen): ston pa yin/ mu stegs can gyis gnas thams cad na'ang 'dug/ bar snang ba la sangs rgyas kyi mu stegs kyi gnas kyi bsam pa yang mi stong pa yin
319a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad yang ldan par snang la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul la yang dag par gzhol ba yin/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding
319a3(phal chen): dang mi 'am ci dang / mi dang mi yin pa dang / rgya sprin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad las lha'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub shin tu bsgrub pa'ang rab tu thob pa/ chos la
319a4(phal chen): dga' ba'i yid la bya ba'ang spong ba yin te/ de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang /
319a5(phal chen): smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur ste/ lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs rgyas brgya phrog mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas
319a6(phal chen): bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag
319a7(phal chen): khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
319a8(phal chen): mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos rim 'gro byed do// bkur sti byed do// sti stang byed do// mchod pa byed do// nam bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen
319b1(phal chen): sman dang / yo byad kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongasu 'dul lo// dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang dag par mchod pa byed des/ dge ba'i
319b2(phal chen): rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag la zhe sa dang / rim 'gros nan tan
319b3(phal chen): du chos ston pa nyan cing len to 'dzin to// thos nas kyang mnor ba'i snyom par 'jug pa dang shes rab dang / ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu brtson par byed de// nan tan gyi yongs su 'dzin
319b4(phal chen): to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis snyan pa yang dag par 'dzin to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon rtog par yongs su dri bas kyang phyir mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ de
319b5(phal chen): sngon pas kyang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i chos kyis bzod pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba yin/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring song ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
319b6(phal chen): de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskul pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag
319b7(phal chen): khrig tu phrag du ma dang / bskal ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig btu sgo phrag du me dang / bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya gling phrag du mar shin tu dag
319b8(phal chen): yongs su byang bar gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ gser gyis le sbram de nyid rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu smras pa ni/ sngon pas kyang rgyan gyi rnam par gzha
320a1(phal chen): dang bzhin gyi mi nub pa dang / tshe 'od gsal zhing dang bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po byang
320a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba 'di la gnas pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyis bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang ches shin tu byang ba dang / ches 'od gsal zhing dang ba
320a3(phal chen): 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i 'od ni skar ma'i tshogs dang / zla ba'i 'od kyi mi 'phrog
320a4(phal chen): shing 'dzan bu'i gling na/ sman gyi bag yod pa thams cad kyang shin tu rkam par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la gnas pa'i byang
320a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/ phyin ci log bzhi dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rlon gyi
320a6(phal chen): rnam par thams cad yongasu skems so// de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa shas phye ba yin te/ lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su mi bsgrub ma
320a7(phal chen): yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam kyis sa ring du song ba zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa mdor bstan pa'o//
320a8(phal chen): de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phang cher ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur du 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la mngon par rtog pa'i ye shes yang dag par
320b1(phal chen): bstan pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongasu dri ba mi zad pa yin sems can skyon med par shin tu bzla bar bya ba la mkhas pa yin
320b2(phal chen): te/ sbyin pa'am dag bstan pa'am/ don bsgrub pa'am don mthun pa 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams kyi mchog tu gyur/
320b3(phal chen): gtso bor 'gyur/ thu bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur bas nas/ thams
320b4(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam te/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid
320b5(phal chen): la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang //
320b6(phal chen): mi 'jig pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la
320b7(phal chen): bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /
320b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gnas par bya ba dang /
321a1(phal chen): sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnam
321a2(phal chen): par 'byed pa dang / lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su ston pa dang / lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i
321a3(phal chen): 'khor bye ba brgya stong yang dag par snyan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu brtsom mo// de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu chen gyi rnam pa smon lam
321a4(phal chen): gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phral te/ de dag gis lus sam 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul lam/ dbyangs sam spyod pa'am rgyan tam/ byin gyi rlabs sam/
321a5(phal chen): mos pa smon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pargya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba
321a6(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyi kyang bgrang dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don nyid yang dag par rtag par bya ba dang / stan par bya ba'i phyir
321a7(phal chen): de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ye shes zab mo dam tshig gi rjes snyeg shing / sa drug rtog pa'i yid ldan bdag nyid mnyam po zhag pa// shes rab thabs
321a8(phal chen): gnyis rung du 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub// mkhas pas sa bdun spyod pa dam pa yongs su gno ni// ston pa tshad med mi smon snying rje byams dang ldan// chos nyid mnyam pa'i
321b1(phal chen): rjes 'gro sangs rgyas mchod pa byed// shes pas shes byas bsod nams stobs kyi mi ngom pas/ de phyir mkhas pa bdun pa'i sa phyogs yongasu gnon// khams gsum mngon
321b2(phal chen): bar bsgrub byed shin tu dben pa thog/ nyon mongs stobs rnams ni yang 'gro ba ni mos pa// mig yor sgyu ma'i rmi lam mi gnyis chos spyod pa// snying rje la spyod ston pa mkhas pas bdun
321b3(phal chen): po gnon// namakha'i bsam pas ning rnams yong spyong rnam me rtog rgyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan zhing mig g.ye chos dang ldan// brjod pa'i dbyangs bral 'gro ba dgrar bya don du gnyer/
321b4(phal chen): skad cig sems kyis rgyal ba'i kun mkhyen yang dag gzhol// chos rnams 'di dag spyad pas snang ba thob 'gyur bas// 'gro ba'i don 'dod sa mchog yongasu gnan ces bya// de dgra sa
321b5(phal chen): 'di gnas shing mtha' yas sems can spyod// bde gshegs tshad med las mkhyen rnam par spyod pa byed// zhing dang bskal pa chos grangs sna tshogs du ma dang // mos dang bsam
321b6(phal chen): ba sems dang spyod pa sna tshogs dang // theg pa gsum po bstan pa tshad med yang dag 'jug/ bdag gis sems can de dag yongs su smin pa zhes// de dag de ltar rnam phye shes comam ldan pa
321b7(phal chen): spod lam bzhi por ston par brtson zhing thabs dang ldan// sems kyi ska cig kun la byang chub yon tan bsgrubs// pha rol phyin pa bcur 'jug yongasu rdzogs par byed// sems
321b8(phal chen): skyed yongs bsngo de ni skye'o// tshul khrims nyon mongs zhi ba 'azod pa mi tshig pa// brtson 'grus de nas khyad par gong du rtsom pa de// lam las ma 'phrul de ni legs ldan
322a1(phal chen): bsam gtan no// mi skye bzod la rdul med mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog/ da dung sngon 'dod bsngo ba de ni smon lam te/ mi mthun stobs yin shin tu rtog pa'i
322a2(phal chen): ye shes so// de ltar byang chub yon tan thams cad skad cig ldan// dang por dmig pas yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ gnyis la dri ma bsal phyir gsum pa legs
322a3(phal chen): bsal bas// bzhi la lam gyis lnga la mnyam pa nyid kyis te// mi skye ba'i snang bas mkhas pa'i drag po rnam par 'phel/ bdun po 'dir phyir yon tan mtha' dag kun rdzogs par/
322a4(phal chen): smon lam du ma sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa byed// ci'i phyir zhe na ye shes spyod pa 'di grub po// de ni brgyad pa yan chad kun du rnam dag 'gyur 'da' dkar phyin dka' ye shes mang po'i
322a5(phal chen): las kyi 'grub/ zhing gnyis par mtshams ji ltar yongasu rgal dka' bzhin/ bdud spod rgyal po chags med ci bzhin te/ lam la gnas pa yin gyis thams cad brtan ma 'das/ brgyad
322a6(phal chen): pa ye shes sa dang gang tshe ldan gyur pa/ de tshe sems kyis yul 'das ye shes las la gnas// tshangs pa 'gro ba lta yang ma'i bdag nyid min// de bzhin mkhas pa pad+mo bzhin du mi chag
322a7(phal chen): spyod/ 'di la gnas pa nyon mongs sna tshogs rab tu gda'// de nyon mongs spyod med bya ba'ang thob pa min/ lam la gnas kyang de 'dra'i nyon mongs spyod med min/ rgyal ba'i ye
322a8(phal chen): shes mngon 'dod de bas zad pa min// 'jig rten bzod dang las gnas rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ mkhas pas rtsug lag rgyus la gnas te shes byas dang / bsam gtan mngon
322b1(phal chen): shes stobs sgom ldan par 'gyur ba rnams// de bas gsal 'gyur ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs mngon par sgrub// nyan thos rang rgyal spyod las yongasu 'das/ bdun pa'i byang chub sems
322b2(phal chen): dpa' spyod la mkhas pa gnas// sngon bcad bsam pas yid kyis 'di la ye shes kyis// nar son mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i bu bzhin no// shin tu zab dang ldan pas gong da rtsom byed de//
322b3(phal chen): 'gog pa'i sems dang ldan yang mngon par mi byed do// ji ltar rgya mtshor phyin zhing gru chen zhugs 'gyur la// chu tshul thams cad sngos grub gra la skyon mi 'gyur// de dag sngon pas thabs
322b4(phal chen): dang shes rab mchog dang ldan// shes dka' 'gro ba kun tu shes spyod yin tan mang // sangs rgyas bye ba yang du bsam pa dag pas mtsho// gser sbram de nyid rin chen mang pos spras
322b5(phal chen): pa yin// 'di la gnas pa'i mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog gi 'od// sred pa'i chu rnams ji ltar nyi bzhin yongs su skem// sa mchog 'di la gnas pa dbang sgyur rgyal por 'gyur//
322b6(phal chen): ye shes dam pa'i 'bras bu ston la mthu yod mkhas// 'dod na brtson 'gras dam pa'i stobs dang ldan gyur pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'tshang ba dag/ phyogs rnas
322b7(phal chen): kun tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong // yan cad smon lam yon tan mchog can tshad kyang med// 'di nis mchog bdun pa ste/ rang rgyal dbang la spyod pa dang / 'jig
322b8(phal chen): nyon kun gyi shes pa dang/ ya ma dang shes rab gyung ba'o// rid du song ba nas byab ste// byang chubasams dpa'is 'ad 'o// shin
323a1(phal chen): chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// / bam po lnga bcu'o//
323a2(phal chen): mkhas pa'i spyod pa dam pa de 'dra thos nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan brtson pa mang po/ bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras rnams la mchod byed/ me tog phreng ba rgyal
323a3(phal chen): mtshan pa dan yid 'ong // spos phye ma rin chen yid 'ong brgyan pa/ dbyig gi spros pa'i gdug rab khrag khrig du ma/ phreng ba'i sprin gyi dam pa'i char yang mngon par 'bebs/
323a4(phal chen): lha'i bu mos yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs// du ma'i bsil snyan gar dang mchog dang ldan dbyangs// bde bar gshegs dang rang rgyal sras mchod pa'i don du// thub pa'i
323a5(phal chen): yon tan rmad du byung ba brjod byed// thams cad gzigs pa rkang gnyis khya mchog gtso bo// sangs rgyas spyod yul 'gro la phan phyir don mdzad// dbyangs srin yid du bA rab
323a6(phal chen): tu 'byung ba'i// rnga dang bsil snyan sna tshogs rnams las 'byung // skra'i rtse la bde gshegs brgya stong snyed// 'ga' 'ga' khrag khrig bye ba rdal bas de mang // zhing mchog
323a7(phal chen): dam pa mnyam pa med pa dag na// khyu mchog rnam ni rdul bral chos rnams ston mdzad// spu tse cig la 'jam klas dam pa'i zhing mang // gling ban du ma brgya mtsho chen kun nas/
323a8(phal chen): 'khor yug bye ba de bzhin ri rab thams cad/ so so'i tshul dang ldan par kun kyang snang 'gyur/ sgra'i rtse mo de la 'gro rgyud drug po// yi dgas byol song mi dang sems can dmyal
323b1(phal chen): lha dang / gnod sbyin srin po kra dang lha me mang po// sna tshogs las kyis yul kun kyang spyod bye// rdul bral kun gyis ning gi spyod yul kun/ 'khor lo dam pa'i mchog
323b2(phal chen): kyang de'i tshe 'khor lo gyur/ 'gro ba'i 'du shes sems can dang de bzhin spyod pa// bde gshegs gsung gi dam pas kun stan byas/ sems can lus la bde gshegs
323b3(phal chen): shing mang sna tshogs/ zhing la sems can rmad snyed lus kyang de bzhin/ lho dang ma'i lam rgyud de bzhin sna tshogs// mkhyen nas bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams kun ston//
323b4(phal chen): shin tu yang ba'i zhing la 'du shes 'phrar gyur/ rdal gyi mtshan me dag la 'du shes yang 'gyur/ de la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul// 'jig rten kun gyi
323b5(phal chen): brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur// che ba nyid dbyangs de skad du/ snyan pa'i dbyings su grags gyur nas// 'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhing shi/ gsung gi mchog la dga' zhing
323b6(phal chen): gnas// 'khor rnam zhi bar shes gyur nas/ rnam 'gro la zla bas yang smras pa/ sa brgyad pa'i rnam pa dang / de la 'jug pa stan pa mdzod// byang chub sems dpa' de
323b7(phal chen): rje'i snying pos smras pa// kye rgyalnga sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa thabs dang /
323b8(phal chen): shes rab kyis len shin tu spang ba/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa/ smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa'i stobs shugs can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlab kyi byin
324a1(phal chen): du rlabs pa/ rang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas
324a2(phal chen): kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang / ldan pa bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyis stobs kyi mngon
324a3(phal chen): par 'phags pa/ snying rje dang / snying rtse ba chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba'i sbyor ba dang // ye shes kyi lam chad med pa'i song ba/ de
324a4(phal chen): chos thams cad thog ma nas ma byung ba nyid la yang dag par ji ltar ba bzhin du 'jug go/ ma skye ba dang mtshan nyid med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang /
324a5(phal chen): thug pa med pa dang / mi rgya ba dang mi ldog pa dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dang / thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog
324a6(phal chen): pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la'ang yang dag pa ji ltar bzhin tu 'jug ste/ des rnam pa thams cad du sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa
324a7(phal chen): dang / 'du shes dang bral zhing thog pa med pa la na mkha' dang 'dra zhing na mkha'i rang bzhin du khong du chud pas mi skye ba'i chos la zod pa thob ces bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
324a8(phal chen): dag de lta bu'i rjod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gnas zab mo shes par dka' ba
324b1(phal chen): mi dad pa mtshan ma thams cad bral ba 'du shes kyi bgegs thams cad phyir ldog pa tshad med pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'phrog pa dben pa thams cad
324b2(phal chen): mngon du gyur pa/ shin tu thob pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa mthar 'gog pa'i bar
324b3(phal chen): da mnyam par gzhag pa ni sgyu ba dang / sems g.yo ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad bral ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' 'ang
324b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral te/ lhun gyi grub pa'i chos nyid thob cing / lus dang ngag dang sems kyi brtsol ba
324b5(phal chen): shin tu dben pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la gnyid log pa'i rmi lam de bdag chu klung chen pos khyer ba mnyam pa byed la
324b6(phal chen): de nas ci phyin du 'bed ba cing rtsol ba chen po rtsom pa las/ de 'bed cing stsogs pa chen po de nyid kyis sad par gyur na/ de sad ma thag tu 'bed cing rtsol ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyu ro//
324b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyis yang nyon mongs pa'i chu klung chen po bzhir sems can mang po dong bar shes nas/ 'bed cing rtsol ba yongs rtsom mo/
324b8(phal chen): brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan byang chub sems dpa' sa mi g.yo ba thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ de'i gnyis po rgyu ba'am/ mtshan ma rgyu ba dag kyang
325a1(phal chen): thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye shin gnas pa ni/
325a2(phal chen): 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su mi rgyu ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang
325a3(phal chen): sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa yongs su rgyu ba rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du yongasu mi rgyu ba ma yin te/ des sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba'am/ byang chub la
325a4(phal chen): yongasu rgyu ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas la yongasu rgyu ba 'am/ nyan thos la yongasu rgyu ba 'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs
325a5(phal chen): su rgyu ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba la yongs su rgya ba yang mi rgya na/ 'jig rten pa'i yongs su rgya ba yongs su rgyab lta ci smos/
325a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar mi g.yo ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs la gnas pa de'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud de la/
325a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad/ de la 'di 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legaso
325a8(phal chen): legs so// sangs rgyas kyi rjes su rtog par bya ba la/ 'di ni don dam pa'i bzod pa'ang yin na/ 'on kyang rigs kyi bu nged kyi stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
325b1(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongasu btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsom shig/
325b2(phal chen): bzod pa'i sgo 'di ma btang shig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ khyed kyi de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa thob kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag zhi ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba ma yin
325b3(phal chen): te/ nyon mongs sna tshogs yongs su rgyu bar 'gyur na/ de ltar rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi yongs su mnar pa la soms/ 'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyi
325b4(phal chen): sngon gyi smon lam gyi sems can gyis don yongs su grub par bya bar btab pa dang / ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyi mi khyab pa dran par bgyi shig/ 'di ltar yang rigs kyi
325b5(phal chen): bu 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung yang rung ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid 'di ni de bzhin du 'du
325b6(phal chen): pa ste 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyi tshe brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di thob bo//
325b7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khyed nged kyi lus tshad med pa dang / ye shes tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang / ye shes mngon par grub pa med pa dang /
325b8(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la ltos/ khyod kyi kyang de bzhin du mngon par 'grub par bya dgos so//
326a1(phal chen): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu gang de ltar chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa de'i khyod kyis snang ba cig pur zad de// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
326a2(phal chen): gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ yongs su mtha' yas par song la yongs su mtha' yas bsgrub te/ de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang
326a3(phal chen): bgrang bar dkas/ de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub pa skyed cing / 'di la yang phyogs bcu'i zhing tshad med pa dang / sems can tshad med pa dang / chos rnam pa
326a4(phal chen): dbye ba tshad med pa la ltos te/ de dag thams cad ma nor bar bgrang bar bgyis shig ces te/ kye rgyas pa'i sras de dag de ltar ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub semasadapa'
326a5(phal chen): la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa gang yin byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rnam par phye ba'i tshul mngon par sgrub pa'i
326a6(phal chen): las tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gzhan du med pa de dag nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khyed kyi sre ches pa dang / khong du chud par bya na gal ste/
326a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i de sngon par bsgrub pa'i sgor zhugs par mdzad zin na/ de nyid de'i mtha' las rgal ba'i mya ngan las 'das
326a8(phal chen): par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis dgos pa'am rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de la ye shes mngon par
326b1(phal chen): sgrub pa'i lam gang gi skad cig tu mngon par bsgrub pas kyang / thog ma sems bskyed pa'i phyin chad sa bdun pa la zhugs shing rjes su song ba'i yongs su rtsom pa'i bar snga ma de dag
326b2(phal chen): gis bcu'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gis cha dang / khrag khrig gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya'i cha dang / khrag khrig stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /
326b3(phal chen): ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang rgyu yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas sman pa rtsam gyi bar du mi mchog pa de nyid du tshad med pa'i ye shes
326b4(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pas nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad lus cig gis mngon par bsgrub pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par gyur gyis 'di la
326b5(phal chen): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod mthu yongs su sdud de/ dbyangs sngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa da ye shes
326b6(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / skye ba mngon par bsgrub po tshad med pa dang / zhing yongs su sbyangs pa tshad med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa dang /
326b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba tshad med pa dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa tshad med pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i shugs tshad med pa dang / 'khor gyi
326b8(phal chen): dkyil 'khor tshad med pa rnam 'phye ba dang / tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis las kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi mthu mi skul ba'i tshul/
327a1(phal chen): gyis yang dag par bsgrub bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di sa ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i glu ni/ rgya mtsho chen por ma byin gyi bar du spyod cing 'dra
327a2(phal chen): dbya ba yin/ rgya mtsho chen po la zhugs ma thag rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi gsungs ched du skyod dgos pa yin/ des rgya mtsho chen po la nyin cig gi ci mchod pa de ni sngon ched du skyed cing 'gro bas
327a3(phal chen): lo rgyar yang de ltar tshad med par phyin par mi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs yang dag par bsags pa
327a4(phal chen): theg pa chen po'i grur zhugs pa yang / yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgya mtshor phyin nas/ yud tsam cig tu lhun gyi grub pa'i ye shes kyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ci
327a5(phal chen): rtsam yang dag par gnon pa de ni sngon gyi ched du bya ba'i lam gyi bskal pa rgya stong du yang dag par gnon par mi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa 'di la
327a6(phal chen): thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas ye shes kyi bsgrub pa lhun gyi grub pa la shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i blos/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam par
327a7(phal chen): spyod cing 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba yang rnam par spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa yang rnam par spyod do// de 'jig rten ji ltar 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes so// 'jig
327a8(phal chen): rten ji ltar 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes so// las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so// las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur
327b1(phal chen): pa'i khams chung ba'ang rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams che ba'ang rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so// 'dod pa'i khams rnam par bye ba 'ang
327b2(phal chen): rab tu shes so// gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams chung ba 'am rab tu shes so// che ba'ang rab tu shes so// tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so// rnam par phye ba/
327b3(phal chen): ba'ang rab tu shes so// de khams gsum rnam par spyad pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan la/ sems can lus rab tu dbye ba la ma
327b4(phal chen): shing / zhing gis lhun rnam par dbye ye shes la mkhas pa dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la blo shin tu gtong ste/ de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
327b5(phal chen): phyir sems can rnams kyis skye ba dang yongs su grub pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur rang gis lus byin gyis rlob po// de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par bkang ni/
327b6(phal chen): sems can gyi pos 'ji lta ba bzhin du/ rang gi lus mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rjes su 'brang bas/ skye bar bya ba'i phyir sngon par bsgrub te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'di
327b7(phal chen): rten gyis khams gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum bcu'am/ bani bcu'am/ lnga bcu gnas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du/
327b8(phal chen): med pa'i bar dag rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rang gis lus mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir sngon par bsgrub po//
329a1(phal chen): de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi kyici gnas kyang mi gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa dag gis de bzhin gshes
329a2(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor dag tu yang snang bar phyin pa yin/ de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par phye ba dang / mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang / 'khor gyi
329a3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor de dag tu de ltar rang gis lus ston te/ de dge sbyong gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dge sbyong gyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to// bram ze'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
329a4(phal chen): bram ze'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to// rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyal rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to// rjes rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rje
329a5(phal chen): rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to// khyim bdag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khyim bdag gis kha dog dang gzugs ston to// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyis 'khor
329a6(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyal po chen po bzhis rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor gis dkyil 'khor du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i kha dog dang gzug
329a7(phal chen): ston// de bzhin tu mtshe ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor gyi 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor
329a8(phal chen): dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas 'og min gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du de dag kha dog dang gzugs ston to// de nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
329b1(phal chen): la nyan thos kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to// byang chub
329b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de
329b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i ci snyed pa de dag gi sems can rnams kyi mos pa
329b4(phal chen): rab tu mang ba de dag thams cad du rang gi lus de lta de ltar rnam par bye ba yongs su ston to// de'i lus kyis rnam pa dang rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang rnam par bral ste/
329b5(phal chen): lus mnyam nyid thob pas sems can gyi lus rab tu shes so// ning gis lus dang las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub
329b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi sras dang / chos kyi lus dang rnas pa'i lus kyang rab tu shes so// de sems can rnams kyi sems dang 'as
329b7(phal chen): pa sngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes par 'dod ni sems can gyi lus nam kha'i lus su byin gyi rlob po// de bzhin du shing gi sras rnam par smin pa'i lus dang can thos kyi lus dang /
329b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / le shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus kyang rnam pa'i sras su byin gyi rlob po// des sems can
