356a3(phal chen): ba dang / sprul pa thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa dang / rnam par mi 'god pa'i yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// de sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlab yang dag par ji lta ba bden
356a4(phal chen): tu rab tu shes so// chos kyi byin gyi rlab pa dang / dge 'dun gyi byin gyi rlabs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / dus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
356a5(phal chen): mchod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gang 'di de
356a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste/ spyod pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ skye ba dang / 'ad
356a7(phal chen): 'phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ skyem phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ mngon par 'byung ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ mngon par byang chub pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye
356a8(phal chen): shes sam/ rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ sku tshe'i tshad byin gyi rlab pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes
356b1(phal chen): sam/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ bstan pa gnas pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
356b2(phal chen): tu shes so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags pa la 'jug pa'i gnas 'di lta ste/ sku'i gsang ba 'am gsung gi
356b3(phal chen): gsang ba 'am/ thugs kyi gsang ba 'am/ dus dang dus ma yin pa'i thugs su chud pa'i gsang ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'i gsang ba'am/ sems can snga ba dang tshar
356b4(phal chen): bcad pa'i gangs pa 'am/ theg pa dang tha dad pa'i gsang ba 'am/ sems can gyi spyod pa dang po rnam par bye ba gsang ba 'am/ las dang bya ba la 'jug pa gsang ba 'am/ sbed pa dang po
356b5(phal chen): po mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa thugs su chud pa gsang ba de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gang 'di dag bskal pa la 'jug pa'i ye she
356b6(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ bskal pa cig la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa grangs med pa'i bskal pa la bskal pa cig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa
356b7(phal chen): grangs med pa la bskal pa grangs med pa yang dag par 'jug/ skad cig la bskal pa dang / bskal pa la skad cig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa la bskal pa ma
356b8(phal chen): yin par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa
357a1(phal chen): yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i banal pasangs rgyas med pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang 'das pa dang / mthongs pa dang
357a2(phal chen): da ltar byung ba la da ltar byung ba la/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i bskal par 'jug cing / ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa/
357a3(phal chen): ring po la bskal pa zung ngur yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa thung ngur la bskal pa ring por yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa thams cad la ming du rtag par yang dag par 'jug
357a4(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin de rab tu shes so// gang 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs su chud pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste/ skra'i rtse mo la 'jug pa'i ye shes
357a5(phal chen): sam// rdul shin du phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ zhing mang por mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ sems can gyi lus dang sems can mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i
357a6(phal chen): ye shes sam/ thams cad du khyab pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ sgril zhi ba la spyod pa la 'jug pa'i yang dag par snyan pa'i ye shes sam/ lugs dang mthun pa'i spyod
357a7(phal chen): pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes ma/ lugs dang mi mthun pa'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ 'jig rten bam du rung ba dang / bsam du mi rung ba
357a8(phal chen): dang / rnam par shes par rung ba dang / rnam par shes par mi rung ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam/ nyan thos kyis shes par bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
357b1(phal chen): shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshes pas mkhyen par bya ba'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad kyang yang
357b2(phal chen): dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes shin tu yang ba tshad med pas sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
357b3(phal chen): sa khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyang tshad med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyi mi
357b4(phal chen): khyab pa zhes bya ba rab tu thob po// sgrib pa med pa'i zhes bya ba dang / rnam par dag pa rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang / sgo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba
357b5(phal chen): dang / 'khor lo thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po zhes bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor snang ba zhe
357b6(phal chen): bya ba dang / yul ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu thob po// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa
357b7(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rab tu thob ste/ de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag dang / gzungs brgya
357b8(phal chen): stong dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa brgya stong rab tu thob po// ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i blo dang / tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i dran pa mkhas pa yin/ de'i phyogs bcu'i
358a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa las skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang /
358a2(phal chen): chos kyi sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin to// mos par byed do// yang dag par len to// bdag gir byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dpengs rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po sprin las rnam par
358a3(phal chen): skye ba'i chu'i phung po chen po ni/ rgya mtsho chen po me tog par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyi bzod pa 'am/ bdag gir bya ba'am/ blang ba'am bzung bar mi nus so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du
358a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang chos kyi sbyin chen po de dag ni sems can thams
358a5(phal chen): cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad/ sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa'i bar la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gi kyang bzod pa'am/ blang ba'am
358a6(phal chen): yang dag par bzung ba 'am/ bdag gi bya ba slab pa ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag thams cad la mos par
358a7(phal chen): byed do// yang dag par len to// yang dag par 'dzin to// bdag gir byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni klu'i rgyal po cig sprin chen po yang
358a8(phal chen): bzod do// len to 'dzin to// bdag grir byed do// klu'i rgyal po chen po gnyis dang / gsum nas tshad med pa'i bar gyi sprin chen po dag kyang / ska cig yud tsam gyis bzod do/
358b1(phal chen): len to 'dzin to// bdag gir byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po de tshad med par rgya che zhing yang ba'i phyir ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i chos
358b2(phal chen): kyi sprin 'di la gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa cig las kyang ska cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang /
358b3(phal chen): chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa rnams bzod do// yang dag par len to// yang dag par 'dzin to// bdag gir byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa/ gnyis dang / gsum nas tshad me
358b4(phal chen): pa'i bar dag las kyang ska cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa bzod do// yang dag par 'dzi to// ka/ yA
358b5(phal chen): dag par len to// bdag gir byed do// de'i phyir sa 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol bas zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin
358b6(phal chen): gshegs pa ji snyed gcig las byang chub sems dpa' ska cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyis 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po bzod par byed
358b7(phal chen): pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / yang dag par len cing bdag gir byed pa de dag bgrang bar nus sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
358b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa 'di srid cig las/ byang chub sems dpa' ska cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po bzod cing /
359a1(phal chen): yang dag par len pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin cing bdag gir byed do// zhes grangs kyi shin tu brtan pa'i tshul du bgrang bar ma yin no// 'on kyang
359a2(phal chen): dpe tsam du bstan par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste dper na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gyi rdul shin du phra ba
359a3(phal chen): sbed na/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can sems cig cig thos pa 'dzin pa'i bzung rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mo'i bra
359a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dge slong rnam par rgyal ba chen po zhes bya ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bring ba nyan thos chen po thos pa 'dzin
359a5(phal chen): ba'i mchog tu phyin par 'gyur ba la rnam pa de lta bu'i thos pa 'dzin pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang sems can cig po de dang ldan par 'gyur te/ sems can cig po de ci 'dra ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi kham
359a6(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur la/ gcig gi gang gzung ba de bzhin gyi bzung na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag gis 'dzin pa'i shes
359a7(phal chen): pa de dag tshad med cing mang ba yin mod/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa de ni mang de tshad med do//
359a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyi khong du chud pa dang / yid ches par bya ba na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sem
359b1(phal chen): dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa cig las kyang ska cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba dang 'od dang sprin chen po'i chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len te/
359b2(phal chen): yang dag par 'dzin to// bdag gir byed do// chos kyi snang ba dang / sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin pa'i shes pa de la thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
359b3(phal chen): stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ brgya phrag stong gi char dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang /
359b4(phal chen): dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas bsgrub pa tsam gyi bar du yang mi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa cig la ci lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma dag tu rdul shin
359b5(phal chen): du phra ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las ska cig yud tsam thang cig/
359b6(phal chen): tu/ chos kyi snang ba dang / 'od dang sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len to// yang dag par 'dzin to// bdag gir byed do// de bas
359b7(phal chen): nas 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs kyi
359b8(phal chen): snying rje dang / snying rje chen po'i sgron chos kyi snang ba chen po rab tu sgrog pa 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog pa mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang mi 'jig pa'i klog rnam par 'gyur ba 'od zer chen po rlu
360a1(phal chen): gshin du spyod pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sbyin kyai bsdug pas kun nas leb pa lngas sna tshogs kyi sbyin gyi grong yang dag par sngon pas
360a2(phal chen): sgra chen po rab tu sgrog pa/ bdud kyi 'khor thams cad shin du mar spyod pa yongs su spang ste/ skad cig yud tsam pang cig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snga ma de dag tu rdul shin du phra ba ji snyed pa de
360a3(phal chen): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rgyas par bkang ste/ dge ba'i bdud rtsi'i
360a4(phal chen): rgyun gyi char chen pos bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa lang ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyi me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// de bas na 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o//
360a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams cig tu yang dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste/
360a6(phal chen): 'pho ba yum gyi bskur bzhugs pa dang snyun bzhugs pa dang / tshe dang po mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor
360a7(phal chen): ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can gyi bsam pa'i lam dang / 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin las thams cad byin gyi
360a8(phal chen): rlob po// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis nas 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma de dag rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang / ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig
360b1(phal chen): brgya stong tshad med pa'i bar du yang dga' ldan gnas na gzhugs pa nas bzung ste yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po snyan pa'i bar du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul dang /
360b2(phal chen): 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyi rlong po// de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing / shin du rtag pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po
360b3(phal chen): thob pas/ 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams dog pa yang dag par byin gyi rlab po// yang ba yang dog par byin gyi rlob po// 'dod nas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar
360b4(phal chen): byin gyi rlob po// rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyi rlob po// de bzhin du brgya chen po dang / shin du yangs pa dang / tshad med pa dang / phra ba dang / thag 'bru chen po
360b5(phal chen): dang / snrel bzhi dang / spri'u tshugs dang / gzhi snyam pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang khyu mchog gi mthu chung bas mngon par bsgrub pa de dang der byin gyi rlob
360b6(phal chen): po/ de 'dod na rdul shin du phra ba cig la 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor yug 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa cig kyang byin gyi rlob ste/ rdul shin tu phra ba de'ang
360b7(phal chen): mi 'phel ba bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to// rdul shin du phra ba cig la 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang / gsum dang bzhi dang ldan nas 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i
360b8(phal chen): bar du thams cad 'khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan par byin gyi rlob ste/ rdul shin tu phra ba de yang mi 'phel la bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to//
361a1(phal chen): 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi brgyan yongs su ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i
361a2(phal chen): bar gyi rgyan yongs su ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig ni 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag tu yang yongs su
361a3(phal chen): ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag na sems can gyi khams ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu bsdud de/ sems can gyi khams
361a4(phal chen): la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams cig na sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par bsdad de/ sems can
361a5(phal chen): de dag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod na kra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa cig pa cig tu ston to// 'dod na sangs rgyas
361a6(phal chen): kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i bar du ston to// 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag na rdul shin du phra ba ji snyed kyi yod pa de snyed kyi lus skad
361a7(phal chen): cig yud tsam thang cig tu sprul pa byed do// lus re re la yang de snyed kyi lag pa yongs su ston to// lag pa de dag gis/ kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed de/ lag
361a8(phal chen): pa re res kyang me tog gi phung ba ru klung 'gang ga'i bye ma snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ de dag la mngon par mthor ro// me tog ji lta ba bzhin du sgo dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang/
361b1(phal chen): bye ma dang / nam bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / de bzhin du brgyan thams cad yongs su 'bul lo// lus re re la yang de snyed kyi mgor byin gyi rlog
361b2(phal chen): cing / mgo re re la yang de snyed kyi lce byin gyi rlab te/ de dag gi kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yon tan shin du brjod pa byed do// sems skyed pa re re la yang phyog
361b3(phal chen): bcu rgyas par 'gro ste/ sems skyed pa tsam gyi kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa tshad med pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rgyan gyi bar du byin gyi rlab po// dus gsum gyi lus
361b4(phal chen): tshad med pa yang byin gyi rlob ste/ rang gi lus la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang / rgyan dang yon tan tshad med pa byin gyi rlob
361b5(phal chen): po// 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'du ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus byin gyi rlob po// rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas gtong ste/ seMs
361b6(phal chen): can rnams la gnod par mi byed do// 'dod na chu'i phung po yan chad 'jig rten gyi khams cig byin gyi rlob po// der yang pad+mo chen po byin gyi rlob po// pad+mo chen pos 'od rnam pa
361b7(phal chen): phye bas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa rgyas par gang bar byed de/ de la'ang byang chub kyi shing chen po'i yongs su ston pa nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams
361b8(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i bar du yang dag par ston to// rang gi lus la phyogs bcu'i nor bu dang / klog dang nyi zla'i 'od byin gyi rlong pa nas/ snang ba dang / 'od thams cad kyi bar du byin/
362a1(phal chen): gyi brlob la// nga'i dbugs kyi kyang phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa g.yo bar byed de/ sems can rnams 'jig par yang mi
362a2(phal chen): byed do// phyogs bcur yang rlung gi 'jig pa dang / mes 'jig pa dang / mes 'jig pa yang byin gyi rlob la/ 'dod na sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin du gzugs kyi lus dang / gnas
362a3(phal chen): yongs su rgyan par byin gyi rlob bo// rang gis lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byin gyi rlob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rang gi lus byin gyi rlob po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
362a4(phal chen): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyi rlob bo// rang gi sangs rgyas kyi ning du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byin gyi rlob bo// kye rgyal po'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprid la gnas par
362a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag dang gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa yongs su ston to// de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa'
362a6(phal chen): la la dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gtsang ma'i
362a7(phal chen): gnas su rtog pa kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar de ste byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba'i spyod yul yang de ltar chad med na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam/
362a8(phal chen): kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig yod snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i dra bas lakhor de dag gi sems dang bsam pa'i rgyud shes nas byang chub sem
362b1(phal chen): dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor 'di dag the tsom du gyur nas/ de dag gi the tsom cad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i chu 'phrul rnam par phye ba
362b2(phal chen): cung zad cig mi stan tam/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// / bam po lnga bcu gsum pa'o//
362b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi lhun dang / rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa zhes bya
362b4(phal chen): ba la snyoms par bzhugs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi lhan dang / rang bzhin yang dag
362b5(phal chen): par ston pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dro za dang / lha ma yin dang /
362b6(phal chen): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rtsang ma'i gnas kyi rigasu rtog pa de dag thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos lus
362b7(phal chen): kyi nang na 'khor par rang rang gi shes par gyur te/ der sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par grub par shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i rnam pa dang rgyan ji snyed pa de dag bskal pa khrag khri
362b8(phal chen): 'tshangs pas kyang brjod par mi nus par mthong ste/ der byang chub kyi shing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu khyab pa'i lhun can/ stong gsum khrag khrig yongasu tshang ba tsam du yang
363a1(phal chen): tshad med pa'i yal gcan rtse mo shin du tho byung ste/ de dang rkyen du 'bar bar de'i drung gi snying po byang chub kyi seng ge'i khri rgya chen po byung nas/
363a2(phal chen): de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa'i blo gros thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba snying po byang chub tu gshegs bzhugs par mthong ngo // de ltar de na rgyan ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de
363a3(phal chen): dag ni/ bskal pa khrag khrig yongs su 'tshang bas kyang brjod par dka'o// de co 'phrul chen po 'di stan nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang /
363a4(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs dang / 'jig rten mgon po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs su gtogs pa'i 'khor
363a5(phal chen): de dag thams cad so so'i gnas ji bzhin du bkod pa dang / de nas 'khor de dag thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas mi smra bar/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos de nyid la sem
363a6(phal chen): shing 'khod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i blangs/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge 'dzin 'di'i
363a7(phal chen): mthu rnam par bkod pa 'di ni rmad nga byung ba ngo mtshar chen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ting nge 'dzin ni
363a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi lhun dang / rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smra ba// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'o na ting nge 'dzin
363b1(phal chen): 'di spyod yul dang yul dang rgyun ji lta bu yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ti nge 'dzin 'di la shin tu gom par ni 'dod na/
363b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dra ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung 'ga' ga'i bye ma snyed dam pa de bas kyang mang du rang gi lus la ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin la
363b3(phal chen): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dra ba brgya stong shin du mang ba rab tu thob po// de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus sam/ lus kyi sa
363b4(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal gyi go phang thob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa dag gi kyang shes par slab pa ma yin no// ngag gam ngag gi las kyang
363b5(phal chen): shes par sla ba ma yin/ yid ma yid kyi las kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul shes par sla ba ma yin no// dus gsum la rnam par slab pa shes par sla ba ma yin no// ting
363b6(phal chen): nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul la 'jug par shes pa sla ba ma yin no// ye shes kyi yul shes par sla ba ma yin no// rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa shes par sla ba ma yin no// 'phral pa'i la
363b7(phal chen): shes par sla ba ma yin no// byin gyi rlab kyi las shes par sla ba ma yin no// mthu'i las shes par sla ba ma yin pa nas mdor snga na gom pa mdor shing 'degs pa'i las kyi bar du yang
363b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kyi go phangs 'thob cing / byang chub sa legs pa'i blo gros la gnas pa rnams kyi kyang shes par sla ba ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub
364a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di ni mdor bsdus te bstan na yang de ltar tshad med pa ste/ rgya cher ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs pa
364a2(phal chen): bstan pa'i mthar thug par mi 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi spyod pa'i
364a3(phal chen): yul dang / byin gyi rlab kyang de ltar tshad med na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul gyi rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig yod / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye
364a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ rde'u rgya shugs kyi tsheg gu tsam gnyis sam gsum zhig blang ste/ 'jig rten gyi kham
364a5(phal chen): mtha' yas pa dag na sa'i khams ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rdo ba 'di las ji tsam zhig gi lhag par 'phags shing / lhag par tshad med ces zer ba zhig yod na kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di
364a6(phal chen): ltar khyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams kyi chos nyid pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyi 'ja
364a7(phal chen): ba ni khyod kyi tshig 'di de dang 'dra bar bdag gi 'phags so// kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas gang spang ba'i sa'i khams chud la lhag ma las tshad med
364a8(phal chen): pa de bzhin du/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di kho yang bskal pa grangs med par shin tu stan kyang / phyogs 'tshams zhig bstan tu zad na de bzhin
364b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sa smos su lta ga la yod/ kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyi khong du chud pa dang / yid ches par bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mdun na srang du bzhugs te/
364b2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed cig/ sa 'di lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
364b3(phal chen): rnams kyi/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ rmig ma'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam til gyi zhing thob pa bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprod pa sngon pa
364b4(phal chen): bsgrub pa/ bskal pa mu med par mngon par bsgrub pa de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi ska cig yud tsam thang cig tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yud kyi rgya'i char
364b5(phal chen): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / yang nye bar mi
364b6(phal chen): 'gro ba nas grangs dang / cha dang / bgrangs pa dang / dpe dang / rgyu dang / bskrun pa tsam du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ye shes de lta bu dang / ldan pa'i byang
364b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang / gnyis su med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang yongs su mi stong la/ sangs
364b8(phal chen): rgyas lta ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro yang rab tu byed do// bskal pa re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa la mchod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub
365a1(phal chen): pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po rjes su song bas mchod pa byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byin gyi rlab kyi snang ba yang dag
365a2(phal chen): bar 'dzin to// de ni sngon pas kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa rgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khris
365a3(phal chen): phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig rgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar chos kyi dbyings
365a4(phal chen): yongs su dris pa la shin du stan pas mi 'phrog par gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ lha rdzas kyi rnam par rgyan gyi rnam par mgar bar ma rdung pa rin po che dam pa
365a5(phal chen): smras pa/ lha'i rgyal po dbang bskur gyi yan lag dam pa mgo'o'am mgul du rtags na/ de ma yin pa'i lha dang mi'i rgyan gyi rnam pa gzhan mi 'phrog shing mi thub pa yin/ kye rgyal
365a6(phal chen): nga'i sras de bzhin du byang chub seMs dpa'i sna chos kyi sprin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rgyud de dag kyang / sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
365a7(phal chen): rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yin cing / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phrog pa ma
365a8(phal chen): yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba ni/ sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bzung ba'i rgyu yin te/ de yin pa'i ye shes snang ba
365b1(phal chen): gzhan gyi mi phrogs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i 'od kyi ni skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang khyab la/ sems can rnams kyi
365b2(phal chen): lus kyang tshim par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba yang nyan thos dang / rang
365b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yan chad/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams
365b4(phal chen): kyi kyang mi 'phrog pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar chos nyid la'ang sems can rab tu gzhog go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta
365b5(phal chen): bu dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus gsum gyi ye shes yang dag par bstan to// chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba'i ye shes dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
365b6(phal chen): cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byin gyi rlabs pa dang sems can thams cad dang / zhing kyi chos yongs su shes par bya ba dang /
365b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes nas mdor sna na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob bya ba'i bar du yang dag par bstan to// de'i pha
365b8(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa bcu las ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin shas che ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya ba byang chub seMs da'i
366a1(phal chen): sa bcu mdor bstan pa'o// rgya cher ni bskal pa grangs med pa mu med pas bstan pas mthar thug par shes par bya'o// de la gnas
366a2(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ phal cher lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen por 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i pha
366a3(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa bstan pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas mi 'phrog pa yin/ sbyin pa'am ngag snyan pa 'am/
366a4(phal chen): don bsgrub pa 'am/ don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur snyam te/ sangs rgyas yid
366a5(phal chen): la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang
366a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
366a7(phal chen): 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang / mi bral ba yin te/ de 'dod na gcig yud
366a8(phal chen): tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rab tu thob cing / de dag la sgom par 'jug pa dang /
366b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod tu med pa/ bye ba khrag khrig bcu stong phrag cu'i rdul shin tu zla ba snyed mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlab kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig
366b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed bskyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig
366b3(phal chen): rgya stong phra ba nu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du snyed du gnas par
366b4(phal chen): bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi mi'i mtha' bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed la/ rab tu 'jug pa
366b5(phal chen): dang chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi ning brjed du med pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rnam par dbye bar bya ba dang / lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba
366b6(phal chen): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig/
366b7(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba yang dag par snyan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo// yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams kyi smon las
366b8(phal chen): gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam/ 'od dam rdzu 'phrul li/ mig gam spyod yul li/ dbyings sam spyod pa 'am rgyan tam byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa'i
367a1(phal chen): @mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bcu stong phrag du
367a2(phal chen): ma'i bar gyi kyang bgrangs par dka'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ni rim gyi mngon par du gzhol bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam pa thams
367a3(phal chen): cad tu rjes su song bar lta'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las 'byung ba'i 'bab tshun/ nu rlung chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su
367a4(phal chen): ngoms par byas nas mi zad par byas te/ gong du rnam par 'phel ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i bar du zhon par 'gyur te/ chu de ni thog ma nas kyang rgya mtsho chen po la mngon par gzhol
367a5(phal chen): ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu 'bab pa yang / smon lam chen po'i chu rlung gi rgyun gyi sgo nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis//
367a6(phal chen): sems can gyi khams mos par byas te/ mi zad par byas nas/ gong du rnam par 'phel ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du rgya chen po la mngon
367a7(phal chen): bar zhen par gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu de ni thog ma nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po la mngon par gzhol ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa
367a8(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi gzhi las yong bar gyur te// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po bzhi las/ ri'i rgyal po chen po bcu yod par gyur pa 'di lta
367b1(phal chen): ste/ ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba can dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po spos kyi ngang can dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po rnam par 'dal ba dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po drang srong ri dang / ri'i rgyal/
367b2(phal chen): po chen po gany+dza shing 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po rta na ri dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po sa 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po 'khor yug dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po dpal chen dang / ri'i
367b3(phal chen): rgyal po chen po ri rab chen po dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras de la 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po kha ba can ni/ sman gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sman sna tshogs
367b4(phal chen): thams cad blangs pas mthar thug pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / 'jig rten
367b5(phal chen): ba'i gtsug lag dang tshig dang sngags dang / rig pa'i gnas kyi 'byang gnas yin te/ 'jig pa'i rtsag lag dang / tshig dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i gnas rten pas mthar
367b6(phal chen): thug pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/ spos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs blangs pas/ de bzhin du byang chub
367b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa dang tshul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te//
367b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang / tshul khrims rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos kyi mthar thug pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po
368a1(phal chen): @#rnam par 'dal ba ni rin po che'i rang bzhin du dag pa/ rin po che rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
368a2(phal chen): thams cad blang bas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan
368a3(phal chen): dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang sgom par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / mngon par
368a4(phal chen): shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i
368a5(phal chen): rgyal po chen po drang srong ri ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang
368a6(phal chen): srong bgrang bas zad pa med do// kye rgya lha sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / lam dang lam ma yin pa'i
368a7(phal chen): khyad par dang / drag shes pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lam dang lam ma yin pa'i khyad par dang bye brag gi rgyus yongs su dris pa yongasu bstan pas zad
368a8(phal chen): par mi 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po gnya' shing 'dzin ni// rin po che'i rang+gA rnam par dag pa gnod sprin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan
368b1(phal chen): pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po bgrang bas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shin du rgyal bar dka'
368b2(phal chen): ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mngon par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ mngon par
368b3(phal chen): shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul yongasu dris pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po ta na
368b4(phal chen): ri ni/ rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa shing rtog gi nas rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/ shing rtog gi rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad blang nas zad par mi 'gyuraro//
368b5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon gsum la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa shin tu bstan
368b6(phal chen): ba'i 'byung gnas yin te/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu mngon par khong du chud par bya ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/
368b7(phal chen): ri'i rgyal po chen po sa 'dzin ni/ rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dge pa/ klu rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas te/ rdzu 'phrul chen po can 'grang bas zad pa/
368b8(phal chen): med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yang thabs dang / shes rab shin du bstan
369a1(phal chen): ba'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon par khong du chud par bya ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad
369a2(phal chen): pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ltar ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po 'khor yug ni/ rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dbang du gyur pa/ rnams kyi 'byung
369a3(phal chen): gnas yin te/ dbang du gyur pa bgrang bas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang
369a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dbang mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su dris pa shin du snyan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par che ba yongs su dris pa bstan
369a5(phal chen): pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po dpal dang ldan pa ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan
369a6(phal chen): pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas te/ lha ma yin rdzu 'phral chen po can dgrang bas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros
369a7(phal chen): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes rgyud thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'gro ba thams cad 'byung gnas su dris pa
369a8(phal chen): bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po re rab ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa/ lha rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnas
369b1(phal chen): kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lha rdzu 'phrul chen po bgrang bas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
369b2(phal chen): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yang dag par
369b3(phal chen): bstan pa/ yongs su dris pa bstan pas zad pa med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar rin po che chen po'i ri de dag rgya che chen po las byung zhing rgya mtsho chen po las smos pa de bzhin
369b4(phal chen): du/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las smos pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
369b5(phal chen): 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rnam pa bcus mi 'phrog pa'i phyir/ rgya mtsho grangs su 'gro ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rim gyi gzhol ba dang / shi ba'i ro dang mi 'grog
369b6(phal chen): pa dang / chu gzhan gyi grangs yongs su spangs dang / ro cig pa dang / rin po che mang ba dang / zab cing ting ring ba dang / yang zhing tshad med pa dang / 'byung po mang po'i gnas
369b7(phal chen): su gyur pa dang / bres kyi tshul las mi 'da' ba dang / sprin chen po'i char thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas mi ngom pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
369b8(phal chen): yang spyod pa rnam pa banus mi 'phrog pa'i grangs su 'gro'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sa rab tu dga' ba la smon lam chen po rim gyi mngon par bsgru
370a1(phal chen): pas gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma dang bral ba la khrims ngan pa'i ro dang mi 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od
370a2(phal chen): byed pa 'jig rten par gdags pa'i grangs yongs spang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'phro ba can la sangs rgyas la mos pa'i mi phyed pa'i ro gcig dang / byang chub sems dpa'
370a3(phal chen): sa shin du rgyal bar dka' ba la thabs dang / mngon par shes pa tshad med pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i rin po che mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
370a4(phal chen): sa mngon gsum la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rab tu brtag pas shin du zab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la/ blo rnam par 'byed pa dang / mkhas pa yang shing
370a5(phal chen): tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la rgyan chen po mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'i 'byung ba mang po gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa
370a6(phal chen): legs pa'i blo gres la rnam par thar pa zab mo dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi dpe las ma 'da' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
370a7(phal chen): sa chos kyi sprin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos snang ba'i sprin chen po'i char yang dag par bzung bas mi ngom pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rim
370a8(phal chen): po che'i mkhan po mkhas pas shin tu bsregs/ shin du bsgrub/ shin du sbyang / shin tu dag par byas/ leg par phug rin po che'i sras bus leg par rtags/ rin po che bai
370b1(phal chen): dur+ya'i rtsa ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gzhag ste/ 'od thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba la rgyal pos bsngags par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rigs bcu las 'das shi na/ shin
370b2(phal chen): tu 'phags par gyur pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la rin po ches phan gartags pa'i don du nye bar gnas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos
370b3(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po che skyed pa yang spangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / rdul shugs dang / dka' thub kyi shin du sreg/ bsam gtan rnam
370b4(phal chen): bar dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sgom par 'jug pas shin tu bsgrubs/ lam gyi yan lag gi rnam pas shin tu sbyangs/ thabs dang mngon par shes pas shin tu dag par
370b5(phal chen): byas/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas shin tu phug/ thabs dang shes rab rin po ches tshogs kyi sras bus shin tu rtags/ dbang gi rnam pa rin po che bI dUr+ya'i yu ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse
370b6(phal chen): mo la gzhag/ sems can gyi spyod pa rab tu rtag pa dang / thos pa'i ye shes kyi 'od rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
370b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rin po che thams cad kyi yang dag par phan
370b8(phal chen): rtags pa'i don du gnas pa yin te de'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa zhes kyang bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub nas/ rnam tho ba bas
371a1(phal chen): cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang yon tan yang dag par gsags pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di ni/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
371a2(phal chen): skyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'o na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang
371a3(phal chen): yon tan yang dag par bsags pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di gang gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs ci tsam zhig dang ldan par 'gyur byang chub sems dpa'
371a4(phal chen): rdo rje snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi thu ci tsam pa de snyed kyi bsod nams kyi ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems skyed cing / bsgrub par
371a5(phal chen): dmigs pa la yod de chos kyi sgo'i rgyud kyi 'di grag cing mngon par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang de tsam du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa tham
371a6(phal chen): cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan yang dag par bsags pa'i chos kyi rgyud 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas mnyam pa 'am/ mos par bya ba'am/
371a7(phal chen): bzung bar yang mi nus na/ sgom pa'i rnam pa'i sbyor bas bcom pa nus pa lta ci smos/ de bas ni kye rgyal ba'i sras gang gi chos kyi sgo'i rgyud 'di thos te/ thos nas mos par byed pa dang /
371a8(phal chen): mos par byas shing 'dzin pa dang / sgom pa'i rnam pas rtsom par byed na/ sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang ldan par shes par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe
371b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos nyid thob pas/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po ba/
371b2(phal chen): brgyad tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul lo// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldego/ rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu ldeg go/ chem chem rab
371b3(phal chen): tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos nyid rab tu
371b4(phal chen): thob pas/ lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi mngon par 'bab po// lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab po// lha rdzas kyi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab po// lha rdzas
371b5(phal chen): kyi rgyal mtshan gyi char mngon par 'bab po// lha rdzas kyi bdan sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra mngon pa
371b6(phal chen): sgrogs so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la mngon par stod pa'i klu'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra mngon par sgrogs so// ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten khyams 'di'i
371b7(phal chen): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su/ lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying por lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang phyogs bcur
371b8(phal chen): rgyas par gang zhing chos ston pa 'di yang / thams cad byung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthu phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i
372a1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phyogs bcu rgyas par byed cing lhags te/ de nas phyin nas kyang 'di skad ces zer ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar
372a2(phal chen): khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di brjod pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang snying po zhes bya bar ming mthun pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams
372a3(phal chen): rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i drung nas 'di ltar lhags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na yang
372a4(phal chen): chos kyi bstan pa 'di nyid sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di 'dra ba dag la/ tshig 'di dag nyid dang / khong du chud par bya ba 'di dag nyid/ don 'di nyid lhag chad med
372a5(phal chen): par mngon par brjod pa de 'byung bar gyur to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor 'dir phyin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig
372a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'dir bdag cag ji ltar phyin ci log zhig du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gzhan 'phrul dbang
372a7(phal chen): byed kyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che'i snying po yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems
372a8(phal chen): dpa' rnams phyin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcu'i rnam par ltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la ltas nas/
372b1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings la rnam par lta ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems skyed pa yang dag par brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par
372b2(phal chen): bstan pa dang / spyod pa'i stobs yang dag par sbyang ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dri ma gsal ba dang / thams cad
372b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan rab tu
372b4(phal chen): brjod par byed cing / sa'i don 'di yang rtag par bya ba dang bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing dang dul dga' zhi zhing dul
372b5(phal chen): ba'i yid ldan pa/ na mkha'i dbyings 'dra bar snang mkha' mtshungs 'dra zhing / za ba'i dri ma rnam sbyangs lam rnams shes gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par rab
372b6(phal chen): la nyon// bskal pa bye bar dge ba brgya stong rab bsags shing // sangs rgyas rgya stong drang srong chen po mchod byas te// dbang bsgyur rnams dang
372b7(phal chen): rang rgyal mtha' yas mchod byas nas/ 'gro ba kun la phan phyir byang chub sems skye'o// rtul shugs dka' thub dka' spyod du la bzod ldan
372b8(phal chen): gyur la// khyel yod dpal gyi bzod ldan ye shes dge 'phags shing / blo gros rigs yang sangs rgyas ye shes sems ldan gyi/
373a1(phal chen): byang chub sems rab rgyal ba'i stobs dang mnyam 'dra ste/ dus gsum rgyal ba ji snyed mchod pa'i phyir// na mkha'i dbyings/
373a2(phal chen): tshad zhing rnams thams cad yongs su sbyongs/ chos rnams thams cad ji snyed de dag mnyam rtogs pas/ 'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du byang chub sems skyed do// gzhal yas sems mchog ra
373a3(phal chen): tu thob 'gyur nas// sdig pa thams cad bsal phyir rdul med rab tu dga'// smon lam stobs dpyad dkar chos yang dag bsal byas nas// snying rje brtse ldan sa'i gong ma yongs
373a4(phal chen): su gnon/ 'gro phyir byams sems tshul khrims thob dang yon tan ldan/ dri med dri bral rang bzhin yongs dag bsam pa yis// 'jig rten thams cad me gsum 'bar bar mthong
373a5(phal chen): 'gyur nas/ gsum pa rnams yang blo yis 'gro ba'i don du gnon/ sdug bsngal mi rtag nad pa zug rngu mi bde ba'i// khams gsum rtag tu sdug bsngal brgya'i me 'bar bas/
373a6(phal chen): 'dus byas nyes mthong rgyal ba'i legs pa mngon mos shing / ye shes 'od 'phro yang ldan 'ong 'phro yod pa gnon// dran dang blo ldan lam gyi ye shes thob gyur cig/ sa mchog de la sangs rgyas
373a7(phal chen): brgya stong snyen bkur nas/ mi'i gtso bo yon tan rtag tu dran byed cing / 'gro ba kun gyi dka' thub rgyal bar dka' ba gnon// ye shes blo gros thabs dang shes rab blo dpyod pas/ 'gro don
373a8(phal chen): mtha' yas sna tshogs byas pa stan byas shing / stobs bcu mchod pa sems can don rnams bsgrubs byed de// mi skye mngon gsum mtha' yas drag po yongs su gnon// 'jig rten kun
373b1(phal chen): tu 'gro bas shes dkar spyod byed cing / bdag bral byed med yod dang med pa rnams bsal ba'i// rang bzhin stong chos yan lag bcu gnyis rab 'byung zhes/ 'phra zhing rno ba'i sems ldan bdun pa/
373b2(phal chen): yongs su gnon// zab dang shes rab sems yangs rab tu thob gyur cing / ring du song ba gdul dka' ring du song ba gnon// rang bzhin dul shing zhi phyir du ma'i sems spangs te// de nas nam
373b3(phal chen): mkha' 'dra ba'i mig g.yo yongs su gnon// de la mkhas pa'i ye shes las rnams sna tshogs shing // zhi ba de las bslab zhi mi'i mchog tu rnams// dbang bcu ldan zhing 'jig rten yang dag
373b4(phal chen): nyid spyod pa'i// rang bzhin chen po'i 'gro phyir legs pa'i blo gros gnon// 'di la shin du phra ba 'jig rten kun dpyod cing // sems can thibs po'i spyod ldan nyon mongs las spyod te/ de dag
373b5(phal chen): gdul ba'i spyod pas yon tan mang po gnon// bde gshegs mdzod thob don gyi dam pa rab tu ston// dkar chos rim gyi de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan gyur pas// sa dgu'i bar du bsod nams ye/
373b6(phal chen): shes tshogs thob cing // rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs mchog don dam mchog 'dod pa// ye shes yon tan dbang bskur sangs rgyas kun las thob// brgya stong phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin grangs
373b7(phal chen): med pa// spyod yul shes pa che nyid shes yang thob gyur pa// de'i rjes la thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur thob// yul yang ting 'dzin de dag thob pas de mi skul// gang tshe de yis kun
373b8(phal chen): mkhyen dbang bskur thob pa'i tshe// pad+mo rgya chen rin chen kun gyi brgyan pa 'byung // de'i mthun lus kyi dbus su gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras kyi yongs bskor de la lta zhing gnas/
374a1(phal chen): @de'i 'od pa ma thag khrigs pa yas stong drag sang / phyogs bcu'i mgro nga'i sdug bsngal kun kyang ni bar byed// mgo'i drugs nas 'od zer bye ba stong byung zhing /
374a2(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun gyi mi'i gtso bo'i 'khor du rgyud// stong gi mkha'i dbyings la 'od zer dra bar gnas// sangs rgyas mchog phyir brtson par rgyal ba'i zhabs su 'dod// de'i rgyal ba rnams dang
374a3(phal chen): rgyal sras rnams kyis kyang // chos rab don du rgyal bas dbang bskur thob par mkhyen// mchod pa'i don du rgyal sras mtha' yas kun kyang 'ong // de tshe kun mkhyen dbang bskur mi mchog
374a4(phal chen): mdzod spu nas// dbang bskur 'od zer dam pa mang po 'gyur// 'od zer mchog gi bskor cing spyi bo gtsug tu nub// gang tshe rgyal mchog pu'i mthu'o srid mchog la// dbang bskur bzhin du
374a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskor tshe// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad kun nas g.yo bar 'gyur// mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal de'i tshe zhi zhing dal// gang tshe kun mkhyen dbang gi mngon pa
374a6(phal chen): dbang bskur ba// de phyir mkhas pas chos sprin sa mchog thob ces bya// mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i shing rgyud chad med de// sa rab 'di gnas pa'i 'gro kun gtso yin no// gzugs dang gzus
374a7(phal chen): med de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams yang dang // sems can khams dang zhi dang chos khams yangs pa dang // grangs dang grangs med na mkha'i khams kyi bar tu te// chos dbyings yang ba tham
374a8(phal chen): cad ma nor khong du chung / 'di la gnas pa mthu chen sprul pa'i las kun dang / de bzhin byin rlab rgyas pa'i ye shes dang // mi mchog gsang ba'i bskal pa'i grangs rnams shes pa dang /
374b1(phal chen): skra tse cig tu 'jig rten khams rnams bzung ba dang / mi'i gtso bo 'byung dang sku tshe 'tshang rgya dang / 'khor lo dam pa bskor dang mya ngan 'da' ba'i rnams// thams cad shes rab gong
374b2(phal chen): du rnam thar zhi ba dag/ sngan chad ma thob de kun de tshe rab tu thob// 'di la gnas pa mthu chen rgyal po'i chos kyi sprin// thams cad khong du chud byed dran pas kun kyang 'dzin// klu rnams kun
374b3(phal chen): gyi sprin char rgya mtsho 'dzin pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal po'i chos sprin char chen kun kyang 'dzin// rgyal ba cig las chos gang mthu chen des thos pa// de la phyogs bcu mtha' yas zhing gi
374b4(phal chen): sems can rnams// thams cad bde gshegs nyan thos thos pa 'dzin gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa' thos pa'i stobs kyi sngan chad spyod pa'i mthus// ska cig yud tsam cig
374b5(phal chen): tu khrag khrig zhing bkang zhing / bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs nyon mongs kun kyang zhi bar byed// de phyir rgyal bar 'di ming chos kyi sprin ces gsungs// 'di gnas mthu chen lha'i 'jig rten gtsor
374b6(phal chen): gyur pa'i// phyogs rnams kun tu mi'i gtso bo'i yul yang ston/ rnam 'phrul khrag khrig stong phrag du ma 'ang ba ston te// byang chub spyod pa de sems 'gro ba mos par 'gyur// mkhas
374b7(phal chen): pa legs ldan 'di gnas gom bor ba tsam// sa dgu'i bar du shes par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan gyi shes par mi 'gyur smos ci dgos// dus gsum nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyi de
374b8(phal chen): bzhin no// de nas thams cad mkhyen par 'gro ba kun la ston// shes rab dus gsum kun tu thog med zhi chos can// zhing rnams kun du rgyas bkang chos rnams kun gyi bar//
375a1(phal chen): rgyal ba mngon du mchod pas mchod byed 'phrog pa med// yon tan kun ldan sa'i lha'i lha zhes bya// mkhas pa 'di gnas shes rab
375a2(phal chen): snang bar 'gro kun gyi// mun pas kun bsal chos kyi tshul yang rab tu ston// dbang phyugs dam pa'i mthu yis 'gro ba'i 'dod chags sel// de bas rgyal sras nyon mongs sel
375a3(phal chen): bas mkhas ces bya// 'di la gnas pa de dag khams gsum dbang phyug 'gyur// ye shes tshul shes theg pa gsum po bston la mkhas// ska cig yud tsam cig gi ting nge 'dzin
375a4(phal chen): cig min// phyogs 'di la gnas de dag khams gsum dbang phyug 'gyur// ye shes tshul shes theg pa gsum po bston la mkhas// ska cig yud tsam gcig gi ting nge gcig mig
375a5(phal chen): min thob// phyogs bcur kun gyis dam pa cig min ston// 'di ni bdag gi rgyal sras rnams mdor snyan pa// rgya cher bskal pa brgya phrag stong gi ston mi nus// yon tan 'di'i
375a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas ye shesas 'di la// gnas pa rtag tu ri'i rgyal po bzhin mi g.yo// rgyal sras thog ma gtsug lag kun gyis mi g.yo ste// sman gyi rnam pa gnas kyi rgyal gang
375a7(phal chen): bzhin no// nul khrims thob bas gnyis pa spros dang 'dra// rnam 'dal me tog ji bzhin gsum shes bya// lam la mos bzhin mi 'khrug 'od 'phro thob pa ste// drang srong ga
375a8(phal chen): gnan mkhas pa rnams tan gyur pa'o// gnod sbyin gna' zhing 'dzin zhing bsam las lnga ba thob// rten shing rtags 'dra bar drug pa'i 'bras bu ste// 'dul bas pani
375b1(phal chen): kun bzhin shes rab chen pos thob// khor yug dbang ldan bzhin du brgyad pa dbang chen thob// dgu pa dri ma sel ba dpal can lha mi bzhin// bcu pa rgyal ba'i legs ldan
375b2(phal chen): ri rab lha gnas 'dra// dang po smon lam sngon 'gro gong mtshul khrims tshogs// gsum pa spyod pa'i yon tan bzhi pa cig gi dngos// lhag pa dge mang drag pa shin du zab pa'i
375b3(phal chen): dngos// brgyad pa blo gros yang ba kun tu cig min brgyan// dgu pa mkhas pa'i ye shes phra zhing zab dang ldan// 'gro rgyud thams cad ye shes ldan pas rab tu gnon// bcu pa rgyal ba rnams
375b4(phal chen): la yang dag chos 'dzin te// rgyal sras skyod pa mi skal rgya mtsho de 'dra'o// spyod pa bcu 'das thog ma'i sems rab skyed par 'gyur// dka' thub rtul bas gnyis pa gsum pa bsam gtan gyi//
375b5(phal chen): dag pas bzhi pa shin du byang bas lnga pa'o// drug pa rnon pos rtogs pa'i bdun pa mi phyed pas// brgyad pa mthu chen rdo rje rgyal mtshan lnga pa yin// dgu pa ye shes ldan pas thib po'i bla shes//
375b6(phal chen): bcu pa rgyal bas dbang bskur rgyal ba'i dbang thob bzhin// yon tan rin chen dag pas de bzhin rim du 'bar// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams gshegs te bgrang bar nus// rnam
375b7(phal chen): shes cig gi 'gro ba kun sems shes par rung // na mkha'i dbyings kun sgra yis gzhal bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i yon tan bskal pa khrag khrig bshad mi nus// de bzhin gshegs
375b8(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par gnas sde// yid dga' bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos de skad ces smras pa dang /
376a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang na bzhugs shing // mngon par sangs rgyas nas ring por mi lon te// nag bdun pa
376a2(phal chen): gnyis la bab pa'i tshe// lha'i rgyal po dbang byed kyi gzhal med khang na nor bu rin po che'i snying po can na bzhugs pas// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos bshad pa la mngon dgyes par
376a3(phal chen): par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang // lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
376a4(phal chen): mgon po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gtsang ma'i rigs su gtog pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mngon par dga'o// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las
376a5(phal chen): sa bcu'i le'u ste sum bcu gcig pa'o// // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// / bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa'o// bcom
376a6(phal chen): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i
376a7(phal chen): spyod pa la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ byed khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid nas/
376a8(phal chen): phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can 'khod pa bcu 'thon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang
376b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor// seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi snying po can 'khod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ bye ba khrag
376b2(phal chen): khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bskor cing mdun du byas pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya dag ste/ 'di
376b3(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du snang bar mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zab mo'i mdzod kyi snying pos byu ba
376b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi bzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin sgra zab mo
376b5(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad mdzod kyi snying po byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mi byed pa'i gtsug gi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
376b6(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po ngag gi lam mi g.yo bar kun tu 'gro ba'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grag
376b7(phal chen): ba kun tu rnam par grags pa'i 'od zer gyi gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i 'od zer snang
376b8(phal chen): ba'i gzi brjid kyi mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun lta ba'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs 'od zer gyi
377a1(phal chen): rgyal po snang ba ga'i brjid kyi mdzodzad kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bcu rnam pa
377a2(phal chen): dag par thub med pa'i 'od zer snang ba'i gzi brjid kyi snying po byung ba zhes bya ba dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar 'thon ma thag tu/ de'i mdo las
377a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ma rtag par/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyang lang bar gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
377a4(phal chen): po kun tu bzang po 'ong ma rtogs par/ 'od thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur te/ thams cad kyang zil gyi non par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi
377a5(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa mang po'ang mngon par 'byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar spos kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kyi tshar mngon pa
377a6(phal chen): bab par gyur to// me tog sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// byung ba'i sprin chos
377a7(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// gdugs kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha
377a8(phal chen): mngon par bab par gyur to// gos kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyabu blag bcu stong gi par mngon par bab par gyur to// rin po na'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams/
377b1(phal chen): cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// rgyal mtshan gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi
377b2(phal chen): char mngon par dab par gyur to// ba dan gyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
377b3(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
377b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// 'od kyi dra ba snang ba chen po'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par/
377b5(phal chen): khyab pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang mngon par dab par gyur to// rin po che sna tshogs gzhal med khang gi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par bye ba khrag khrig
377b6(phal chen): brgya stong gi char mngon par bab par gyur to// snying po byang chub kyi brgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par
377b7(phal chen): dab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan snang ba'i gos kyi sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas bur khyab par bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char mngon par bab
377b8(phal chen): par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi seng ge'i khri mang po de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa'i re re'i seng ge'i khri'i brgyan/ rin po che rnam par
378a1(phal chen): dag pa re re dang / dmigs pa mang ba ri de dag thams cad ma/ dmigs pa re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams/ 'jas gras pa ba
378a2(phal chen): cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad la dmigs pa re re zhing yang sems can gyi khams 'jam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmig
378a3(phal chen): pa mang po de dag thams cad dmigs pa re re zhing yang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag thams cad las
378a4(phal chen): dmigs pa re re zhing yang / dus 'jam klas pa thams cad yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang po de dag las dmigs pa re re zhing yang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
378a5(phal chen): 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa thams cad brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ de bzhin
378a6(phal chen): gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ sems can 'dul ba dang bcas pa/ ming gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa/
378a7(phal chen): mang po yongs su snang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus dag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams gong du byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyad par gyur pa de dag
378a8(phal chen): kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs drung na ma khod cing pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su sbyong ba yang yongs su snang bar gyur to// dmigs pa mang
378b1(phal chen): po de dag thams cad las dmigs pa re re zhing yang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'jim klas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ sangs rgyas skye ba dang
378b2(phal chen): bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ sems can 'das
378b3(phal chen): ba dang bcas pa/ mig gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa mang po yongs su snang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug dus dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang du byang chub
378b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod par gyur pa de dag kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs kyi drang na 'khod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dag
378b5(phal chen): kyang yongs su snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i de dag 'di snyam du gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa ni gang dang gang nas lhag/
378b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang dang gang gi zhabs drung nas phyin snyam ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil khor de dag thams cad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
378b7(phal chen): po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag lhag ni gang nas lhags/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa
378b8(phal chen): ni gang shed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig gi zhabs drung nas 'dir phyin te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i
379a1(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras sa// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bas na/ khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'di/
379a2(phal chen): dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas lhag/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig gi zhabs drung nas phyin pa yongs su rtag pa dang / yongs su spyad bgyi shig/ de nas byang chub seMs
379a3(phal chen): dpa' chags pa med pa'i mig gi kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings shin du rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang /
379a4(phal chen): mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / dmigs pa thams cad shin du rnam par phye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus mngon par shes pa
379a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu rtog pa zhes bya ba dag la mnyam par gzhag go/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems
379a6(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu la/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang mnyam par gzhag ste/ kun gyi kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
379a7(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan sha stag la snyoms par gzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong ba de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drang na/ byang chub sem
379a8(phal chen): dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag kyang ma mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de dag las lang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces
379b1(phal chen): smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu la mnyam par/
379b2(phal chen): gzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong / byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs drung na/ tshangs par spyod
379b3(phal chen): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de
379b4(phal chen): dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag da dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa gang nas lhag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi
379b5(phal chen): drung nas lhag pa lhag pa gyi shig/ spyad par gyi shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa de dag ni mthong bar dka'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs kyi drung
379b6(phal chen): du/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dag kyang de bas kyi shin tu mthong bar dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
379b7(phal chen): de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par gzhag go/ de la mnyam par
379b8(phal chen): gzhag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi/ 'jig rten gyi kham 'jam klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi zhabs drung na/ byang chub sem
380a1(phal chen): dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bzhin nyid kyang mu mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la
380a2(phal chen): blang te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' re res/ byang chub sems
380a3(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed la mnyam par gzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo // gang gi zhabs kyi
380a4(phal chen): drung na byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rten
380a5(phal chen): las na mkha'i dbyings su 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'daso lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
380a6(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chags pa mi mnga' ba'i brgyan dang ldan pa dang / dus gsum mtshungs par snyam pa'i/ 'jig rten
380a7(phal chen): gyi khams 'jam klas par thams cad kun tu khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin pa 'di la ltos shig dang /
380a8(phal chen): de la 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs snyan du gyur par snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs snyan du gyur/
380b1(phal chen): bar snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' 'jam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs rnyan du gyur par snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa thams cad gzugs brnyan du gyur par
380b2(phal chen): snang ngo // lam gyi rgyu 'jam klas pa thams cad kyang gzugs snyan du gyur par snang ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag de bas na khyed kyi rang gi lus kun tu lta ba'i mig dang ldan par
380b3(phal chen): byin gyi rlob la shes rab kyi dmigs pa na mkha'i dbyings kyi klas par byin gyi rlobs ste/ ye shes yang pa'i dmigs pa thams cad kyi rje su song ba'i khong du chud par gyi la/
380b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jam klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyi rlob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad du mi gnas pa 'di la/ gnas
380b5(phal chen): thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i lta bas ltos shig/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang / srid pa thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / shin
380b6(phal chen): du phra ba'i tshul gyi stobs bcu'i stobs yongs su non pa dang / dmigs rlung ngu la rgya chen por 'jug pa'i lta bas ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i de dag gi/
380b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i gdam ngag bzhin du thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas sems shing rtog pa dang /
380b8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi thil gnyis kyi 'khor lo'i rtsib stong yod pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings 'khor lo zhes bya bar mthong bar gyur to// 'dzag
381a1(phal chen): @kyi khams cas kying byangs la bar lags pa bar mthong bar gyur te// 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dbyings
381a2(phal chen): rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing mtsho skyong de de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems kun tu snang ba'i mdzod kyi snying po byung ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i
381a3(phal chen): 'khor los sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskor cing 'dun du byas te 'ongs nas se ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i
381a4(phal chen): rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs byin pa ri dgas in na'i ya'i byin pa lta bu gnyis la 'jig rten gyi khams chags zags pa med pa'i snying po
381a5(phal chen): can zhes bya ba yod de// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rgya mtsho chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i snying pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ngo // chos ston to// de'i sangs
381a6(phal chen): kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
381a7(phal chen): brjod du me yang \u0f7fbye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'ong nas seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa rgyan gyi snying po can la 'dug
381a8(phal chen): go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs pus mo gnyis kyi lha nga la/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa lai sbram yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'dra
381b1(phal chen): bdam pa zhes bya ba zhugs shing mtsho skyong ngo // chos ston to// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid kyis mdzod kyi snying pos byung ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub
381b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bkar cing 'dun du byas te 'ong na
381b3(phal chen): seng ge'i khri chags pa med pa'i snying po can la 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku sta zur gyi dkyil 'khor la 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs kyi brgyan gyi snying po zhes
